[\[21a.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_yan lag gi phyogs gcig skrangs pa'i nad la ni/_ka ra bI ra la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu dro 'jam tsam gyis bskus pa phan no/_/ba spu ba ni du rga'o/_/king shu ka ni pa la sha'o/_/na li ka ni pa dru ma la ta'o/_/ko sha ta ka ni kri ta tsi tra'o/_/bong nga ni a ti bi
[\[21a.7\]]Sha'o/_/ta li'i lo ma ni mo sa li'o/_/dza yan ti ni ag ni man ta'o/_/'ol ma se ni gun dza'o/_/pri sha karni ni mu sha kar ni'o/_/rid ti ni dud sti'o/_/bri ti tra ba ni shir sha'o/_/ha sti ka ra Na ni glang po che'i rna ba ste ba ra dada'o/_/de nas 'or nad rlung gyur la/_/zla phyed bar du dur byid
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]dam/_/yang na e raN+Da'i mar blud/_/ces bya ba la/_de nas rlung las gyur pa'i 'or nad la dur byid dang bskol ba'i mar ram/_e raN+Da las byung ba'i mar zla ba phyed kyi bar du blud par bya'o/_/rlung gis rtug 'gags la de nyid/_/zas kyi sngon du 'o ma 'am/_/sha khu blud cing
[\[21b.2\]]rlung 'jom pa'i /_/sman gyi dugs dang bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'or nad la rlung gis rtug pa 'gags pa dang ldan pa la ni e raN+Da'i til mar de nyid zas ma zos pa'i sngon du 'o ma 'am/_sha khu dang sbyang te blud par bya'o/_/yang na rlung las gyur pa'i 'or nad la rlung 'jom pa'i sman gang
[\[21b.3\]]dag yin pa dugs dang bsku ba'i rnam pa dag bya'o/_/phyogs gcig skrangs la kha lung dang /_ag ni man tha sdang spos dang /_/bca' sga thang shing lde gus bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus kyi phyogs gcig skrangs par gyur pa la ni/_kha lung la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gus bsku
[\[21b.4\]]bar bya'o/_/mkhris gyur tig ta'i sman mar ram/_n+ya gro d+ha sogs bskol ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad la tig ta'i sman mar ram/_n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i mar blud par bya'o/_/skom dad che dang rmongs bag tsha/_/'o ma bsku byug bsil ba
[\[21b.5\]]bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa'i 'or nad skom dad che ba dang /_rmongs bag dang khong tsha ba gyur pa la ni 'o ma blud pa dang /_de bzhin du bsku ba dang byug pa dang reg pa dang nus pa'i sman gyis byas pa phan no/_/pa to la rtsa kyi lce ba/_/shing mngar thang shing pu tse shel/_/skyer pa
[\[21b.6\]]tsaN+Dan a ru ra/_/da na lcang ma bi sha la/_/pi pi ling dang mar bskol blud/_/khong tsha mgo 'khor skom dad che/_/'dus pa'i nad dang me dbal skrang /_/lus tsha rim dang bcas pa sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_pa to la la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba mar dang bcas pa blud na khong tsha
[\[21b.7\]]ba la sogs pa'i nad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las gyur dong ga sogs/_/til mar dang ni bskol ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i 'or nad la ni dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan dang bskol ba'i til mar blud par bya'o/_/rgyun srang 'gags shing me drod nyams/_/
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]rmongs bag yi ga 'chus pa la/_/thal sman chang snying mnan chang dang /_/ba gcin dar bar bcas pa blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i skran nad rgyun srang 'gags pa la sogs pa la ni thal sman la sogs pa blud cing bsten par bya'o/_/pi pi ling
[\[22a.2\]]dang 'ba' cha rnying /_/shi kru'i shun pa zangs ma dang /_/ba gcin lde gu dro 'jam sbyar/_/bsku dang dril ba'i las la sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_pi pi ling la sogs pa ba gcin dang lde gur byas pa dro 'jam tsam gyis lus la bsku ba dang dril phyis bya ba la sbyar bar bya'o/_/ru rta ag ni man
[\[22a.3\]]tha dang /_/rgya sran dong ga tsi tra ka_/ba gcin chu bskol bas khrus bya/_/tsa rong a ka ru yis byug_/ces bya ba la/_ru rta la sogs pa'i sman ba gcin dang chu'i nang du bskol la des khrus byas la/_tsa rong dang a ka ru'i lde gur byas pas ni byug par bya'o/_/nA ga ba la sa ra la/_/
[\[22a.4\]]a za sring gi a ma ba ta/_/a za gan+d+ha zhes bya dang /_/a shwa gan+d+ha'i lde gu ni/_/yan lag phyogs gcig skrangs la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang yan lag gi phyogs gcig skrangs pa'i 'or nad la ni nA ga la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na phan no/_/sa ra la ni tsi tra'o/_/am ba ta
[\[22a.5\]]ni e'i sha shi ka'o/_/a za gan+d+ha ni bad gab+d+ha'o/_/nad gzhi ji bzhin yan lag ni/_/nye ba'i phyogs nas gtar ga bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yan lag gi phyogs gcig la brten pa'i skran nad la nad gzhi so so ji lta ba dang /_yan lag gi phyogs gang dang nye ba'i phyogs nas gtar
[\[22a.6\]]ga bya ba la/_slon sman dang bkru sman gyis sbyang par bya'o/_/'dris pa'i nad la nad gzhi ni/_/shas che'i dbang du gso ba bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dris pa'i nad dang ldan pa dang /_'dus pa zhes bya ba la ni/_nad gzhi gang shas che ba'i dbang du byas nas ji skad smos pa'i gso ba nyid ci rigs
[\[22a.7\]]par sbyar bar bya'o/_/go snyod pa tha gla sgang dang /_/kaN+da ka ri tsha ba lnga/_/skyer ba chu dron sbyar blud pa/_/rtsa mkhris bca' sga chu dron blud/_/nad gzhi gsum gyi 'or nad ni/_/yun rings lon zhing tshabs chen sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_go snyod la sogs pa'i lde gu chu dron dang sbyar te
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]blud na/_nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i 'or nad yun ring po lon cing tshabs shin tu che ba dag kyang sel bar byed do/_/de bzhin du rtsa mkhris zhes bya ba bu nim pa dang bca' sga bskol ba'i chu dron blud na yang yon tan de dang 'dra'o/_/sle tres dang ni a ru ra/_thang shing gu gul ba
[\[22b.2\]]spru ba/_/ba gcin sbyar blud dmu rdzing dang /_mdze dang skya rbab srin bu'i nad/_/gcin nad za khu bad kan dang /_/rlung ni stod du 'joms pa sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_sle tres la sogs pa'i sman ba gcin dang sbyar te blud na dmu rdzing la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/de ltar
[\[22b.3\]]rang rang nad kyi dbang byas bshad/_/snad ba las byung ba la khrag dbyung zhing /_bsil sman mar khus byugs shing byugs shing blugs par bya/_dug skyes skrangs la dug sel sbyor ba bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul de ltar rang rang gi nad gzhi'i dbang du byas nas 'or nad kyi gso ba bshad pa yin la/
[\[22b.4\]]mtshon la sogs pas snang pa las byung ba la gtar ga bya ba dang /_bsil ba'i sman dang mar la sogs pas bsku ba la sogs pa byas la dug gis phog pa las gyur pa'i skrangs nad la ni dug sel ba'i sbyor ba gang dag yin pa byas na phan no/_/grong dang rlan can chur gnas sha rid rlon/
[\[22b.5\]]tshod skam til gyi zas dang bu ram can/_/phye btags zas dang zho dang lan tsha dang /_/kha zas rul bag chang skyur yos sha skam/_/'dris pa'i zas dang lci dang ma goms za/_/tsha ba bskyed dang nyin par gnyid log dang /_/mtshan mo gnyid ma log dang nyal po rnams/_/'or nad can
[\[22b.6\]]gyis de dag thams cad spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_skrang nad dang ldan pa thams cad kyis kyang grod gi phyogs kyi sha la sogs pa dang /_tshod ma skom po la sogs pa spang par bya'o/_/chur gnas ni chu na spyod pa'i srog chags kyi sha'o/_/chur gnas pa zhes smos pa rlan can gyi
[\[22b.7\]]sha'i sgras kyang spang ba nyid yin mod kyi/_'dir gtso bor bya ba'i phyir logs shig tu smos pa yin no/_/yang na rlan can nyid chur gnas pa yin par sbyar ro/_/sha rid ni srog chags sbeg pa'i sha'o/_/sha rlon ni ma btsos pa'o/_/tshod ma skam po ni pa to la la sogs pa tshod
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]ma'i sde tshan las bshad pa'o/_/til gyi kha zas ni til las byas pa'i la du la sogs pa'o/_/bu ram ni bu ram las byas pa'i zas sam btung ba'o/_/phye zan ni 'bras la sogs pa btags pa las zan du byas so/_/de bzhin du zho 'ba' zhig kyang
[\[23a.2\]]skrang bar byed pa yin pas spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du lan tshwa dang kha zas rul cing spyi bag tu gyur pa spang bar bya'o/_/chang 'ba' zhig kyang spang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du skyur ba'i rnam par rang skyur la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang /_nas brngos pa'i yos dang sha skam
[\[23a.3\]]dang 'dris pa'i zas de phan dang mi phan zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin du gzhan yang lci ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyang spang bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin du nyin par gnyid log cing nyal la mtshan mo gnyid ma log pa dang /_bud med la 'khrig pa spyod cing nyal po
[\[23a.4\]]byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad 'or nad can gyis spang par bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_gso ba'i gnas las le'u bcu bdun pa'i rnams par 'grel
[\[23a.5\]]pa'o//_//de nas med bal gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_go rims kyis na 'di nyid kyi gso ba bshad dgos pas 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/med bal nad la thog ma nyid/_/smyung ba dang ni rtsub chos dang /_/khrag dbyung skyug sman bkru sman phan/_/snum
[\[23a.6\]]chos sbyad par mi bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_/me dbal gyi nad la ni nad kyi sngon byung ba'i tshul skyes pa'i thog ma nyid la smyung ba bya zhing nyams smad pa dang rtsub par 'gyur ba'i cho ga bya ba dang /_gtar ga btab cing khrag dbyung ba dang /_bkru sman dang skyug sman blud pas sbyang ba byas na phan gyi med dpal
[\[23a.7\]]gyi nad gang la yang thog ma kho nar snum chos bya ba ni phan pa ma yin no/_/po son cha dang dug mo yungs/_/shing mngar bcas ba pa to la/_/nim pa'i lo ma pi pi ling /_/skyug sman btang na me dbal 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la po son cha la sogs pa'am/_yang na po son
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]cha dang pa to la las skyug sman btang na yang med dbal gyi nad 'joms par byed do/_/kyi lce ba yi khu ba'am/_/rgun 'bru'i 'bras bu gsum yang rung /_/dur byid phye ma btab pa 'am/_/'o ma mar sbyar bkru sman ni/_/khong na zhen pa'i nad la ni/_/khyad par du ni sbyang ba btang /_/zhes
[\[23b.2\]]bya ba la/_kyi lce bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/_rgun 'bru'i khu ba 'am/_'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/_gang yang rung ba'i nang du dur byid kyi phye ma btab pa'i bkru sman btang ba'am/_yang na dur byid dang /_'o ma dang mar du sbyar ba'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/_/de
[\[23b.3\]]las kyang khyad par du ni khong pa'i nang du zhen pa'i nad la skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis sbyang bar bya'o/_/sbyang min nad tsha bas chung ba la/_/zhi sman tsan+dan ut+pal gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_me dbal gyi nad dang ldan pa las sbrum ma la sogs pa sbyang bar mi rung la nad tshabs chung ba yin
[\[23b.4\]]na zhi bar bya ba'i sman tsan+dan dang ut+pal la sogs pa gtang bar bya'o/_gla sgang nim pa pa to la/_/pa to la sogs nyid dag gam/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na sbyar ba byar mi rung zhing nad tshabs chung ba la zhi bar bya ba'i sman gla sgang la sogs pa blud par bya'o/_pa to la la sogs pa
[\[23b.5\]]ni pa to la dang pu tse shel/_/zhes bya ba bstan pa yin no/_/thal tres gla sgang skyu ru ra/_/pu tse shel gyi chu bskol blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na de la zhi bar bya ba'i sman thal tres la sogs pa blud par bya'o/_me dbal skom dad can la ni/_/byi tsher ba dang pa ra pa ta/_/sle
[\[23b.6\]]tres bca' sga bskol ba ni/_/khu ba bsgrangs pa blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_me dbal gyi nad skom dad can gyis btab pa la ni byi tsher ba la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/_bskol te bsgrangs pa blud par bya/_skyer pa sran chung pu tse shel/_/pa to la dang 'bras bu gsum/_/
[\[23b.7\]]nim pa shing mngar kyi lce ba/_/bskol ba mar dang bcas pa blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang me dbal skom dad can la skyer pa la sogs pa'i sman gyi khu ba nyid blud pa'i sbyor bar bskol la de'i nang du mar bcug ste blud na yang phan no/_/yan lag nad zhugs nad khrag nyid/_/thog
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]ma nyid du khrag dbyung bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lag dar dad byin pa la sogs pa yan lag rnams la nad khrag yod pa las gyur pa'i me dbal ni thog ma nyid du khrag de phyung bas bsal bar bya ste/_nad gzhi ji lta ba las rngabs ru dang /_ku ba dang /
[\[24a.2\]]sin bu pad pas khrag dbyung ba'am/_gtar ga btab ste khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/pags pa sha dang rgyus pa 'drul/_/khrag rul pa las byung ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir khrag rul pa las pags pa la sogs pa 'drul zhing rnags par 'gyur bas de'i
[\[24a.3\]]phyir khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/smin zhing bad kan zad pa dang /_/rlung dang mkhris pa shas che la/_/tig ta tig ta chen po'i mar/_/kyi lce ba bskol mar phan no/_/zhe bya ba la/_smin cing bad kan zad par gyur nas/_rlung dang mkhris pa shas che zhing rgyas par gyur
[\[24a.4\]]pa la ni tig ta dang tig ta chen po'i sman mar mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mdze nad kyi skabs su bshad pa dang /_kyi lce ba'i sman mar khong 'bras kyi skabs su bshad pa phan no/_/khrag phyung khong pa dag gyur nas/_/nad ni sha lpags la gnas la/_/phyi rol nas ni byugs
[\[24a.5\]]sogs kyis/_/'phral du me dbal zhi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag phyung zhing bsal bar 'gyur ba dang /_sbyang ba byas pas khong pa dag par gyur nas nang gi skyon med par rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang yang med par sha dang pags pa la gnas par gyur pa la/_phyi
[\[24a.6\]]rol nas sman gyi byugs pa la sogs pa byas na 'phral du de'i mod la me dbal zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/rlung gyur shu ti gla sgang dang /_/'o ma 'u su ba ra hi/_/ar ta ka la pi pi ling /_/thang shing shi kru ru rta yi/_/lde gus byugs pa byas na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las
[\[24a.7\]]gyur pa'i me dbal ni shu ti zhes bya ba'i sha ta pus pa la sogs pa'i sman btags pa'i lde gus bskus na phan no/_/ba ra ha ni bi na ma li ka'o/_/ar ta ka la ni ru dza ga ra'o/_/'u su ni 'u su'i 'bras bu'o/_/shi kru ni so ban dza na'o/_/mkhris par n+ya gro d+ha sogs te/_/de
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]bzhin pad+ma uta pa la sogs/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur ba'i me dbal la ni n+ya gro d+ha la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyis bsku ba'am/_yang na pad+ma dang ut+pal la sogs pa bsdus pa las bshad pas bskus na phan no/_/de las mkhris pa la ni pad+ma dang ut+pal dang nya
[\[24b.2\]]lcibs dang /_'dam dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_sring ga ta ga dang /_ka shi du ka dang /_sha kha ra dang /_ba la ka dang /_tsan+dan dkar po dang /_mu tig dang /_nor bu dang /_btsag yug snum dang /_pa ya s+ya dang /_pra du na Da rI ka dang /_shing mngar dang /_shug pa dang
[\[24b.3\]]mar sar dang /_'o ma'i lde gu bskus na phan no/_/zhes bshad do/_/n+ya gro d+ha'i rtsa gzhon nu dang /_/chu shing nang gi lo mar bcas/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i lde gu dang /_/lan brgyar bkrus pa'i mar gyis byug_/ces bya ba la/_n+ya gro d+ha'i rtsa ba gzhon nu sar pa dang chu shing gi nang
[\[24b.4\]]gi lo ma dang bcas shing bsres pa dang /_pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i lde gur sbyar ba lan brgya phrag mang du bkrus shing btsir ba'i mar dang sbyar bas byug par bya'o/_/pad+ma can gyi 'dam bsil ba'am/_/mu tig btags par gyur pa la/_/dung ngam byi ru nya phyis sam/_/yug snam mar dang bcas
[\[24b.5\]]pas byug_/ces bya ba la/_gang na pad+ma skyes pa'i 'og gi 'dam bsil bas byug pa'am/_mu tig zhib tu btags pa nyid kyis byug pa'am/_dung la sogs pa gang yang rung ba btags nas mar dang bcas pas byugs na yang phan no/_/bad kan las gyur 'bras bu gsum/
[\[24b.6\]]shug ba btsod dang pu shel tse/_/ka ra bI ra 'dam bu'i rtsa/_/a nan da yi lde gus bskus/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na phan no/_/da ba lo ma bdud pa dang /_/seng ldeng thang shing bkru sman dang /_/gla
[\[24b.7\]]sgang dong gar bcas pa'am/_/ba ra na sogs lde gus bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_da ba la sogs pa'i lde gu ra sbyar ba'am/_ba ra na la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi lde gu bskus na yang bad kan las gyur ba'i me dbal sel to/_/dong ga yi ni lo ma dang /_/sle sman ta ka'i shun lpags
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]dang /_/in+d+ra ba ru na'i lo ma/_/shrI Sha 'ol ma se'i me tog_/ces bya ba la/_dong ga'i lo ma dang /_sle sman ta ka las skyes pa'i shun lpags dang /_en+d+ra ba ru na'i lo ma dang /_shrI Sha dang /_'ol ma se'i me tog lde gu ra byas pa bskus na yang phan no/_/
[\[25a.2\]]chu blugs mar bsku sman mar dang /_/lde gu phye ma ji bzhin du/_/sman ni 'di dag nyid kyis bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bkru ba'i don du bshad pa'i sman shu ti la sogs pa 'di dag nyid kyis chu blugs pa dang /_rma'i phyi rol nas bsku ba'i mar dang lde gu dang phye ma'i sbyor ba yang ji lta ba
[\[25a.3\]]bzhin du byas te gtang bar bya'o/_/rlung rgyas mar ni shas cher bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang lde gu'i sman la sogs pa 'di dag rlung shas che ba'i me dbal la ni mar shas che bas bya'o/_/bad kan gnas zhen ma smin la/_/dro dang rtsub shas che ba sbyar/_/de bzhin mkhris pa'i gnas
[\[25a.4\]]zhugs la/_/khrag mkhris la ni mar ldan bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi gnas la gnas shing rten pa'i me dbal ma smin par gyur pa la ni dro ba dang rtsub pa'i lde gus bsku ba phan la/_de bzhin du mkhris pa'i gnas su zhugs pa'i me dbal dang khrag dang /_mkhris pa
[\[25a.5\]]las gyur pa'i me dbal la ni mar sar dang ldan pa'i sman de dag gi lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/shin tu bsil zhing srab pa dang /_/gos srab nang du bzhag pa ni/_/nus pa chung las yang dang yang /_/gzhan dang gzhan ni sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_shin tu bsil zhing
[\[25a.6\]]grang la srab cing chung ba dang /_gos srab mo'i nang du gtums shing bzhag pa'i lde gu ni skad cig ma re re zhing yang dang yang du gzhan dang gzhan spos la sbyar bar bya ste/_gang gi phyir lde gu de de ltar bskus pa ni nus pa chung ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'dres pa'i nad la las 'di ni/_/
[\[25a.7\]]'dren mar bya ba la bsngags ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gnyis 'dres pa'i ldan pa las gyur ba'i me dbal la ni/_gong du bshad pa'i gso ba'i las de 'dren ma byas na bsngags shing phan no/_/me ltar tsha la lan brgyar ni/_/bkrus pa'i mar sar 'ba' zhig
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_me lta bur tsha ba'i me dbal ni/_mar sar chu grang mo'i nang du lan mang du mnyes pa 'ba' zhig gis bskus na phan no/_/mar gyi nying khu blugs pa 'am/_/shing mngar bskol ba'i chu grang ngam/_/ut+pal pad+ma kha ra'i chu/_/'o ma bu ram shing khu
[\[25b.2\]]blugs/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang me ltar tsha ba'i me dbal la mar gyi nying khu dngas ma blugs pa 'am/_yang na chu grang bskol pa'i chu bsgrangs te blugs pa'am/_yang na ut+pala'am/_kha ra'am/_'o ma 'am/_bu ram shing khu'i khu ba grang mo blugs par bya'o/_/btung ba
[\[25b.3\]]bsku dang blugs pa dang /_/tig ta chen po'i sman mar phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_me lta bu'i me dbal la tig ta chen po'i sman mar mdze nad kyi skabs nas bshad pa blud pa la sogs pa sbyar na mchog tu phan no/_/rmen bu khrag mkhris sel ba yi/_/gso ba ci rigs legs byas
[\[25b.4\]]la/_/rlung dang bad kan 'joms byed la/_/glan dang dkri ba la sogs phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rmen bu'i me dbal la ni sngar bshad pa'i mkhris pa dang 'dres pa las byung ba nas/_bkru sman gyi bar khrag dang mkhris pa sel ba'i gso ba legs par byas la/_de'i rjes la rlung
[\[25b.5\]]dang bad kan la phan pa'i gso ba glan pa'i dugs dang /_dkri ba'i dugs la sogs pa byas na phan no/_/rmen bu'i me dbal gzer bcas la/_/til mar rtsa ba bcu dang bskol/_/ba gcin dron mo chu dron blugs/_/zhes bya ba la/_rmen bu'i me dbal gzer dang bcas pa 'byung ba
[\[25b.6\]]la ni rtsa ba bcu dang bskol ba'i til mar blugs pa'am/_de bzhin du ba gcin dron mo'am chu dron mo blugs par bya'o/_/yang na shi kru'i lde gu'am/_/na ta ma la'i shun pa'am/_/la phug skam po ba ru ra'i/_/lde gu dro 'jam bsku ba'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na shi kru'i shun
[\[25b.7\]]pa lde gur btags pa dro 'jam tsam gyis bsku ba'am/_yang na na ta ma la zhes bya ba ka rany+dza'i shun lpags btags pa'i lde gu chu dro 'jam tsam mam/_la phug skam po btags pa'i lde gu dro 'jam tsam bsku ba 'am/_ba ru ra'i lde gu dro 'jam tsam bskus na yang rmen bu'i me dbal
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]gzer dang bcas pa la phan no/_/dan da shing tsha tsi tra ka_/arka snu ha'i 'o ma dang /_/bu ram go bye'i rus nag tshur/_/lde gus rdo yang 'bigs byed na/_/bad kan las gyur rmen bu'i nad/_/phyi rol gnas pa smos ci dgos/_/zhes bya ba la/_dan
[\[26a.2\]]pa dang /_tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba'i shun spags/_arka dang /_shing snu ha'i 'o ma dang /_bu ram dang /_go bye'i nang gi rus pa dang /_nag tshur gyi lde gur byas pas bskus na rdo yang 'bigs par byed na bad kan las gyur pa'i rman bu lus kyi phyi rol na gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te
[\[26a.3\]]nges par 'bigs par byed do/_/yun ring gnas pa'i rmen bu la/_/la phug rgya sran ku lad tha'i/_/khu ba thal sman se'u 'brur bcas/_/gro yi zan dang nas kyi zan/_/rgun chang sbrang rtsi bu ram dang /_/kha ra chang gi dngas mar bcas/_/kha lung khu bar bcas pa dang /_/'bras
[\[26a.4\]]bu gsum gyi sbyor lde gu/_/pi pi ling dang sbrang rtsir bcas/_/thang shing dang ni sle tres dang /_/brag zhun gyi ni sbyor ba dang /_/gla sgang go bye'i sbyor ba'am/_/sbrang rtsi yi ni sbyor ba dang /_/mgo bkru sman dud rngub pa dang /_/sngar bshad skran ni gzhig pa dang /_/lcags gser
[\[26a.5\]]lan tshwa bsregs pa dang /_/rdo bas btsir bar bya ba yin/_/sman 'di yis ni 'jigs par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rmen bu'i nad yun ring du gnas shing rgyun du chags par gyur pa la 'og nas bshad pa'i sman 'di dag gis bshig par bya'o/_/la phug gi khu ba thal sman rnam gnyis
[\[26a.6\]]gang yang rung ba dang bcas pa se'u 'bru dang bcas pa dang /_de bzhin du rgya sran ku lad tha'i yu sha'i khu ba dang thal sman bcas pa dang /_de bzhin du gro'i zan dang nas kyi zan rtag tu sbyin pa dang /_rgun chang la sogs pa blud pa dang /_de bzhin du 'bras bu gsum mam/_pi pi ling
[\[26a.7\]]gi sbyor ba lde gu'am/_phyi mar byas pa'am/_de bzhin du thang shing la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ste/_ci rigs par sbyor ba de dang des bya ba dang /_nam tshong yan chad kyi nad du gtogs pa'i rmen bu la/_mgo bo'i bkru sman dang /_dud pa rngub pa'i rnon po dang /_lngar bshad pa'i skran
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]gzhig pa'i sbyor ba gang yin pa dang /_lcags la sogs pa bsregs pas btsir zhing mnan pas yun ring du gnas pa'i rmen bu 'jigs par byed do/_/zhes thams cad la sbyar par bya'o/_/sbyor ba sna tshogs de dag ni/_/byas kyang zhi bar ma gyur cing /_/shin tu sra bar gnas
[\[26b.2\]]gyur la/_/nad stobs che bar gyur na ni/_/de 'og 'di la thal sman nam/_/lde gu'am gser gyis bsregs pa phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbyor ba gong du smos pa sna tshogs pa de dag gis gso ba byas kyang de zhi bar ma gyur cing /_rdo ltar shin tu sra bar gnas par gyur la nad
[\[26b.3\]]kyi stobs shin tu che zhing zhig par ma gyur na sman gyi sbyor bar de dag gi 'og tu rmen bu'i nad 'di la thal sman gyis bsreg pa'am/_lde gu mes bsregs pas bsregs pa'am/_gser mer bsregs pas bsregs na phan no/_/smin par byed pas rnags byas la/_/dbral nas de
[\[26b.4\]]nas dbyung bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rmen bu de smin par byed pa'i sman gyis smin cing bsrubs la/_de'i 'og tu gtsags spyad kyis bsal te/_/rmen bu gang yod pa dbyung bar bya'o/_/'di la khrag 'di rnags 'dod pa/_/yang dang yang du gdon par bya/_/zhes bya ba
[\[26b.5\]]la/_rmen bu'i me dbal zhes bya ba la/_khrag rnags par 'dod cing gnas pa las g.yos shing phyed tsam smin par gyur pa la yang dang yang du khrag gdon cing dbyung bar bya'o/_/khrag bsal 'og tu slar yang ni/_/rlung dang bad kan sel sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag
[\[26b.6\]]bsal zhing bton nas de yi 'og tu rlung dang bad kan sel ba'i sman gang dag yin pa gtang bar bya'o/_/tsha zhing smin pas rnags gyur la/_/phyi nang rma ltar gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rmen bu'i me dbal de dang smin pas rnags par gyur pa la ni phyi dang nang gi rma'i gso ba ltar
[\[26b.7\]]gso bar bya'o/_skyer pa srin sman kam bi khyai/_/bskol ba'i til mar rma la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyer pa la sogs pa'i sman dang til mar bskol ba rma la phan no/_/bad kan mkhris pa shas che la/_/dUr ba'i khu ba mar bskol phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan dang mkhris pa shas
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]cher gyur pa'i me dbal la ni dUr ba bskol ba'i khu ba dang mar bskol ba phan no/_/gso ba'i las kun phyogs dang steng /_/khrag dbyung pa ni phyogs gcig yin/_/me dbal de ni khrag mkhris dang /_/ma 'dres pa las byung mi 'gyur/_/'di yi rten ni khrag
[\[27a.2\]]nyid yin/_/de bas khrag ni mang du dbri/_/zhes bya ba/_me dbal gyi nad la skyug sman dang /_bkru sman btang ba la sogs pa'i gso ba'i las kun nad sel ba'i las byed pa'i phyogs gcig tu bzhag pa dang /_khrag dbyung ba gcig tu gso ba'i phyogs gcig ste phyed yin no/_/
[\[27a.3\]]de yang gang gi phyir me dbal de ni khrag dang mkhris pa dang ma 'dris shing de la me brten pa las 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_de bas na rgyu de'i phyir me dbal 'di'i rten nam/_gnas ni khrag nyid yin te/_de bas na khrag mang du dbri zhing dbyung ba kho na 'di'i dpyad kyi mchog yin no/_/
[\[27a.4\]]nad gzhi mang po me dbal la/_/bkru sman ma gyur mar mi sbyin/_/de yis nad ni sra gyur pas/_pags pa khrag dang sha 'tshong byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gang nad gzhi mang po las gyur pa'i me dbal de la ni bkru sman du ma gyur cing gang zhig blud na 'khru ba'i bya ba mi byed pa'i mar
[\[27a.5\]]de sbyin par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'khru bar mi byed pa'i mar des slar zhing sra la rengs shing 'thas par 'gyur bas pags pa dang khrag dang sha 'tshod cing sreg par byed pa'i skyon yod do/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'o rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob
[\[27a.6\]]dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las gso ba'i gnas le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas mdze nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_/go rims kyis na mdze nad kyi gso ba brtsams pa yin no/_/mdze can kun la thog ma nyid/_/
[\[27a.7\]]snum blud pas ni gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze'i nad kyis btab pa thams cad la ni dang po kho nar sman mar blud cing snum sbyin pas gso zhing bcos par bya'o/_/de la rlung shas che ba la/_/rtsa ba bcu pa sle tres dang /_/sha rang ka ta e raN+Da/_/me sha sring gi mar ram ni/_/
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]til mar bskol te blud pa phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la mdze nad de rnams kyi nang na rlung las gyur pa de'i shas che ba'i mdze nad la ni rtsa ba bcu pa la sogs pa'i mar ram/_til mar bskol te blud na phan no/_/nim pa pa to pu tse shel/_/skyer pa pa ta byi tsher ba/_/par pa ta dang
[\[27b.2\]]kyi lce ba/_/srang re chu bre brgyad kyi ni/_/nang bskol brgyad cha lus pa ru/_/gla sgang rtsa mkhris kyi lce ba/_/dug mo yungs dang pi pi ling /_/tsan+dan zho ni gnyis gnyis dang /_/zhun mar srang ni bcu gnyis bskol/_/tig ta'i sman mar de 'thungs na/_/mkhris pa'i
[\[27b.3\]]mdze dang me dbal dang /_/'brum phran lus tsha skom dad che/_/mgo 'khor g.yan pa skya rbab 'bras/_/rma 'grams 'bras kyi phreng ba dang /_/thor bu khong 'bras skran dang ni/_/zad byed smyo byed myos pa dang /_/snying nad rab rib ngo khabs dang /_/sha bkra mig ser pho ba'i
[\[27b.4\]]nad/_/mtshan par rdol dang brjed byed dang /_/dmu rdzing zla mtshan mi chod dang /_/sbyar dug gzhang 'brum khrag mkhris sel/_/gzhan yang mkhris pa las gyur nad/_/shin tu gso dka'i rnams la'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_nim pa la sogs pa'i sman sna re srang re chu bre brgyad
[\[27b.5\]]kyi nang du bskol la bskol ba de brgyad cha lus pa dang zhun mar srang bcu gnyis dang gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman sna re zho gnyis gnyis lde gur byas pa dang bskol ba'i sman mar te tig ta'i sman mar zhes bya ste/_de blud na mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mdze dang me dbal la sogs pa sel bar
[\[27b.6\]]byed do/_/de bzhin du 'dir ma smos pa'i mkhris pa dag las gyur pa'i nad gzhan dag sel bar byed cing de la phan pa yin no/_/lo ma bdun pa par pa ta/_/dong ga shu dag pu tse shel/_/shug pa pa ta 'bras bu gsum/_/ser bo gnyis dang thal tres gnyis/_/nim pa tsan+dan
[\[27b.7\]]pi pi ling /_/shing mngar sle tres be sha la/_/dug mo yungs dang pu tse shel/_/rtsa mkhris mur ba ba sha ka_/nye'u shing bu ga pa to la/_/gla sgang byi tsher kyi lce ba/_/skyu ru'i khu ba nyis 'gyur dang /_/de rnams mar gyi brgyad 'gyur chur/_/bskol ba'i tig ta chen po ste/_/yon tan
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]yang ni sngar bas lhag_/ces bya ba la/_lo ma bdun pa la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa dang /_skyu ru ra'i khu ba nyis 'gyur dang /_mar gyi brgyud 'gyur gyi chu'i nang du bskol ba'i sman mar ni tig ta chen po'i sman mar zhes bya ste/_de'i yon tan yang sngar smos
[\[28a.2\]]pa'i tig ta'i sman mar bas yon tan che ba yin no/_/lo ma bdun pa ni sab ta la'o/_/par pa ta ni ldum bu skra bzangs so/_/ser po rnams gnyis ni yung ba dang skyer pa'o/_/thal tres gnyis ni sha ri pa dkar nag gnyis so/_/pi pi ling gnyis ni pi pi ling dang /_ha ti pi pi ling
[\[28a.3\]]ngo /_/bad kan las gyur nim pa dang /_/lo ma bdun pa tsi tra ka_/ru rta dong gra tsha ba gsum/_/pi la ya yi mar blud phan/_/zhes bya bal/_bad kan las gyur pa'i mdze nad la ni nim pa la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa dang /_mar tshul bzhin du bskol ba blud na phan no/
[\[28a.4\]]kun la go bye'i mar ram ni/_/yungs dkar du ba ra'i mar blud/_/ces bya ba la/_mdze nad thams cad la go bye zhes pa bse shing gi 'bras bu btsir ba'i mar ram/_yungs kar gyi mar ram/_du bar btsir ba'i mar blud na phan no/_/byi dang ga dang a ka ru/_/go bye'i lde gu mar
[\[28a.5\]]bskol blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na mdze nad thams cad la srin sman byi dang ga dang /_a ka ru dang /_go bye btags pa'i lde gu dang bskol ba'i sman mar blud do/_/dong ga'i rtsa ba dag dang mar/_/lan brgya'i bar bskol mar yang blud/_/seng ldeng bskol ba'i chu bsten na/_/mdze
[\[28a.6\]]nad myur du sel bar bya'o/_/ces bya ba la/_dong ga'i rtsa ba lde gur byas pa dang /_mar gnyis lan du ma'i bar du bskol ba blud la/_seng ldeng bskol ba'i chu 'thungs na mdze nad thams cad myur du sel bar byed do/_/'di dag nyid kyis ci rigs par/_/snum chos bsku ba byas pa'ang
[\[28a.7\]]phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshad ma thag pa'i snum de dag gis nad gzhi ji lta ba las/_ci rigs pas snum gyi cho ga byas pa dang /_bsku ba byas na yang phan no/_/snum gyis zhen la med dbal gyi/_/skabs su bshad pa'i sbyar sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad kyis thebs pa
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]de lus snum gyis khebs par byas nas/_me dbal gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i bkru sman dang skyug sman btang bas sbyar bar bya'o/_/dpral ba lag pa rkang pa las/_/'di la gtar ga gdab par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang nad pa de la nyams stobs kyi tshul nas dpags te
[\[28b.2\]]dpral ba la sogs par gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/mdze nad tshabs chung zhal zhal gdab/_/rwa sogs kyis kyang khrag dbyung bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad cung zad kyis btab pa la ni gtsags bus zhal zhal gdab cing khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/nad
[\[28b.3\]]dmigs kyi tshul las dpags te/_gtar ga gdab pa'i le'u las 'byung ba'i tshul du rngabs ru dang bsku ba la sogs pas khrag phyung na phan no/_/mdze nad 'joms pa'i snum gyis ni/_/'di la bar bar brta bar bya/_/khrag byung bkru sman gyis sbyang zhing /_/lto stong gyur pa'i
[\[28b.4\]]mdze can la/_/ci nas rlung gis 'di yi ni/_/lus ni 'jigs pa de ltar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang mdze can de la mdze nad 'joms shing sel bar byed pa'i snum go bye dang /_yungs kar gyi mar la sogs pas bar du nyams brta zhing tshim par byas na/_de sngar byung ba dang /_bkru
[\[28b.5\]]sman gyis sbyang bar gyur pas rlung brta bar byed pa'i rgyus lus la gnod cing 'jig par byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/nim pa sle tres ba sha ka_/'bras bu gsum dang pa to la/_/kaN+Da ka ri ka rany+ja/_/lde gu chu dang mar bskol ba/_/sman mar rdo rje can zhes bya/_/des ni me dbal mig ser
[\[28b.6\]]rims/_/khrag nad lud pa mdze nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_nim pa la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa bskol ba'i chu dang mar du bskol ba'i sman mar de ni slob dpon gyis rdo rje can zhes bya'o zhes bshad de/_de blud pas na me dbal la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/'bras bu
[\[28b.7\]]gsum dang tsha ba gsum/_/dur byid kaN+Da ka ri gnyis/_/dan da dong ga pu tse shel/_/shu dag bong nga tsi tra ka_/pa thar bcas pa zho gnyis gnyis/_snu ha'i 'o ma srang gcig dang /_/bre gang mar bskol lto sra ba'i/_/snum bcos bkru sman dag tu sbyar/_/mdze dang sha
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]bkra mcher pa dang /_/rgyu rlugs rde'u 'gags skran 'joms byed/_/'di ni rdo rje chen por bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i sman sna re re zhing zho gnyis gnyis kyi tshad du byas la/_snu ha zhes bya ba su d+ha k+Shi ra'i 'o ma sar pa srang gcig
[\[29a.2\]]dang btags te lde gur byas te/_lde gu de dang mar bre gang bskol ba'i sman mar de ni lto sra ba dag la snum chos bya zhing btang ba dang bkru sman gnyi ga ci rigs par sbyar zhing gtang bar bya ste/_des mdze nad la sogs pa'i nad shin tu gso dka' ba dag kyang sel bar byed do/_/sman mar de ni
[\[29a.3\]]rdo rje chen po zhes bya'o/_/kaN+Da ka ri gnyis ni kaN+Da ka ri dang bri ha ti'o/_/dan da bre bzhi chu bre ni/_/bcu drug bskol ba de mar bskol/_/ko sha ka ti srang gcig btang /_/de blud steng 'og sbyong byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dan da bre bzhi bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol ba de'i brgyad cha
[\[29a.4\]]lus par mar bre gang bskol ba mar dang ko sha ta ki srang gcig lde gur byas te bsres la de las ci rigs par blud na steng dang 'og tu sbyong zhing slon pa dang khrus byas pas dag par byed pa yin no/_/a par ta ki srang brgyad chu/_/bre bcu drug bskol brgyad cha lus/_/khu ba der ni de'i rtsa ba/
[\[29a.5\]]mar ni bre gang bskol bar bya/_/blud ba de ni zhag gcig gis/_/bar du chod de legs zhu nas/_/khre rgod rang skyur mar bskol blud/_/mdze nad sha bkra 'bras kyi phreng /_/sel zhing bu mang dran 'dzin 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_a par ta ki ni rak+ta puSh+pe dang /_tsar ma rang ga
[\[29a.6\]]dang /_ro hi zhes bya ba me tog dmar po can sag ti tshod pa zhig yod pa la bya'o/_/la la ni sab ta la la ar pa ta ki zhes bya ba'o zhes zer ro/_/de srang brgyad chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol ba de las chu bre do lus pa dang khu ba de'i nang du ar ga ta ki de'i rtsa ba lde gur byas pa dang /
[\[29a.7\]]mar bre gang bskol la mar de zhag gcig gis bar du chod pa'i tshul gyis blud la de legs par zhu bar gyur pa dang /_khre rgod dam ci tshe'i chan dang rang skyur kan dzi zhes bya ba bskol ba blud na mdze nad la sogs pa sel zhing 'joms par byed pa dang de bzhin du bu tsha mang du 'phel ba dang dran pa
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]'dzin cing mi brjed par 'gyur ro/_/ni li ta ka'i tshil sbrang rtsi/_/dzA ti'i khu ba mar bcas pa'am/_/seng ldeng a sa na'i chur bcas/_/dbang bo bsdams brtan mdze nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_dbang po bsdams shing yul thub pa dang ni li ka'i tshil sbrang rtsi dang me
[\[29b.2\]]tog dzA ti'i khu ba dang bcas pa zos na mdze nad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ni li ta ka'i tshil mar dang cha snyoms pa zos na yang mdze nad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/yang na ni li ta ka'i tshil dang seng lde nga dang a sa na bskol ba'i chu dang bcas pa blud na yang mdze nad 'joms par
[\[29b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/sA lu nas dang gro dang ni/_ci tshe khre dang mud+ga dang /_/sran chung dang ni tu ka ra'i/_/tshod ma kha bo skam sa'i sha/_/'bras bu gsum dang pa to la/_/seng ldeng nim pa go bye sbyar/_/chang ni sman dang sbyar ba dang /_/dar ba sar pa ra dang bcas/_/bza' dang btung
[\[29b.4\]]ba mdze la phan/_/skyur tsha lan tshwa can rnams gnod/_/ces bya ba la/_sA lu ni sA lu rtsa snar la sogs pa ste/_de dang nas dang skam sa'i sha'i bar gyi kha zas 'bras bu la sogs pa dang sbyar ba bza' bar bya ba dang /_/de bzhin du btung bar ni chab kyi nang du sman bcug pa la sogs
[\[29b.5\]]pa blud na phan no/_/skyur ba dang tsha ba dang lan tshwa'i bag dang ldan pa'i bza' ba dang /_btung ba ni de gnod pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/zho dang 'o ma rlan can sha/_/bu ram ma sha til mar spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_zho la sogs pa ni mdze can gyis shin tu spang bar bya'o/_/pa to la'i
[\[29b.6\]]rtsa 'bras bu gsum/_/pi sha la ni re re ni/_/cha gsum gyis dbri zho phyed gsum/_/kyi lce ba dang pu tse shel/_/zho phyed dong gra bzhi char bcas/_/de ltar srang gcig brdungs pa dag_/bskol ba'i chu ni 'thungs gyur na/_/nad kyi tshogs ni sbyong bar byed/_/sman de zhu nas
[\[29b.7\]]skam sa yi/_/ri dgas bya yi sha khu dag_/'bras rnying chan dang sbyar ba bza'/_/sbyor 'di zhag drug bsten na ni/_/mdze nad kun dang skrangs pa'i nad/_/pho ba'i nad dang gcin sri dang /_/gzugs 'khums gso dka'i nad rnams dang /_/snying nad chu sor gzir rims
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_pa to la'i rtsa ba la sogs pa'i sman sna re zhing sum cha sum cha dbri ba'i zho phyed sum cha/_des na sman lnga po dag sna re zhing cha gsum pas phri ba'i zho phyed dang gnyis te/_de la da na drug la zho phyed yod pas de la pa to la zho phyed dang
[\[30a.2\]]gnyis/_de las zho phyed kyi sum cha da na gnyis kyis dbri/_des na pa to la da na bco brgyad las bcu drug tu bya/_de bzhin du a ru ra dang /_skyu ru ra dang /_ba ru ra dang bi sha la yang da na zho gnyis bri ste/_da na bcu drug bcu drug bya/_de ltar bcu drug phrag lnga pa da na
[\[30a.3\]]brgyad cu yod la/_kyi lce ba dang pu tse shel gnyis cha gcig gis bskyed pa dang dong gra bzhi cha dang bcas pa de ltar sbyar na kyi lce ba zho phyed de/_da na drug pu tse shel yang zho phyed de/_da na drug dang gra bzhi cha ste/_da na bzhi ste spyir da na dgu bcu rtsa drug la spyir srang drug yod do/_sman
[\[30a.4\]]gcig pa de brdungs la phye mar byas te bskol ba'i chu 'thungs na nad kyi tshogs sbyong zhing dag par byed la sman de zhu nas skams ri dgas dang bya'i sha khu dang 'bras rnying pa'i chan zos shing spyod la spyod la sbyor ba 'di zhag drug gi bar bsten zhing longs spyad par gyur na mdze nad la sogs pa sel bar 'gyur ro/
[\[30a.5\]]de bzhin du rtag pa'i rims la sogs pa'i rims thams cad kyang sel bar 'gyur ro/_/byi dang ga yi snying po dang /_/a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/_/srang re dan da srang gsum dang /_/bu ram srang ni bcu gnyis dag_/ri lur byas 'di byin gyur na/_/mdze dang sha bkra dbugs mi bde/
[\[30a.6\]]lud pa dmu rdzing gzhang 'brum dang /_/gcin nad mcher pa'i rmen bu'i nad/_/thor bu srin nad skran rnams 'joms/_/grub pa'i sbyor 'di gnod sbyin ni/_/nor bu bzang pos dge slong zhig_/srog 'dor nyid la bshad ces grags/_/zhes bya ba la/_byi dang ga'i snying po la
[\[30a.7\]]sogs spyir srang re re srang gsum/_/dan da gcig pu srang gsum/_bu ram srang bcu gnyis te/_de dag spyir ri lu byas pa dbang po thul zhing bsdams pa'i nad la byin na/_mdze nad la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/sbyor ba 'di ni rab tu grub par grags pa yin no/_/gnod sbyin
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]nor bu bzang pos dge slong zhig srog 'dor du nye ba'i tshe sbyor ba 'di bshad cing bstan to zhes grags te/_grags zhes bya ba ni de skad zer ro/_/zhes lung las 'byung ba ston pa yin no/_/thor bu ni tshogs dag tu rtsa ba cher 'chos pa'i 'bras nad la bya'o/_/tig ta nim pa 'bras bu
[\[30b.2\]]gsum/_/shug pa bong nga pi pi ling /_/mur ba dang ni pa to la/_/ser po rnam gnyis pu tse shel/_/shu dag in+d+ra ba ru ni/_/dug mo yungs bcas cha snyoms pa/_/dan da dur byid bra ma sha mi/_/phyi ma bzhin du nyis 'gyur byas/_/phye ma sbrang rtsi mar bcas zos/_/mdze
[\[30b.3\]]dang za gu tshor ba chung /_/sel ba'i sman gyi mchog yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_tig ta la sogs pa'i sman cha mnyam por byas la/_dan da dang dur byid dang bra ma sha mi zhes bya ba phyi ma bzhin nyis 'gyur du byas te/_des na gal te tig ta zho gcig byed na dan da zho gnyis dur byid zho
[\[30b.4\]]bzhi bram sha mi zho brgyad dang sbyar ro/_/sman de dag phye mar zhib tu btags pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba rtag tu zos na mdze nad la phan no/_/'bras bu gsum dang pi pi ling /_/byi dang ga dang sbrang rtsi ni/_/til mar mar sbyar lde gu'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bras bu gsum la
[\[30b.5\]]sogs pa'i lde gu sbyar ba zos na yang mdze nad la phan no/_/ka ka u dum+bA ra dang /_/nim pa gla sgang byi dang ga_/tsha ba gsum gyi lde gu ni/_/dug mo yungs kyi khu bar bcas/_/blud na lpags nad thams cad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_/ka ka u dum+bA ra la sogs pa'i lde
[\[30b.6\]]gu dug mo yungs bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te/_blud na mdze nad du gtogs pa'i bags pa'i skyon thams cad sel bar byed do/_/ka ka u dum+bA ra ni phal gu ste/_phred du zhes bya'o/_/dug mo yungs dang tsi tra ka_/nim pa thang shing seng ldeng dang /_/lo ma bdun pa a sa na/_/
[\[30b.7\]]khu ba skol mar dang a ru ra/_/sbrang rtsi ldan zos mdze nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug mo yungs la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du a ru ra dang sbrang rtsi dang mar btab ste zos na mdze nad thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/seng ldeng nim pa sle tres dang /_/pa to la
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]dang byi tsher bskol/_/seng ldeng la sogs lnga pa ste/_/khyab 'jug gis ni lha min bzhin/_/mdze nad 'phral du 'joms par byed/_/ces bya la/_seng ldeng nas byi tsher bar sman lnga po bskol ba'i khu ba ni seng ldeng lnga pa zhes bya ste/_des ni mdze
[\[31a.2\]]nad kyi rnam pa 'phral du 'joms shing sel bar byed do/_/dper na lha chen po khyab 'jug gis lha ma yin rmeg med par byed pa dang 'dra'o/_/skyer pa nim pa seng ldeng gi_/shun lpags bskol bas mdze nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyer pa la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba blud
[\[31a.3\]]pas kyang mdze nad sel bar byed do/_/skyer pa nim pa 'bras bu gsum/_/pa to la'i rtsa pu tse shel/_/shu dag bcod ni bskol ba yis/_/dam chos la brten 'khor ba ltar/_/khrag mkhris las gyur mdze nad gcod/_/sman 'di nyid dang ba yi mar/_/bskol bas rlung gyur mdze
[\[31a.4\]]nad rnams/_/mchog tu sel bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyer ba la sogs pa sman bskol ba'i khu ba blud na yang khrag dang mkhri pa las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel bar byed do/_/dper na dam pa'i chos la legs par brten cing bsgoms pas 'khor ba'i 'ching ba gcod pa dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[31a.5\]]yang skyer pa la sogs pa'i sman 'di dag nyid dang ba'i mar bskol ba'i sman mar blud na rlung las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel bar gyur ro/_/seng lding nim pa skyer pa dang /_/sle tres thang shing sna rer bskol/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du seng ldeng la sogs pa'i sman sna re re bskol ba'i khu
[\[31a.6\]]ba'am sman de dag mar du bskol ba blud na yang mdze nad la phan no/_/pa tha skyer pa tsi tra ka_/dan da dug yungs pu tse shel/_/ba gcin yang na chu dron bcas/_/zla ba gcig blud mdze nad dang /_/gzhang 'brum za khu skran nad dang /_/skya rbab ma zhu srin nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/
[\[31a.7\]]pa to la la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu ba gcin dang sbyar ba'am/_chu dron dang sbyar ste zla ba gcig gi bar du blud na mdze'i nad la sogs pa 'joms par byed do/_/rgya skyegs dan da'i 'bras bu gsum/_/mur ba pa ta tsi tra ka_/a pa mar ga byi dang ka_/lo ma bdun pa tsha ba gsum/_/btsod
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]dang skyer pa ba sha ka_/nim pa thang shing rtsa ba lnga/_/gnyis po phye ma ba gcin sbyar/_/zla ba gcig 'thungs phan zas bza'/_/mdze yi nad kun 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rgya skyegs la sogs pa nas rtsa ba chen po lnga dang /_chung ngu lnga/_gnyis po'i bar phye mar byas pa dang
[\[31b.2\]]ba gcin du sbyar te zla ba gcig gi bar du blud cing phan zhing 'phrod pa'i zas zos nas mdze'i nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/skyer pa pi pi ling dong gra/_/byi dang ga dang do ba ri/_/tsi tra ka dang ta bya rnams/_/go rims bzhin du cha res bskyed/_/ba gcin sbyar ba'am ri lu ni/_/byin
[\[31b.3\]]na mi bzad mdze yang 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyer pa la sogs pa go rims bzhin du cha res bskyed pa'i phye ma ba gcin dang sbyar te blud pa'am/_yang na bskol te ri lur byas pa byin na mdze nad gso dka' ba'am mi bzad pa yang 'joms shing sel bar byed do/_/tsha ba gsum dang
[\[31b.4\]]'bras bu gsum/_/til dang go bye'i phye ma ni/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar/_/ri lur byas pa cha bdun pas/_/mdze yi nad rnams 'joms byed cing /_/bcud kyis lan dang ro tsar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_tsha ba gsum cha gcig_/'bras bu gsum cha gnyis pa/
[\[31b.5\]]til gsum pa/_go bye bzhi pa/_mar lnga pa/_sbrang rtsi drug pa/_kha ra bdun pa ste/_de lta bu'i cha bdun mnyam por byas pa'i sman 'dis ni mdze'i nad thams cad 'joms par byed cing bcud kyis len du 'gyur zhing ro tsa ba dang stobs skyed par 'gyur ba yin no/_so ma ra dza tsi
[\[31b.6\]]tra ka_/skyer pa du ba ra'i rus pa/_/go bye srin sman 'bras bu gsum/_/bsten na mdze nad ma lus 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_so ma ra dza la sogs pa'i sman bu ram dang ri lur byas pa bsten zhing zos na mdze nad ma lus par 'joms shing sel bar byed do/_/so ma ra dza byi dang
[\[31b.7\]]ga_/go bye tsi tra ba ra hi/_/a ru ra dang lang ga li/_/til nag po dang pi pi ling /_/bu ram dang ni ri lur byas/_/mdze yi nad rnams 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_so ma ra dza la sogs pa'i phye ma gcig tu bsdus te bu ram dang ri lur byas pa gang yin pa dag gis
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]kyang mdze'i nad rnams 'joms par byed do/_/'dis so ma ra dza la sogs pa'i phye ma ji snyed yod pa'i bu ram nyis 'gyur dang ri lur byas te/_de yang /_tshad ni rnam par ma bshad par/_/phye ma bu ram nyis 'gyur gzhug_/ces smos pa yin no/_/
[\[32a.2\]]lang ga li ni bi sha la'o/_/so ma ra dza pi pi ling /_/de yi rtsa ba byi dang ga_/snying po lcags rkyag skyu ru ra/_/til mar lde gus mdze nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_so ma ra dza la sogs pa dang til mar dang bu ram ri lu byas pa byin na yang phan no/_/a ru ra dang
[\[32a.3\]]go bye til/_/bu ram ri lus mdze nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na a ru ra la sogs pa'i ri lu byin na yang mdze nad la phan no/_/so ma ra dza byi dang ga_/bu ram ri lur byas pa'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_so ma ra dza dang bu ram ri lur byas na yang phan no/_/seng ldeng
[\[32a.4\]]brag zhun byi dang ga_/sbrang rtsi mar dang ldan za zhing /_/phan dang ran par zos na ni/_/'brum phran sha bkra shu ba 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_seng ldeng gi phye ma dang brag zhun dang byi dang ga mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba za zhing mdze la phan pa'i kha zas 'brum phran la sogs pa 'joms par
[\[32a.5\]]byed pa zos na yang mdze nad la phan no/_/kha ra lcags phye byi dang ga_/tsi tra ka dang skyu ru ra/_/pi pi ling gi lde gu yis/_/mdze nad shin tu gso dka' 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha ra la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu byin na yang shin tu gso dka' zhing lci ba'i mtshan nyid 'joms so/_/
[\[32a.6\]]gla sgang tsha gsum 'bras bu gsum/_/rtsa ba lnga nyid thang shing btsod/_/nim pa shing tsha lo ma bdun/_/shing tsha tsi tra ka dang ni/_/mur ba pi sha la'i phye ma/_/nas phye dgu cha sbrang rtsi ni/_/cha gcig sbyar ba 'di rtag tu/_/'thungs na mdze nad 'joms byed cing /_/'or nad skya rbab
[\[32a.7\]]sha bkrar bcas/_/pho nad gzhang 'brum rgyu rlugs dang /_/mtshan bar rdol dang 'brum phran dang /_/g.yan pa shu ba nad rnams 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman phye mar btags pa nas phye dgu cha dang /_sbrang rtsi cha gcig tu sbyar te skyo mar byas pa 'thungs na
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]mdze nad 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/tu pa ra yi rus pa'am/_/go bye so ma ra dza dang /_/tsi tra ka dang brag zhun rnams/_/bcud len cho ga ltar bsten phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_tu pa ra'i nang gi rus pa bcud len gyi cho ga las bshad pa'i tshul ltar bsten na yang phan no/_/de
[\[32b.2\]]bzhin du go bye dang /_so ma ra dza dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_brag zhun rnams re re zhing bcud kyi len gyi cho ga ltar bsten na yang mdze'i nad la phan no/_/de ltar nad bsal nang gi ni/_/nad sbyangs nas ni phyi rol gyi/_pags par gnas la sman byugs phan/_/nad kyi dri ma ma
[\[32b.3\]]dag la/_/sman rnon byugs na mdze nad ni/_/bslangs pas slar ni 'phel bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul de ltar mdze'i nad nang du sbyangs shing bsal nas pags par gnas pa'i nad la ni sman gyi phyi rol nas bsku ba la sogs pa phan te/_gang gi phyir dri ma can gyi lus ma
[\[32b.4\]]dag bar gyur pa las sman rnon pos byugs shing bskus na nad de bslangs pas slar zhig 'phel bar 'gyur bas na dang por nang gi sbyangs nas gzod bsku bar bya'o/_/gting zug sra zhing kor kor po'i/_/mdze la dugs bya snyi ba dang /_/'bur bar gyur nas mtshon gyis ni/_/zhal zhal
[\[32b.5\]]gdab cing byug par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze'i nad gting zug cing zhen pa dang /_sra zhing mkhrang ba dang /_zlum bo kor kor bo'am til til du chags pa la ni sman rno ba la sogs pas dugs bya zhing dkris la 'bur zhing mtho bar gyur pa dang mtshon gyis dril zhing zhal zhal byas la sman
[\[32b.6\]]gyis byug cing bsku bar bya'o/_/gang zhig pags pa kun nyams shing /_/mtshon gyis gdab tu mi rung ba/_/de la khrag ni phyung nas su/_/thal sman rnon pos bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad gang pags pa kun nyams shing zhig ste/_mtshon gyis gdab tu mi rung ba de la
[\[32b.7\]]ni nad kyi khrag phyung zhing bsal la thal sman rnon pos bsku bar bya'o/_mdze nad rab sra rtsub pa dang /_/tshor ba med brtan yun ring lon/_/sngags bcas dug khu blud pa dang /_/dug gi sman ni rjes su bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze'i nad sra zhing rtsub par gyur pa dang /_tshor ba med
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]cing bem bem por gnas pa dang /_brtan zhing 'gyur ba med pa dang /_yun ring zhing lo mang zhig lon pa la dug gis byug cing blud par bya ba de yang sngags kyis btab pas byug cing bsku bar bya ba la/_de'i 'og tu dug gi sman rjes su sbyar zhing blud par bya'o/_/
[\[33a.2\]]mdze nad rengs shing tshor ba med/_/rngul mi 'byung zhing g.ya' ba la/_/lci skam rgya mtsho'i dbu ba'am/_/mtshon gyis bdar la lde gus byug_/ces bya ba la/_mdze nad gang lus rengs shing 'gyur mi shes pa dang /_shin tu tshor ba med cing bem bem por 'dug pa
[\[33a.3\]]dang /_'byung mi shes pa dang /_g.ya' ba dang ldan pa'i mdze nad la ni lci ba skam po'am/_rgya mtsho dbu ba'am mtshon gyi bdar zhing drud la de'i 'og tu lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/gla sgang dong gra 'bras bu gsum/_/po son cha dang ka rany+dza/_/lo ma bdun pa dug mo yungs/_/
[\[33a.4\]]ru rta skyer ba pri yang ku/_/yungs kar sbyor bas lus bkru zhing /_/lde gus slon sman bkru sman dang /_/bzhar zhing lus ni bskus gyur na/_/pags pa'i nad dang mdze nad dang /_/skrangs nad skya rbab mdze nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_gla sgang la sogs pa'i lde gus ni don
[\[33a.5\]]thams cad grub ba'i lde gu ste/_de la lus khrus byas pa dang /_yang des slon sman dang /_bkru sman gyi sbyor ba byas pa dang /_bzhar ba'i rjes la bskus na pags pa'i nad la sogs pa sel ba yin no/_/ka ra bI ra nim pa dang /_/dug mo yungs dang dong ga dang /_/tsi tra ka'i rtsa ba gcin
[\[33a.6\]]bskol/_/bskus nas mdze nad 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ka ra bI ra la sogs pa'i sman ba gcin dang bskol ba gzar bu la chags pa tsam zhig blud na yang mdze nad la phan no/_/ka ra bI ra kar rtsa ba/_/dug mo yungs dang ka rany+dza'i/_/bras bu skyer pa'i shun lpags
[\[33a.7\]]ni/_/so ma na yi myu gur bcas/_/bskus na mdze 'joms grub pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ka ra bI ra dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /_dug mo yungs dang /_ka rany+ja'i 'bras bu dang /_skyer pa'i shun lpags dang /_so ma na zhes bya ba dzA ti'i myu gu dang bcas pa btags pa'i lde gus bskus na
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]yang mdze nad 'joms par mngon sum du grub cing mthong bas yid ches pa yin no/_/shri sha'i shun pa ras bal gyi/_/me tog dong ga'i lo mdang /_/mon sde'u dmar ru bzhi po ni/_/btags pa'i lde gus mdze nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing shri sha'i shun lpags dang /_ras
[\[33b.2\]]bal gyi sa bon gyi me tog dang /_dong ga'i lo ma dang /_mon sran snge'u dmar ru ka ka ma tsi zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba dang lo mar bcas pa ste rnam pa bzhi po de dag btags pa'i lde gus bskus na yang mdze'i nad rnams 'joms shing sel bar byed do/_/nim pa ser po rnam pa gnyis/_/bye'u rug pa dang
[\[33b.3\]]pa to la/_/ru rta a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_/thang shing shi kru yungs kar dang /_/g.yer ma 'u su gla ba dang /_/tsa rong cha snyoms phye mar bcas/_/dar ba sbyar ba til mar gyis/_/bskus pa'am lus byug dril gyur na/_/mdze nad g.yen pa 'dum por bcas/_/'brum phran skrang
[\[33b.4\]]pa'i nad rnams sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_nim pa la sogs pa'i sman cha mnyam por phye mar byas la/_phye ma de dag dar ba dang bsres nas dang por lus til mar gyis bskus la byugs te/_de'i 'og tu lde gu des bsku zhing drel phyis byas nas mdze'i nad la sogs pa sel bar
[\[33b.5\]]byed do/_gla sgang dngul rdo dang ni skyer ba dang /_/nag tshur ka ma bi l+ya dang ru rta dang /_/seng phrom mu zi pog kar byi dang ga_/ldong ros ba bla ka ra bI ra'i shun/_/phye mar byas pa til mar gyis bskus pa'i/_/steng du phye ma'i dong du 'di blugs na/_/shu ba g.yan pa 'brum bu
[\[33b.6\]]phra mo dang /_/rkang shu la sogs 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang sngar til mar gyis bskus pa'i lus la gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman phye mar byas pa zhib tu btags pas lus kyi steng du gtor zhing blugs par gyur na shu ba dang /_g.yan pa la sogs pa'i mdze nad kyi
[\[33b.7\]]rnam pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/skam pi l+ya ni ra dza na ga'o/_/mu zi ni gan+d+ha pa sha na ste rdo dri can no/_/ka ra bI ra'i shun lpags ni a shwa ma ra'i shun lpags so/_/yungs kar snu ha'i shing dum btags/_/lde gu me ma mur btsos te/_/'dod chags shugs kyi ngo tsha bzhin/_/bskus
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]na glang shu 'jig par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_yungs kar dang snu he'i shing gi dum bu'i nang bskol ba btags pa'i lde gus sman gyi phur ma btso ba'i tshul du me ma mur gyi nang du btsos te bskus na glang shu'i nad 'jig cing sel bar byed do/_/ji ltar 'dod chags kyi
[\[34a.2\]]shugs bdo bar gyur na ngo tsha 'jig par byed pa bzhin du lde gus glang shu 'jig par byed do/_/ldong ros ba bla na le sham til mar/_/a rka'i 'o ma'i lde gus mdze 'joms byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ldong ros la sogs pa'i sman til mar a rka'i 'o ma dang lde gus byas pa bskus na
[\[34a.3\]]yang phan no/_/de bzhin tsi tra mar da ka rany+dza/_/ru rtar bcas pa ba gcin btag pa'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_tsi tra mar da dang /_ka ra ny+dza'i sa bon dang /_ru rta dang bcas pa ba gcin dang btags te bskus na yang mdze nad sel bar byed do/_/gu gul yungs kar
[\[34a.4\]]na le sham/_/nag tshur dang ni byi dang ga_/shrI pe Sh+Ta dang sra rtsi pog_/gla sgang ldong ros mu zi dang /_/ru rta dang ni ka m+bi l+yai/_/ser po gnyis dang bcas pa ni/_/'khor los btsir ba'i til mar bsres/_/'di ni mtshon gyis bzhar te bskus/_/nyi mar bsregs na mdze nad
[\[34a.5\]]sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_gu gul la sogs pa'i sman 'khor los btsir ba'i til mar bsres pa mtshon cha la sogs pas bzhar zhing bdar ba lus la bskus nas nyi ma'i 'od la bsregs na mdze nad de'i mod la sel bar byed do/_/ta ma la'i lo ma na le sham/_/ru rta ldong ros nag
[\[34a.6\]]tshur bcas/_/zangs kyi snod du til mar du/_/zhag bdun legs par sbangs pa des/_/zhag bdun bsku zhing nyi mas bsreg_/sha bkra 'joms par byed pa yin/_/sha bkra sar par zla ba gcig_/bsten zhing sbyangs pa byas na sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_ta ma la'i lo ma la
[\[34a.7\]]sogs pa zangs kyi snod du bcug la til mar gyi nang du zhag bdun sbangs pa des bsku zhing byugs nas nyi ma'i than pa la bsregs na sha bkra zla ba gcig gis sel bar byed/_de yang skyug sman dang bkru sman gyi sbyang ba byas na de sel zhing 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/a pa marga'i thal ba'i chu/_/lan
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]bdun legs par gzags pa ru/_/pri yang ku yi mar bskol ba/_/bskus na sha bkra sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_a pa marga'i thal ba'i chu lan bdun gyi bar du legs par gzags shing 'khus par byas la/_de'i nang du pri yang ku'i mar bskol bas bskus na yang sha bkra'i nad
[\[34b.2\]]sel par yang 'gyur ro/_/ka ka dzang gi rtsa ba dang /_/ras bal sa bon 'dam ma dang /_/la phug sa bon dar bar sbyar/_/mig dmar gza' la bskus na ni/_/sha bkra sel bar grub pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ka ka dza'i rtsa ba la sogs pa'i sman dar ba dang spyar ba gza' mig dmar la
[\[34b.3\]]babs pa'i zhag la bskus na yang sha bkra sel bar byed cing mngon sum du mthong bas yid ches pa yin no/_/dzi ban ti dang skyer ba btsod/_/kam+bi l+ye+e dang spangs ma ni/_/'o ma mar dang til mar bskol/_/sra rtsi phog dang spra tshil ni/_/btab pa bskus na de yis ni/_/rkang lag
[\[34b.4\]]zhig pa sel bar byed/_/pags pa gcig pa'i mdze dang ni/_/'brum phran 'bras ni 'byer ba yi/_/mdze nad 'jig par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dzi ban ti la sogs pa'i lde gur byas la 'o ma bzhin 'gyur bcug ste/_mar dang til mar dang ji skad smos pa ltar bskol la de'i nang du
[\[34b.5\]]sra rtsi phog sar dza ra na zhes bya ba dang spra tshil brtab ste bskus na rkang lag zhig cing 'brul ba rnams sel bar byed la pags pa gcig pa'i mdze nad rnams 'jig par byed do/_/lo ma bdun pa'i rtsa ba dang /_/shrI sha yi ni shun lpags dang /_/su ma na dang tsi tra ka_/thal tres nim pa'i shun pa
[\[34b.6\]]dang /_/ka rany+dza dang yungs kar dang /_/tsi tra mar dang 'bras bu gsum/_/byi dang ga dang tsha ba gsum/_/ser po rnams gnyis til mar dang /_/ba gcin bcas par bskol bas ni/_/pags pa'i nad dang rma 'grams dang /_/rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i/_/mdze yi nad
[\[34b.7\]]ni sel byed de/_/'di ni rdo rje 'dra bas na/_/rdo rje can zhes bya ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lo ma bdun pa'i rtsa ba dang /_shri sha la sogs pa'i shun lpags dang /_ka rany+dza la sogs pa'i sa bon dang /_'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas la ba gcin bzhi 'gyur dang til
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]mar dang bcas par bskol na pags pa'i nad la sogs pa sel zhing 'joms par byed do/_/des na 'di ni rdo rje dang 'dra bas na ming rdo rje can zhes bya'o/_/e raN+Da dang dngul rdo dang /_/gla sgang nim pa ka dang ni/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba ka m+bi l+yai/_/byi dang ga dang ni rgun thi/_/go bye
[\[35a.2\]]iN+Da pa ru ni/_/thang shing khron bu gu gul dang /_/ldong ros shri pi ru rta dang /_/lan tshwa ta la bca' sga rnams/_/cha snyoms snu ha'i 'o ma dang /_/arka til mar lhan cig bskol/_/lde gu rdo rje chen po ste/_/rdo rje can pas yon tan lhag_/sha bkra dang ni gzhang 'brum dang /_/'bras
[\[35a.3\]]kyi phreng ba 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_e raN+Da la sogs pa'i sman cha mnyam dang til mar bskol la arga dang snu ha'i 'o ma til mar dang cha mnyam par byas te/_de dag lhan cig bskol ba'i sman mar ni rdo rje chen po zhes bya ste/_sngar gyi rdo rje can gyi yon tan pas yon tan ches lhag
[\[35a.4\]]cing che ba yin la/_khyad par du yang sha bkra la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed pa yin no/_/ru rta ka ra bI ra dang /_/bring ga ra dza arka dang /_/shu dag shi ra rgyam tsha gcin/_/til mar bskol bar dug bcug pa/_/bsku ba mdze nad sel ba'i mchog_/ces bya ba la/_ru rta la sogs pa'i
[\[35a.5\]]sman lde gur byas pa'am/_ba gcin dang mar bskol te de'i nang du dug bcug pas bskus na mdze nad sel ba'i mchog yin no/_/spra tshil li khri gu gul dang /_/sbangs ma dngul rdo yungs kar bskol/_/g.yan pa glang shu myur du sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_/spra tshil la sogs pa'i sman
[\[35a.6\]]lde gur byas pa dang yungs kar gyi mar bskol bas ni g.yan pa la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/rgya skyegs tsi tra mar da dang /_/shi be shri ta tsha ba gsum/_/ru rta yungs kar la phug gi_/sa bon ser po rnam gnyis kyi/_/lde gu dar bar sbyar bskus na/_/shu ba thams cad sel bar
[\[35a.7\]]byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i lde gu dar ba dang sbyar te bskus na shu ba'i nad thams cad sel to/_/zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/tsi tra ka dang shi kru'am/_/sle tres thang shing a ba mar/_/seng ldeng d+ha ba'i lde gu'am/_/dur byid dan da tra ban ti/_/rgya
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]skyegs dngul rdo sug smel lam/_/pu r+Na rna pa'i lde gu ste/_/tshig rkang drug bshad lde gu drug_/zho ga chu dang sbyar ba yis/_/bskus na bad kan rlung las ni/_/gyur pa'i mdze nad sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_tsi tra ka dang shi kru zhes bya ba'i pi pi ling dkar po zho ga chu dang sbyar
[\[35b.2\]]ba'i lde gu bskus na yang bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel bar byed do/_/de bzhin du sle tres dang a ba marga dang thang shing zho ga chu dang sbyar ba'i lde gu yang seng ldeng dang /_d+ha ba btags pa'i lde gu dang /_dur byid dang dan da dang tra ban ti'i lde gu'am/_rgya skyegs
[\[35b.3\]]sam/_/dngul rdo dang sug sme la sbyar ba'i lde gu'am pu r+Na rna ba gcig pu'i lde gu ste/_de ltar tshig rkang pa re res bshad pa'i lde gu drug po de dag gang yang rung ba zho ga chu dang sbyar ba de bskus na rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/ba la ka dang ma nu dang /_/a gar
[\[35b.4\]]nA ga ge sar dang /_/gan+d+ha b+ha dra gla ba dang /_/tsan+dan dang ni pu shel tse/_/cha res bskyed pa'i lde gu yis/_/bad mkhris mdze nad sel bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba la ka la sogs pa'i sman cha brgyad po cha res bskyed pa'i lde gus bskus na bad kan dang mkhri pa las gyur pa'i
[\[35b.5\]]mdze nad sel bar byed pa grub cing mngon du gyur pa yin no/_/de la ba la ka zho gcig_/ma nu zho gnyis/_/a ru ra zho gsum/_nA ga ge sar zho bzhi/_gan+d+ha b+ha dra zho lnga/_gla ba zhes bya ba ni pe la zho drug_/tsan+dan zho bdun/_pu shel tsi zhes bya ba u shi ra zho brgyad sbyar bar bya'o/_/tig
[\[35b.6\]]ta'i sman mar brgya bkrus mar/_/bskus na mdze yi tsha ba sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad sel bar byed pa tsha ba dang sbyar ba la ni sngar bshad pa'i tig ti'i sman mar chu'i nang du lan du ma bskus na phan no/_/til mar tsan+dan shing mngar dang /_/stag tsher ba dang ut+pal/_/bcas pa
[\[35b.7\]]bskus na phan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang tsha ba dang ldan pa'i mdze nad de la til mar tsan+dan dang shing mngar dang stag tsher ba zhes bya ba pra pu N+Da rI ka dang ut+pa la sbyar ba'i lde gus bskus na de la phan zhing sel bar byed do/_/rnags shing yan lag 'drul ba dang /_/lus tsha 'brum bu phra mo 'byung /_/
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]pags pa myags dang bcas pa la/_/bsil ba'i sman chus blugs shing byugs/_/gtar ga bkru sman btang ba dang /_tig ta'i sman mar byin na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rnags shing rul bar gyur pas yan lag dang nying lag 'drul bar gyur pa dang /_lus tsha/_'brum
[\[36a.2\]]bu phra mo tsag tsag byung ba dang /_pags pa myags shing zhig par gyur pa la ni sman bsil ba can la sogs pa'i chus lus la blugs pa dang lde gus byugs pa phan no/_/de bzhin du nad de la ni gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba dang /_bkru sman sbyin pa dang /_tig ta'i sman mar bza' ba dang /
[\[36a.3\]]btung ba dang /_blugs pa dang /_bsku ba'i don du sbyar ba phan no/_/seng ldeng nim pa ba sha ka_/dug mo yungs dang 'bras bu gsum/_/byi dang ga dang sle tres dang /_/pa to la dang ba gcin sbyar/_/phyi dang nang nas btang gyur na/_/srin bu las gyur mdze nad 'joms/_/zhes
[\[36a.4\]]bya ba la/_seng ldeng la sogs pa'i sman ba gcin dang sbyar ba phyi nas blugs pa dang /_nang nas btung bar sbyar na srin bu las gyur pa'i mdze nad sel bar byed do/_/rlung shas che la thog mar ni/_/mar btang bad kan shas che la/_/skyug sman mkhris pa las gyur la/_/gtar ga
[\[36a.5\]]gdab cing bkru sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gi shas che ba'i mdze nad la ni dang po kho nar zhun mar sbyin par bya'o/_/bad kan shas che ba'i mdze nad la ni dang po kho nar skyug sman gtang bar bya'o/_/mkhris pa rgyas par gyur ba'i mdze nad la ni dang por gtar gas khrag dbyung la bkru sman
[\[36a.6\]]gtang bar bya'o/_nang sbyangs khrag ni phyung ba dang /_/gnas ni dag par gyur pa la/_/bsku ba gang zhig byas gyur pa/_/de ni mod la byang bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze'i nad gang zhig la nang gi nad bkru sman la sogs pas bsal zhing khrag phyung nas lus kyi gnas dag par
[\[36a.7\]]byas pa la ji skad smos pa'i lde gus bskus na 'phral du de nad med par 'gyur ro/_/nad gzhi bsal zhing khrag ni phyung ba dang /_/phyi dang nang nas zhi ba'i gso ba byas/_/sman mar yang ni dus su byin gyur na/_/mdze yi nad ni gso sla nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad gzhi
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]sbyangs zhing bsal ba la sogs pa byas par gyur na mdze'i nad de gso sla zhing bde blag kho nar 'byung du rung bar 'gyur ro/_/mdze can nad ni lan mang sbyangs gyur pa/_/de yi srog bsrung lan mang 'bad bya ste/_/nad ni lhag par mang du phyung bas nyam chung ba/_/rlung ldong myur du gsod par byed par
[\[36b.2\]]'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze'i nad dang ldan pa gang zhig nad lan mang du sbyangs shing dag par gyur pa de'i la srog bsrung zhing gnod par mi 'gyur bar sman pas 'bad par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nang gi nad lhag par mang du phyung bar gyur pa la/_nyams stobs shin tu bri zhing chung bar
[\[36b.3\]]gyur pa la/_rlung gi nad langs nas myur ba kho nar gsod pa'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro/_/zla ba phyed cing skyug sman btang ba dang /_/zla ba re re nas ni bkru sman gtang /_/mgo bo sbyang ba zhag ni gsum gsum dang /_/zla ba drug drug nas ni gtar ga bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze can la
[\[36b.4\]]zla ba phyed phyed 'das pa dang skyug sman btang zhing slon du gzhug pa dang /_zla ba re re 'das nas bkru sman btang zhing 'khrur gzhug pa dang /_zhag gsum gsum 'das pa dang mgo ba'i bkru sman ji skad smos pa bzhin du bya ba dang zla ba drug drug nas gtar ga bya zhing nad khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/
[\[36b.5\]]gang zhig slon dang 'khru ba dka' 'gyur te/_/mdze can nad shas che bas khyab gyur pa/_/de ni nges par gso dka' nyid 'gyur bas/_/de bas nad ni ma lus dbyung bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze can gang zhig skyug sman byin yang slon par dka' zhing de bzhin du bkru sman byin yang
[\[36b.6\]]'khrus par dka' bar gyur pa'am/_yang na cung zad tsam zhig slon zhing 'khrus nas nad 'thon par ma gyur pa'i mdze can de nad kyi shas che bas khyab par gyur pa yin la/_de lta bu dag ni nges par gso dka' ba'am/_gsor mi rung ba'i mdze nad du 'gyur bas de bas na mdze nad de'i nad
[\[36b.7\]]ci nas kyang ma lus par dbyung bar bya zhing gting phyin par bya ba'i nad cung zad 'bri ba tsam gyis gso bar ni mi bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las gso ba'i gnas le'u bcu dgu pa'i
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas sha bkra dang srin bu'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar nas gzhi bshad pa'i go rims kyis gso ba yang de ltar bshad dgos pa'i phyir skabs 'dir le'u brtsams pa yin no/_/gang zhig mdze nad pas
[\[37a.2\]]kyang 'jigs 'gyur zhing /_/myur du gso dka' nyid du 'gyur bas na/_/khang pa 'bar bar gyur pa lta bur ni/_/sha bkra'i nad zhi ba la 'bad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha bkra'i nad la ni mdze'i nad pas kyang 'jigs par gyur pa yin pas de ni ma bcos na myur du gso dka'
[\[37a.3\]]ba nyid du 'gyur te/_rgyu de bas na sha bkra'i nad de'i gso ba'i sbyor ba la 'bad cing brtson par bya ste/_dper na khang pa'i me 'bar bar gyur pa la gyur pa la myur du zhi zhing bsil bar dgos pa dang 'dra'o/_/khyad par du ni dang por lus la ni/_/sbyang ba bya ba nye bar sbyang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha
[\[37a.4\]]bkra'i nad thams cad la ni gso ba gzhan pas khyad par du dang po kho nar lus kyi nad sbyang ba'i cho ga 'og nas smos pa nye bar sbyar par bya'o/_/sha bkra la ni so ma ra dza'i khu/_bu ram chang ngam sha khu bkru sman ni/_/snu ha'i 'o mar bcas pa blud par bya/_/de 'thungs nas ni lus bkrus nyams
[\[37a.5\]]stobs dag_/ci yod pa las nyin mtshan bsten par bya/_/skom dang skyes na zhag gsum thug pa blud/_/ces bya ba la/_sha bkra'i nad la so ma ra dza bskol ba'i khu ba bu ram dang chang sbyar te blud pa 'am/_yang na so ma ra dza bskol ba'i khu ba sha khu dang sbyar la blud par bya ste/_de ni bkru sman
[\[37a.6\]]gyi dam pa'am/_mchog yin par 'dod la/_de bas na so ma ra dza'i khu ba de 'thung nas lus bskus te nyams stobs kyis ji tsam bzod par nyi tshan la bstan cing 'dug par bya'o/_/des sha bkra can de bkrus par gyur pa dang /_skom dang skyed na zhag gsum gyi bar du thug pa rkyang
[\[37a.7\]]rkyang po blud par bya'o/_/sha bka'i lus la chu bur byung gyur na/_/de ni tsher ma dag gis brtol bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gong gi sman des bskus nas nyi ma la 'dug pa na sha bkra can gyi lus de las 'brum bu 'am chu bur byung bar gyur na chu bur de tsher mas brtol la chu gzags par bya'o/_/
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]chu bur gzags par byas nas nang re zhing /_/so ma ra dza dang ni a sa na/_/pri yang ku dang shu ti chur bskol blud/_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar chu bur de brtol te chu gzags pa'i 'og tu nyi ma re re zhing nang par gyi dus su so ma ra dza la sogs pa'i sman chur bskol ba blud par bya'o/_/rgya
[\[37b.2\]]skyegs shing thal bu ram phran sbyar ba'i/_/chu ni nyams stobs ci yod pa la blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na chu bur gzags pa'i 'og tu rgya skyegs kyi shing pa la sha zhes bya ba'i thal ba dang /_/bu ram phra mo pha ni rta zhes bya ba sbyar ba'i chu nad pa'i nyams stobs ci yod pa las zla ba phyed kyi
[\[37b.3\]]bar du nang re blud par bya'o/_/bal gu skyu ru ra'i shun dug mo yungs/_/khu ba so ma ra dzar bcas pa blud/_/dro bar 'dug nas chu bur byung ba na/_/lan tshwa med zas dar bar bcas par sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_so ma ra dza'i lde gu shing bal gu dang skyu ru ra la sogs pa'i shun pa
[\[37b.4\]]bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te blud nas sha bkra can de nyi tshan dro ba la 'dug tu bcug nas chu bur byung bar gyur pa dang /_tshwa med pa'i zas dar ba dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o/_/ba gcin tsi tra ka dang tsha ba gsum/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba mar gyi snod du gzhag_/zla phyed lon nas sha bkra can
[\[37b.5\]]la blud/_/'di la mdze nad gso ba'i cho ga'ang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba gcin dang /_tsi tra ka dang /_tsha ba gsum sbyar ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab la rdza mar bcug pa'i snod kyi nang du zla ba phyed kyi bar du bzhag la/_de'i 'og tu blud par bya zhing yang sha bkra'i nad kyis btab pa 'di la mdze'i
[\[37b.6\]]nad kyi gso ba'i cho ga ji skad bshad pa byas na yang phan no/_/yang na bring ga ra dza lcags snod bcug_/til mar nang du brngos pa sbyin bya zhing /_/a sa na yi sa bon 'o mar bskol/_/de rjes blud na sha bkra 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_yang sha bkra'i nad kyis btab pa
[\[37b.7\]]la/_bring ga ra dza lcags kyi snod kyi nang du bcug ste/_til mar gyis brngos pa byin nas/_de'i rjes la a sa na'i sa bon lo mar bskol ba blud na sha bkra'i nad 'joms par byed do/_/dong ga arka pu ti ka ra ny+dza/_/snu ha dzA ti'i lo ma ba gcin btags/_/lde gu bskus na sha bkra gzhang
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]'brum dang /_/shu ba g.yan pa rma 'grams sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_dong ga nas snu ha dang dzA ti'i bar gyi lo ma ba gcin dang lhan cig zhib tu btags pa'i lde gus bskus na sha bkra la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_glang chen gzig gi pags bsregs
[\[38a.2\]]til mar dang /_/sbyar ba bskus na sha bkra sel mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_glang po che'i pags pa dang /_/gzig gi pags pa me'i nang du bsregs pa la til mar dang bcas pa'i lde gus bskus na yang sha bkra'i nad sel ba'i mchog dam pa yin no/_/sbur ba dri ngan dong ga'i 'o ma dang /_/
[\[38a.3\]]sbyar te bskus pa gcig pus sha bkra sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbur ba dri nga zhing gnag pa gang yin pa de dong ga'i shing gi 'o ma dang sbyar te sha bkra la bskus na rdzas kyi sbyor ba gzhan dang ma 'dres pa gcig pu des kyang sha bkra'i nad sel bar byed do/_chu bur bskyed phyir go bye cham chom
[\[38a.4\]]brdungs/_/nub mo ba gcin la sbangs nyi grib bskom/_/de ltar lan gsum byas te zhib tu btags/_/snu ha'i 'o sbyar bskus na sha bkra 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha bkra las chu bur bskyed cing 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir go bye zhes bya ba bse shing gi 'bras bu cham chom brdungs te nub mo ba
[\[38a.5\]]gcin gyi nang du sbangs nas nyin par grib ma la bskams te tshul de ltar lan gsum sbangs shing bskams nas de'i 'og tu de zhib par btags la/_lde gu sbyar te/_shing snu ha zhes bya ba shI khaN+Da 'byung ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar te bskus na sha bkra'i nad 'joms shing sel bar byed do/_/sbrul nag bsregs
[\[38a.6\]]pa las byung snag tsha ni/_/ba ru ra yi mar dang sbyar te bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrul nag po snod kha sbyar ba'i nang du du ba ma shor bar bsregs pa'i thal ba snag tsha ltar gyur pa de ba ru ra'i tshi gu btsir ba'i khu ba mar dang sbyar te bskus na yang sha bkra sel bar byed do/_/de bzhin rma bya'i mkhris pa
[\[38a.7\]]bsregs pa 'am/_/ba la ka bsregs rma bya'i mkhris bsregs phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma bya'i mkhris pa bsregs pa bskus pa 'am/_ba la ka bsregs pa'i thal ba 'am/_rma bya'i mkhris pa bsregs te bskus na yang sha bkra'i nad la phan no/_/so ma ra dza'i sa bon phul gang dang /_/
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]ba bla bzhi cha dag ni bsregs nas su/_/pa yi gcin dang sbyar te btags bskus na/_/sha bkra lpags mdog 'dra bar byed pa'i mchog_/ces bya ba la/_so ma ra dza'i sa bon las phul gang ste srang bzhi/_ba bla de'i bzhi cha ste/_srang gcig gcig tu bsres nas ba'i gcin dang sbyar te
[\[38b.2\]]bskus na yang sha bkra'i nad de pags pa gzhan dang mdog 'dra bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/glang chen rtug pa legs bsregs thal ba ni/_/glang chen gcin dang bsres te gzags gyur pa/_/bre bcu drug dang so ma ra dza yi/_/sa bon bcu chas btab bskol sbyin bag gyur/_/mang du
[\[38b.3\]]bdar ba de yis bskus na ni/_/sha bkra'i nad ni rnam par 'joms 'gyur zhing /_/mdze'i nad dam sme ba nag po'am/_/sha lhag skyes pa'i rma ni sbyong bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_glang po che'i rtug pa legs par bsregs pa'i thal ba yang /_glang po che'i gcin dang lhan cig tu bsres
[\[38b.4\]]pa lan mang du gzags pa'i khu ba bre bcu drug tsam gyi tshad la so ma ra dza'i sa bon bcin khu'i bcu cha btab ste bskol la de tshos nas sbyin bag 'byar ba gcan du gyur pa dang /_sha bkra'i nad lci ba skam po la sogs pas mang du bdar te/_lde gu des bskus na sha bkra'i nad 'joms par
[\[38b.5\]]'gyur la/_de bzhin du mdze nad la sogs pa'i nad la yang dang por bdar te des bskus na sbyong zhing sel bar byed do/_/go bye tsi tra ka dang snu ha dang /_arka'i rtsa ba dang ni 'ol ma se/_/de bzhin tsha ba gsum dang dung dang ni/_/spangs ma ru rtar bcas dang lan ch+wa lnga/_/thal ba gnyis dang lang+ga
[\[38b.6\]]li btags phye/_/snu ha arka'i 'o mar bskol nas ni/_/ska bar gyur ba lcags kyi nang du gzhag_de ni thur mas bskus na mdze nad dang /_/sha bkra sme ba nag por gyur pa dang /_/mdzer ba gzhang 'brum pags pa'i rmen bu sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing snu ha dang arga'i 'o ma'i nang du
[\[38b.7\]]go bye la sogs pa'i sman phye mar byas te bskol nas 'o ma de ska bar gyur pa dang de thur mas blangs nas bskus na mdze nad la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/sbyang byas gtar ga gdab pa dang /_/rtsub chos phye zan zos gyur pas/_/sdig pa zad par gyur pa yi/_/'ga' zhig gis ni sha
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]bkra 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_sha bkra'i nad skyes par gyur nas skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis sbyang ba byas pa dang /_gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba dang /_rtsub chos kyi rnam pa kha ba dang /_phye zan zos par gyur pa la ni sdig pa zad cing bsod nams dang ldan pa'i
[\[39a.2\]]mi 'ga' zhig gis sha bkra 'byang bar 'gyur gyi thams cad ni ma yin no/_/khong pa'i srin yod snum dugs byed/_/bu ram 'o ma nya sogs kyis/_/bad kan srin bu bslangs nas ni/_/nub mo de ni bde bar gnas/_/bye'u rug sogs sde ba gcin dang /_/chu phyed bcas pa bskol nas ni/_/
[\[39a.3\]]khu ba de'i nang pi pi ling /_/po son cha dang byi dang ga_/til mar swa rdzi k+sha rar bcas/_/mas gtong bas ni gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin bu khong pa na yod pa'i nad pa la ni snum gyis shes par byas la/_de'i 'og tu dugs byas nas bu ram dang 'o ma dang nya'i sha la sogs pas bad kan
[\[39a.4\]]dang srin bu bslangs shing gnas la bkod la nub mo de bde bar gnas shing gnyid log la/_nad par bye'u rug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan ba gcin dang chu ba gcin phyed blugs pa'i nang bskol la/_khu ba'i nang du pi pi ling la sogs pa'i lde gu btab la til mar dang swa rji ka k+Sha ra dang bcas pa'i nas
[\[39a.5\]]gtong ba'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/_/de nyid de la de nyid dam/_/dur byid lde gu po son cha/_/pi pi ling ni khu bar bsres/_/bkru sman de la blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i 'og tu nyin zhag de nyid la/_lto na srin bu yod pa'i nad pa de la ni ru ha mas gtong ba de nyid blud par bya ba'am/_dur
[\[39a.6\]]byid dang lde gu po son cha dang pi pi ling bskol pa'i khu ba dang bsres pa'i bkru sman blud par bya'o/_/de ltar steng 'og sbyang byas nas/_/tsha ba lngar ldan thug sogs blud/_/tsha dang kha dang bska ba yi/_/sman bskol chu ni blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar steng dang 'og dang 'og nas sbyang bar byas pa'i rjes la
[\[39a.7\]]nad pa de la tsha ba lnga dang ldan pa'i thug pa la sogs pa'i rim pa blud par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sman tsha ba dang /_kha ba dang bska ba dang ldan pa'i sman chu bskol ba blud par bya'o/_/dus su byi dang ga'i til mar/_/'jam rtse de la gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bkru sman dang skyug sman btang ba'i
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]rjes la/_srin bu yod pa'i nad pa de la 'jam rtsi gtang bar 'os pa'i dus su byi dang ga'i til mar gyi 'jam rtsi mas gtong bar bya'o/_/mgo yi srin bur mgo nad ni/_/gso bar bya ba'i rim pa bya/_/tsha dang kha ba shas che zhing /_/snum nyung kha zas sbyin par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mgo
[\[39b.2\]]bo la brten zhing gnas pa'i srin bu yod pa la ni mgo bo'i nad gso ba las bshad pa'i sman gyis gso ba'i rim pa bya zhing kha zas tsha ba dang kha ba'i shas che zhing de lta bu las gzhi blangs pa sbyin zhing snum chung ba'i kha zas sbyin par bya'o/_/byi dang ga dang pi pi ling /_/pi pi ling rtsa na le sham/_/na
[\[39b.3\]]le sham ni dkar po dang /_swa rdzi ka ni thal bar bcas/_/nas thug dar ba btsos pa blud/_/ces bya ba la/_byi dang ga la sogs pa'i sman dang bcas pa'i nas thug dar bar btsos pa blud par bya'o/_/gi ri kar ni shi sha ka_/pa ri pa tra ke du ka/_/pa la sha'i 'bras ba tu ra/_/su ti ka ni so sor
[\[39b.4\]]bskol/_/khu ba sbrang rtsi bcas pa'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_gi ri kar ni la sogs pa'i sman sna gang yang rung ba so sor bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_byi'u rug pa dang sbrang rtsi+er sbyar ba blud par bya'o/_/byi'u rug pa sogs sbrang rtsi sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na byi'u rug pa la sogs pa
[\[39b.5\]]ste/_byi'u rug pa gnyis dang pha ni ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sman sna re re sbrang rtsi dang sbyang ba'i lde gu sbyin par bya'o/_/rta sbangs phye ma byi dang ga_/bskol ba'i nang sbangs mang du bza'/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu'am/_/'bras bu gsum khur sbangs pa sbyin/_/mgo bo'i srin bu'i
[\[39b.6\]]nad la ni/_/de yi phye ma bung par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rta sbangs kyi phye ma byi dang ga dang bskol ba'i nad du sbyangs shing bsres pa lan mang du bza' ba 'am/_yang na rta sbangs kyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa'i lde gu'am/_'bras kyi khu ba dang sbyar ba sbyin par bya ste/_yang na mgo
[\[39b.7\]]bo srin bu yod pa'i nad pa la ni rta sbangs kyi phye ma sna'i sgo nas bus la btang na yang phan no/_/mu sha kar+Na'i 'dab ma ni/_/zhib tu btags ba 'bras phyer bcas/_/btsos pa'i khu ba sbyin par bya/_/de yi rjes la rang skyur ram/_/dar ba sla ba tsha ba lnga/_/lan tshwar bcas pa
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mu sha kar+Na zhes bya ba a khu kar+Na'i 'dab ma byi ba'i rna ba 'dra ba zhin tu btags la/_'bras sA la'i phye ma dang sbyar te 'dab ma la btsos pa'i skya khur byin na de'i 'og tu 'bras kyi khu le'i rang skyur kan dze zhes bya ba la/_tsha ba lnga dang lan
[\[40a.2\]]tshwar bcas pa blud pa 'am/_dar ba sla ba tsha ba lnga dang bcas pa blud bar bya'o/_/nim pa a pa marga dang /_/ni rgun thi lo'ang de bzhin bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_nim pa dang a pa marga dang /_ni rgun tha'i lo ma la yang mu sha ka r+Na'i skabs su bshad pa'i cho ga de bzhin du byas pa'i khu ba
[\[40a.3\]]sbyin par bya'o zhes sbyar ro/_/byi dang ga yi phye ma dang /_/bsres pa'i 'bras phye'i khur ba sbyin/_/go bye'i mar ni rnying pa la/_/byi dang ga yi shun pa bsal/_/cha phyed bcug ste nyi mar gzhag_/btung dang 'jam rtsir sbyar bar bya/_/thang shing shri beSh+Ta yi snum/_/so sor de
[\[40a.4\]]bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na byi dang ga'i phye ma dang bsres pa'i 'bras kyi phye'i khu ba sbyin par bya ba'am/_go bye btsir ba'i mar gyi nang du byi dang ga shun pa drus pa mar de'i cha phyed bcug la nyi ma la bzhag ste btung ba dang 'jam rtsir sbyar na yang srin bu'i nad sel to/_/
[\[40a.5\]]thang shing dang shri beSh+Ta zhes bya ba sa ra la'i shing gi snum khu so sor snga ma bzhin du byi dang ga snun ba cha phyed bcug ste/_btung pa dang 'jam rtsir sbyar na yang phan no/_/bshang bar skyes la lhag par yang /_/bkru sman dang ni 'jam rtsi gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_bshang ba las skyes pa'i
[\[40a.6\]]srin bu la khyad par du yang srin bu 'joms par byed pa'i sman dang sbyar te/_bkru sman dang 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur mgo ba'i nad/_/bkru sman slon dang zhi sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i srin bu la ni mgo ba'i bkru sman dang slon sman
[\[40a.7\]]zhi ba'i sman btang bas bsal bar bya'o/_/khrag las gyur pa'i srin bu la/_/gso ba mdze yi tshul du bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i srin bu la ni mdze nad gso ba'i cho ga ji skad smos pa bzhin bya'o/_/spu 'byi byed la gso ba ni/_/in+d+ra lub ta'i cho ga bya/_/
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]zhes bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i srin bu spu za zhing 'byin par byed pa la ni/_de'i gso ba in+d+ra lub ta zhes bya ba'i nad gso ba'i cho ga rgyud phyi ma las mgo na ba'i skabs su bshad pa gang dag yin pa de bya'o/_/'o ma sha dang mar dang bu ram dang /_/zho dang 'dab ma can gyi tshod ma
[\[40b.2\]]dang /_/mdor na mngar dang skyur ba'i khu ba rnams/_/srin bu gzhom par 'dod pas yongs su spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_mi'i srin bu'i nad gzhom zhing bsal bar 'dod pas 'o ma la sogs pa spang bar bya ba'am/_de bzhin du 'dab ma can gyi tshod ma ste rgya sne'u dang /_lcam pa la
[\[40b.3\]]sogs pa'i tshod ma spang ba dang /_mdor bsdu na mngar ba dang skyur ba'i bag thams cad yongs su spang zhing dor bar bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las gso ba'i gnas
[\[40b.4\]]le'u nyi shu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o/_//de nas rlung nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_go rims 'di nyid la bab pas 'di'i gso ba bstan pa'i phyir brtsams pa yin no/_/ma 'dres rlung las dang por ni/_/mar dang rkang dang tshil dang ni/_/til mar
[\[40b.5\]]blud cing snum gyi ni/_/sbyor bas legs par gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gi nad ma 'dres pa des/_bad kan dang mkhris pa'i nad med pa la ni dang por mar la sogs pa'i snum blud cing bsku ba dang dugs la sogs pa snum gyi sbyor bas gso bar bya'o/_/de nas snum zhen
[\[40b.6\]]ngal bsos ste/_/'o mas slar yang snum chos bya/_/rlan can grong dang chu la gnas/_/sha khu snum dang ldan pa gtang /_/'o thug kri sar skyur dang bcas/_/lan tshwar ldan blud 'jam rtsi gtang /_/sna sman skyo byas kha zas ni/_/snum byas byin zhing dugs byas la/_/legs bskus
[\[40b.7\]]snum dang ldan pa la/_/gseg ma la sogs dugs bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu rlung nad kyis zhen pa'i nad pa la snum gyi cho ga byas pas dub par gyur pa de la/_gso zhing dub brtas te 'o ma blud cing snum gyi cho ga bya ba'am/_rlan can gyi srog chags la sogs pa'i
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]sha khu gang yang rung ba blud cing 'o thug dang kris ra'i thug pa skyur dang lan tshwa dang ldan pa blud pa 'am/_'jam rtsi mas gtong ba dang /_sna nas sman gyi sbyor ba btang ba dang /_skyo ma la sogs pa'i sman kha zas snum can byin la brta bar byas la/_de'i 'og du legs
[\[41a.2\]]par snum gyis zhen pa dang gseg ma la sogs pa'i dugs kyi le'u las bshad pa rnams snum dang ldan pas dugs bya'o/_/snum gyis zhen byas dugs byas pas/_/g.yo zhing rengs dang gzer bcas pas/_/zhes bya ba la/_snum gyis legs par zhen par byas pa dang /_dugs
