[\[60b.5\]]mi bde/_/blud de slon du gzhug par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_ku ba kha bo'i 'bras bu lags par smin par gyur pa dang /_ku ba'i nang nas 'bras bu phyung la/_ku ba'i nang du 'o ma bcug ste/_mnan la zhor gyur pa dang /_lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba'i nad pa la blud la slon du gzhug go_/'bras bu'i
[\[60b.6\]]nang ma zho ga chu/_/mdze dug skya rbab nyid la blud/_/ces bya ba la/_ku ba kha bo'i nang gi 'bras bu zho ga chu dang sbyar te/_mdze nad la sogs pas btab pa la blud de slon du gzhug par bya'o/_/de dang dar ba bskol ba ni/_/rgyam tsha sbrang rtsi bcas pa 'ang blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na ku ba kha bo
[\[60b.7\]]dang /_dar ba bskol ba'i nang du rgyam tsha dang sbrang rtsi btab ste blud la/_mdze dang dug dang skya rbab kyis nyen ba'i nad pa slon du gzhug par bya'o/_/yang na de yi sa bon ni/_/ra yi 'o mar bcas ba dag_/dug skran dmu rdzing rmen bu dang /_/'bras dang rkang bam nad la blud/_/ces bya ba la/_ku ba kha bo'i sa
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]bon ra'i 'o ma dang sbyar ba ra'i 'o ma de nyid dang bcas pa dug la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab pa la blud la slon du gzhug go/_/bad kan las gyur lud pa'i rims/_/lkog ma'i nad dang ma zhu la/_/ku ba kha bo'i khu ba ni/_/phye dang sbyar ba'i skyo ma blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las
[\[61a.2\]]gyur pa'i lud pa la sogs pa'i nad la/_ku ba kha bo bskol pa'i khu ba phye dang sbyar ba'i skyo ma blud la slon du gzhug go/_/skran dang rims rnying bying ba la/_/lde gu sha khur sbyar blud na/_/legs pa kho nar slon 'gyur zhing /_/nyam chung bar yang 'gyur ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/yang ku ba kha bo'i lde gu sha
[\[61a.3\]]khu dang sbyar ba blud na skran dang rims bying ba yun ring du lon pa rnying pa sel zhing sbyor ba de lta bus nyam nga ba med par legs par slon par 'gyur zhing nad pa de nyam chung bas nyen bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ku ba kha bo'i me tog dang /_/'bras bu'i phye mas bsgos pa yi/_/me tog phreng ba bsnams pa ni/_skyid de ba
[\[61a.4\]]yi skyug sman yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ku ba kha bo'i me tog dang 'bras bu bskams pa zhib tu btags pas me tog gi phreng ba la bsgos te/_de'i dri ma mnams pas skyid de ba/_/bde ba la brten pa dag skyug tu bzhug go/_/skran lud dmu rdzing lkog ma'i nad/_/bad kan gnas la brten pa'i rlung /_/bad
[\[61a.5\]]kan kha dang mgrin par gnas/_/bad kan 'phel bar gyur pa dang /_/brtan zhing dkyil ni skyes pa la/_ko sha ta ka'i skyug sman bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_skran la sogs pa'i nad dang bad kan gyi gnas la brten pa'i rlung nad la/_kha dang lkog mar gnas pa'i bad kan dang /_bad kan 'phel
[\[61a.6\]]zhing rgyas par gyur ba dang brtan cing dkyel che bar gyur pa la ni ra dza ko sha ta ki zhes bya ba marga'i skyug sman btang ba bsngags pa yin no/_/'tsho byed nye'u shing zangs rtsi ba/_/kha sral phre'u ram nye gnyis/_/shra ba ni dang me da dang /_/ma hA me da mu ng+hu li/_/'di dag re re'i phye ma dang /_/ko sha ta ki'i
[\[61a.7\]]phye mar bcas/_/sbrang rtsi kha rar sbyar ba ni/_/lud pa snying ni tsha la bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_/'tsho byed dang /_nye'u shing la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i phye ma ra dza ko sha ta ki'i phye ma dang bcas pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu byin te slon du bcug na lud pa la sogs pa'i nad la phan no/_/de rjes chu dron blud
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]pa ni/_/bad kan mkhris tsha ldan la bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_/lde gu de byin pa'i rjes la chu dron blud pa ni mkhris pa tsha ba dang ldan pa'i bad kan la skyug sman du bsngags so/_/'u su g.yer ma'i khu ba dang /_/de yi khu bas dug 'joms so/_/zhes bya ba la/_'u su'i 'bras bu dang /_g.yer
[\[61b.2\]]na bskol ba'i khu bar dza ko sha ta de'i lde gu dang sbyar ba'i skyug sman blud na dug 'joms par byed par 'gyur ro/_/bim pa ka sa mar da 'am/_/ba spru ba yi khu bar ni/_/ra dza ko sha ta ki ni/_/rdog ma gcig gam gnyis mnyes pa'i/_/dngas ma snying gi nad la blud/_/ces bya ba la/_/ra dza ko sha
[\[61b.3\]]ta ki'i rdog ma gcig gam gnyis bim pa bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/_ka sa mar da bskol ba'i khu ba'am/_/ba spru ba ba skol ba'i khu ba'i nang du mnyes la btsags pa'i dngas ma blud de slon du bcug na mchog tu snying gi nad sel zhing 'joms par byed pa'i dam pa yin no/_/de bskol 'o ma las byung
[\[61b.4\]]mar/_/po son cha sogs bskol ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_/yang na ra dza ko sha ta de dang bskol ba'i 'o ma las byung ba'i mar sar dang po son cha la sogs pa ste po son cha dang /_dzi mu ta ka dang /_ku ba kha bo dang /_ko sha ta ki dang /_dug mo yungs kyi sa bon dang /_kri da be da zhes bya ba
[\[61b.5\]]ko sha ta ki gnyis pa bskol ba'i khu ba dang bcas pa'i skyug sman blud na snying gi nad la phan no/_/ko sha ta sogs kha dang tsha/_/mdze dang skya rbab mcher pa'i nad/_/'or nad skran nad sbyar dug sogs/_/gting zug pa la bsngags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ko sha ta ka la sogs pa'i sman ro kha
[\[61b.6\]]ba dang /_tsha ba'i skyug sman btang na/_mdze la sogs pa'i nad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/po son cha sogs drug so sor/_bskol ba dang ni rlan can sha_/ko sha ta ka cha mnyam bskol/_/khu ba rgyam tshar bcas pa blud/_/ces bya ba la/_po son cha la sogs pa gong du smos pa'i skyug sman drug
[\[61b.7\]]po so sor bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_rlan can gyi srog chags kyi sha ko sha ta ka dang cha mnyam pa bskol la/_bskol ba'i khu ba de rgyam tsha dang bcas pa blud nas slon du bcug na yang mdze la sogs pa'i nad la phan no/_/po son cha sogs pi pi ling /_/cha mnyam ko sha ta kar sbyar/_/yang na ko sha ta
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]ka yi/_/khu ba bu ram shing khu blud/_/ce bya ba la/_po son cha la sogs pa'i skyug sman drug po pi pi ling dang cha mnyam pa ko sha ta ka'i khu ba dang sbyar ba'i skyug sman blud pa 'am/_yang na ko sha ta ka blud ba'i khu ba bu ram shing gi khu ba dang sbyar te/_blud de slon du bcug na
[\[62a.2\]]yang mdze nad la sogs pa'i nad la phan no/_/dug mo yungs ni skyid de ba/_/bad kan mkhris pa khrag bcas dang /_/rims nad shu ba snying nad dang /_/dreg nad kyis 'ther mdze la bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_/dug mo yungs kyi sa bon bskol ba'i khu ba ni skyid de ba'am/_byis pa gzhon nu bad
[\[62a.3\]]kan dang /_mkhris pa la sogs pa'i nad dang bcas pa'i skyug sman du gtang ba bsngags so/_/dug mo yungs kyi sa bon te/_/yungs kar ram ni ma du ka_/bskol ba'i chu'am rgyam tsha'i chu/_/yang na kri sa ra ldan blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na dug mo yungs kyi sa bon yungs kar bskol ba'i
[\[62a.4\]]chu 'am ma du ka bskol ba'i chu 'am/_rgyam tsha'i chu gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te skyug sman du btang ba 'am/_yang na dug mo yungs kyi sa bon kri sa ra zhes bya ba'i til gyi sbyar thug dang ldan pa blud la slon du gzhug go/_/de yi sa bon arga yi/_/'o mar zhag bdun sbangs pa ni/_/po son cha dang dzi mu ta/_/
[\[62a.5\]]ku ba kha bo dzi ban ti/_/dzi ba ka ni bskol ba yi/_/khu ba gang yang rung ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_/dug mo yungs de'i sa bon kyi phye ma arga'i 'o ma nang du zhag bdun gyi bar du sbangs pa po son cha la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te/_skyug sman du blud par bya'o/_/skyug sman gyi
[\[62a.6\]]ni gtso bo yi/_/cho ga phyogs tsam bshad pa yin/_/blo dang ldan pas tshul 'di yis/_/gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar tshul 'dis skyug sman gyi gtso bo po son cha la sogs pa'i cho ga bya ba'i thabs ma smos par de'i phyogs tsam zhig bshad cing bstan pa yin pas
[\[62a.7\]]blo dang ldan pa'i sman pas sa bon tsam du smos pa'i tshul 'dis skyug sman gyi rnam pa gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par rjes su dpags te sbyar zhing gtang bar bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa'i tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]ba las/_cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u dang po'i 'grel pa'o//_//de nas bkru sman bya ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_ro stod kyi sbyang ba bshad pa'i rjes la/_ro sman kyi sbyang ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/de las kyang dur byid ni bkru sman gyi gtso
[\[62b.2\]]bo yin pas dang por bshad pa yin te/_de'i phyir smos pa ni/_/dur byid bska zhing mngar la rtsub/_/zhu rjes tsha bar gyur pa yin/_/bad kan mkhris pa zhi byed de/_/rtsub pas rlung ni 'khrugs par byed/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa yin te/_dur byid ni sha ma dang /_/tri byid dang /_ma ka ti ka zhes
[\[62b.3\]]bya ba la sogs pa'i ming gi rnam grangs kyis bshad pa yin no/_/de ni ro bska ba dang mngar ba yin la/_/rang bzhin ni rtsub pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin la/_/zhu bar gyur pa ni zhu rjes kyi ro tsha ba yin no/_/de bzhin du bska ba la sogs pa'i rgyus bad kan dang mkhris pa ni zhi zhing sel bar byed pa yin la/
[\[62b.4\]]rtsub pa'i rgyus rlung ni 'khrugs shing ldang bar byed ba yin no/_/de 'dir sman gyi sbyor ba yis/_/rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa sel/_/cho ga'i khyad par la brten nas/_/nad kun 'joms par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang dur byid de ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_bad kan sel bar byed pa'i sman
[\[62b.5\]]gyi sbyor ba dang /_bsrel shing cho ga'i las kyi rim pa la brten cing gnas na/_/nad thams cad kyang sel cing 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/dur byid rnam pa gnyis su bshad/_/de rtsa dmar nag dkar ba yi/_/rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/dur byid de'i rtsa ba rnam pa
[\[62b.6\]]gnyis su bshad de/_sha ma zhes bya ba rtsa ba dmar nag tu 'dug pa ni gcig yin la/_/dri byid ces bya ba rtsa ba dkar po yod pa ni gnyis pa yin no/_/de la tri byid mchog tu bshad/_/nyes pa med cing bde bar 'khru/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa ba rnam pa gnyis su yod pa de'i nang nas tri byid ces bya ba dur
[\[62b.7\]]byid dkar po ni shin tu mchog yin par bshad de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyes pa'i skyon med par nad sel zhing bde blag tu 'khru bar byed pas mchog yin la/_/de ni byis pa dang /_/rgan po dang /_mi skyid de bar gnas pa dag lto snyi ba'i nad pa'i bkru sman du mchog tu bsngags pa yin no/_/brgyal rmongs
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]byed cing lkog ma ni/_/rtsub cing gnod par byed pa dang /_/rno zhing myur du 'khru byed pa/_/lto sra nad gzhi shas che dang /_/sdug bsngal gyis nyen nad pa la/_/sha ma dur byid bsngags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dur byid dmar nag tu 'dug pa sha ma zhes bya ba'i sgras bshad
[\[63a.2\]]pa de ni shin tu rno zhing myur du 'khru bar byed pa yin pas/_brgyal ba dang sems rmongs par byed pa dang /_lkog ma shas cher rtsub cing 'dar ba snyam sems la nyams shing gnod par byed pa yin no/_/de bas na rtsa ba dmar nag tu 'dug pa'i dur byid de ni nad pa lto sra ba dang /_nad gzhi sogs pa'i shas
[\[63a.3\]]che ba dang /_nad kyi sdug bsngal gyis lus nyen cing gzir ba dag la de bsngags shing nad kyi gting 'byin pa yin no/_/de ni zabs su zug cing 'jam/_/thad kar 'phros pa ma yin pa/_/btus la snying po bor nas ni/_/shun ba bskams te sba bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa ba de gnyis kyang zabs su
[\[63a.4\]]zug cing sa'i gting ring por nus par gyur pa dang /_'jam zhing mnyen pa dang /_rtsa ba yan man du ma 'phros bar thur du drang por zug pa btus shing bton la/_nang gi snying po shing bu ltar sra ba de bor nas shun pa legs par bskams te/_snod bzang po'i nang du sba bar ba'o/_/de nas de'i 'og de'i
[\[63a.5\]]phye ma/_/rgyam tsha dong ga cung zad btab/_/rlung nad la ni skyur las blud/_/ces bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu bkru sman gtong ba'i dus su rlung gi nad la ni/_dur byid kyi phye ma rgyam tsha dang dong ga'i phye ma cung zad tsam dang bsres te/_/rang skyur kan dzi'am/_rtsa ba mo'i dngas ma la sogs ba btung ba
[\[63a.6\]]skyur bag dang sbyar te blud par bya'o/_/mkhris par sbrang rtsi kha ra mar/_/'o ma rgun 'brum bu ram shing /_/khu ba tang pal mngar ba yi/_/sman de 'bras bu gsum gyi ni/_/khu bar bcas pa blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa'i nad la ni dur byid kyi phye ma de sbrang rtsi dang kha ra dang mar dang
[\[63a.7\]]sbyar zhing bsres ba'i 'o ma 'am/_/rgun chu 'am/_bu ram shing gi khu ba 'am/_/tang pa la bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/_mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/_'bras bu gsum bskol pa'i khu ba gang yang rung ba dang ci rigs par sbyar te blud par bya'o/_/bad kan la pi lu yi/_/
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]khu ba ba gcin chang skyur rtsabs/_/tsha ba lnga sogs phye ma ni/_/bad kan 'joms dang ci rigs sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi nad la dur byid kyi phye ma pu lu bskol ba'i khu ba 'am/_ba gcin nam/_chang ngam/_skyu rtsabs kan dzi zhes bya ba gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te tsha ba lnga'i phye ma la
[\[63b.2\]]sogs pa bad kan 'joms par byed pa'i sman gyi phye ma btab ste ci rigs par blud par bya'o/_/dur byid ldi gu khu ba dang /_/bskol pa'i khu ba bsgrangs kha ra/_sbrang rtsi dri bzangs gsum dang bcas/_/lde gu yid 'ong bkru sman yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dur byid lde gur btags pa 'am/_/bskol
[\[63b.3\]]ba'i khu ba bsgrangs ba'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang kha ra dang /_shing tsha la sogs pa dri bzangs gsum gyi phye ma btab pa'i lde gu ni bkru sman shin tu yi gar 'ong ba yin no/_/a rdza gan+d+ha smig rkang dang /_/kha ra dur byid bi da ri/_/phyer btags sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/_/lde gu byin na 'dus pa dang /_/rims dang lus
[\[63b.4\]]rengs tsha ba dang /_/skom dad kyis gzir legs par 'khru/_/zhes bya ba la/_/ardza gan+d+ha la sogs pa'i sman btags pa'i phye ma dang /_sbrang rtsi dang /_mar du sbyar ba'i lde gu byin na 'dus pa'i nad la sogs pas gzir ba legs par 'khru zhing bde bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/bu ram shing ni tshal
[\[63b.5\]]par bkas/_/nang ngos dur byid lde gus bskus/_/gcig tu sbyar te phur ma yis/_btso ba'i tshul byas de bza' bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bu ram shing gi dum bu tshal pa gnyis su bkas la/_de'i nang ngos dur byid kyi lde gus bskus la/_slar gcig tu sbyar te sman gyi phur ma btsos ba'i tshul du btsos
[\[63b.6\]]pa de zos na/_'dus pa dang rims la sogs pas gzir ba'i nad legs par 'khru bar 'gyur ro/_/shing tsha sug smel mnyam ni li/_/de mnyam dur byid sha kha ra/_/phye ma rgun chu sbrang rtsi dang /_/phye dang skyo mar sbyar te blud/_/rlung mkhris bad kan las gyur dang /_/me drod chung ba'i
[\[63b.7\]]nad dang ni/_/skyid de ba yi mi rnams la/_/gnod pa med pa'i bkru sman yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing tsha sug smel spyir cha gcig dang /_de gnyis kyi cha ji tsam yod pa dang /_ni li zhes bya ba sman ni li ni cha mnyam du bya/_sman de gsum ji snyed yod pa'i cha dang /_dur byid cha mnyam du bya/_/dur
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]byid yan chad kyi sman bzhi po dang /_kha ra cha mnyam du bya/_de lta bu'i sman gyi phye ma de rgun chu dang sbrang rtsi dang phye dang lhan cig skyo mar byas te blud na/_rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las gyur ba'i nad dang /_/pho ba'i me drod nyams pa dang /_skyid de bar gnas pa'i
[\[64a.2\]]mi rnams la bkru sman 'di ni sdug bsngal skyes pa'i gnod pa'i 'tshe ba med cing dam par gyur pa yin no/_/byi dang ga yi snying po dang /_/'bras bu gsum zhes bya ba dang /_/ya bak+Shar pi pi ling /_/dur byid kun gyi cha byed bcas/_/sbrang rtsi mar ram bu ram gyis/_/lde gur byas pa byin na ni/_/
[\[64a.3\]]skran dang mtsher pa dmu rdzing dang /_/gzugs 'khums lud pa yi ga mtshus/_/rlung dang bad kan las gyur nad/_/mang po gzhan dag sbyor bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_/byi dang ga'i spun pa bsal ba'i snying po dang /_'bras bu gsum dang ya bak+Shar zhes bya ba nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang
[\[64a.4\]]pi pi ling cha mnyam po bya/_byi dang ga la sogs pa'i sman de dag kun gyi cha phyed phyed du byas te/_phye mar btags pa de sbrang rtsi dang mar gyi lde gur bcas pa byin na skran la sogs pa'i nad sbyong zhing dag par byed do/_/de bzhin du rlung dang bad kan las gyur pa'i nad 'dir ma smos pa gzhan dag kyang sbyong
[\[64a.5\]]par byed do/_/pi pi ling rtsa byi dang ga_/'bras bu gsum dang 'u su dang /_/tsi tra ka dang ma le sham/_/pi pi ling dang dug mo yungs/_/zi ra ha ti pi pi ling /_/ti mu sa dang lan tshwa lnga/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis phye mar byas/_/dur byid dang ni til mar gnyis/_/srang ni brgyad brgyad char bsres dang /_/skyu
[\[64a.6\]]ru ra'i khu bre gsum dang /_/bu ram srang ni lnga bcu me/_/chung bskol de las ran tsam ni/_/zos na mdze dang gzhang 'brum dang /_/mig ser za khu skran dang ni/_/dmu rdzing mtshan par rdol ba dang /_/pho ba'i nad dang skya rbab rnams/_/'joms shing cho ga bsrung mi dgos/_/bu skyed par yang de
[\[64a.7\]]yis byed/_/bu ram dge ba can zhes bya/_/dus kun du ni 'phrod pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_pi pi ling gi rtsa ba la sogs pa sman sna re re zhing zho gnyis gnyis tshad du byas pa'i phye ma dang /_/til mar dang dur byid kyi phye ma gnyis srang brgyad brgyad kyi tshad du byas pa dang bsres la/_/skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]bskol ba'i khu ba bre gsum dang /_bu ram srang lnga bcu gcig tu bsres de thams cad me chung ngu la bskol la/_/dge ba'i bu ram zhes bya ba de las ji tsam ran pa'i tshad tsam zos na des mdze la sogs pa'i nad 'joms par 'gyur ba dang /_bu skyed par byed pa dang /_dus drug char du yang
[\[64b.2\]]'phrod cing bsngags pa yin no/_/tsha ba gsum dang dri sna gsum/_/gla sgang dang ni byi dang ga_/skyu ru ra de thams cad ni/_/mnyam ba'i dur byid kha ra dang /_/sbrang rtsi'i ri lur byas zos na/_/gcin sri rims dang slon bro dang /_/lud pa sha skems mgo 'khor dang /_/zad byed lus
[\[64b.3\]]tsha skya rbab dang /_/me drod chung dang dug nad sbyong /_/zhes bya ba la/_tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i sman cha mnyam por byas pa spyir ji snyed pa yod pa dang /_dur byid cha mnyam par byas la/_/kha ra yang dur byid cha mnyam par byas te/_des tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i sman spyir cha gcig dur
[\[64b.4\]]byid cha gnyis kha ra cha gsum par sbyar la de thams cad sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig ri lur byas na/_gcin sri ba'i nad la sogs pa sbyong bar byed cing bsngags pa yin no/_/dur byed dug mo yungs sa bon/_/pi pi ling dang bca' sga rnams/_/sbrang rtsi rgun 'bru'i chur sbyar ba/_/dbyar gyi dus
[\[64b.5\]]kyi bkru sman yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dur byed la sogs pa'i sman gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang rgun 'bru'i chu dang sbyar ba ni/_dbyar gyi dus kyi bkru sman du bsngags so/_/dur byid gla sgang byi tsher dang /_/kha ra tsan+dan ba le ka_/shing mngar ba ta la phye ma/_/rgun chu dang sbyar ston gyi yin/_/zhes
[\[64b.6\]]bya ba la/_dur byid la sogs ba'i sman gyi phye ma rgun chu dang sbyar ba ston gyi dus su bkru sman btang bar bsngags so/_/dur byid pa ta kru trag tres_/zir shu dag sa ra la/_khron bu'i phye ma chu dron sbyang /_/dgun gyi dus su blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/dur byid la sogs pa'i sman cha
[\[64b.7\]]mnyam ste phye mar btags pa chu dron mo dang sbyar ba ni dgun gyi dus su bkru sman du bya bar bsngags pa yin no/_/dur byid kha ra cha mnyam pa/_/sos ka'i dus kyi bkru sman yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dur byid dang kha ra cha mnyam pa ni sos ka tsha ba'i dus su bkru sman du blud bar bya'o/_/dur byid sba
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]'bras kyi lce ba/_/pa ta la dang pu tse shel/_/khron bu legs par btags nas ni/_/ba gcin nang du zhag gsum sbangs/_/'di ni dus kun sbyor ba ste/_/snum zhen dri ma nad rnams 'byin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dur byid la sogs pa'i sman phye mar btags pa ba
[\[65a.2\]]gcin gyi nang du zhag gsum sbangs pa/_'di ni dus kun du btang ba'i sbyor ba yin te/_snum gyis zhen par byas pa'i lus las dri ma zhes bshad pa dang nad rnams 'byin par byed pa yin no/_/sha ma dur byin byi tsher ba/_/gla sgang ha ti pi pi ling /_/dug mo yungs dang ni li ni/_/'bras bu gsum dang bu
[\[65a.3\]]tse shel/_/phye ma sha khu 'am mar ram ni/_/chu dron dang sbyar thams cad du/_/khong rtsub la yang gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha ma dur byid la sogs pa'i sman cha snyoms te phye mar btags la/_sha khu 'am mar ram chu dron dang sbyar te dus thams cad du skyes bu khong rtsub pa dag la yang gtang
[\[65a.4\]]bar bya ba yin no/_/rims dang snying nad dreg nad dang /_/rtug skam la sogs nad rnams la/_/dong ga'i bkru sman lhag par ni/_/'jam mngar bsil la phan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims la sogs pa'i nad la ni lhag par yang dong ga'i bkru sman phan pa yin te/_de ni 'jam par 'khru la ro mngar
[\[65a.5\]]zhing bsil pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/byis pa rgan po glo rdol dang /_/skyid de ba yi mi rnams la/_/'jam zhing skyon ni med pa'i phyir/_/mchog du dong ga'i bkru sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_khyad par du byis pa la sogs pa'i nad rnams la lhag par 'jam par 'khru zhing 'tshe
[\[65a.6\]]ba'i skyon med pa'i phyir dong ga'i bkru sman gtang ba lhag par yang bsngags pa yin no/_/'brus bu'i dus su legs smin pa'i/_/de yi 'bras bu btus nas ni/_/zhes bya ba la/_/dong ga de'i 'bras bu 'byung ba'i dus su skyes ba shing dus ma yin par skyes pa ma yin la/_/legs par smin
[\[65a.7\]]cing tshos pa de btu zhing blang bar bya'o/_/de ni yon tan ldan gyur pas/_/khur gcig phye ma'i nang du gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_dong ga'i 'bras bu de 'bus zos ba la sogs pa'i skyon med pa de khur gcig tsam zhig gzhug par bya'o/_/zhag bdun lon nas byung nas ni/_/nyi ma la ni
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]bskam par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bras bu de phye mar sbas pa'i 'og tu zhag bdun nas phyung la nyi ma la bskam par bya'o/_/de nas rkang ni phyung nas su/_/snod ni gtsang mar gzhag par bya/_zhes bya ba la/_de ltar bskams pa'i 'og tu 'bras bu de'i nang gi rkang phyung la/
[\[65b.2\]]rdza snod la sogs pa'i snod gtsang ma'i nang du gzhag par bya'o/_/byis pa lo bzhi lon pa nas/_/lo ni bcu gnyis lon gyi bar/_lus tsha rtug 'gags kyis gzir la/_/rgun chur sbyar te blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dong ga'i rkang de lus tsha ba dang /_rtug ba 'gags
[\[65b.3\]]pa'i nad kyis gzir bar byed pa'i byis pa lo bzhi nas lo bcu gnyis lon ba'i bar dag la rgun chu dang sbyar te blud na bde bar 'khru par byed do/_/dong ga'i rkang ni mnyes pa dang /_/bskol ba'i chu ni grang mo blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang de la dong ga'i rkang mnyes pa bskol ba'i chu bsgrangs
[\[65b.4\]]ba blud na yang bde bar 'khru bar byed pa yin no/_/yang na chang dngas zho ga chu/_/skyu ru ra yi khu ba 'am/_/rang skyur dag dang bcas pa 'am/_/dur byid lde gur sbyar ba spyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/yang na dong ga'i rkang mnyes pa'i khu ba chang gi dngas ma 'am/_zho ga chu la sogs pa'am/_/dur
[\[65b.5\]]byid kyi lde gu yang blud par bya'o/_/dan da'i khu bar de yi rkang /_/bu ram rnying pa bcug nas ni/_/zla ba gcig gam zla phyed bar/_/mnan pa'i chang ni blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dong ga'i rkang dang bu ram rnying ba dan da bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du bcug la de zla ba gcig gam zla ba phyed kyi
[\[65b.6\]]bar du mnan te blud na yang bde bar 'khru bar byed do/_/seng phrom rtsa ba'i shun pa ni/_/nang gi shun lpags por nas ni/_/bskams te phye mar byas nas ni/_de la cha gnyis bskol te gzags/_/seng phrom cha ni gsum pa sbangs/_/rtsa ba bcu yi khu ba dang /_/cha de slar yang sbang bar bya/_/
[\[65b.7\]]slar yang skams te phye mar byas/_/de las zho gnyis ba gcin nam/_/chang gi dngas ma 'am zho ga chu/_/rgya shug skyu ru ra'i khu ba/_/gang yang rung bar sbyar te blud/_/ces bya ba la/_seng phrom ni ro tra dang /_bi hang pa tra zhes bya ba ste/_de'i rtsa ba dang shun pags kyi nang rim bor te/
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]legs par bskams nas phye mar byas la de'i 'og tu phye ma de cha gsum du byas la cha gnyis bskol ba'i khu ba de btsags nas/_khu ba de dang seng phrom cha gsum pa bsres la/_spang bar bya ba dang /_rtsa ba bcu'i khu ba dang yang cha de sbang bar bya'o/_/de nas slar phyung la bskams te
[\[66a.2\]]phye mar byas nas phye ma de la zho gnyis kyi tshad ba gcin nam chang gi dngas ma 'am/_zho ga chu la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te/_ci rigs par blud par bya'o/_/seng phrom bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_/lde gur byas te kha ra dang /_/mar dang bskol ba'i lde gu de/_/bkru sman gyi ni dam pa yin/_/zhes
[\[66a.3\]]bya ba la/_seng phrom zhes bya ba ro tra bskol ba'i khu ba kha ra dang bskol ba'i lde gu de byin na yang bkru sman gyi mchog yin no/_/shrI khaN+Das nad kyi tshogs/_/shas cher sogs ba 'ang 'jig byed de/_/myur du 'khru zhing grags pas na/_/lto snyi nyam chung byis pa dang /_/rgan po nad pa yun rings la/_/de ni
[\[66a.4\]]gtang bar mi bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_shrI khaN+Da zhes bya ba shing su ta'i 'o ma bskol bas nad kyi tshogs shas cher tshogs shing dkyel skyes pa yang myur du 'khru bar byed cing skrag cing sdug bsngal bas sems myos par byed pa yin pas na de'i phyir lto snyi ba la sogs par bkru sman du gtang par mi bya'o/_/
[\[66a.5\]]skran dang dmu rdzing sbyar ba'i dug_/lpags nad gcin nad sbrang rtsi 'dra/_/skya rbab skran dang dug gis phog_/nad kyis sems dkrugs gyur la gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang shrI khaN+Da de skran la sogs pa'i nad kyis btab pa la bkru sman du gtang bar bya'o/_/de ni tsher ma rnon po ni/_/mang pos
[\[66a.6\]]khyab par gyur pa mchog_/ces bya ba la/_shing su ta de yang tsher ma rnon po mang pos khyab cing g.yogs par gyur pa de thams cad kyi mchog yin no/_/lo gnyis pa 'am lo gsum pa/_/khyad par du ni dgun gyi mthar/_/de ni mtshon gyis rnam bcad la/_de las 'o ma blang bar bya/_/zhes
[\[66a.7\]]bya ba la/_yang shing su ta de lo gnyis sam lo gsum lon pa'i gzhon nu rtsa ba legs par zug pa/_dpyid zla ra ba'i tshe mtshon gyis bcad la/_de las 'o ma gzags shing blang bar bya'o/_/bil ba la sogs rtsa ba lnga/_bri ha ti ni rnam gnyis dang /_/bskol ba'i khu ba dang mnyam pa'i/_/du ta'i 'o
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]ma dang bsres la/_/de 'og me yi mdag mar bskam/_/ri lur byas pa zho ga chu 'am/_/chang ngam ba gcin sogs sbyar blud/_/ces bya ba la/_bil ba la sogs pa rtsa ba chen po lnga dang /_bri ha ti ni rnam pa gnyis te kaN+Da ka ri dang /_bri ha ti gnyis po las sman sna re re zhing bskol ba'i khu
[\[66b.2\]]ba dang /_shing su ta'i 'o ma bsres te cha mnyam du byas la/_de nas de'i 'og tu de gnyis ka me'i mdag ma la bskoms te/_de nas ri lur cha mnyam par byas la/_zho ga chu 'am chang ngam rtsa ba mo'i dngas ma ba gcin nam/_rgya shug gi khu ba 'am/_skyu ru ra'i khu ba 'am/_skyur rtsabs kan dzi
[\[66b.3\]]gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te blud par bya'o/_/dur byid sogs dgu 'bras bu gsum/_khron bus ba ta la dang bcas/_/su ta'i 'o mas zhag bdun sbangs/_/sha khu 'am mar dang sbyar te blud/_/ces bya ba la/_dur byid la sogs pa dgu ste/_tri byid ces bya ba dur byid dkar po dang /_sha
[\[66b.4\]]ma dur byid dang /_dong ga dang /_/seng phrom dang /_su ta zhes bya ba shrA \u0f72khaN+Da dang shang khi ni dang /_dan da dang /_/tra ban ti dang /_/sa ta la zhes bya ba dang bcas pa ste dgu po dang /_'bras bu gsum gyi phye ma dang /_rtsang sman khron bu dang bcas pa shing su ta zhes bya ba snu ha'i 'o ma'i nad du zhag bdun sbangs pa
[\[66b.5\]]sha khu 'am mar dang sbyar te blud na yang bde bar 'khru bar byed do/_/tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/_/dur byid dan da tsi tra ka_/de bzhin bu ram chus sbyar blud/_/ces bya ba la/_tsha ba gsum dang /_'bras bu gsum dang /_/dur byid dang dan da dang /_tsi tra ka'i phye ma snga ma bzhin du su ta'i 'o ma'i
[\[66b.6\]]nang du sbangs pa blud na yang nges par 'khru bar byed do/_/shang khi ni yi 'bras bu ni/_/phub ma med cing ma bskams btu/_/de bzhin sa ba ta la'i rtsa ba/_/de dag rnon por 'khru byed yin/_/bad kan dmu rdzing sbyar ba'i dug_/skran sogs nad la gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_shang khi ni
[\[66b.7\]]ni tu la dang /_ya ba tig ta zhes bya ba'i sman de de'i 'bras bu'o/_/phub ma med par gyur pa dang /_/shas cher ma bskams btu ba dang /_/de bzhin du sa ba ta la'i rtsa ba sbyar te/_de dag gis rno bar 'khru bar byed pa yin pas bad kan gyi nad la sogs pa la gtang bar bya'o/_/de gnyis ri lu zho gnyis
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]tsam/_/chang dang rgyam tshar sbyar ba ni/_/bad rlung las gyur snying nad dang /_/de bzhin skran gyi nad la gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_shang khi ni'i 'bras bu dang /_sab ta la'i rtsa ba de gnyis phye mar btags te/_/ri lur bsgongs ba zho gnyis tsam chang dang rgyam tsha
[\[67a.2\]]dang sbyar ba ni bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i snying nad dang skran gyi nad la gtang bar bya'o/_/dan da dra ban ti'i rtsa ba/_/glang po'i so ltar brtan zhing sbom/_/dmar zhing gnag la rno zhing dro/_/myur du 'khru bar byed pa yin/_/lci zhing rlung ni 'khru byed cing /_/mkhris pa bad kan 'ju bar byed/_/
[\[67a.3\]]ces bya ba la/_dan da ni kum pa ste de dang dra ban ti zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba glang po che'i so ltar brtan zhing sbom par gnas pa dmar gnag tu 'dug pa rang bzhin rno zhing dro ba/_myur du 'khru zhing sbyong bar byed pa lci ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa/_/rlung gi nad 'khru par byed pa/_mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi nad
[\[67a.4\]]'ju bar byed pa yin no/_/de ni sbrang rtsi pi pi ling /_/lde gus bskus la 'jag ma dang /_/'jim pas bskus shing mes bsregs la/_/nyi ma chung zad dro bskoms pas/_/de yi rno bas bsal bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dan da dang dra ba na ti'i rtsa ba de sbrang rtsi dang pi pi ling gnyis kyi lde
[\[67a.5\]]gus bskus la 'jag ma dang 'jim pas kyang bskus te sman gyi dur bu'i tshul du bsregs la tshos par gyur pa dang /_nyi ma'i tsha ba ha cang mi che ba la yang bskam par mi bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni rno ba lus zungs la gnod par byed pa med pa dang /_nyi ma'i tsha bas bsal zhing gzhig par
[\[67a.6\]]bya'o/_/de ni chang dngas zho ga chu/_/dar ba mnan chang pi lu yi/_/khu ba gang yang rung sbyar blud/_/nyam chung skran dang gcin snyi dang /_/dmu rdzing sbyar ba'i dug rnams sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar byas pa'i rtsa ba de/_lde gur byas pa la chang gi dngas ma la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang
[\[67a.7\]]sbyar te blud na lus nad kyis nyams smad pa'i skran la sogs ba'i nad rnams sbyong bar byed do/_/ba glang ri dgas ra sha yi/_/khu bar sbyar bas skya rbab dang /_/lto srin mtshan bar rdol nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_dan da dang dra ban ti'i rtsa ba'i phye ma ba glang ngam ri dgas sam ra sha'i khu ba dang
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]sbyar te blud na skya rbab dang lto na srin bu yod pa dang /_mtshan par rdol ba'i nad sel cing sbyong bar byed do/_/de bskol khu ba lde gu dang /_/rtsa ba bcu yi khu bar bskol/_/rtsa ba bcu yi khu bar bskol/_/mar gyis me dang la khong 'bras dang /_/'brum phran mtshan khung tsha ba sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_dan da dang dra ban ti'i
[\[67b.2\]]rtsa ba btags ba'i lde gu rtsa ba bcu bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_bskol ba'i mar blud na me dbal gyi nad la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/til mar bcas pas skran za khu/_/gzhang 'brum rtug 'gags bad rlung sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga 'di nyid kyis til mar bskol
[\[67b.3\]]te bskus na skran la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/snum chen sbyar pas khu chu bshang /_/'phyen 'gags rlung gi nad rnams sbyong /_/zhes bya ba la/_cho ga 'dis snum chen po ste zhun mar dang rkang dang tshil dang til mar bskol ba blud na khu chu 'gags pa la sogs pa'i nad dang rlung gi
[\[67b.4\]]nad gzhan dag kyang sbyong bar byed do/_/dur byid la sogs dgu po 'di/_/bkru sman gyi ni rab mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dur byid rnam gnyis dang /_dong ga la sogs pa sman dgu po 'di dag ni bkru sman rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/a ru ra yang dur byid kyi/_/cho ga bzhin
[\[67b.5\]]du sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_a ru ra yang gong du bshad pa'i dur byid kyi cho ga bzhin du bshad par bya ste/_de nas dus su de'i phye ma/_/rgyam tsha dong ga cung zad gdab/_/rlung nad la ni skyur las blud/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa sbyar pa'i bar ji snyed smos pa rnams la dur byid kyi gong
[\[67b.6\]]a ru ra bcug la sman gyis sbyang bar bya'o/_/bu ram srang brgyad a ru ra/_/nyi shu dan da tsi tra ka_/srang re pi pi ling dur byid/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis lhan cig sbyar/_/ri lu bcu byas zhag bcu bar/_/ri lu re re zos rjes la/_/chu dron blud cing cho ga 'dis/_/
[\[67b.7\]]de dag thams cad zos gyur na/_/kun zos bsrung ba 'ang mi dgos par/_/'dis ni thams cad sel bar byed/_/mchog tu skya rbab pho ba'i nad/_/lpags nad zlum po gzhang 'brum dang /_/g.yan pa'i nad rnams sel ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bu ram srang
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]brgyad dang /_/a ru ra rdog ma nyi shu/_dan da dang tsi tra ka srang re re/_/pi pi ling dang dur byid gnyis zho gnyis gnyis sbyar la de dag las ri lu cha mnyam pa bcur byas te/_ri lu re re zhag bcu bcu'i bar du zos la/_de'i rjes la chu dron blud de cho ga 'dis ri lu
[\[68a.2\]]de thams cad zos par gyur na ri lu 'dis cho ga bsrung zhing bsdams mi dgos par nad thams cad sel cing 'joms par byed pa yin la/_de las kyang khyad par du skya rbab la sogs pa'i nad sel zhing 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/chung ngu 'ang don ni chen po dang /_/chen po 'ang las ni nyung zad
[\[68a.3\]]dang /_/'dre dang dbye ba byas pa dang /_/dus dang sbyor ba ldan par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_/chung ba ste nus pa chung ngu yang tshad chen po dang ldan pas don chen po ste/_las su bya ba chen po byed par 'gyur ba dang /_nus pa chen po dang ldan pa dag kyang tshad chung ngur btang bas/_las kyi bya ba
[\[68a.4\]]nyung zad byed cing nus pa zhan par 'gyur te/_ji lta zhe na/_'dres pa la sogs pas bya ba de dag byed de/_de la sman rnon po dang sbyar ba chung ngus kyang don chen po byed par 'gyur la/_/mang po yang sman rnon po dang /_dbye zhing de dang mi ldan na las nyung zad byed par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin dus
[\[68a.5\]]kyis kyang sman btul zhing 'jam pa de nyid sos ka'i tshe btang na don chen po byed par 'gyur la/_sman rnon po yang dgun gyi dus su btang na las nyung zad byed par 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba ni nus pa skyed par byed pa ste/_sbyor ba des na sman 'jam po rnon po dang sbyar bas kyang don chen po byed par 'gyur
[\[68a.6\]]la/_sman rnon po yang sman rtul po dang sbyar na yang las nyung zad byed par 'gyur ro/_/yang de bzhin du rigs pa'i sbyor bas nus pa zhan pa'i sman de nyid sman rnon po dang ci rigs par sbyar na rnon por 'gyur la/_de bzhin du sman rnon po yang nus pa zhan pa'i sman dang sbyar na rtul por 'gyur ro/
[\[68a.7\]]de yang drang srong tsa ra kas/_/sman ni 'dre bas chung ngu yang /_/las ni mang po byed par 'gyur/_/de bas sman ni nus pa dag_/mtshungs pas nye bar sbyar bar bya/_/chu med srin bus gnod ma byas/_/yul dang dus kyi yon tan ldan/_/tshad ni chung dang lhag par ldan/_/nus pa mtshungs
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]shing legs sbyar la/_/snum dang dugs kyi cho ga byas/_/sman ni rno ba nyid du 'gyur/_/yon tan 'di dag chung zad sman/_/sngar bshad tshad kyis mnyam 'gyur la/_/snum dugs legs par ma byas la/_/sman gyi nus pa 'bring por 'gyur/_/sman mthu chung zhing rtsub
[\[68b.2\]]pa dang /_/tshad ni chung bar gyur pa dang /_/mthu ni mi mtshungs sbyar gyur pas/_/shugs dal lta bur nus zhan 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba bshad pa yin no/_/shing tsha nA ga ge sar dang /_/a mra ta ka se'u 'bru dang /_/sug smel kha ra sbrang rtsi dang /_/kha lung chang sogs de dang
[\[68b.3\]]de/_/yid dang rjes su mthun pa yi/_/rigs pas bkru sman gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing tsha la sogs dang ldan pa'i bkru sman de dang de nad pa so so'i yid dang rjes su mthun pa 'dir ma bshad par gzhan dag kyang ci rigs par sbyar zhing bkru sman du gtang bar mi bya ste/_gang gi
[\[68b.4\]]phyir yid dang rjes su mi mthun zhing zhe 'gras pa yid du mi 'ong ba dag byin na slon pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i skyon yod pa'i phyir ro/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying bo'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/
[\[68b.5\]]cho ga grub ba'i gnas kyi le'u gnyis ba'i 'grel pa'o//_//de nas skyug sman dang bkru sman gyi nyes pa grub par bya ba'i cho ga bshad bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyug sman dang bkru sman gyi cho ga bshad nas de dag nyid kyi cho ga'i sbyor ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa de grub par bya zhing
[\[68b.6\]]gso bar bya ba dang /_bcos par bya ba'i sbyor ba bshad par bya ba'i phyir le 'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/skyug sman lto ni snyi pa 'am/_/ltogs pa 'am bad kan shas chung ba 'am/_/shin tu rno ba 'am grang ba'ang chung /_/ma zhu ba 'am nyam chung la/_/blud na nad 'byung re ba nyams/_/
[\[68b.7\]]de tshe thur 'byung nad slong 'gyur/_/de la slar yang snum chos bya/_/sngar gyi skyon bral skyug sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te skyug sman nad pa lto snyi bar gyur ba 'am/_/ltogs shing bkres par gyur pa 'am/_bad kan gyi shas chung ba 'am/_shin tu rno ba la sogs pa la blud
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]par gyur na/_nad gyen du 'byung ba'i re ba des nyams par 'gyur zhing 'dod pa'i don thob par mi 'gyur la/_sman yang thur du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing slar yang nad bslangs shing skyed par 'gyur ro/_/nyes pa de la slar yang snum chos bya la slar skyon gang gis
[\[69a.2\]]nyes par gyur pa de ran par byas la tshad dang dus la sogs par ltos pa'i sman gyis de skyugs shing slon du gzhug par bya'o/_/bkru sman ma zhu bad kan dang /_/ldan pa 'am shin tu rno ches pa/_/dro ba 'am lan tshwa shas che ba/_/yi gar mi 'ong mangs pa yis/_/gyen du rgal bar
[\[69a.3\]]gyur pa dag_/sngar bshad nyes pa de la ni/_/grub pa'i sbyor ba de bzhin bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bkru sman de nad pa ma zhu ba dang ldan pa 'am/_bad kan dang ldan pa la ni shin tu rno ches ba 'am lan tshwa shas che ba'i yi gar mi 'ong zhing yid dang mi 'thad pa 'am/_sman shin tu mang po
[\[69a.4\]]'thungs pas tshad las ches bar gyur pa la sogs pas gyen du rgal zhing kha'i sgro las byung bar gyur pas sngar bshad pa'i nyes pa nad 'byung ba'i re ba nyams pa dang /_nad slar la glongs par gyur pa dag la grub pa'i sbyor ba yang sngar bshad pa dang 'dra bar nad pa de snum chos bya zhing sngar
[\[69a.5\]]gyi skyon gang yin pa yang ngos zin par byas la/_tshad dang dus la sogs pa la ltos pa'i bkru sman btang zhing sngar skyon du gyur pa'i nyes pa dag kyang spang bar bya'o/_/de yang snod du ma chags na/_/gsum po de la blud mi bya/_/gzhan du goms pa 'am zhim pa yi/_/sman ni gnod pa
[\[69a.6\]]med pa gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar gso ba log par gyur pa'i tshul gyis blud pas sman de yang khong pa'i snod kyi nang du chags par ma gyur cing yang gyen du rgal bar gyur na/_de'i 'og du sman gsum po de la blud par mi bya zhes gzhan du sngar goms par gyur pa dang /_zhim zhing yi
[\[69a.7\]]gar 'ong ba'i sman gnod pa med pa'i lde gu la sogs pa skyin pa ni ma gtogs te/_yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa ni gsum pa yin yang gtang bar bya'o/_/snum chos dugs ni ma byas la/_/sman ni rnying zhing rtsub pa yis/_/nad slong phyin par ma gyur pas/_/mgo 'khor skran dang skyigs bu dang /_/
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]mun par mthong dang skom dad che/_/byin snying na zhing lus g.ya' dang /_/brla na kha dog mi sdug pa'i/_/nad ni skyed par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa snum chos dang dugs ma byas pa'i lus la sman rnying pa dang rtsub pa dag gis nang glongs shing gnas las bskyod nas phyir 'byin
[\[69b.2\]]cing bskyod par ma nus pas mgo 'khor ba la sogs pa'i nad skyed par byed pa yin no/_/snum chos dugs byas sman nyung zhing /_/me drod che bas zhu gyur pa 'am/_/grang bas rengs pa 'am ma zhu bas/_/nad glongs pas ni ma phyin pas/_/nad ni de dag nyid skyed cing /_/de nyid sbyor nyes thams
[\[69b.3\]]cad yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_snum chos dang dugs legs par byas pa'i nad pa la sman shin tu thun chung zhing nyung ba byin pa 'am/_pho ba'i me drod che bas sman tshad chung ngu de zhu bar byas ba 'am/_grang bas rengs shing 'thas par gyur pa 'am/_ma zhu ba dang ldan pas nad glongs nas phyir
[\[69b.4\]]'byin par ma nus pa dag gis sngar bshad ma thag pa'i nad mgo 'khor ba dang skrangs pa la sogs pa de dag nyid skyed par byed de/_de dag nyid ni sbyor ba nyes pa zhes bya ba thams cad yin no/_/de la til mar rgyam tshas bskus/_/gshag ma rdo bas dugs byas shing /_/mas gtong drag
[\[69b.5\]]byas skam sa'i sha_/kha zas byin la 'jam rtsi ni/_/po son cha dang pi pi ling /_/thang shing til mar bskol ba gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de lta bu'i nyes ba dang ldan pa'i mi de la til mar dang rgyam tshas lus bskus la/_gshag ma rdo yis dugs bya zhing mas gtor ba drag po ni ru ha byas la skam
[\[69b.6\]]sa'i sha khu dang zas byin pa po son cha la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i til mar gyi 'jam rtsi mas gtong ba chad dang ldan par byas pa nad gzhi dang lus zungs la sogs pa'i tshul la brtags te gtang bar bya'o/_/rlung 'joms snum gyis snum chos bya/_/slar yang bkru sman rnon pos sbyang /_/zhes bya ba la/
[\[69b.7\]]yang de la rlung 'joms par byed pa'i snum gyi sbyor bas snum chos byas la/_bkru sman snga ma bas rno ba btang la sbyang bar bya'o/_/nad gzhi che zhing khong rtsub la/_/me drod chung dang sman chung ba/_/rtug skam bcas pas glongs pa dang /_/nad kyis lam ni 'gags par 'gyur/_/mi bzad sbo dang lte ba dang /_/
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]rgyab dang rtsib logs mgo bo na/_/phyi sa gcin 'gags dbugs mi bde/_/mi bzad pa ni skyed par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nad gzhi shas che ba dang /_khong rtsub pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_rtug skam dang bcas pas gyen du 'khyil zhing nad glongs pa dang /
[\[70a.2\]]nad des rtsa sbubs kyi lam 'gags par byas nas mi bzad par sbo ba dang /_lte ba la sogs par na ba dang /_phyi sa 'gags pa la sogs pa brnag par dka' ba skyed par byed par 'gyur ro/_/bsku dang dugs dang reng bu sogs/_/mas gtong drag po 'jam rtsi bya/_/rtug skam sel ba'i gso
[\[70a.3\]]dpyad las/_/thams cad sbo ba dag la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbo ba la sogs pa'i nad dang ldan pa'i mi de la sogs pa'i nad rnams dang /_rtug skam sel ba'i gso dpyad kyi las gzhang 'brum gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa thams cad phan no/_rtsa ba lnga pa nas tshig 'khus/_shu dag
[\[70a.4\]]pi ti ka rany+dza/_/rgyam tsha nas thug legs sbyar bas/_/gzer nad rtug skam lto sbos 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_/rtsa ba lnga po la sogs pa'i sman dang /_nas thug legs par g.yos pas ni gzer la sogs pa'i nad rnams sel bar 'gyur ro/_/thal sman se'u 'bru pi pi ling /_/
[\[70a.5\]]shing kun bca' sga star bu dang /_/rgyam tsha bcas pa'i chang ngam ni/_/mar ram chu dron sbyar ba blud/_/mkhregs shing yongs su 'dzag pa dang /_/na zhing bcad snyam sems pa sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_thal sman ya bak+Sha ra dang se'u 'bru la sogs pa chang la sogs pa gang yang rung pa dang
[\[70a.6\]]sbyar te blug na mkhregs shing 'khru ba la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/sman 'thungs gyur pa'i shugs bkag ni/_/rlung la sogs pa'i nad rnams ni/_/'khrugs te snying gi phyogs song nas/_/snying nad mi bzad skyed par byed/_/skyigs bu lud pa rtsib logs na/_/rmya zhing mig
[\[70a.7\]]'gul kha chu 'dzag_/dran pa nyams shing lce 'cha' la/_/so ni khrig khrig 'cha' bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nad pas sman 'thungs par gyur nas/_'byung bar 'gyur pa'i shugs bkag cing brnags te 'byung du ma ster na rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs shing ldang bar 'gyur te/_snying
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]gi phyogs su song nas snying gi nad btsir ba snyam sems pa la sogs pa mi bzad cing brnag par dka' ba skyed pa dang /_skyigs bu la sogs pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la sman pa ma rmongs pas/_/mkhris pas nyen la mngar ba dang /_/bad kan gyis nyen kha ba yi/_/skyug
[\[70b.2\]]sman dag ni myur du gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur pa'i nad pa de la sman pa rmongs shing 'khrul bar ma gyur pas gal te nad de mkhris pas brgyal bar gyur pa yin na/_sman mngar ba'i skyug sman blud de myur du skyug tu gzhug la/_bad kan gyis brgyal
[\[70b.3\]]ba yin na/_sman kha ba'i skyug sman blud de skyug tu gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas de la smin byed pa'i/_/nad kyi lhag ma smin par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas nad pa de smin par byed pa'i sman gyis nad lhag ma rnams smin cing zad par bya'o/_/de yi me drod lus kyi stobs/_/rim gyis
[\[70b.4\]]mngon par 'phel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_yang nad pa de'i pho ba'i me drod dang lus kyi stobs rjes su mthun pa'i sman dang /_/zas dang skom gyis rim gyis mngon par 'phel bar bya zhing bskyed par bya'o/_/shas cher slon gyur rlung gis ni/_/gang gi snying ni gzir gyur pa/_/
[\[70b.5\]]de la snum 'gyur lan tshwa sbyin/_mkhris pa bad kan de las gzhan/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang zhig shas cher slon par gyur pas rlung gis snying gzer zhing na bar gyur pa de la/_sman dang /_zas dang /_skomasnum pa dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa'i shas che ba sbyin par bya'o/_/
[\[70b.6\]]mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi shas che ba slon pa'i nang ni de las gzhan pa ste/_rtsub pa dang kha ba dang bska ba'i zas skom dang sman sbyin par bya'o/_/sman ni 'thungs par gyur nas shugs/_/bkag par gyur pa 'am bad kan gyis/_/'gags pa 'am shin tu sbyangs gyur pa'i/_/
[\[70b.7\]]lus la rlung ni 'jug gyur nas/_/rengs dang 'dar dang zug pa dang /_/lus snyom dkris snyam sems shing zug_/ces bya ba la/_skyes bu sman 'thungs par gyur nas shugs 'byung ba bkag pas rlung gis lam srang 'gags par byas pa dang /_bad kan gyis 'gags
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]par byas pa 'am/_yang na shin tu sbyangs shing slon khrus drags par gyur pas lus la rlung 'jug par 'gyur te/_des rlung rengs pa la sogs pa'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la rlung ni 'joms pa yi/_/snum chos dugs sogs thams cad bsngags/_/
[\[71a.2\]]zhes bya ba la/_sbyor ba nyes pa de la ni rlung 'joms par byed pa'i gso ba dang snum chos la sogs pa thams cad phan no/_/sogs pa smos pas ni 'jam rtsi dang /_bkru ba dang sman chu blugs pa dang /_lus bying ba dang /_kha zas dang /_skom dang /_sman rlung 'joms par byed pa dag
[\[71a.3\]]bsdu'o/_/sman thun che la rno ba ni/_/bkres nyen lto snyi la blud na/_/bad kan mkhris pa bshang ba ni/_/bsal nas lus zungs 'dzag par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bkres pas nyen pa dang /_lto snyi ba'i nad pa la sman thun che zhing mang bar btang bar gyur na/_bad kan la sogs pa
[\[71a.4\]]myur du bsal zhing phyung nas dngas ma la sogs pa'i lus zungs rnams 'jag cing 'byung bar byed do/_/de la sbyor drags mngar ba yi/_/sman gyis lhag ma slon du gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_sbyor ba drags ba'i nyes ba byung ba de la mngar ba'i sman gyis ma zhu ba'i sman lhag ma slon du
[\[71a.5\]]gzhug cing sbyar bar bya'o/_/skyug sman drags la bkru sman gtang /_/'khrus drags skyug sman 'jam po gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_skyug sman gyi sbyor ba drags pa la ni bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/_/bkru sman drags par gyur pa la ni skyug sman 'jam po gtang bar bya'o/_/de la chu grang
[\[71a.6\]]blud pa dang /_ro smad bcings pas gcad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbyor ba drags pa'i nad pa de la chu grang blud par bya'o/_/ro smad man chad bcings pa dang zas dang skom shin tu bsil bas de gcad par bya'o/_/stang zil tsan+dan pu shel dang /_/ra khrag kha ra'i chu dang ni/_/'bras yos phye
[\[71a.7\]]ma'i skyo ma ni/_/sbyor drags sel ba'i dam pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_stang zil de dngul rdo la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i chu dang 'bras yos skyo mar byas pa ni sbyor ba drags pa sel ba'i mchog yin pas de blud par bya'o/_/slon sman sbyor ba drags pa la/_/chu grang dag ni blugs
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]par bya/_/rgun 'bru la sogs khu ba mar/_/sbrang rtsi kha ra'i skyo ma blud/_/ces bya ba la/_skyug sman gyi sbyor ba drags pa la chu grang gis lus la blugs par bya zhing rgun 'bru la sogs pa'i skyo ma blud par bya'o/_/sgregs par bcas pa shin tu skyugs/_/mur ba 'u su gla sgang
[\[71b.2\]]dang /_stang zil ma du ka'i phye ma/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sgregs par bcas par drag tu skyug pa la mur ba la sogs pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang lde gur sbyar ba sbyin zhing bldag tu gzhug par bya'o/_/slon mthar lce ni 'khums pa la/_/snum dang skyur dang lan tshwa dang /_/
[\[71b.3\]]ldan pas mkhur ba bkang ba dang /_/yid 'ong yu sha sha khu phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi slon drags pas lce 'khums shing /_nang du zhugs par gyur pa la snum la sogs pa dang ldan pas mkhur ba bkang ba dang /_de bzhin du/_yid du 'ong ba'i yu sha dang sha khu blud na phan no/_/de yi
[\[71b.4\]]mdun du mi gzhan ni/_/'bras bu skyur pa za ru gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_lce 'khums pa'i nad pa de'i mdun du skyes bu gzhan 'bras bu skyur pa zar bcug na phan no/_/lce phyir byung la til dang ni/_/rgun 'bru'i lde gu bskus nas gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_/slon drags pas lce phyir
[\[71b.5\]]byung zhing sdud mi shes pa la ni til dang rgun 'bum btags pa'i lde gus bskus la nang du gzhug par bya'o/_/tshig lkugs rlung gi nad la ni/_/mar dang sha dang g.yos pa yi/_/nas thug sla ba sbyin bya zhing /_/snum dang dugs kyi sbyor ba bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshig lkugs shing thogs pa dang /
[\[71b.6\]]de bzhin du rlung gi nad ldang ba la ni dus shes pa'i sman pas mar dang sha dang g.yos su byas pa nas thug sla ba sbyin par bya zhing /_de bzhin du snum dang dugs kyi sbyor ba dang ldan par bya'o/_/sman gyi sbyor ba drags pa yis/_/srog ces bya ba'i khrag phyung bas/_/gang phyir de ni srog 'phrog pas/_/
[\[71b.7\]]srog len pa ni yin par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_sman gyi sbyor ba drags pas shas cher 'khrus pa na/_srog ces bya ba'i khrag 'byung bar 'gyur la/_des ni mi rnams kyi srog 'phrog cing gsod par byed pas de'i phyir de la ni srog len pa zhes slob dpon gyis bshad do/_/khrag
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]de dang ni zas bcas pa/_/khyi 'am bya rog la byin la/_zos na srog ces brjod par bya/_/ma zos mkhris pa yin par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_srog ces bya ba'i khrag 'khrus pa de dang zas su sbyar la/_khyi 'am bya rog la byin na/_gal te za bar
[\[72a.2\]]gyur na ni/_srog ces bya ba'i khrag yin par brjod par bya la/_gal te za bar ma gyur na srog ma yin gyi mkhris pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/yang na ras dkar la bsgos te/_/bskams la chu dron gyis bkrus la/_/bkrus kyang dag par ma gyur na/_/mkhris pa'o dag na
[\[72a.3\]]khrag yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na 'khrus pa'i khrag de ras dkar po la bsgos te/_de'i 'og tu nyi ma la bskams la/_de nas chu dron gyis bkru ste ma dag par gyur na ni mkhris pa yin la/_gal te de dag par gyur na ni srog ces bya ba'i khrag yin par shes par bya'o/_/
[\[72a.4\]]skom dad brgyal dang myos pas nyen/_de la srog ni myur bsrung phyir/_/khrag dang mkhris pa sel pa yi/_/gso ba 'tsho ba'i bar du bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_skom dad la sogs pas nyen pa'i nad pa la srog bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir khrag dang mkhris pa sel ba'i gso ba ji
[\[72a.5\]]skad bshad pa dag shis par gyur gyi bar du rgyun du bya'o/_/ri dgas ba glang ma he ra/_/gson po'i khrag ni phyung ma thag_/srog ni 'byor bar byed pa blud/_/de ni myur du srog tu 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_ri dgas la sogs pa gson po'i khrag phyung ma thag mi'i srog ces
[\[72a.6\]]bya ba'i khrag 'byor cing 'dzin par byed pa yin pas de blud par bya ste/_des ni de'i srog myur du 'dzin par byed cing tshim par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nyid 'jag ma dang mnyes pa'i/_/khrag ni 'jam rtsir gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag de nyid 'jag ma dang mnyes te
[\[72a.7\]]btsags pa'i 'jam rtsi mas gtong bar bya'o/_/dur byid tang pal shing mngar dang /_/dUr ba pu shel tse 'o ma/_/bskol ba mar gyi snying po dang /_/stang zil dang ni bcas pa yi/_/'jam rtsi grang mo gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dur byid la sogs pa'i sman dang 'o ma bskol ba dang /
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]mar gyi snying po dang /_stang zil dang bcas pa'i 'jam rtsi grang mo btang na yang phan no/_/spyi bag 'jam rtsi rab grang ba 'am/_/mar gyi snying po 'jam rtsi gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na spyi bag gi 'jam rtsi rab tu grang mo 'khru ba gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa gtang bar bya ba 'am/
[\[72b.2\]]de bzhin du mar gyi nying khu'i 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya'o/_/gzhang phyir byung la sman khu yis/_/'khru ba bcad la gzhug par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang phyir byung ba la ni sbyor ba dang 'phrod pa'i sman gyi khu bas 'khru ba bcad la/_nang du legs par gzhug par bya'o/_/dran pa
[\[72b.3\]]stor la rig byed tshig_/gling bu glu dbyangs nyan du gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_sman gyi sbyor ba drags pas dran pa stor bar gyur pa la ni snyan tshig gi rig byed dang /_gling bu dang /_glu dbyangs snyan pa nyan du gzhug cing yid gso bar bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam
[\[72b.4\]]par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o//_//de nas sman mas gtong ba'i cho ga bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar byas zin pa'i 'og tu
[\[72b.5\]]'jam rtsi mas gtong bar bya ba yang rigs pa yin pas skyug sman dang /_bkru sman gtang ba'i cho ga'i 'og tu le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/ba la sle tres ra sna 'bras bu gsum/_/rtsa ba lnga pa rnam gnyis srang re'i tshad/_/po son cha brgyad ra sha srang lnga bcu/_/chu nang bskol te bzhi cha lus gyur pa/_/
[\[72b.6\]]btsags par la la phud dang po son cha/_/bil ba ru rta sha ta puSh+pa dang /_/shu dag gla sgang pi pi ling rnams kyi/_/lde gu bu ram sbrang rtsi mar dang ni/_/til mar rgyam tsha dag dang ldan gyur pa/_/dro 'jam cho ga bzhin du btang gyur pa/_/mas gtong mchog ste nad kun 'joms byed yin/_/nad
[\[72b.7\]]med la phan tshe ring nyams brtas byed/_/'jam rtsi gang du lde gu ma smos pa/_/der ni kun la 'di nyid gzhug par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba la nas rtsa ba bcu pa'i bar sman sna re zhing srang re'i tshad du byas pa dang /_po son cha rdog ma brgyad srang gcig tsam yod pa dang /_ra sha srang lnga bcu
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]chu tshad bzhin du byas pa'i nad du bskol la/_de'i khu ba bzhi cha lus pa byas te/_de yang 'dir ba la la sogs pa sman sna bcu drug po de dag gi chu bcu drug 'gyur te/_chu srang nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug yod do/_/de tsam dang de dag bskol la/_de'i bzhi cha ste/
[\[73a.2\]]chu srang drug cu rtsa bzhi lus pa dang dbab par bya ste/_'dir sman la ltos nas chu srang bcu drug 'gyur gzhug par ba'o/_/sha la ltos na ni chu shin tu bskol ba mang bas bskol ba thal ches par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /_dgos pa med pa'i phyir sman pa rgan po de dag de ltar nye
[\[73a.3\]]bar sbyod par mi byed do/_/'dir dper brjod pa ni ra sna la sogs pa'i sman mar lud pa gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa lta bu yin no/_/de ltar bzhi cha lus pa'i sman gyi khu ba de btsags la/_de'i nang du la la phud la sogs pa btags pa'i lde gu dang bu ram dang sbrang rtsi la
[\[73a.4\]]sogs pa dang ldan par byas pa dro 'jam tsam sngar bshad pa bzhin du mas gtong bar gyur pa ni 'jam rtsi'i mchog yin te/_nad thams cad 'joms par byed cing nad med pa la yang phan zhing tshe ring bar byed pa yin no/_/'dir lde gu la sogs pa'i tshad mas gtong ba'i cho ga
[\[73a.5\]]las bshad pa ltar shes par bya ste/_de bde blag tu dran par bya ba'i phyir yang de nyid bstan par bya ste/_lde gu ni bskol ba'i sman gyi brgyad cha gzhug par bya ba 'am/_shin tu sla ba 'am shin tu ska bar ma gyur pa de tsam du gzhug la/_bu ram ni srang gcig gzhug par bya zhing
[\[73a.6\]]sbrang rtsi dang rgyam tsha ni ci rigs pa gzhug par bya'o/_/'dir snum ni bskol ba'i sman khu'i bzhi cha dang cha mnyam par gzhug par bya'o/_/de yang gang gi phyir sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha la sogs pa ci rigs pa zhes bshad pa yin la/_rigs pa de yang bkru sman drug po mas gtong ba bshad pa'i tshig
[\[73a.7\]]gzhan dag la bshad par bya ste/_de yang sprang rtsa dang til mar ni khyor bzhi gzhug par bya la/_rgyam tsha ni zho gnyis gzhug par bya'o/_/zhes ji skad bshad pa dang /_de bzhin du snying po las/_snum dang sbrang rtsi re re zhing /_/srang ni gsum gsum tshad du bya/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]smras pa yin no/_/mas gtong ba'i 'jam rtsi'i skabs gang du lde gu'i sman ma smos pa de 'jam rtsi kun la yang la la phud la sogs pa'i lde gu 'di nyid gzhug par bya'o/_/rtsa ba bcu pa'i khu ba skyur dang ni/_/ra sha bcas pa snga ma btags pa dang /_/snum chen gsum ldan mas gtong mchog
[\[73b.2\]]yin te/_/rlang gi nad kun rab tu 'joms par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_sman rtsa ba lnga pa che chung gnyis dang /_ra sha dang bcas pa'i khu ba bskol ba cho ga bzhin du bskol ba'i sman gyi khu ba sbyor ba dang 'tsham pa'i skyur dang ldan pa dang sngar bshad pa'i la la phud la sogs pa'i sman btags pa
[\[73b.3\]]gzhug pa dang /_snum chen po gsum po til mar dang zhun mar zhag dang ldan pa 'am/_nad gzhi'i tshul las dpag te/_snum gsum po de dag las gang yang rung ba dang sbyar te mas gtong ba ni mas gtong ba'i dam pa yin te/_rlung gi nad thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/zhes drang srong rnams
[\[73b.4\]]kyis bshad do/_/pa la pa tol rtsa ba chung ngu lnga/_/kyi lce ba dang e raN+Da dang nas/_/bskol ba'i khu ba bre gang ra sha'i khu/_/de yi phyed bcug la bskol bre gang lus/_/pri yang ku dang gla sgang pi pi ling /_/lde gur byas shing til mar zhun mar dang /_/sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ni ldan gyur pa'i/_/
[\[73b.5\]]'jam rtsi btang na me drod 'phel ba dang /_/nyams stobs bskyed cing sha ni rgyas pa dang /_/mig gi gsal stobs 'phral du skyed par byed/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sman gyi tshogs bskol ba'i cho ga bzhin du legs par bskol ba bre gang dang ra sha'i khu ba bre phyed bcug la yang
[\[73b.6\]]de bre gang lus kyi bar du bskol la/_pri yang ku dang gla sgang dang /_/pi pi ling gi lde gu brgyad cha cha mnyam pa dang ldan pa til mar dang sbrang rtsi dang rgyam tsha dang ldan par byas pa'i 'jam rtsi des ni pho ba'i me drod 'phel bar byed pa la sogs pa skyed par byed pa yin no/_/e raN+Da'i rtsa srang
[\[73b.7\]]gsum pa la sha_/srang gsum rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu dang /_/ra sna pa la sle tres ba spru ba/_/a shwa gan+d+ha dong ga thang shing rnams/_po son cha brgyad chu bre brgyad du bskol/_/brgyad cha lus par gyur pa de yi nang /_/shu dag shu ti sba ma'i 'bras bu dang /_/pri yang ku dang shing mngar pi pi
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]ling /_/dug mo yungs kyi sa bon gla sgang dang /_/skyer pa'i khaN+Dar bcas ba zhib tu btags/_/zho gnyis tshad kyis rgyam tshar bcas pa dang /_/sbrang rtsi til mar ba gcin dang sbyar ba'i/_/mas gtong skyugs byed me drod skyed pa dang /_/rkang pa byin pa brla
[\[74a.2\]]dang 'jug to dang /_/lto ba snyi dang pho mtshan na ba dang /_/lus lci rlung dang bshang gci 'gags dang skran/_/rde'u chags rgyu rlugs gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad/_/bad kan rlugs nad de dang de dag 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_e raN+Da'i rtsa ba dang pa la sha srang gsum
[\[74a.3\]]gsum/_rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu la sogs ba'i sman sna re zhing srang re/_/po son cha rdog ma brgyad chu bre brgyad de/_/srang nyis brgya lnga bcu rtsa drug gi nang du de thams cad bskol te/_bskol ba de las brgyad cha ste bre gang lus par gyur pa dang /_sman gyi khu ba de'i nad du shu dag la
[\[74a.4\]]sogs pa nas skyer pa'i khaN+Da dang bcas par zhib tu btags ba'i lde gu dang /_rgyam tsha zho gnyis sam/_nad gzhi'i tshul las dpags pa'i tshad dang ldan pa'i sbrang rtsi la sogs pa sbyar bas mas gtong bas ni bad kan dang tshigs la sogs pa'i nad la sogs pa skyugs
[\[74a.5\]]par byed pa dang /_rkang pa'i nad la sogs pa bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i nad gang dag yin pa de dang de dag thams cad 'joms shing sel bar byed do/_/shing mngar seng phrom tsan+dan ut+pal a ru ra/_/tsan+dan ut+pal ba yi 'o mar bskol/_/'tsho byed kha ra mar dang bcas pa yi/_/
[\[74a.6\]]'jam rtsis mkhris pa'i nad rnams sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman pa'i 'o mar bskol ba'i nang du 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan gyi lde gu dang kha ra dang mar dang bcas par sbyar ba'i 'jam rtsi mas gtong bas ni mkhris pa la sogs ba'i nad 'joms shing sel bar
[\[74a.7\]]byed do/_/ra sna ba sha ka 'tshod byi tsher ba/_/ba la rtsa ba chung lnga rtswa yi lnga/_/thal tres tsan+dan shug pa rnam gnyis dang /_/shing mngar seng phrom srang ni phyed phyed dang /_/chu dang bskol ba'i khu ba de dang ni/_/'o ma bre bzhi bskol te chu ngu'i bar/_/dzi ban ti dang me da rnam
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]gnyis dang /_/nye'u shing ram nye ba gnyis bi da ri/_/ka she ru dang kha ra dkar po dang /_/dzi ba ka dang pad+ma ge sar dang /_/stag tsher ut+pal dang pad+ma dkar/_/seng phrom kha sral phre'u shing mngar dang /_/nA ga ge sar mun dza ta ka dang /_/tsan+dan rnam gnyis btags
[\[74b.2\]]pa mar dang ni/_/sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha dang ni ldan byas pa/_/bsgrangs pa'i ni ru ha ni gtang bar bya/_/slar phyung skam sa'i sha khu 'am 'o ma dang /_/'bras chen byin la lus la chu blugs bya/_/lus tsha tshad 'khru mngal nad khrag mkhris dang /_/snying nad skya rbab mi bzod rims dang
[\[74b.3\]]ni/_/skran bcas gcin 'gags mig ser la sogs pa/_/mkhris pa las gyur nad ni thams cad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba sha ka ni bri sha'o/_/rtsa ba chung ngu lnga ni bri ha ti la sogs pa'o/_/rtswa'i rtsa ba lnga ni dUr ba dang /_'jag ma dang /_bu ram shing dang /
[\[74b.4\]]'dam bu dang /_'bras kyi rtsa ba'o/_/thal tres ni sha ri pa ste/_go sang gan+d+ha zhes bya'o/_/ra sna la sogs pa 'di dag sman sna re re zhing srang phyed phyed sman gyi khu ba bskol ba'i cho gas chu'i nang du bskol la/_de dang 'o ma bre bzhi bskol la chu du bar gyur cing 'o ma lus kyi bar
[\[74b.5\]]du bskol nas de'i nad du dzi ban ti la sogs pa lde gu'i cho ga bzhin du btags te sbyar ba'i lde gu dang /_mar la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i ni ru ha gtang bar bya'o/_/mas gtong ba de slar byung bar gyur na skam sa'i srog chags kyi sha khu 'am 'o ma dang sbags te/_'bras chen sbyin par
[\[74b.6\]]bya'o/_/de bzhin du lus la chu blugs shing khrus byas te de ltar btang ba'i 'jam rtsi des ni lus kyi khong tsha ba la sogs pa'i nad dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/ko sha ta ka dong ga thang shing dang /_/mur ba gze ma arka dug mo yungs/_/pa tha
[\[74b.7\]]rgya sran bri ha ti chur bskol/_/khu ba srang ni nyi shu lus pa dang /_/des ni yungs kar sug smel po son cha/_ru rta zho ni gnyis gnyis tshad dang ni/_/sbrang rtsi po son cha yi mar dang ni/_/thal sman yungs mar srang ni gnyis bcas pa/_/mas gtong me drod chung dang yi ga 'chis/_/bad
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]kan las gyur nad ni kun la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_ko sha ta ka la sogs pa'i sman gyi khu ba bskol ba'i cho gas bskol la de'i khu ba srang nyi shu ste/_khyor bcu lus par gyur te/_de nas ko sha ta ka nas bri ha ti'i bar gyi sman srang lnga bcu chu drug 'gyur gyi nang
[\[75a.2\]]du bskol la/_khu ba srang ni nyi shu lus par byas la khu ba srang nyi shu po der yungs kar la sogs pa'i sman bzhi po zho gnyis dang bcas shing sbrang rtsi dang /_/po son cha'i mar dang /_thal sman dang /_yungs mar sna re re zhing srang gnyis dang ldan par byas la/_mas gtong
[\[75a.3\]]ba drag po ni ru ha zhes bya ba btang na me drod chung ba la sogs pa'i nad thams cad la phan no/_/de nas ni ru ha de ni/_/snum 'jam skyid de ba dang ni/_/las kyi lus snyom gyur pa'i sman /_/srang ni gnyis gnyis so sor bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu mas gtong ba
[\[75a.4\]]ni ru ha snum zhing snum par byed nus pa 'jam zhing rtsub pa ma yin pa skyid de ba'i mi rnams dang /_skyug sman la sogs pa'i las kyi lus snyom zhing rab tu zhig par gyur pa'i mas gtong ba'i sman srang gnyis gnyis mtshon pa so sor bshad par bya'o/_'o ma las ni srang bzhir bya/
[\[75a.5\]]sbrang rtsi til mar mar khyor re/_/gzar bus dkrugs pa'i mas gtong bas/_/rlung 'joms stobs dang kha dog skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_'o ma las srang bzhi ste/_khyor do/_/sbrang rtsi dang /_til mar dang /_mar las srang gnyis gnyis te khyor re bsdus la gzar bus
[\[75a.6\]]dkrugs pa'i mas gtong bas ni rlung gi nad rnams 'joms par byed cing /_stobs dang kha dog rnams skyed cing 'phel bar byed do/_/til mar chang dang sbrang rtsi mar/_/khyor ni re re'i tshad du byas/_bil ba la sogs rtsa ba ni/_/khyor gnyis rgya sran khu ba ni/_/khyor
[\[75a.7\]]do bcas pas rlung nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_til mar la sogs pa sna re khyor re ste srang gnyis gnyis/_/bil ba la sogs pa'i rtsa ba lnga'i sman khyor gnyis gnyis/_/rgya sran gyi khu ba khyor do ste srang bzhi dang bcas pa'i 'jam rtsi mas gtang bas ni rlung gi nad rnams sel bar byed
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]do/_/pa to la dang nim pa dang /_/lo ma bdun pa pu ti ka_/ra sna'i khu ba srang gnyis gnyis/_/mar srang gnyis dang yungs kar gyi/_/lde gur byas pa kha ba lnga/_/bad kan mang dang srin nad dang /_/mdze dang za kha'i nad rnams 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_/pa tol
[\[75b.2\]]la sogs pa'i sman sna lnga po srang gnyis gnyis te/_khyor re dang mar srang gnyis te de khyor drug dang /_yungs kar gyi lde gu dang bcas pa'i kha ba lnga pa zhes bya ba'i 'jam rtsi yin te/_des ni bad kan mang ba la sogs pa'i nad rnams 'joms par byed do/_/til mar ba gcin
[\[75b.3\]]zho ga chu/_/skyur rtsabs khyor ni re re dag_/yungs kar btags pa'i lde gur sbyar/_/rtug 'gags lto sbos sel byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_til mar la sogs pa khyor re re ste khyor bzhi dang yungs kar btags pa'i lde gus ni rtug pa 'gags pa la sogs pa sel zhing
[\[75b.4\]]'joms par byed do/_/pa yas s+ya dang bu ram shing /_/sa la pa r+Ni bi da ri/_/ra sna khyor re pi pi ling /_/lde gu sbrang rtsi mar sbyar ba'i/_/mas gtong khu ba 'phel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_pa yas s+ya la sogs pa lnga po khyor re re bskol ba'i nang du pi pi ling gi lde gu
[\[75b.5\]]dang /_sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar ba'i mas gtong bas ni khu ba 'phel zhing ro tsa bar byed do/_/de nas grub pa'i 'jam rtsi ni/_/nyes pa med cing 'bras bu che/_/stobs skyed lus 'phel bde bar byed/_/kun du sbyar bya bshad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu grub pa'i 'jam
[\[75b.6\]]rtsi ste 'bras bu dag gis mngon sum du mthong ba nyes pa med cing gnod par 'gyur ba'i skyon dang bral bar 'bras bu che zhing yon tan mang ba nyams stobs bskyed cing lus 'phel zhing rgyas par byed pa dang /_dus kun tu sbyar zhing gtang bar bya ba gang yin pa de bshad par bya'o/_/sbrang rtsi til
[\[75b.7\]]mar cha mnyam la/_/rgyam tsha zho gnyis shu ti bzhi/_/e raN+Da yi rtsa ba bskol/_/mas gtong sbrang rtsi til mar can/_/bcud kyis len te gcin snyi dang /_/gzhang 'brum srin bu skran nad dang /_/rgyu ma rlugs pa'i nad rnams sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrang rtsi dang til mar gnyis cha
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]mnyam por byas pa dang /_rgyam tsha 'am/_lce myang tsha zho gnyis/_shu ti zho bzhi/_e raN+Da'i rtsa ba bskol ba dang /_sbrang rtsi dang til mar bskol ba gtso bor gyur pa'i 'jam rtsi ni bcud kyis len du 'gyur zhing gcin snyi ba la sogs pa'i nad
[\[76a.2\]]sel bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni shing mngar phye mar bcas/_/mig la phan zhing khrag mkhris sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshad ma thag pa'i sman 'di nyid shing mngar gyi phye ma dang bcas pa'i 'jam rtsi ni mig la phan par byed pa dang /_khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad sel bar byed do/
[\[76a.3\]]gla sgang lde gu sbrang rtsi dang /_/til mar sha khu mar bcas pa/_/'tsho bar byed pa zhes bya ste/_/gzhang gi nad dang brla nad dang /_/chu so dang ni rlig pa dang /_/pho mtshan zug pa'i nad rnams sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_gla sgang gi lde gu dang gong du smos pa'i 'jam rtsi 'di nyid
[\[76a.4\]]sbrang rtsi dang til mar dang sha khu dang ldan pa ni ming 'tsho bar byed pa zhes bya ste/_gzhang gi nad la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/sbrang rtsi mar dang zhag dang ni/_/til mar khyor ni re re'i tshad /_/rgyam tsha zho gcig sba ma yi/_/'bras bu srang phyed bcas pa dang /_/de yang 'tsho ba yin
[\[76a.5\]]par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_sbrang rtsi la sogs pa sna re zhing khyor re'i tshad dang /_rgyam tsha zho gcig sba ma'i 'bras bu srang phyed dang sbyar ba de yang 'tsho bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'jam rtsi yin te/_des kyang gzhang gi nad la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/e ran+Da'i rtsa bskol
[\[76a.6\]]ba yi/_/khu ba shu dag pi pi ling /_/po son cha yi phye mar bcas/_/sbrang rtsi til mar rgyam tshar bcas/_/'di ni shing rta can zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/e raN+Da'i rtsa ba bskol ba'i khu ba la sogs pa dang tshul bzhin du sbyar ba'i 'jam rtsi 'di ni ming shing rta can zhes
[\[76a.7\]]bya ste/_des kyang gzhang gi nad la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/de bskol shu dag shu ti dang /_/shing kun rgyam tsha thang shing dang /_/ra sna sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yi/_/'jam rtsis nad sel zhes bya dge_/zhes bya ba la/_e raN+Da'i rtsa ba de bskol ba'i khu ba shu dag la
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]sogs pa dang ldan pa'i 'jam rtsi ni ming nad sel zhes bya ste dge zhing mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/rtsa ba lnga yi khu ba dang /_/pi pi ling dang rgyam tsha dang /_/shing mngar sbrang rtsi bcas pa yi/_/til mar grub pa'i 'jam rtsir bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_rtsa ba lnga pa
[\[76b.2\]]bskol ba'i khu ba dang pi pi ling la sogs pa sbyar ba'i 'jam rtsi ni ming grub pa'i 'jam rtsi zhes bya ba yin no/_/rtsa ba bcu pa 'bras bu gsum/_/po son cha ni bil bar bskol/_/ba gcin dang ni de btags shing /_/pa tha gla sgang dug mo yungs/_/lan tshwa po son
[\[76b.3\]]cha til mar/_/thal sman lan tshwar bcas pa ni/_/rig pa'i 'jam rtsi bad kan nad/_/skya rbab gsud pa'i nad rnams dang /_/khu ba rlung ni 'gags pa dang /_/rlung 'khrugs pa la bsngags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa ba bcu ba la sogs pa'i sman tshul bzhin du
[\[76b.4\]]bskol ba ni rigs pa'i 'jam rtsi zhes bya ste/_des ni bad kan gyi nad la sogs pa sel bar byed pa yin no/_/gla sgang pa ta e raN+Da/_/sle tres ba la ba spru ba/_/ra sna btsod dang dong ga dang /_/bu shel tse dang kyi lce ba/_/ba ru ra dang pu tse shel/_/rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu rnams/_/
[\[76b.5\]]srang re po son cha rdog brgyad/_/de ni chu bre bzhi nang bskol/_/bzhi cha lus pa btsags nas ni/_/'o ma bre dro dang bsres la/_/'o ma lus pa slar yang bskol/_/skam sa'i sha khu bzhi cha dang /_/sbrang rtsi rgyam tsha shing mngar dang /_/shu ti dur byid pi pi ling /_/dug mo yungs
[\[76b.6\]]dang skyer khaN+Da/_/btags pa dang ni bsres pa yi/_/'jam rtsi dro 'jam btang na ni/_/sha dang me drod lus kyi stobs/_/khu ba 'phel bar byed pa yin/_/dreg nad rmongs bag gcin snyi dang /_/gzhang 'brum skran dang bshang gci 'gags/_/mi bzad rims dang me dbal dang /_/
[\[76b.7\]]rgyu rlugs lto spos mkhregs shing 'khru/_/chu so rked pa brla dku na/_/gnye'u rengs rna ba mgo yi nad/_/zla mtshan nad dang smyo byed dang /_/'or nad lud pa rde'u chags dang /_/gcin 'khyil pa yi nad rnams 'joms/_/dbang po nyams shing zhum pa dang /_/mig la
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]phan zhing bu skyed byed/_/'tsho byed rgyal po bcud len yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/gla sgang nas rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu'i bar sman re re zhing srang re re dang /_po son cha brgyad chu bre bzhi'i nang du bskol la/_de las bzhi cha ste/_bre gang lus pa btsags nas sman
[\[77a.2\]]gyi khu ba dang 'o ma bre do bsres la/_yang 'o ma lus nas chu du bar gyur gyi bar du bskol la/_de'i nang du skam sa'i srog chags kyi sha khu bzhi cha dang sbrang rtsi dang rgyam tsha la sogs pa dang bsres pa'i 'jam rtsi dro 'jam tsam btang bas ni sha la sogs pa 'phel bar byed pa dang /_dreg nad
[\[77a.3\]]la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa dang /_mig la phan zhing bde bar byed pa dang /_bu skyed cing mngal 'chags bar byed de 'tsho byed kyi 'jam rtsi rnams kyi rgyal po yin zhing yon tan gyis khyad par 'phags par byed pa dang /_bcud kyis len du 'gyur ba yin no/_ri dgas phra
[\[77a.4\]]mo mgo chung ba/_/rtsa ba bcu pa bskol ba'i chu/_/sba ma'i 'bras bu shu ti dang /_/gla sgang lde gu snum chen bcas/_/mas gtong rlung ni sel ba'i mchog_/shin tu ro tsar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ra dgas phra mo ri bong la sogs pa dang /_mgo bo chung ba phag
[\[77a.5\]]rgod la sogs pa'i chu dang /_sba ma'i 'bras bu la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /_snum chen po zhun mar dang /_til mar dang /_rkang dang /_tshil gcig tu sbyar ba mas gtong ba ni rlung gi nad sel bar byed pa'i mchog yin zhing de bzhin du ro tsa bar byed pa yin no/_/rma bya'i mkhris
[\[77a.6\]]pa gshog pa dang /_/rgyu ma rkang ba mchu rtug pa/_/bor ba'i sha ni 'ba' zhig dang /_/rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu ni/_/srang re dang ni ldan gyur pa/_/chu dang 'o mar bskol nas ni/_/'o ma lus par sbrang rtsi mar/_/bcas dang de bzhin bi da ri/_/shing mngar shu ti pi pi ling /_/po son
[\[77a.7\]]cha yis lde gur bsres/_/rgyam tsha cung zad btab pa yi/_/'jam rtsi stobs 'phel ro tsa'i mchog_/ces bya ba la/_rma bya'i gshog pa la sogs pa bor ba'i sha 'ba' zhig dang /_rtsa ba lnga pa chung ngu srang re chu dang 'o ma brgyad 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la/_chu du ste 'o ma lus
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]pa sbrang rtsi de mar dang bcas par byas pa dang /_pi da ri la sogs pa'i lde gu bcug la/_rgyam tsha cung zad btab pa'i 'jam rtsi ni shin tu stobs skyed bar byed pa dang /_ro tsa bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/gong ma sreg la sogs pa yang /_/cho ga 'dis ni so sor
[\[77b.2\]]bya/_/khron gyis gzas tshol thams cad dang /_/mthu rtsal mchu yis gzas tshol ba/_/chu la gnas pa'ang de bzhin te/_/nya la 'o ma spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshad ma thag pa'i rma bya'i sha'i skabs kyi cho ga 'di ni gong ma sreg la sogs pa dang /_khron gyis
[\[77b.3\]]gzas tshol ba la sogs pa'i sha re re la yang de cho ga bzhin du bya la/_chu la gnas pa'i srog chags ngang pa la yang de bzhin du bya zhing /_ro hi ta la sogs pa'i nya la yang cho ga de bzhin du byas la nya'i skabs su sngar gyi 'o ma smos pa de spang bar bya'o/_/sram dang ne'u le byi la dang /_/
[\[77b.4\]]reg 'jam byi ba rnams kyi sha/_/re re srang bcu rtsa ba lnga/_/'o ma'i nang du bskol ba la/_/'o ma der ni po son cha/_/pi pi ling dang lan tshwa gnyis/_/kha ra til mar sbrang rtsi mar/_/'jam rtsi btang ba bcud len yin/_/rtsol bas dkrugs nas glo 'grams dang /_/dbang
[\[77b.5\]]po nyams dang gzi mdangs stobs/_/khu chu bshang gci 'gags pa dang /_/dreg nad kyis 'theng nad rnams dang /_/rta dang glang po shing rtas g.yengs/_/rkang lag chag grugs gyur pa la/_/slar ni bde bar 'tsho byed cing /_/ro tsa byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/kha sral bu ram
[\[77b.6\]]shing phran las/_/g.yos su byas pa'i 'o thug blud/_/ces bya ba la/_sram la sogs pa'i sha srog chags re re'i srang bcu bcu dang /_rtsa ba chen po lnga las sna re re zhing srang bcu bcu 'o ma bcu 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la 'o ma de'i nang du po son cha dang pi pi ling gi lde gu lan tshwa gnyis
[\[77b.7\]]la sogs pa dang ldan ba'i 'jam rtsi bcud kyis len gyi dam par 'gyur zhing /_rtsol bas lus dkrugs shing bskyod de glo 'grams par gyur pa'i mi dang dbang po nyams shing zhum par gyur pa la sogs pa rnams slar yang bde bar 'tsho bar byed cing /_skyon de dag sel bar byed pa
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]dang ro tsa bar byed pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyi nang na mchog dam pa yin no/_/sman gyi sbyor ba 'di la ni/_kha sral pad+ma kun da dang /_bu ram shing ni phra mo las g.yos su sbyar ba'i 'o thug tu sbyar ba blud par bya'o/_/snum zhing bsdam
[\[78a.2\]]pa mi dgos pa'i/_/grub pa'i sman ni sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_grub pa'i sman gong du bshad ma thag pa'i sbrang rtsi til mar cha mnyam la/_/rgyam tsha zho gnyis shu ti bzhi/_/e raN+Da yi rtsa ba bskol/_/mas gtong 'jam rtsi til mar can/_/zhes bya ba la
[\[78a.3\]]sogs pa smos pa'i snum gyi mas gtong ba bsdams shing bsrung bar bya mi dgos pa grub pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba ni ru ha gtang bar bya'o/_/nad 'joms bsrung dang bcas pa yi/_/snum gyi 'jam rtsi bshad bya ste/_/zhes bya ba la/_'di man chad kyi snum gyi mas gtong
[\[78a.4\]]'jam rtsi zhes bya ba nad kyi tshogs 'joms par byed cing bsrung zhing bsdams pa dang bcas pa khyad par du rlung nad 'joms par byed pa gang yin pa de bshad pa yin no/_/rtsa ba bcu pa ba la dang /_/ra sna a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_/ba spru ba dang e raN dang /_/sle tres ga
[\[78a.5\]]bra'i rtsa ba dang /_/ba sha ka dang pu ti ka_/sa ha ra dza nye'u shing pa/_/ka ka na se srang re dang /_/nas dang ma sha zar ma dang /_/rgya shug rgya sran khyor re'i tshad/_/chu bre drug cu rtsa bzhir bskol/_/de las bre ni bcu drug lus/_/'tsho byed sde ni srang re bcug_/
[\[78a.6\]]til mar bre ni bzhi dang bskol/_/'di ni 'jam rtsir btang gyur na/_/rlung nad thams cad sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rtsa ba bcu pa la sogs pa'i sman sna re re zhing sngar re dang /_/nas la sogs pa'i khyor re la srang gnyis gnyis/_chu bre drug cu rtsa bzhi ste/_/
[\[78a.7\]]dro na bzhi'i nang du bskol la/_de las bcu drug ste/_dro na gcig lus pa dang /_'tsho byed kyi sman kyi sde tshan srang re bcug la/_til mar bre bzhi dang bskol te 'jam rtsi 'di btang na rlung las gyur ba'i nad thams cad sel zhing 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/de
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]bzhin skam sa'i srog chags sha/_/'tsho byed sde dang bcas par bskol/_/zhes bya ba la/_skam sa'i srog chags kyi sha'i zhag 'tsho byed sna bcu dang bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi btang na yang rlung las gyur pa'i nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/shu ti nas dang bil ba
[\[78b.2\]]skyur/_/til mar bskol bas rlung nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_shu ti la sogs pa'i sman kan dzi rang skyur la sogs pa dang /_til mar bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi btang na yang rlung las gyur pa'i nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/rgyam tsha mdog dmar gyur
[\[78b.3\]]gyi bar/_/mer bsregs mar gsur rlung nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyam tsha 'am lce myang tsha mdog dmar por gyur gyi bar du mer bsregs la/_de mar gyi nang du gsur ba'i nad 'jam rtsi btang na yang rlung nad 'joms par byed do/_/dzi ban ti dang po son
[\[78b.4\]]cha/_/me da rnam gnyis sra ba ni/_/shing mngar ba la shu ti dang /_/zangs rtsi ba dang pi pi ling /_/ka ka na si nye'u shing pa/_/kha sral k+ShaM ra ka ka ri/_/zur ba kar ka ta sring gi_/shu dag btags pa'i lde gu dang /_/mar dang til mar 'o ma ni/_/bzhi 'gyur gyi
[\[78b.5\]]ni nang du bskol/_/'jam rtsi nyams brtas rlung mkhris 'joms/_/stobs dang khu ba me drod 'phel/_/khrag dang khu ba'i nad sel byed/_/bu skyed par yang byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dzi ban ti la sogs pa'i sman btags te lde gur byas pa dang /_mar dang til
[\[78b.6\]]mar cha mnyam par byas pa 'o ma bzhi 'gyur dang bsres te/_tshul bzhin du bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi btang na nyams brtas par byed pa dang /_rlung dang mkhris pa 'joms pa la sogs pa'i yon tan skyed par byed do/_/rgyam tsha ru rta po son cha/_/shu ti lcang ma shu dag dang /_/ba la ka
[\[78b.7\]]dang shing mngar dang /_/ga bra'i rtsa ba kad phal/_/thang shing dong gra ma nu dang /_/me da dbyi mo tsi tra ka_/zur pa bong nga byi dang ga_/sha ma dur byid ha re Nu/_/s+thi ra bil ba ni li ni/_/ti mu sa dang pi pi ling /_/dan da ra sna cha mnyam pa/_/e raN+Da yi mar ram ni/_/til
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]mar bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi yis/_/bad kan nad 'joms rgyu rlugs dang /_/rtug skam skran dang gzhang 'brum dang /_/mcher pa'i nad dang gcin snyi dang /_/rlung nad 'khyil dang lto spos dang /_/rnge'u chags nad ni myur du sel/_/zhes bya ba la/
[\[79a.2\]]rgyam tsha la sogs pa cha mnyam par byas pa lde gur btab la/_e raN+Da'i 'bras bu btsir ba'i mar dang bskol ba'i 'jam rtsis ni bad kan gyi nad 'joms shing rgyu rlugs la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/yang na bil ba la sogs pa'i/_/rtsa ba lnga dang til
[\[79a.3\]]mar bskol/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na bil ba la sogs pa'am/_rtsa ba lnga dang til mar bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi btang na yang rlung gi nad 'joms par byed do/_/yang na bad kan sel sman sbyar/_/til mar dang btang bad kan 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na
[\[79a.4\]]bad kan sel ba'i sman tsha ba lnga la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i til mar gyi 'jam rtsi btang na bad kan 'joms par byed do/_/yang na po son cha brgyad 'gyur/_/skyur bskol 'jam rtsi bad kan sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rang skyar la sogs pa khu ba skyur po til mar
[\[79a.5\]]gyi brgyad 'gyur dang /_/po son cha'i lde gu bskol ba'i 'jam rtsi btang na yang bad kan sel bar byed do/_/'jam rtsi 'jam pas rmongs gyur pa/_/rnon pos nye bar sbyar bar bya/_/rno bas gnod la snum pa dang /_/mngar zhing bsil la 'jam pa gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/
[\[79a.6\]]'jam rtsi 'jam zhing rtul ba btang bas skyes bu rmongs bag tu gyur pa 'jam rtsi rnon pos sbyang zhing dag par bya ba dang /_de bzhin du 'jam rtsi rnon pos gnod par gyur pa la/_snum pa dang mngar ba dang /_bsil ba dang /_'jam pa'i 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya'o/_/rnon po
[\[79a.7\]]ba gcin pi lu dang /_/tsi tra ka dang lan tshwa dang /_/thal sman dang ni yungs kar rnams/_/dus la bab par gtang bar bya/_/'o ma mar sogs 'jam po yis/_/zhes bya ba la/_'jam rtsi 'jam po las nyes par gyur pa la ni ba gcin la sogs pa mas gtong ba
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]rnon po dus la bab pa'i tshe gtang bar bya la/_rnon pos nyes par gyur pa la ni 'o ma dang mar la sogs pa rdzas 'jam po'i mas gtong ba dag gis gso bar bya'o/_/nyams stobs dus dang nad gzhi rang bzhin dag_/rnam par phye ste 'jam rtsi gtang bya ba/_/rang rang
[\[79b.2\]]gi ni sman gyi sde tshan gyis/_/rang rang gi ni nad rnams bsal bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_blo dang ldan pa'i sman pas nad pa'i nyams stobs la sogs pa rnam par phye zhing brtags te rang rang gi sman gyi sde tshan mngar ba la sogs pa'i sman gyi tshogs rnams kyis rlung la sogs
[\[79b.3\]]pa rang rang gi nad bsal ba'i phyir 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya'o/_/tsha bas nyam thag la bsil ba/_/bsil bas nyen la dro 'jam sbyar/_/de dang 'tsham pa'i sman ldan par/_/'jam rtsi brtags te gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa
[\[79b.4\]]mkhris pa skyed par byed pas/_nyam thag cing gzir bar gyur pa la ni bsil pa'i sman dang 'jam rtsi gtang bar bya la/_de bzhin du zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa'i grang ba'i dbang gis rlung dang bad kan gyis nyen pa'i nad la ni/_de dang 'tsham pa'i sman dang sbyar ba'i 'jam
[\[79b.5\]]rtsi tsam gang yin pa gtang bar bya ste/_de dag kyang sman dang nad kyi mtshan nyid brtags te/_ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du gtang bar bya'o/_/sbyang bar bya ba'i nad rnams la/_/brta byed 'jam rtsi mi gtang zhing /_/mi gang mdze gcin nad kyis nyen/_/tshil rgyas nad
[\[79b.6\]]la gtang mi bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbyang bar bya ba skyug sman dang bkru sman gtang bar rigs pa'i nad rnams la brta bar byed pa'i 'jam rtsi gtang bar mi bya zhing /_yang mi gang mdze nad dang gcin nad kyis nyen pa la sogs pa la 'jam rtsi gtang bar mi bya'o/_/nyam
[\[79b.7\]]chung glo 'grams pa dang brgyal ba dang /_/lus skem rid dang sbyangs pa'i lus can dang /_/gang yang dri mas tshe ni bzung gyur la/_/sbyong bar byed pa'i mas gtong gtang mi bya/_zhes bya ba la/_nyam chung ba dang /_glo 'grams pa dang /_brgyal
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]bar gyur pa dang /_lus zungs zad pas shas cher rid cing skem pa dang /_bkru sman la sogs pas lus sbyangs zin pa'i lus can gang dang gang dri ma ste bshang bas tshe bzung zhing srog gi rten byas pas de dag la sbyong zhing bkru bar byed
[\[80a.2\]]pa'i mas gtong pa gang yin pa de gtang zhing sbyang du mi rung ngo /_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa/_tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_cho ga grub pa'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o//_//
[\[80a.3\]]de nas mas gtong ba'i cho ga'i nyes pa grub pa bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_mas gtong ba phyin ci log tu nye bar sbyar ba las nyes pa gang zhig 'byung ba de bsal zhing gso bar bya ba'i phyir de grub par bya ba'i cho ga'i le'u brtsams pa yin no/_/snum chos dugs ni ma byas dang /_/
[\[80a.4\]]lto lci ba la sman grang snum/_/tsha nyung sman tshad chungs pa 'am/_/sman ni ska ba btang gyur na/_/de yis nad ni glongs gyur dang /_/stobs chung ba yis nad ma phyin/_/sbyor ba nyes pa bskyed gyur cing /_/'phyen dang phyi sa gcin sri dang /_/lte ba chu so na zhing tsha/_/dang gar chags shing gzhang
