[\[100b.1\]]slon bro/_/bla brnan gyi ni nad sel byed/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na bong nga dkar bo gcig pu sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus kyang lud pa dang rims la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/nu zho 'thung zhing slon pa la/_/de la zhun mar sbrang rtsi dang /_/kaN+Da kA ri bri ha ti/_/'bras bu'i
[\[100b.2\]]khu ba tsha ba lnga/_/sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_byis pa gang ma'i nu zho 'thungs shing slon par gyur pa de la ni/_mar dang sbrang rtsi dang /_kaN+Da ka ri dang /_bri ha ti'i 'bras bu'i khu ba dang /_tsha ba lnga'i phye ma dang sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin par bya'o/_/pi pi ling dang lan
[\[100b.3\]]tshwa lnga/_/ba ri pa tra byi dang ga_/de bzhin lde gur bcas pa sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_pi pi ling dang /_lan tshwa lnga dang /_ba ri pa tra dang /_byi dang ga'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu sbyin na yang slon pa'i nad la phan no/_/de bzhin tsha ba gsum reg 'jam/_/sha ri da ta rma bya sram
[\[100b.4\]]ji snyed pags pa spu bsregs la/_/snag tsha sbrang rtsi mar sbyar phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de bzhin du tsha ba gsum dang /_bya reg 'jam la sogs pa ji snyed pa'i pags pa dang /_sbu bsregs te snag tshar bcas pa mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba'i lde gu byis pa la byin na yang nad de la phan
[\[100b.5\]]no/_/seng ldeng bal bu a rdzu na/_/ru rta twa ta na'i khu ba/_/'o ma mar dang bcas bskol bas/_/slon bro nye bar sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_seng ldeng la sogs pa 'o ma dang mar bcas pa bskol ba blud na yang slon bro ba sel bar byed do/_/gang zhig so dang bcas
[\[100b.6\]]skyes dang /_/gang gi dang por ya so skyes/_/bkra mi shis pa de la ni/_/zhi ba bya zhing bram ze la/_/yon dang bcas pa sbyin par bya/_/de bzhin skem byed mchod par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_byis pa gang ma'i khong nas so dang bcas par skyes pa dang /_yang byis pa gang yang so dang por
[\[100b.7\]]skyes pa'i bkra mi shis pa'i gnod pa can de la ni zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba dang /_dge sbyong dang bram ze la byis pa de yon dang bcas pa sbyin par bya ba dang /_de bzhin du gzhon nu skem byed mchod par bya'o/_/bad kan 'khrugs pas rkan gyi shar/_/rkan gyi mdzer pa zhes bya ste/_/
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]des na rkan gyi phyogs kyi ni/_/spyi bo du ma'i bar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rkan lhung nu zho 'gras pa dang /_/ska ba 'thungs shing bshang ba sla/_/skom dad kha g.ya' mig na zhing /_/gnya' ba 'degs dka' slon par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan 'khrugs
[\[101a.2\]]pas rkan gyi shar rkan gyi mdzer pa zhes bya ba'i nad skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rkan gyi mdzer pa des rkan gyi phyogs kyi spyi bor dma' zhing lcong bar 'gyur la/_de bzhin du rkan lhung zhing babs pa dang /_nu zho dang 'gras shing 'thung bar mi dga' ba dang /_dka' zhing sdug bsngal bas 'jigs
[\[101a.3\]]pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/de la rkan bteg nas tshig 'khus/_/thal pa sbrang rtsi+er sbyar ba bsku/_/yang na bcal sga pi pi ling /_/ba glang lci khu lan tshwa bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_rkan du mdzer pa byung ba de la btegs nas/_nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba dang /_sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i
[\[101a.4\]]lde gus bsku bar bya ba'am/_yang na bca' sga la sogs pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/dong gra skyer pa shing tsha yi/_/lde gu n+ya gro d+ha'i lo mar/_/gtums la ba lang lci bas byugs/_/de rjes me ma mur la bsregs/_/khu bas rkan dang kha bsku zhing /_/mig
[\[101a.5\]]tu yang ni blugs par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dong gra dang skyer pa dang /_shing tsha lde gur byas pa bya gro d+ha'i lo mar gtums la/_/de'i 'og tu ba lang gi lci bas phyi rol nas bskus la/_de'i 'og tu me ma mur gyi mdag mer bsregs la/_chos pa dang khu ba btsir te byis pa de'i rkan dang /_/
[\[101a.6\]]kha'i phyogs bsku zhing /_mig tu sman gyi thigs pa blugs par bya'o/_/ru rta shu dag a ru ra/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i lde gu ni/_/nu zhor sbyar bas byis pa blud/_rkan gyi mdzer pa las thar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/ru rta la sogs pa'i lde gu dang nu zho dang lhan cig blud na yang rkan gyi
[\[101a.7\]]mdzer pa'i nad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/dri mas gos sam rngul ba las/_/gzhang khar bad kan khrag las byung /_/rma ni nad dmar g.ya' ba dang /_/bla brnan mang po 'byung bar 'gyur/_/la las ma mo'i nyes par bshad/_/gzhan dag lus srul pos byas zer/_/rgyab kyi thor bu gzhang
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]bsdebs zer/_/la las de ming med ces bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_bshang ba zhes bya ba'i dri mas gos pa dang /_lan 'ga' rngul bar gyur pa las bad kan khrag las gyur pa'i rma nang na dmar zhing g.ya' ba dang bcas pa dang /_bla brnan mang po dang ldan par 'byung bar
[\[101b.2\]]'gyur la/_rma de la ni la las ni ma mo'o gdon gyis nyen pa las byung ba yin par bshad la/_de bzhin du gzhan dag ni lus srul po'i gdon gyis nyen pa byas zer/_la las ni rgyab kyi thor bu zhes bya ba yin zer la/_gzhan dag ni gzhang bsdebs pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/zhes
[\[101b.3\]]zer ba'o/_/la las ni nad de ming med ces bya'o/_/zhes zer ro/_/de la ma ma bad mkhris dag_/sel ba'i sman gyis nu zho sbyang /_/zhes bya ba la/_ming du ma dang ldan pa'i nad de la ni ma ma'i mkhris pa dang /_bad kan sel bar byed pa'i sman gyis de'i nu zho sbyang zhing nyes pa med par
[\[101b.4\]]bya'o/_tsan+dan dkar chu bsil ba dang /_ldan pa'i skom ni nang nas blud/_/ces bya ba la/_ma ma de la tsan+dan dkar po chu bsil ba dang sbyar ba'i skom ma ma dang byis pa la blud par bya'o/_/de dang skyer pa'i khaN+Da ni/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pas rma bsku bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_tsan+dan
[\[101b.5\]]dkar po dang skyer pa'i khaN+Da sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa'i lde gus rma bsku bar bya'o/_/rgya shugs 'bras bu gsum blag sha'i/_/shun pa bskol ba'i chu blugs bya/_/nag tshur gi waM spangs ma dang /_/dngul rdo ba bla ldong ros ni/_/skyur dang btags pas bsku bya zhing /_/zhes bya ba la/
[\[101b.6\]]rgya shug la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu bas rma de la blugs par bya ba 'am/_nag tshur la sogs pa'i sman khu ba skyur po dang /_sbyar ba'i lde gus rma bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na shing mngar skyer khaN+Da/_/dung ni zhib tu btags pa 'am/_/dung gi lte ba sha ri ba 'am/_/a sa na yi shun pa ni/_/
[\[101b.7\]]phye mar btags pas gdab par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rma de shing mngar la sogs pa zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma gdab bar bya ba 'am/_yang na dung gi lte ba dang /_/sha ri ba zhes bya ba thal tres kyi phye mas gdab bar bya ba 'am/_yang na a sa na'i shun pa phye mar zhib tu btags
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]nas gdab par bya'o/_/dmar zhing g.ya' ba'i shas che la/_/srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang bsdebs pa'i nad de mdog dmar zhing /_g.ya' ba'i shas che bar gyur pa ni srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/gzhang
[\[102a.2\]]bsdebs nad la mkhris pa yi/_/rma la phan pa thams cad bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhang bsdebs pa zhes bya ba'i nad la mkhris pa'i rma la phan pa'i zas dang /_skom dang /_sman thams cad phan no/_/pa tha gla sgang ser po gnyis/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba byi dang ga_/pur+Na rna bar
[\[102a.3\]]bil bar bcas/_/bri sh+tsi ka li tsha ba gsum/_/mar bcas bskol ba tshad tsam bldag_/sa zos nad las thar bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba tha la sogs pa sman bskol ba'i khu ba mar dang bskol ba tshad tsam byis pas bldags shing zos nas zos pa la sogs pa'i
[\[102a.4\]]nad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/nad ni gang gi sman gang yin/_/de yis nu ma bskus nas ni/_/yud tsam 'dug la de rjes bkru/_/blud na nad ni de des sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_rims la sogs pa'i sman gang dag yin bar bshad pa'i sman des nad gzhi ji lta ba dang sbyar te
[\[102a.5\]]bskus nas yud tsam ste/_chu tshod gnyis 'das kyi bar du bsdad la/_de'i rjes la nu ma bskus te/_byis pa la nu zho blud na rims la sogs pa'i nad de sman des 'joms bar 'gyur ro/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying bo'i rnam par 'grel pa/_tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba
[\[102a.6\]]slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_gnas phyi ma'i le'u gnyis ba'i 'grel pa'o//_//de nas byis pa'i gdon gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_le'u snga mar/_tshul min skrag par mi bya ste/_/skrag na gdon ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/zhes
[\[102a.7\]]bshad pa'i rim pas byis pa'i gdon gso ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/sngon gyi skem byed bsrung ba'i phyir/_/gdon ni skyes pa'i gzugs can lnga/_/bud med kyi ni gzugs can bdun/_/lha chen po yi sprul pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngon gyi dus
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]su lha chen po'i bu skem byed ces bya ba gzhon nu gdong drug pa rims las bsrung ba'i phyir/_gdon skyes pa'i gzugs can lnga dang bud med kyi gzugs can bdun lha chen po nyis kyis bskyed pa yin no/_/skem byed sa ga lug thug gdong /_/khyi gdong yi dgas zhes bya dang /_/zhes bya ba
[\[102b.2\]]la/_skem byed kyi gdon la sogs pa lnga ni skyes pa'i gzugs can yin par shes par bya'o/_/bya gdon srul mo grang pa yi/_/srul mo long ma lus srul mo/_/de bzhin bzhin gyi rgyan can ma/_/nam gru nam gru skem mo yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bya'i gdon la sogs pa'i gdon bdun
[\[102b.3\]]po ni/_bud med kyi gzugs can yin no/_/de rnams kyis ni gzung ba'i tshul/_/rtag tu ngu dang rims kyis 'debs/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdon de rnams kyis dang po gzung zhing 'jug pa'i tshul lam rtags ni rtag par rgyun du ngu ba dang /_rims kyis 'debs par byed
[\[102b.4\]]pa yin no/_/spyi'i tshul skrag dang glal ba dang /_smin ma 'degs shing rmya ba dang /_/dbu ba slon zhing gyen du blta/_/ma mchu sos 'debs gnyid yar dang /_/ngu zhing mkhun la nu zho la/_/mi dga' skad ni 'gyur ba dang /_/glo bur du ni sen mo yis/_/rang gi ma
[\[102b.5\]]ma'i yan lag 'brad/_/ces bya ba la/_gdon de rnams kyi spyi'i rtags ni/_skrag cing 'jigs pa dang glal ba la sogs pa nas rang gi ma ma 'am ma la rgyu med par yan lag thams cad sen mos 'brad cing gnod par byed pa'i bar yin no/_/de la skem byed kyis zan rtags
[\[102b.6\]]mig gcig mchi ma 'dzag pa dang /_/yang dang yang du mgo bo rdeb/_/phyogs gcig nyams shing lus rengs la/_/rngul bcas skye ba rengs ba dang /_/so 'cha' nu zho la mi dga'/_/sngangs shing ngu la skad gsang nyams/_/kha yo kha chu skyug pa dang /_/mi bzad par ni
[\[102b.7\]]gyen du blta/_/tshil khrag dri bro yid mi dga'/_/bshang ba khu tshur la bcangs shing /_/mkhur tshes mig dang smin ma gcig_/g.yo zhing mig ni gnyis ka dmar/_/des ni yan lag nyes nyams sam/_'chi ba kho nar byad par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]gdon de rnams kyi nang nas skem byed ces bya ba'i gdon gyis zin cing nyen pa'i rtags ni byis pa'i mig gcig nas 'chi ma 'dzag pa dang /_skad cig ma re re zhing yang dang yang du mgo bo brdegs shing bskyod pa dang /_/lus kyi gzhogs phyed nyams shing ma
[\[103a.2\]]rungs pa dang /_lus shing ltar rengs pa dang /_rngul 'byung ba dang /_ske ba gnye'u rengs kyis btab pa la sogs pa dang /_tshil dang khrag dri mi zhim pa dang /_yid mi dga' zhing lto ba ltar gnas pa dang /_bshang ba khu tshur gyi nang du bcangs pa dang /_mkhur tshos dang kha yo
[\[103a.3\]]par gnas pa la sogs pa yin te/_des ni yan lag nyams shing mi tshang par 'gyur ba'am/_'chi ba kho na 'gyur ro/_/skem byed brjed byed mtshan ma ni/_/dran pa nyams shing yang dang yang /_skra 'bal ske ba 'gugs pa dang /_/rnam par 'dud cing glal bzhin du/_/
[\[103a.4\]]bshang dang gci ba 'byin par byed/_/wu bar skyug cing gyen du blta/_/rkang lag smin mas gar yang byed/_/nu ma rang lte so yis 'debs/_/kun tu g.yo zhing gnyid yar rims/_/khrag ni rnag gi dri bro'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_skem byed brjed byed ces bya ba gdon sogs bzung
[\[103a.5\]]pa'i mchan ma ni byis pa'i dran pa nyams shing brgyal ba la sogs pa dang /_lus rnam par 'gugs shing btud nas glal bzhin du bshang ba dang /_gci ba 'byin par byed pa la sogs pa yin no/_/lug thug gdong gis rtags kyi nad/_/sbo zhing rkang pa lag pa dag_/'dar zhing wu
[\[103a.6\]]bar skyug pa dang /_/skom dad che 'khru chang pa sdom/_/skad gsang dma' zhing mdog mi sdug_/mkhun zhing slon par byed pa dang /_/lud pa skyigs bus 'debs gnyid yang /_/so yis mchu gnon yan lag sdud/_/rengs shing lug thug dri bro la/_/gyen du lta zhing dgod pa dang /_/
[\[103a.7\]]bar du 'gugs shing rims kyis 'debs/_/brgyal zhing mig gcig skrangs pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lug thug gi gdong zhes bya bas zin pa'i rtags ni byis pa lto sbo ba la sogs pa'i nad kyis 'debs pa dang /_lus kyi bar du gugs shing sgur por byed pa la sogs pa yin no/_/
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]khyi yi gdong gi rtags gyur pa/_/'dar zhing ba spu ldang ba dang /_/rngul zhing mig ni 'dzums pa dang /_/rgyab tu gug cing lce dang so/_/mchu dang rkan sgra 'byin zhing skyug_/bshad pa'i dri 'byung khyi skad 'don/_/zhes bya ba la/_khyi'i gdong gi rtags ni byis pa lus 'dar ba la
[\[103b.2\]]sogs pa nas khyi'i skad 'byin pa'i bar yin no/_/yi dgas kyi ni gdon gyi rtags/_/ba spu ldang zhing yang yang sdang /_/glo bur ngu zhing rims kyis 'debs/_/'khru zhing slon byed lud pa lu/_/glal skom mi ro'i dri dang ldan/_/lus ni bskyod cing g.yo ba dang /_/skem
[\[103b.3\]]zhing rengs la mdog mi sdug_/khu tshur bsdam zhing mchi ma 'dzag_/ces bya ba la/_byis pa yi dgas kyi gdon mtshun lha zhes bya bas gzung ba'i rtags ni ba spu ldang zhing yang dang yang du sdang ba yin no/_/bya gdon lus lhod 'khru bar byed/_/lce rkan lkog mar rma byung zhing /_/thor bu
[\[103b.4\]]na zhing tsha la rnags/_/tshigs dag tu ni yang yang 'byung /_/mtshan mo skye la nyin mo 'bri/_/kha 'am bshang sgo 'gags pa dang /_/'jigs shing bya yi dri dang ldan/_/rims kyis 'debs par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_byis pa bya'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/
[\[103b.5\]]lus lhod cing yan lag shig shig por gyur pa dang /_'khru bar byed pa la sogs pa dang /_lus dang yan lag la rma 'byung ba dang /_mtshan mo skye zhing mched la nyin mo ni bri ba la sogs pa yin no/_/srul mos slon zhing 'dar ba dang /_/lus snyom mtshan mo gnyid yar dang /_/
[\[103b.6\]]skyigs bu lto sbo 'khru ba dang /_/skom zhing gcin ni sri ba dang /_/lus lhod ba spu gshor ba dang /_/kha ltar dri ni mnam pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_srul mo zhes bya ba'i gdon bud med kyi gzugs can gyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni byis pa slon zhing skyug pa dang /_lus 'dar ba dang
[\[103b.7\]]skom zhing gnyid kyis log pa ltar/_yul 'dzin mi nus pa dang /_mtshan mo gnyid yar ba la sogs pa yin no/_/grang ba'i srul mos 'dar ba dang /_/ngu zhing zur gyis lta ba dang /_/skom zhing 'khru la rgyu ma 'khrugs/_/zhag ltar dri ni mnam pa dang /_/yan lag logs
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]gcig grang ba dang /_/cig shos dro ba nyid yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_grang ba'i lus srul mo zhes bya ba'i bud med kyi gzugs can gyi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni byis pa lus 'dar ba la sogs pa nas lus kyi gzhogs gcig ni dro bar gyur pa la sogs
[\[104a.2\]]pa'i bar yin no/_/srul mo long mas slon pa dang /_/rims dang lud pa gnyid chung dang /_/bshang ba sla zhing mdog mi sdug_/dri nga bskus pas myur du skam/_/mthong ba nyams shing mig na g.ya'/_/mig skrang glo bar gyur ba dang /_/skyigs bu mi dgod nu zho 'gras/_/mdog
[\[104a.3\]]mi sdug cing nga ro rtsub/_/mdog nyams nya yi dri dang ldan/_/yang na dri ni skyur bcas yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_srul mo long ma'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/_byis pa slon zhing skyugs pa la sogs pa dang lus dri nga ba dang lus kyi lde gu myur du bskam pa la sogs pa'i bar yin no/_/
[\[104a.4\]]bzhin rgyan can gyis rkang pa dang /_/lag pa gdong ni mdzes pa dang /_/rtsa ni nag po snang ba yis/_/lto ba khyab cing rims kyis 'debs/_/yi ga 'chu zhing yan lag na/_/ba gcin lta bu'i dri 'byung 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_bud med kyi gzugs can gyi gdon bzhin rgyan can
[\[104a.5\]]gyis zin pa'i rtags ni byis pa'i rkang pa la sogs pa sdug cing mdzes par gyur pa la sogs pa yin no/_/nam grus gnag cing sngo ba dang /_/mig dang rna ba sna med cing /_/mig 'gul skyigs bu lud pa lu/_/kha ni yo zhing dmar ba dang /_/lug thug drir ldan rims 'debs skem/
[\[104a.6\]]bshang ba sngo zhing sla ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nam gru'i bya'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags ni/_byis pa'i mdog gnag cing sngo ba la sogs pa yin no/_/nam gru skem mos lus kun ni/_/rims kyis 'debs bar gyur ba dang /_/skra 'byi zas la mi dga' dang /_/skad gsang
[\[104a.7\]]zhum zhing mdog mi sdug_/bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs dang /_/lto bar rtsa yi mdud pa chags/_/ngu zhing bya rgod dri ldan la/_/yun rings na bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nam gru skem mo zhes bya ba'i gdon gyi rtags ni/_/lus kyi yan lag thams cad skam zhing rangs pa la
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]sogs pa nas nad yun ring du na zhing rjes su 'brel pa la sogs pa'i bar yin no/_/lto bar rmen bu zlum por 'byung /_/bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs 'byung /_/lce yi dbus ni dma' ba dang /_/rkan ni gnag 'gyur de spang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_byis pa gang lto bar rmen bu 'am/
[\[104b.2\]]thor bu zlum po byung ba dang bshang ba kha dog sna tshogs su 'byung ba la sogs pa'i byis pa de ni gso bar mi rung bas spang bar bya'o/_/kha zas mang po zos kyang ni/_/byis pa gang zhig lus skem byed/_/skem pas nyen cing mig nyams pa/_/de ni nam gru skem mos gsod/_/
[\[104b.3\]]ces bya ba la/_byis pa kha zas mang zhing sna tshogs zos su zin kyang lus skem zhing sbegs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de nyid nam gru'i gdon gyis nges par gsod par 'gyur ro/_/'tshe ba la dga' mchod par 'dod/_/gdon rnams 'dzin pa'i rgyu yin no/_/zhes bya ba
[\[104b.4\]]la/_gdon 'jug par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni 'tshe bar byed cing srog gcod pa la dga' ba dang /_/mchod cing brjod par 'dod pa yin no/_/de la 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can/_/byin tshe sna nas 'dzag pa dang /_/lce nyams mig ni gting du 'bros/_/bde med mig ni mchi mar bcas/
[\[104b.5\]]nyam chung tshig ni dman pa dang /_/dri nga ba ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/skem zhing rang gi bshang dang gci/_/lag bas nyed kyi smod mi byed/_/lag bas bteg ste 'bad pa yis/_/bdag dang de bzhin gzhan la brdeg_/mtshon dang shing sogs kyis brdegs shing /_/'bar ba'i
[\[104b.6\]]me la 'jug par byed/_/chu nang 'bying zhing khron par ltung /_/gzhan yang de 'drar byed par 'gyur/_/skom dad che zhing tsha bas gnag_/slon par byed par 'gyur pa dang /_/bu ga kun nas khrag 'dzag cing /_/'chi ltas byung ba de sbang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la gdon
[\[104b.7\]]de rnams kyi nang nas gdon 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid can zhes bya bas ni/_/byis pa 'tsho ba'am/_yang na 'tshe ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dag la 'dzin cing de sna nas 'dzag pa dang /_/lce nyams pa la sogs pa nas mtshon dang shing la sogs pa'i bar gyis kyang bdag dang
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]gzhan la rdeg par byed pa dang /_me la 'jug pa dang /_chu'i nang du lus bying ba dang /_khron par mchong zhing ltung ba dang /_gzhan yang 'tshe ba'i las de lta bu gzhan yang byed par 'gyur ba dang /_skom dad che ba la sogs pa yin te/_de lta bu'i 'tshe
[\[105a.2\]]ba'i bdag nyid can gyis zin pa gang yin pa de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o/_/dga' ba 'dod pas gzir gyur pa/_/dben par bud med 'dod smra dga'/_/dri dang me tog phreng rgyan dga'/_/mgu zhing zhi ba gso bar dka'/_/zhes bya ba la/_dga' ba 'dod pa zhes bya
[\[105a.3\]]ba'i gdon gyis mi chen po 'am/_/byis pa zin par gyur pa ni/_dben pa'i gnas su bud med dang lhan cig 'dod pa spyod pa dang /_smra ba la dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_dri dang me tog la sogs pa la dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_/sems mgu zhing dga' ba la brtags pa dang /
[\[105a.4\]]spyod lam zhi ba dang /_gdon de gso bar dka' ba yin no/_/lces ni kha la nyug pa dang /_/mchu rkan gre ba skams pa dang /_/dogs pas lta zhing ngu ba dang /_/sems khong chud cing zhum pa dang /_/zas 'dod ltogs par gyur kyang ni/_/byin na za bar mi 'dod pa/_/gtor ma
[\[105a.5\]]'dod pas zin pa ste/_/de ni gso sla yin zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gtor ma 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i gdon yod de/_/des byis pa 'am/_mi chen po gang dag zin par gyur pa de ni lces kha la 'byug cing 'byug pa dang /_mchu la sogs pa bskam par 'gyur ba dang /_/dogs pa dang
[\[105a.6\]]bcas bas kun la lta ba dang /_ngu zhing nga ro 'byin pa dang /_sems khong du chud pa dang /_yid zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_zas 'dod cing shin tu bkres par gyur kyang zas byin na zas mi 'dod par gyur pa ni gtor ma 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa yin par shes par bya ste/
[\[105a.7\]]de ni gso sla ba yin no/_/gsod 'dod pa las grub pa yi/_/sngags bzlas sbyin sreg bya bas gzhom/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdon srog 'dod pa zhes bya ba gsod par 'dod pa yod de/_de la ni grub cing 'bras bu mngon du snang ba'i mthu dang ldan pas sngags bzlas shing sbyin sreg bya bas
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]gzhom zhing gso bar bya'o/_/cig shos la ni ci 'dod par/_/dga' dang gtor ma sogs sbyin pas/_/zhes bya ba la/_gsod par 'dod pas cig shos su gyur pa'i gdon dga' par 'dod pa dang /_gtor ma 'dod pa zhes bya ba la ni dga' ba dang /_/gtong ma sbyin pas gso
[\[105b.2\]]bar bya ste/_/dga' bar 'dod pa la ni rtse dga'i bya ba sbyin pas gso la/_gtor ma 'dod pa la ni gtor ma sbyin pas gso bar bya'o/_/sogs pa smos pas ni 'og nas bshad pa'i cho ga gzhan dag kyang sbyar bar bya'o/_/de nas gsor rung gdon la ni/_/byis pa khang ba dben
[\[105b.3\]]par gzhag_/zhag gsum chag chag phyag dar byas/_/rtag tu me ni bzhag pa yi/_/pu ti'i me tog sil ma dang /_/'dab ma sa bon yungs kar gtor/_/gdon 'joms til mar sbar ba yi/_/mar mes gdon ni 'joms par byed/_/nad g.yog nyal po chang dang
[\[105b.4\]]sha/_/yong su spangs par gyur pa yi/_/mar ni rnying pas bskus nas ni/_/pa la nim pa tar ka ri/_/dong gra thang shing ka tab ga_/'dzam bu dang ni ta ma la/_/ka tri na dang lcam pa dang /_/a pa marga pa ta li/_/ma du shi kru zhes bya dang /_/ka ka dza ka shre ta che/_/bil rkang 'o ma can
[\[105b.5\]]gyi shing /_/ka dam pa bcas karany+dza/_/chu ni dro 'jam dag gis bkru/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas gsor rung ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i byis pa khang pa dben zhing yangs par zhag gsum gyi bar du chag chag dang /_phyag dar lan gsum byas la rtag par rgyun mi 'chad bar me
[\[105b.6\]]gzhag pa dang /_/pu ti la sogs pa'i me tog gi sil ma gtor bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin du gdon 'joms pa'i rdzas yungs mar la sogs pa spar ba'i mar me gzhag par gyur pa der nad pa de gzhag la/_nad g.yogs 'khrig pa la sogs pa spangs par byung pa dag gis mar rnying pas
[\[105b.7\]]nad pa'i lus bskus la ba la dang nim pa la sogs pa'i sman dang /_bskol ba'i chu dro 'jam tsam gyis blugs shing nad pa bkru bar bya'o/_/tar ka ri ni ag ni man ta'o/_/ka tang ga ni a ru la ka'o/_/ta ma la ni bar na'o/_/ka tri na ni bu tri na'o/_/lcam pa ni su par tsa la'o/_/ma du
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]shi kru ni so ban dza na'o/_/shwe ta che ni ma hA kash+pe ta ste gi ri kar Ni'o/_/'o ma can gyi shing ni n+ya gro d+ha'i shing la sogs pa'o/_/ka dam pa ni am pa dan pa'o/_/stag dang gzig dang seng ge sbrul/_/dom gyi pags pa mar dang bcas/_/bdug pas khrus byas 'og tu
[\[106a.2\]]'dug_/ces bya ba la/_byis pa khrus byas pa'i 'og tu stag la sogs pa'i pags pa bsregs pa'i dud pas lus la bdug par bya'o/_/pu ti yungs kar sha rang ga_/shu dag go bye la la phud/_/ru rta mar bcas bdug pas ni/_/gdon kun las ni thar byed yin/_/zhes
[\[106a.3\]]bya ba la/_pu ti ka rany+dza dang /_sha rang ga'i rtsa ba dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_myu gu dang /_shing gi nang gi snying po dang /_khu ba dang /_tsher ma dang /_shu dag la sogs pa'i sman gyi bdugs pas kyang byis pa'i gdon thams cad las thar bar byed do/_/
[\[106a.4\]]yungs kar nim pa'i lo ma dang /_shu dag ka ra bI ra'i rtsa/_/gro ba mar sbyar bdugs pas ni/_/gdon ni thams cad sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_yungs kar la sogs pa'i sman mar dang sbyar ba'i dud pa byis pa la bdugs na yang gdon thams cad sel bar byed do/_/ba lang
[\[106a.5\]]rwa dang rus pa spu/_/pags ba byi li'i rtug pa dang /_/nim pa'i lo ma pu tse shel/_/mar dang bri ha ti gnyis dang /_/ras bal sa bon po son cha/_/nas dang ra spu thang shing dang /_/yungs kar rma bya'i sgro dang pog_/skra dang phub ma pha bang dang /_/rdza mar ra thug gcin dang sbangs/_/
[\[106a.6\]]zhib btags pa yi bdugs pas ni/_/'byung po'i gdon na thams cad dang /_/mi bzad rims ni 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ba lang gi rwa la sogs pa'i sman rdza snod sar pa'i nang du Ra thug gi gcin dang sbangs te/_gcin de nyid btags pa'i reng bu skam po'i dud
[\[106a.7\]]pas ni gdon thams cad dang rims nad thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/byi tsher a mra'i tshi gu dang /_/rgya sbos mngar sde na le sham/_/kr-iSh+Na par+Ni gla sgang rnams/_/lde gur bcas pa mar dang ni/_/'o ma rtsa ba bcu bskol khur/_/bcas bskol de ni gdon 'joms mchog_/ces
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]bya ba la/_a mra'i tshi gu ni a mra'i 'bras bu'i nang na yod pa'o/_/mngar ba'i sde tshan ni 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan no/_/gzhan ni go bar zad de rdzas de dag lde gur byas pa dang /_mar la sogs pa bskol te/_mar de blud na gdon thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/ra sna aM shu ma ti gnyis/_/
[\[106b.2\]]ba la rtsa ba chen po lnga/_/gla sgang btags te mar dang bskol/_/tsha ba gsum dang tsi tra ka'i/_/thal tes ba tra byi dang ga_/shing mngar shing kun pa ya s+ya/_/thang shing pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/dug mo yungs dang bcas pa yi/_/lde gu mar dang bskol ba yis/_/rtag tu byis pa la phan
[\[106b.3\]]zhing /_/nad dang gdon ni thams cad 'joms/_/me drod stobs dang kha dog skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_/ra sna dang aM shu ma ti gnyis kyi lo ma la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu dang bskol ba'i mar ni byis pa la rtag tu phan zhing rims la sogs pa'i nad dang 'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon thams
[\[106b.4\]]cad 'joms par byed cing me drod skyed pa dang /_/lus kyi stobs dang /_kha dog skyed pa yin no/_/sha ri ba dang mu ra dang /_/bra h+mi shu dag shang khi ni/_/yungs kar ashwa gan+d+ha dang /_bye rug pa bcas mar dang bskol/_/de ni btung ba 'am bsku ba yis/_/gdon rnams thams cad
[\[106b.5\]]'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sha ri ba la sogs pa lde gu dang mar du bskol ba'i mar de btung ba 'am bsku ba byas na gdon thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/mar gang 'byung po'i rig pa ru/_/'og nas bshad pa dag dang ni/_/de bzhin gtor ma sbyin sreg dang /_/
[\[106b.6\]]khrus ni sngags rgyud shes pas sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman mar gang 'byung bo'i rig pa zhes bya ba/_/'byung po'i nad gso ba'i skabs nas 'byung ba gang yin pa yang byis pa la sbyar bar bya la/_de bzhin du 'og nas bshad pa'i gtor ma dang /_gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi las dang
[\[106b.7\]]khrus kyi cho ga gang yin bdag kyang sngags kyi rgyud shes pa'i sngags bas sngags las bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o/_/pu ti kar ny+dza'i shun pa/_/bar ba ra yi rtsa ba dang /_/ku ba kha bo bi sha la/_/ka tra ka dang bil pa dang /_/ka pid tha bskol des mtshan mo/_/byis pa bkrus na shis
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_pu ti ka ra ny+dza'i shun pa dang /_/lo ma dang /_shing mngar bar ba re'i rtsa ba dang /_ku ba kha bo nas bil pa dang /_ka pid tha'i bar cha mnyam par byas pa bskol ba'i chu des mtshan mo byis pa bkrus na shis shing dpal bskyed ba yin
[\[107a.2\]]no/_/gdon dang bral yang bla brnan nad/_/rjes su 'brel pa thams cad la/_/byis pa'i nad gsor bshad pa yi/_/sman gyis ji bzhin gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnod pa bsal zhing de dang bral bar gyur kyang bla brnan gyi nad dang rjes su 'brel bar gyur cing yun ring du gnas
[\[107a.3\]]par gyur pa de thams cad la nad dmigs ji lta ba bzhin du byis pa'i nad gso bar bshad pa'i sman gyis gso zhing bcos par bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel ba tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_gnas phyi ma'i
[\[107a.4\]]le'u gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o/_/byis pa gso ba'i bshad pa rdzogs so//_//de nas 'byung po'i gdon gyi nad dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o_/zhes bya ba la/_byis pa'i gdon gyi rjes la 'byung po'i gdon gyi dmigs shes par bya ba'i le'u bzhi pa ni de nyid du
[\[107a.5\]]brtsam par 'os pa yin no/_/gdon phal cher phan tshun gcig la gcig gso ba'i tshul gcig ste khyad par med pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/shes dang rnam shes tshig dang ni/_/spyod pa snying stobs rang bzhin dag_/gang gi rang bzhin 'gyur bar snang /_/de la 'byung po'i gdon yod bshad/
[\[107a.6\]]ces bya ba la/_skyes bu gang shes pa la sogs pa rang bzhin 'gyur zhing phyin ci log tu snang na/_/mi de la 'byung po'i gdon yod ces nges par bshad par bya'o/_de la shes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i sgra shes pas brtsam mo/_/rnam par shes pa ni skabs 'dir khyad par shes pas de kho na nyid
[\[107a.7\]]rtogs pa'o/_/'byung po'i gzugs dang rang bzhin dang /_/smra dang 'gro sogs spyod pa dang /_/gang zhig 'dre bar byed pa dag_/de la de ni zhugs par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_/'byung po ni lha dang lha ma yin dang dri za la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'i sems can rnams te/
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]de'i gzugs dang rang bzhin la sogs pa'i tshul mthun par byed pa gang yin pa de ni mi de la gdon de zhugs pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/de ni lha dang lha min sogs/_/dbye ba rnam pa bco brgyad bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_'byung po'i gdon lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri za la sogs pa'i dbye bas
[\[107b.2\]]mdor bsdus na grangs bco brgyad yin par shes par bya'o/_/de 'dzin rgyu ni 'phral gtam ni/_/sngon chad shes rab 'tshol ba yi/_/blo yis nyes pa byas gyur nas/_/de yi chags pa sogs bskyed pas/_/brtul zhugs spyod dang chos lugs nyams/_/mchod 'os rnams ni brnyas pa
[\[107b.3\]]dang /_/gzhung lugs nyams pa de dang ni/_/sdig dang bdag nyid gsod byed na/_/gdon ni glags skabs tshol byed pas/_/lha la sogs pa 'ang rjes gnod byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gdon de rnams 'dzin cing 'jug pa'i rgyu ni shes rab 'chal ba'i dbang gis nyes pa'i las tshe 'dir 'phral
[\[107b.4\]]du byas pa 'am/_yang na sngon chad byas par gyur la/_/rgyu de'i dbang gis chags pa dang /_khro ba dang nga rgyal la sogs pa skyes par gyur bas skyes bu brtul zhugs dang spyod pa dang rang gi chos lugs nyams par gyur cing mchod par 'os pa bla ma la sogs pa la brnyas par byed pa dang /_de bzhin
[\[107b.5\]]du rang gi chos lugs sam/_/'jig rten pa'i khrims kyi gzhung las nyams par byed pa dang /_sdig pa'i tshul la sogs pa byed par 'gyur la/_de lta bu'i glags rnyed ba dang /_glags skabs tshol bar byed pa'i gdon gyi rigs lha la sogs pa rnams kyis de la gnod cing 'tshe par byed do/_/
[\[107b.6\]]glags ni sdig la sogs pa dang /_/mi dge'i las ni smin pa dang /_/gcig pur khang stong gnas pa 'am/_/dur khrod sogs par mtshan mo gnas/_/gcer bur rgyu ba 'am bla ma smod/_/'khrig pa tshul min spyod pa dang /_/gtsang sbra med par lha mchod dang /_/mi gtsang gzhan dang
[\[107b.7\]]'dres pa dang /_/sbyin sreg sngags gtor mchod sbyin rnams/_/phyin ci log tu byed pa dang /_/mdor na nyin re spyod sogs pas/_/spyod pa brtan pa las 'das pa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_/gdon de rnams 'dzin cing glags skabs tshol ba'i rgyu ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sdig pa la brtson
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]par byed pa dang /_sngon chad mi dge ba'i las byas par 'gyur pa smin cing nyams su myong ba'i dus la bab pa dag ni gdon de la 'jug pa'i glags skabs yin no/_/de bzhin du gcig pu grogs med par khang stong la sogs par gnas pa dang /_yang na dur khrod dang /_shing
[\[108a.2\]]chen po'i drung dang /_bas mtha' la sogs par mtshan mo gnas shing nyal ba dang /_de bzhin du dus su phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing gos spang pa dang /_de bzhin du mchod par 'os pa'i bla ma rnams la smod cing brnyas pa dang /_dus tshigs dag tu spyod pa dang /_bud med zla mtshan dang ldan
[\[108a.3\]]pa la 'khrig pa spyod par byed pa dang /_gtsang sbra'i spyod pa med par lha la mchod par byed pa dang /_gzhan bu btsas shing mi gtsang ba dag dang 'dres shing reg pa dang /_sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i las phyin ci log tu byed cing de'i brtul zhugs nyams pa ste/_mdor na nyin re zhing rtag tu
[\[108a.4\]]spyad pa'i le'u las smos pa'i spyod pa dag las 'das par gyur pa de thams cad ni gdon 'jug pa'i glags skabs kyi rgyu yin no/_/lha yi gdon gyi yar ngo yi/_/tshes gcig bcu gsum dag la 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdon de dag las lha'i gdon 'dzin pa'i dus ni yar ngo'i tshes
[\[108a.5\]]gcig dang bcu gsum pa la 'dzin par byed do/_/lha min gdon ni yar ngo yi/_/bcu gsum mar ngo'i bcu gnyis la/_/zhes bya ba la/_lha ma yin gyi gdon yar ngo'i tshes bcu gsum dang mar ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis la 'dzin par byed do/_/dri za'i gdon ni bcu bzhi dang /_/bcu gnyis dag
[\[108a.6\]]la 'ang 'dzin par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_dri za'i gdon gyis ni mar ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi dang bcu gnyis la 'dzin par byed do/_/klu gdon tshes lnga la 'dzin byed/_/ces bya ba la/_klu'i gdon ni zla ba yar ngo'i tshes lnga la 'dzin to/_/gnod sbyin gdon ni yar ngo yi/_/tshes bdun bcu gcig dag
[\[108a.7\]]la 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnod sbyin gyi gdon zhes bya ba nor gyi bdag po'i gdon ni zla ba yang ngo'i tshes bdun dang bcu gcig dag la 'dzin no/_/tshangs pa srin po yar ngo yi/_/tshes brgyad bco lnga dag la 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshangs pa srin po zhes bya ba'i gdon ni tshes brgyad dang
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]zla ba la mi la 'dzin par byed do/_/srin po sha za sogs mar ngo'i/_/tshes gcig tshes dgu bcu gcig la/_zhes bya ba la/_srin po la sogs pa'i gdon ni mar ngo'i tshes gcig dang tshes dgu dang bcu gcig la 'dzin to/_/mtshun lha gnam stong tshes bcu dang /_/brgyad dang dgu pa dag
[\[108b.2\]]la 'dzin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshun lhar gtogs pa'i gdon ni gnam stong la sogs pa la 'dzin no/_/rgan po la sogs gzhan dag ni/_/phal cher dus de'i thun mtshams la'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgan po ste/_pha ma la sogs pa las gdon du gyur pa gzhan dag la ni phal
[\[108b.3\]]cher tshes brgyad dang /_tshes dgu dag la nyin mtshan gyi thun mtshams la 'dzin par byed do/_/lha yi gdon gyis dpang byas la/_/gdong ni pad+ma kha bye 'dra/_/lta stangs zhi zhing khro ba med/_/tshig nyung rngul dang bshang gci nyung /_kha zas la ni gnod pa med/_/lha dang bram ze la rab dga'/_/
[\[108b.4\]]gtsang zhing saM skr-i ta'i skad smra/_/yun ring nas ni mig 'dzums shing /_/lus dri zhim zhing mchog ster byed/_/gos phreng dkar po chu bo dang /_/ri mtho khang pa mtho la dga'/_/gnyid med tshugs pa med pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdon de dag las lha'i gdon gyis zin cing dbang du byas
[\[108b.5\]]pa'i rtags ni gdong pad+ma kha phye ba 'dra ba ltar mdangs dang ldan pa dang /_lta stangs zhi zhing mi sdug pa med pa dang /_khro zhing 'khrug pa med pa dang /_tshig nyung zhing rngul dang bshang gci nyung ba dang /_kha zas la mi gdu ba dang /_lha dang bram ze la dga' zhing mchod pa dang /_gtsang zhing
[\[108b.6\]]khrus la sogs ba la dga' ba dang /_saM skr-i ta'i skad du smra ba dang /_mig yun ring zhig nas 'dzums par byed pa dang /_lus la dri zhim po'i ngad dang ldan pa dang /_mchog sbyin mchog sbyin no/_/zhes smra ba dang /_gos dkar po la sogs pa la dga' ba dang /_mtshan mo gnyid yar
[\[108b.7\]]zhing chung ba dang /_gzhan gyis tshugs pa med cing zil gyis mi non te/_de lta bu'i mi de ni lha'i gdon gyis dbang du byas pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/lha min gdon gyis zin pa ni/_/yon por blta zhing rang bzhin don/_/lha dang bla ma bram ze dang /_/'jigs med khengs shing dpa' ba
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]dang /_/khro zhing rtsol ba che ba dang /_/da ni drag po khyab 'jug dang /_/skem byed brgya byin yin zhes bshad/_/sha dang chang la dga' zhes bya/_/dri za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/rang sbyod la dga' lus dri zhim/_/snying dga' glu dang gar yang byed/_/
[\[109a.2\]]khrus dang skyed mos tshal la dga'/_/gos phreng byug pa dmar la sred/_/sgeg dang rtsed mo la mngon dga'/_/klu yi gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/mig dmar khro zhing mig 'gyur lta/_/yon por 'gro zhing blta ba dang /_/nyin mtshan dbugs rgod lce las ni/_/kha chu 'dzag
[\[109a.3\]]cing kha 'gram lhag_/bu ram lo ma khrus la dga'/_/kha bub tu ni nyal bar byed/_/gdugs mthong na yang 'jigs pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la klu'i gdon gyis zin pa'i dbang du byas pa'i rtags ni mig dmar zhing khrag gis khyab pa dang /_khro zhing zhe sdang ba'i ngang tshul dang
[\[109a.4\]]ldan pa dang /_'gyur ba med cing mig mi 'gyur bar lta ba dang /_sbrul ltar yon por 'gro ba dang /_g.yo zhing mi brtan pa dang /_nyin dang mtshan du rgyun du dbugs rgod cing 'byin pa dang /_lce skyod cing 'byin pa dang /_kha chu 'dzag pa dang /_mchu gnyis kyi mtshams kyi kha 'gram
[\[109a.5\]]lhag pa dang /_bu ram la dga' ba dang /_'o ma la dga' ba dang /_khrus dang gtsang sbra la dga' ba dang /_/kha bub tu gdong phab ste nyal bar byed pa dang /_gdugs mthong na 'jigs shing skrag par byed pa yin no/_/gnod sbyin gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/mig dmar bgrang cing
[\[109a.6\]]skrag la 'gul/_/lus dri zhim zhing gzi mdangs ldan/_/gtam dang glu dang khrus dang ni/_/phreng ba byug pa la dga' zhing /_/nya yi sha sred dga' ba dang /_/dga' mgu stobs che nad med la/_/lag rtse bskyod cing su zhig la/_/ci zhig sbyin zhes smra bar byed/_/gsang tshig smra zhing sman
[\[109a.7\]]pa dang /_/bram ze la ni brnyas par byed/_/khro ba chung zhing mgyogs 'gro ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni mig dmar ba bgrad cing skrag pa'i tshul du 'gul ba dang /_lus la bsod nams kyi dri zhim po 'byung ba dang /_gzi mdangs bzang po
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]dang ldan pa dang /_gtam la sogs pa la dga' ba dang /_nya'i sha la sred cing mngon par 'dod pa dang /_dga' ba dang mgu ba dang bcas pa dang /_lus kyi stobs che ba dang /_nad med par bde bar gnas pa dang /_lag pa'i rtse mo bskyod cing 'gul ba dang /_/srog chags gang
[\[109b.2\]]zhig la nor la sogs pa ci zhig sbyin par bya zhes smra bar byed pa dang /_gsang zhing sba bar bya ba'i dngos po smra ba byed pa dang /_sman pa dang bram ze la sogs pa la brnyas par byed pa dang /_khro ba chung zhing cung zad tsam khro bar byed pa dang mgyogs par 'gro ba ste/_/mtshan ma de dag dang
[\[109b.3\]]ldan pa yin no/_/tshangs pa srin pos zin pa'i rtags/_/dgod cing gar la dga' ba dang /_/spyod pa gtum zhing glags skabs tshol/_/gshe zhing myur du 'gro ba dang /_/sman pa bram ze lha la sdang /_rang la shing dang mtshon sogs rdeg_/kye zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing /_/bstan
[\[109b.4\]]bcos rig byed 'don pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshangs pa srin po zhes bya 'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni dgod pa la dga' ba dang /_gar byed pa la dga' ba dang /_lus ngag gi spyod pa gtum zhing 'jigs su rung ba dang /_glags skabs tshol zhing dor thabs byed pa dang /_gshe
[\[109b.5\]]zhing tshig ngan pa smra ba dang /_mgyogs par 'gro ba dang /_sman pa la sogs pa la sdang ba dang /_rang gi lus la shing la sogs pas brdeg pa dang /_kye kye zhes 'bod par byed pa dang /_bstan bcos kyi tshig dang /_rig byed kyi tshig 'don cing smra bar byed pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/
[\[109b.6\]]srin po'i gdon gyi zin pa'i rtags/_/khro gnyer bcas shing khro bar lta/_/stobs bag tu ni byed pa dang /_/rdeg cing rab tu rgyug pa dang /_/ngu zhing gdong ni 'jigs rung ston/_/zas ma zos kyang stobs dang ldan/_/gnyid med mtshan mo rgyu ba dang /_/ngo tsha gtsang sbra med cing dpa'/_/
[\[109b.7\]]gdug cing tshig rtsub smra ba dang /_/khro zhing phreng ba dmar po dang /_/bud med sha chang khrag la dga'/_/sha 'am khrag ni mthong ba na/_/mchu ni ldag par byed pa dang /_/zas za'i tshe na dgod pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin po'i gdon gyis zin par gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni dpral bar khro gnyer
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]dang bcas pa'i khro bas lta bar byed pa dang /_brtags shing g.yo ba dang bcas pas rdeg par byed pa dang /_rab tu rgyug cing 'gro ba dang /_skad kyi nga ro chen pos ngu ba dang /_gdong 'jigs su rung ba ston pa dang /_kha zas ma zos kyang lus stobs dang ldan pa
[\[110a.2\]]dang /_gnyid med pa dang /_mtshan mo rgyu zhing 'gro ba la dga' ba dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_gtsang sbra med cing khrus la sogs pa la mi dga' ba dang /_dpa' zhing brtan pa dang /_gdug cing las ngan pa byed pa dang /_tshig rtsub cing rno bar smra ba dang khro zhing 'khrug pa dang /_phreng ba
[\[110a.3\]]dmar po la sogs pa la dga' ba dang /_sha 'am khrag mthong na mchu ldag cing 'jib par byed pa dang /_zas za ba'i tshe dgod par gyur pa ste/_/de lta bu'i mi ni srin po zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa yin par brjod par bya'o/_/sha za'i gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/sems ni bde bar
[\[110a.4\]]mi gnas shing /_/yongs su rgyug par byed pa dang /_/mi gtsang la dga' glu gar dang /_/dgod dang chang dang sha rlon dga'/_/spyos na gdod ni zhum pa dang /_/rgyu med par ni ngu ba dang /_/bdag gnyis sen mos 'brud pa dang /_/khong rtsub lus nyams skad gsang dma'/_sdug bsngal
[\[110a.5\]]ba ni brda sprod cing /_/'brel dang mi 'brel tshig mang smra/_/dran pa nyams zhing gnas stong dga'/_/mi brtan gcer bu dri ma can/_/srang bar 'khyams pa'i gos gyon zhing /_/rtswa yi phreng ba rgyan du thogs/_/shing 'dzeg rta la zhon par byed/_/de bzhin phyag dar thung por 'dzeg_/
[\[110a.6\]]mang du za par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha za'i gdon gyis zin cing dbang du byas pa'i mtshan ma ni sems mal na mi gnas shing sdug bsngal la blo kun du phyogs par yul thams cad rgyug par byed pa dang /_/mi gtsang pa dang sbags pa la dga' ba dang /_glu la sogs pa la
[\[110a.7\]]dga' ba dang /_sbyos shing brgyab na gdong zhum zhum por gyur cing spa bkong ba dang /_gdung ba'i rgyu med par ngu ba dang /_rang nyid kyi lus la sen mos 'brud pa dang khong rtsub cing mdangs nyams la skad 'gag par 'gyur pa dang /_sdug bsngal brda
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]sprod cing smre bar byed pa dang /_/rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i tshig 'brel pa dang mi 'brel pa mang du smra ba dang dran pa nyams shing brgyal ba dang /_skye bo med pa'i gnas stong pa la dga' ba dang /_mi brtan zhing g.yo ba dang /_gcer bur 'dug cing gos med par gnas pa dang /_/dri mas
[\[110b.2\]]sbags pa dang /_srang bar na 'khyam zhing ltung ba'i gos ngan ngon gon pa la dga' ba dang /_rtswa phreng bar lhas rgyan du thogs pa dang shing la 'dzeg pa la sogs pa la dga' ba dang /_kha zas mang du za bar byed pa ste/_/mi de lta bu ni sha za'i gdon gyis brlabs pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/
[\[110b.3\]]yi dgas gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/spyod tshul dri ni yi dgas 'dra/_/sdar zhing zas la mi dga' dang /_/rtsa gcod byed pa zhes kyang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi yi dgas kyi gdon gyis brlabs pa'i rtags sam mtshan ma ni spyod pa dang dbyibs dang /_dri yi dgas dang 'dra ba dang
[\[110b.4\]]sdar zhing 'jigs pa dang /_kha zas mi dga' ba dang /_rtsa gcod par byed pa yin no/_/grul bum gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/tshig mang smra zhing kha gdong gnag_/dal gyis 'gro bar byed pa dang /_/rlig pa skrang zhing 'phyang ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi grul bum gyi gdon
[\[110b.5\]]gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni tshig 'brel pa dang mi 'brel pa dang mang du smra ba dang kha gdong gi mdog gnag pa dang /_rang gi gnas na dal gyis 'gro zhing 'khyams pa dang /_rlig pa skrangs pa dang bcas shing shas cher 'phyang ba yin no/_mi ni byed stems zin pa'i rtags/_/shing dang bong
[\[110b.6\]]ba sogs thogs shing /_/tshal pa gyon te 'gro ba dang /_/gcer bur rgyug cing 'jigs bag tu/_/lta la rtsa yi rgyan du byed/_/dur khrod gnas ni stong pa dang /_/srang bar shing gcig brten pa dang /_/til zas sha dang chang la ni/_/rtag tu mig ni tshag pa dang /_/tshig rtsub de ni smra
[\[110b.7\]]ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi byad stems zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni shing la sogs pa thogs shing /_gos kyi tshal pa dum bur gyon te/_'gro ba la dga' ba dang /_gcer bur 'gro ba dang /_'jigs shing rta bas bag tu lta ba dang rtsa'i rgyan thogs pa dang /_dur khrod
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]la sogs par brten cing 'dug par dga' ba dang /_til la sogs pa la dga' zhing rtag tu de la lta ba dang /_tshig rtsub par smra ba ste/_de lta bu ni byad stems kyi gdon gyis zin pa yin no/_/zhes brjod par bya'o/_/g.yengs byed kyis ni zin pa'i rtags/_/
[\[111a.2\]]chu 'dod zas ni mi slong dang /_/dngangs shing mig ni dmar ba dang /_/tshig rtsub smra ba shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi g.yengs byed ces bya ba'i gdom gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni rtag tu chu 'dod cing slong gi zas slong bar mi byed pa dang /_dngang bag dang bcas pa'i mig dmar pos
[\[111a.3\]]lta ba dang tsig rtsub cing gzhan la gnod par smra ba yin no/_/ro langs gdon gyis zin pa'i rtags/_/dri dang phreng ba la dga' zhing /_/tshig bden smra la yongs su 'dar/_/gnyid che bar ni shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi ro langs zhes bya ba'i gdon gyis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni/
[\[111a.4\]]dri dang phreng ba bsten par dga' ba dang dam bcas pa la brten cing tshig bden par smra ba dang lus 'dar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin par shes par bya'o/_/yi dgas mchu na lta'i gdon gyi rtags/_/mig ni gsal zhing bzhin ras zhum/_/rkan ni skam par byed pa dang /_/mig
[\[111a.5\]]dang rdzi ma skyod pa dang /_/gnyid che me drod chung ba dang /_/g.yon phyogs nas ni gos gon zhing /_/sha dang bu ram til la dga'/_/tshig 'khrul ba ni yin zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yi dgas mtshun lha zhes bya ba nye du shi ba las gdon du gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni mig mi gsal zhing rab rib tu
[\[111a.6\]]'gyur ba dang bzhin ras zhum zhing gsang dma' ba dang /_rkan gyi phyogs skam pa dang /_/mig gi rdzi ma g.yo ba dang gnyid che ba nas tshig 'khrul zhing cal col du smra ba'i bar gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan par shes par bya'o/_/bla ma drang srong rgan dang drug_/dmod pa sems kyi rjes mthun pa/_/
[\[111a.7\]]spyod lam kha zas rang bzhin la/_/ci 'dra gdon ni de yin bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_bla ma dang rgan po la sogs pa bzhi po dag gi gdon gyis zin pa ni dmod pa btab pa dang sems kyis bsam pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang /_de bzhin du de'i spyod lam dang kha zas kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra ba las gdon
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]yang de 'dra ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/gzhon nu'i tshogs kyi rjes 'brang zhing /_/gcer bu skra ni gyen du brdzes/_/yid mi bde zhing dus yun ring /_/gyur pa'i gdon de 'ang spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_byis pa gzhon nu'i tshogs kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rgyu ba dang gcer bur gnas shing skra
[\[111b.2\]]gyen du brdzes pa dang yid mi bde zhing sems gnod par 'gyur ba dang /_gdon gyis zin nas dus yun ring por lon pa'i gdon dang bcas pa de ni gsor mi rung bas yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_/slob dpon
[\[111b.3\]]zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_/phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas gdon nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang du gdon gyis zin pa'i nad gso ba ston pa'i le'u gang yin pa de bshad par bya'o/_/zhes ba'o/_/'byung po
[\[111b.4\]]'tshe ba mi 'dod dang /_/bzlas dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang /_/brtul zhugs tshul khrims mnyam 'jog dang /_/sbyin zhes brtse ba sogs pas bsal/_/zhes bya ba la/_'byung po'i gdon ni gzhan la 'tshe zhing srog gcod pa mi 'dod pa dang gtor ma 'dod pa dang /_'dod pa'i dga' ba
[\[111b.5\]]'dod pa'i gdon gsor mi rung ba dag ni bzlas pa la sogs pa dang brtul zhugs kyi dka' thub dang /_tshul khrims la sogs pa bsten pas de bsal zhing gzhom par bya'o/_/shing kun ba la tsha ba gsum/_/gla rtsi sgog skya a rga'i rtsa/_/spang spos a za lo mi dang /_la ba 'bam po ku ku
[\[111b.6\]]ti/_/shu dag gan+d+ha pri yang ku/_/sar pa gan da til dang ni/_/ka ka an da ram nye ba/_/snu ha kar ka ta shing gi_/sle tres ma hA na ba li/_/yungs kar dang ni lig bu mig_/gdon 'joms sman ni gzhan dag dang /_/bong bu rta dang khyi dang lug_/rnga mo khra dang dred dang ni/_/sre mo reg
[\[111b.7\]]'jom byi la gung /_/ba glang seng ge stag dang ni/_/rgya mtsho yi ni srog chags kyi/_/pags pa mkhris pa sen mo so/_/sde tshan 'di dang mar rnying ngam/_/til mar dag ni bskol ba dang /_btung dang snar ni blugs pa dang /_/bsku ba'i don du sbyar bya zhing /_/'di dag phye mas bdug pa bya/_/zhes
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]bya ba la/_shing kun la sogs pa'i sman gyi sde tshan 'di dang mar rnying pa 'am til mar bskol te mar ram til mar te btung ba dang /_sna nas btang pa dang lus la bsku ba'i don du sbyar bar bya ba dang /_/de bzhin du sman 'di dag gi phye ma'i dud pas bdug pa yang sbyar bar
[\[112a.2\]]bya'o/_/cha ba gsum ni pi pi ling la sogs pa'o/_/gla rtsi ni ne pa li ste la la ni ne pa li zhes bya ba gla rtsi ma yin gyi skabs 'dir ldong ros la bya'o/_/zhes zer ro/_/arka'i rtsa ba ni shing arka'i rtsa ba'o/_/a za lo mi ni mi sha byi lo can zhes bya ba'i sman no/_/la ba ni go ro mi'o/_/'bam po ni
[\[112a.3\]]'bu ta ke shi'o/_/ku ku ti ni lag mna'o/_/gan+d+ha pri yang ku ni la tA zhes bya ba'o/_/sar pa gan da ni gan da na gu li'o/_/ka kan da ni ka na'o/_/smu ha ni shrI khaN+Da'i shing ngo /_/sle tres ni gu rtse'o/_/gdon 'joms sman ni gdon sel ba'i sman la sogs pa ji snyed pa'o/_/bong bu la sogs
[\[112a.4\]]pa'i pags pa la sogs pa ji snyed pa gzhug par bya'o/_/'di yi ri lu byas nas ni/_/mig sman sna sman bya ba dang /_/'di yi lde gus byug pa dang /_/bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing kun la sogs pa'i sman gyi sde tshan 'di dag ri lur byas nas/_mig sman du
[\[112a.5\]]bya ba dang /_sna nas gtang ba dang /_yang shing kun la sogs pa'i sman 'di dag gi lde gus lus la byug pa dang /_yang sman de dag bskol ba'i khu bas lus la blugs par bya'o/_/sbyor ba 'dis ni smyo byed dang /_/brjed byed bcas pa'i gdon zhi byed/_/ces bya ba la/_shing kun la
[\[112a.6\]]sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'dis ni smyo byed dang brjed byed kyi gdon gang dag yin pa de zhi zhing med par 'gyur ro/_/yungs kar ha ti bi pi ling /_/pi pi ling rtsa tsha ba gsum/_/skyu ru ra dang go da dang /_/sre mo byi la dza sha yi/_/mkhris pa dang btags sna sman dang /_/bsku byug byugs sogs byas
[\[112a.7\]]gdon 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_yungs kar la sogs pa'i sman srog chags go da la sogs pa'i mkhris pa dang btags te/_sna sman la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas na yang smyo byed la sogs pa'i gdon 'joms par byed do/_/yungs kar shing kun shu dag dang /_/pri yang ku dang
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]ser po gnyis/_/gi ri kar ni dkar nag gnyis/_/'bras bu gsum dang shwe ta dang /_/nim pa'i lo ma karany+dza/_/shri sha gnyis dang sa bon dang /_/thang shing dang ni tsha ba gsum/_/mar dang ba gcin de'i bzhi 'gyur/_/bskol ba don grub ces bya ste/_/btung dang snar blugs pa sbyar na/_/
[\[112b.2\]]gdon ni thams cad myur 'joms byed/_/mchog tu lha min gdon sel byed/_/brjed byed dug dang bkra mi shis/_/smyo byed gshed byed rims rnams 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_yungs kar dang shu dag la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa dang /_mar dang mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi ba
[\[112b.3\]]gcin dang /_bskol ba'i sman mar ni ming don grub ces bya ste/_de btung ba la sogs par sbyar na gdon thams cad myur du 'joms par byed de/_mchog gam khyad par du lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams 'joms par byed la/_de bzhin du brjed byed nas rims kyi bar yang 'joms par byed pa
[\[112b.4\]]yin no/_/sman te nyid ni ra thug gi_gcin dang sbyar te blud pa dang /_/snar blugs mig sman byug pa dang /_/khrus dang dril ba las sbyar ba/_/sngar bshad yon tan dang 'dra zhing /_/rgyal po'i sgor yang don grub byed/_/ces bya ba la/_yungs kar la sogs pa'i sman 'di dag nyid ra thug
[\[112b.5\]]gi gcin dang sbyar te lde gur byas la blud pa la sogs par sbyar na gdon thams cad 'joms pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i yon tan dang ldan zhing de bzhin du rgyal po'i sgor yang don grub par byed pa yin no/_/yungs kar shu dag tsha ba gsum/_/a shwo gan+d+ha ser po gnyis/_/shing kun kun
[\[112b.6\]]dong rtsa ba dang /_/ka rany+dza yi sa bon dang /_/shi ri sha yi me tog dang /_/ka pid tha yi 'bras bu dang /_/rgyam tsha ru rta rgya spos dang /_/gi ri kar ni dkar po dang /_/so na ka yi rtsa bar bcas/_/ra gcin dag dang legs bsgos shing /_/ba glang mkhris pa bu ram dang /_/ri lur byas pa'i
[\[112b.7\]]sbyor ba de/_/mig bskus snar blugs bsku byas na/_/smyo byed rma ni red pa dang /_/mtshan mo mi mthong mun thibs byed/_/bgegs dang lus chur nub par brgyal/_/dug bskus mda' yis phog pa dang /_/gdug pa'i sbrul gyis zin pa sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_ser po gnyis ni yung
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]ba dang /_/skyer pa'o/_/kun dong rtsa ba ni sgog pa kun dong zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba'o/_/gzhan dag ni go bar zad de/_sman de dag thams cad ra gcin dang legs par spangs shing bsrel la de'i 'og tu ba glang gi mkhris pa dang bu ram dang sbyar te ri lur byas pa'i
[\[113a.2\]]sbyor ba de mig tu bsku ba dang /_snar blugs pa dang /_/lus la bskus na smyo byed la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/ras bal sa bon rma bya'i sgro/_/me tog sman ma bri ha ti/_/shing tsha spang spos po son cha/_/byi la'i rtug pa phub ma dang /_/shu dag mi skra sbrul lpags dang /_/glang po'i
[\[113a.3\]]so dang glang gi rwa/_/shing kun dang ni na le sham/_/cha mnyam bdugs par byas pa yis/_/skem byed smyo byed sha za'i rigs/_/srin po lha yi gdon 'joms mchog_/ces bya ba la/_ras bal gyi sa bon la sogs pa'i sman 'di rnams cha snyoms te sbyar ba'i dud pas bdugs na skem byed la sogs
[\[113a.4\]]pa'i gdon sel bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/skem byed ni gzhon nu'i gdon yin no/_/gan+d+ha b+ha dra tsha ba gsum/_/gur gum pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/kaN+Da ka ri skyer pa dang /_/thang shing dang ni yungs kar gnyis/_/pa la dkar dang dug mo yungs/_/tsan+dan dkar po rgyam tsha dang /_/'bras bu gsum
[\[113a.5\]]dang pu shel tse/_/shu dag spangs ma pu tse shel/_/tsan+dan dmar po ba la dang /_/shing mngar sug smil ldong ros dang /_/shug pa rgya spos shri pa sa/_/ma du ka yi snying po dang /_/bong nga gnyis po pri yang ku/_/dbyi mo ru rta skyer khaN+Da/_/cha snyoms zhib btags lde gu dang /_/mar rnying gcin kun
[\[113a.6\]]cha snyoms bskol/_/gdon khus 'debs zhes bya bar brjod/_/de blud gdon 'joms mchog yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_yungs kar gnyis ni yungs kar ser po dang dmar po'i mdog gis phye ba'o/_/ba la ka ni am pu'o/_/tsan+dan dmar po ni lohi ta ste/_la la dag tsan+dan dmar po ma
[\[113a.7\]]yin gyi btsod la bya'o zhes kyang zer ro/_/shri be ta ni shri pa sa'o/_ma du ka'i snying po ni ma du ka'i me tog gam/_shing ma du ka'i dbus kyi cha na yod pa'o/_/pri yang ku ni gan+d+ha pri yang ku'o/_/bong nga gnyis ni bong nga dkar bo dang nag po'o/_/gzhan dag ni go bar zad de/_/sman de dag thams cad
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]cha snyoms te/_zhib tu btags pa'i lde gu dang mar rnying pa dang /_gcin brgyad po kun cha snyoms te mar ji tsam yod pa gcin re re yang de tsam du byas dang bsres te bskol pa'i sman mar ni gdon khus 'debs zhes slob dpon gyis bshad de blud cing bsku ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas na gdon
[\[113b.2\]]thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog yin no/_/rgya spos shing mngar ka rany+dza/_/rgya skyegs da ta pa to la/_/shu dag shing kun pa ta la/_/yungs kar kaN+Da ka ri dang /_/ser po gnyis dang pu tse shel/_/rgya shug gan+d+ha pri yang ku/_/tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/_/thang shing sle tres byi dang
[\[113b.3\]]ga/_/ko sha ta ki ka kan dang /_/shi kru nim pa dug mo yungs/_/shing sha'i me tog sa bon dang /_/gla sgang ru rta dan da dang /_/gi ri kar Ni tsi tra ga_/bil ba cha mnyam lde gur byas/_/mar rnying can gyi sde tshan bcas/_/bskol te yun ring gzhag pa ste/_/khus 'debs chen po zhes bshad de/_/
[\[113b.4\]]rim pa kun gyis sbyar na ni/_/gdon rnams kun dang smyo byed dang /_/mdze dang rims ni myur du 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgya spos ni ta ka ru'o/_/ser po gnyis ni yung ba dang skyer pa'o/_/rgya shug ni rgya shug skyur po'o/_/ka kan da ni ma ha ka'i 'bras bu'o/_/shi kru ni so ban dza na'o/_/gzhan
[\[113b.5\]]dag ni go bar zad de sman de dag thams cad cha snyoms te lde gur byas pa dang /_mar rnying pa dang gcin gyi sde tshan chang gi sde tshan gyi nang nas bshad pa'i gcin brgyad po dang bcas par bskol te dus yun ring por gzhag pa'i rnying pa de ni khus 'debs chen po'i sman mar zhes bya ste/_de rim pa kun gyis
[\[113b.6\]]zhes pa btung ba dang /_snar blugs pa dang /_bsku ba dang sbyar na gdon gyi nad thams cad dang smyo byed dang /_/mdze'i nad rims la sogs pa myur du 'joms par byed do/_/gdon ni nyi ma gang gang la/_/'dzin pa'i nyi ma de dang der/_mchog tu sbyin sreg gtor ma sogs/_/sman pas rab
[\[113b.7\]]tu 'bad de bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdon gang zhig nyin zhag gang la 'dzin par byed pa'i nyi ma zhag de la sbyin sreg dang gtor ma la sogs pa gdon bzlog pa'i thabs sman pas 'bad de sbyar te bya'o/_/khrus dang gos dang sha dang tshil/_/chang dang mar dang bu ram sogs/_/gang zhig gang la sred
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]gyur pa/_/de'i tshe de ni de la sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdon gang zhig khrus la sogs pa gang zhig la sred cing 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe gdon de la khrus la sogs pa dag sbyin par bya'o/_/rin chen dri dang phreng ba dang /_/sa bon mar dang sbrang rtsi dang /_/zas kun kun la
[\[114a.2\]]sbyin bya ste/_/'di ni spyi yi cho ga'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdon thams cad la rin chen te rdo rje dang baiDUr+ya dang /_ma rgad dang /_gser la sogs pa dang /_dri zhim pa sbyar ba'i dri dang /_sna ma'i me tog la sogs pa'i me tog dri zhim pa'i phreng ba dang sa bon de'i sran mud ga dang /_mon sran gre'u
[\[114a.3\]]la sogs pa dang /_mar dang sbrang rtsi dang la du la sogs pa'i zas kun gdon thams cad la sbyin par bya ste/_cho ga 'di ni spyi'i thun mong gi cho ga yin no/_/zhes bya ba'i don no/_/lha dang drang srong bla ma rgan/_/grub la lha yi gnas su sbyin/_/der yang lha yi gdon la ni/_/byang gi phyogs
[\[114a.4\]]su gtor ma sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lha la sogs pa'i gdon lnga po dag la ni lha'i gnas te/_lha gnas pa'i khang par gtor ma sbyin par bya la/_der yang lha'i gdon la ni byang gi phyogs su gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/_/lha min gdon la ci 'dod par/_/mtshams kyi gnas su nub tu sbyin/_/zhes
[\[114a.5\]]bya ba la/_lha ma yin gyi gdon la ni ci ltar 'dod par grong gi mtshams zhes bya bar grong ngam yul gyi phyi rol du nub phyogs su sbyin par bya'o/_/dri za'i gdon ni ba glang ngam/_/gos dang rgyan bcas gtor ma sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dri za'i gdon la ni ba glang rgyu ba'i lam du gos dang rgyan dang
[\[114a.6\]]bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/_/mtshun lha klu gdon 'bab chu'i 'gram/_/klu la shar lho'i mtshams su sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshun lha'i gdon dang /_klu'i gdon la ni 'bab chu'i 'gram du gtor ma sbyin par bya la/_de las kyang klu'i gdon la ni shar lho'i mtshams su gnas te gtor
[\[114a.7\]]ma sbyin par bya'o/_/gnod sbyin rang gi gnas sam ni/_/chu gnyis 'dus pa'i gnas su sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnod sbyin gyi gdon la ni/_gdon sbyin gyi gnas su byas pa'am/_yang na chu bo gnyis 'dus pa'i gnas su gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/_/srin po lam gyi bzhi 'do'am/_/tshang tshing
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]'jigs su rung bar sbyin/_/srin po'i lho'i phyogs su sbyin/_/tshangs pa'i srin po shar du sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin po dang tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon gnyis la ni lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am/_nags kyi tshang tshing 'jigs su rung bar gtor ma sbyin par bya la/_de las kyang srin bo'i gdon la ni lho phyogs su sbyin par bya la
[\[114b.2\]]tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon la ni shar phyogs su gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/_/sha za ni khang stong du/_/nub phyogs su ni gnas te sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha za'i gdon la ni khang stong du nub phyogs su gnas te gtor ma sbyin bar bya'o/_/phreng ba gtsang zhing dkar po dang /_/dri dang 'o thug 'bras chan dang /_/zho dang gdugs
[\[114b.3\]]ni dkar po yi/_/lha rnams kyi ni gtor mar 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_lha'i gdon la ni phreng ba gtsang zhing dkar ba dang /_a ka ru la sogs pa'i dri dang /_'o thug dang 'bras chan dang zho dang gdugs dkar po'i gtor ma bshams shing 'dod pa yin no/_/shing kun yungs kar shu dag dang /_/tsha ba gsum ni srang phyed phyed/
[\[114b.4\]]mar bre gang dang ba yi gcin/_/bzhi 'gyur dang ni lhan cig bskol/_/der btung snar blugs bskus pa yis/_/lha'i gdon las thar bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar gtor ma byin yang ma zhi na sman gyi sbyor ba bya ba ni shing kun la sogs pa'i sman srang phyed phyed dang /_/mar bre gang dang /_ba'i gcin bre bzhi dang lhan cig bskol la
[\[114b.5\]]mar de btung ba la sogs par sbyar na lha'i gdon las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/shu dag shing kun sgog skya rnams/_/ra gcin sbyar ba snar blugs dang /_mig bskus lha yi gdon las thar/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan yang shu dag la sogs pa'i sman ra gcin dang sbyar te sna sman la sogs pa byas na yang lha'i gdon las thar
[\[114b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/lha min gtor ma 'bras bu ni/_/mang po dag dang pu shel tse/_/zhes bya ba la/_lha ma yin gyi gdon la ni gtor ma 'bras bu shing thog la sogs pa mang ba dang /_de bzhin du pu shel tse dang pad+ma dang /_u t+pal dang bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/_/klu yi gdon la dzA ti dang /_/'bras yos bu ram snum khur
[\[114b.7\]]dang /_/'bras chan bu ram bcas pa dang /_/zas mchog sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang /_/sa na ga nA ga ge sar dang /_/shu dag pad+ma pu shel tse/_/u t+pal pad+ma dmar po yi/_/'dab mar bcas pa'i gtor ma byin/_/zhes bya bal/_klu'i gdon la ni/_dzA ti zhes bya ba'i sna ma'i me tog dang /_'bras yos la sogs pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya ste
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]snum khur dang 'bras chen gnyis ka yang bu ram dang bcas par bya ba dang /_zas mchog ces bya ba 'o thug dang sa nag ni sor shi ta zhes bya'o/_/seng phrom 'o ma dkar po dang /_/rgya spos nA ga ge sar dang /_/yungs kar chu grang la btags pas/_/snar blugs mig la bskus pa'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_seng
[\[115a.2\]]phrom 'o ma dkar po yod pa dang rgya spos la sogs pa dang yungs kar dkar po'i chu grang la btags te snar blugs pa dang mig sman du byas na yang klu'i gdon kyis zin pa la phan zhing thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gnod sbyin gdon la 'o ma zho/_/mar dang 'bras chan bsras pa dang /_/gu gul pad+ma
[\[115a.3\]]thang shing dang /_/pu shel tse dang gos dang gser/_/dbyig ni gtor ma sbyin par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnod sbyin gyi gdon la ni 'o ma la sogs pa'i gtong ma sbyin par bya'o/_/gser dang dbyig ni bzor byas pa dang ma byas pa'i dbye bas tha dad bar shes par bya'o/_/rgyan la sogs
[\[115a.4\]]ba byas pa ni dbyig ces bya'o/_/mar dang 'o ma ba gcin ni/_/cha snyoms bskol ba btung ba dang /_/snar blugs lus la bskus na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_mar la sogs pa gsum po cha snyoms te bskol la blud pa la sogs pa byas na yang gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyis zin pa la phan no/
[\[115a.5\]]a ru ra dang ser po gnyis/_/sgog skya shu dag na le sham/_/nim pa'i 'o mar gcin btags/_/lde gus sna sman mig sman bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_a ru ra la sogs pa'i sman ra gcin dang btags pa'i lde gu btsir ba sna sman la sogs pa byas na yang gnod gyis zin
[\[115a.6\]]pa la phan no/_/tshangs pa srin po'i gtor ma ni/_/nas bre bzhi ni btsos pa yi/_/chu bre bcu drug til btags bsres/_/gdugs dang gos dang byug pa sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshangs pa srin po'i gdon la ni nas bre bzhi btsos pa'i chan gyi gtor ma dang /_de bzhin du chu bre bcu
[\[115a.7\]]drug dang til mar btags pa bsres pa'i dang gdugs dang gos kyi rnam pa'i dang /_gur kum la sogs pa'i byug pa sbyin par bya'o/_/seng ldeng srang ni nyi shu dang /_/tsha ba gsum dang 'bras bu gsum/_/shing kun shu dag shu ti dang /_/yungs kar nim pa'i lo mar bcas/_/
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]sgog skya srang ni phyed phyed dang /_/zhun mar phul ni bdun dag dang /_/ba gcin sum 'gyur bskol ba de/_/btung dang snar blugs bskus na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_seng ldeng srang nyi shu bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du tsha ba gsum la sogs pa srang phyed phyed lde gur byas pa dang /_/zhun
[\[115b.2\]]mar phul bdun dang ba gcin mar gyi sum 'gyur lhan cig bsres te bskol la sman mar de btung ba la sogs par btang yang tshangs pa srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa la phan no/_/srin po'i gdon la til phye dang /_/me tog dkar po 'bras chan 'dres/_/sha btsos rjen pa nim pa ba/_/
[\[115b.3\]]khrag dang bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin po'o gdon la ni til gyi phye ma dang me tog dkar po dang 'bras chan 'dres ma ste/_'bras chan dang mu dag la sogs pa'i chan dang /_/sha btsos pa dang rjen pa dang nim pa zhes bya ba rtsa 'bru'i rnam pa dang /_khrag gi gtor ma
[\[115b.4\]]sbyin par bya'o/_/nag ta ma la shi ri sha/_/shun lpags me tog 'bras bu dang /_/de bzhin pa ta la nag po/_/pil ba'i rtsa ba tsha ba gsum/_/shing kun yungs kar dug mo nyung /_/sgog skya skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu/_/ra gcin dang ni sbyar ba'i sman/_/snar blugs mig tu byugs na phan/_/
[\[115b.5\]]zhes bya ba la/_nag ta ma la sogs pa'i sman ra gcin dang sbyar ba'i sna sman dang mig sman btang na srin po'i gdon gyis btab pa las thar par 'gyur ro/_/'di dag nyid dang mar gyi ni/_/bzhi 'gyur ba gcin bskol ba ni/_/btung dang snar blugs bskus pa yis/_/srin po'i
[\[115b.6\]]gdon ni zlog par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nag ta ma la dang shri sha'i shun lpags dang me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pa'i sman 'di dag nyid dang mar dang mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi ba gcin dang bskol ba'i sman mar btung ba la sogs ba'i sbyor ba byas na yang srin po'i gdon sel
[\[115b.7\]]bar byed do/_/sha za la ni bu ram chang /_/til tshigs til gyi phye ma zho/_/la phug lan tshwa phye zan mar/_/'byung bor 'bras chen gtor ma sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha za'i gdon la ni bu ram chang la sogs pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/_/til gyi tshigs ma ni 'ba' cha'o/_/
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]'gyur pa'i 'bras chen ni 'bras chan 'dres ma'o/_/la la ni 'byung po'i 'bras chen zhes mi bya'i/_'byung po'i kha zas zhes bya ste/_de ni khrag yin no/_/phye zan ni nas kyi chan no/_/ser po rnam gnyis lan tshwa btsod/_/shu ti dong gra pri yang ku/_/shing
[\[116a.2\]]kun sgog skya tsha ba gsu/_/'bras bu gsum dang ba ta li/_/shu dag gi ri kar ni dkar/_/shi ri sha yi me tog mar/_/ba gcin bzhi cha bcas par bskol/_/btung dang bsku ba byas na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_ser po rnam gnyis la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /_mar dang
[\[116a.3\]]ba gcin gyi bzhi cha dang bcas par bsre/_ba gcin mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang bskol ba'i mar btung ba la sogs par byas na sha za'i gdon gyis zin pa la yang phan no/_/yang na de nyid ra gcin btags/_/mig bskus snar ni blugs na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na ser po rnam
[\[116a.4\]]gnyis la sogs pa'i sman de nyid dang ra gcin dang lhan cig btags te lde gur byas pa mig tu bskus shing snar blugs na yang sha za'i gdon gyis zin pa la yang phan no/_/lha dang drang srong mtshun lha dang /_/dri za'i gdon la sna sman sogs/_/rnon po gtang bar mi bya zhing /_/'di la
[\[116a.5\]]zhun mar btung la sogs/_/sman ni 'jam por spyad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lha la sogs pa'i gdon bzhi po la ni sna sman la sogs pa rno zhing drag pa gtang bar mi bya'o/_lha la sogs pa'i gdon 'di la zhun mar dang btung ba la sogs pa'i sman 'jam po gang yin pa de spyad cing
[\[116a.6\]]gtang bar bya'o/_/sha za ma gtogs thams cad la/_/mi mthun sbyin par mi bya ste/_/mthu stobs che ba de khros na/_/nad pa sman par bcas gsod byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sha za'i gdon ma gtogs pa gdon thams cad la mi mthun zhing de la gnod par 'gyur ba ci yang sbyin zhing spyad
[\[116a.7\]]par mi bya ste/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_de rnams ni mthu stobs che zhing nus pa dang ldan pa yin pas lha la sogs pa'i gdon de dag la mi mthun pas spyad na khros zhing 'khrugs nas nad pa sman pa dang bcas pa gsod par byed par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/mgon
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]po phyag ni bcu gnyis pa/_/nad kun gso par mdzad pa yi/_/sngags bzlas na ni nad kun sel/_/de bzhin smyo byed brjed byed dang /_/gzhan yang sems 'khrul byed pa 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_'phags pa spyam ras gzigs dbang phyug sems can thams cad kyi mgon du gyur
[\[116b.2\]]pa/_lha'i yang lha phyag bcu gnyis pa nad thams cad gso bar mdzad pa'i sngags ji skad bshad pa dag bzlas na yang gdon thams cad dang brjed byed la sogs pa 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/rigs sngags rgyal mo rma bya che/_/gtsang byas de la rtag tu bsgrags/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang
[\[116b.3\]]na nad pa de khrus dang gtsang sbra byas la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i sngags dus thams cad du de'i rna bar bsgrags shing bzlas na yang gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/'byung bo'i bdag po lha chen dang /_/de yi 'khor gyi tshogs mchod cing /_/de yi sngags grub
[\[116b.4\]]bzlas na yang /_/gdon ni thams cad 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_'byung bo'i gdon rnams kyi legs ldan lha chen po mchod par bya ba dang /_/de bzhin du de'i 'khor gyi tshogs 'joms byed rnams mchod pa dang /_de'i sngags grub zin pa bzlas par gyur na yang gdon
[\[116b.5\]]thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/gang yang 'og nas bshad pa yi/_/le'u gnyis las smos pa dang /_/gang 'dir bshad pa de dag kun/_/phan tshun sbyor ba byas na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang 'di'i 'og nas bshad pa'i le'u gnyis po smyo byed dang brjed byed ces bya ba'i nad gso ba
[\[116b.6\]]la smos pa dang /_/gang le'u 'di las bshad pa' de dag thams cad ni phan tshun 'dres mar sbyar zhing sbyor ba byas na phan no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi
[\[116b.7\]]le'u lnga ba'i rnam par 'grel pa'o/_/de nas smyo byed gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdon gyi gso ba las smyo byed dang brjed byed kyi gso ba logs shig tu byas pa ni brjod pa mang ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/smyo byed nad gzhi re re dang /_/'dus sogs dug las
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]gyur pa drug_/ces bya ba la/_smyo byed ni rnams pa drug ste/_/rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi re re las gyur pa gsum dang 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang /_sogs pa smos pas sems kyi gdung ba las gyur pa gcig dang /_dug las gyur pa ste drug go/_/smyo byed
[\[117a.2\]]ces bya lus dang ni/_/sems kyi nad lam log pa ru/_/zhugs pas smyos par gyur pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_smyo byed ces bya ba ni gang lus dang sems kyi nad lam log par gyur pas yid myos shing ma rtags pa nyid du myos par gyur pa de la myos shing brgyal ba zhes bya'o/_/bza' btung gnod
[\[117a.3\]]pa dag dang ni/_/snying dang ma goms dri mar bcas/_/ma snyoms pa ni bsten pa dang /_/yid zhum snying stobs chung ba dang /_/rid cing spyod pa ma snyoms dang /_/mchod 'os mchod par mi byed dang /_/sems las kyis ni sems nyams dang /_/dug
[\[117a.4\]]dang nye ba'i dug las gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_bza' ba dang btung ba gnod par gyur pa dag gis lus dang sems kyi nad skyed pa dang /_/de bzhin du zas skom rnying pa lo lon pa dang /_/sngar ma goms pa dang /_/dri ma can du gyur pa dang /_zas skom ma snyoms pa bsten pa dang /_/de bzhin
[\[117a.5\]]du yid zhum zhing mi dga' ba dang snying stobs chung zhing nad kyi khyad par gyis 'khrugs pa dang /_lus rid cing nyam chung ba dang /_/spyod pa drag dal ma snyoms pa dang /_/mchod par 'os pa lha dang bla ma la sogs pa mchod par mi byed pa dang /_/sems las kyis yid la gnod par byed pa
[\[117a.6\]]dang /_sems nyams shing ma rungs par gyur pa dang /_/de bzhin du dug dang nye ba'i dug sbyar ba'i dug la sogs pa las smyo byed kyi nad du gyur pa yin no/_/'di yis snying stobs zhan pa yi/_/snying gi nad la gnod byas te/_/blo ni dri ma can byas te/_/yid rgyu ba yi lam bkag nas/_/smyo byed
[\[117a.7\]]dag ni skyed par byed/_/de yis blo dang rnam shes dang /_/dran pa 'khrul zhing lus kyi ni/_/bde dang sdug bsngal las nyams te/_/shing rta kha lo sgyur ba ni/_/med pa lta bur rtsom pa ni/_/kun kyang bsam pa med par spyod/_/ces bya ba la/_sngar bshad pa'i bza' ba dang
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]btung ba gnod pa la sogs pa'i nad kyis snying la gnod par byas te/_blo dri ma'i rnyog ma can du byas te/_yid rgyu ba'i rtsa sbubs kyi lam bkag nas smyo byed kyi nad skyed par byed pa yin la/_smyo byed des blo la sogs pa 'khrug cing 'khrugs pa dang lus kyi bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal las
[\[117b.2\]]nyams shing /_tshor ba med de thams cad du bsam pa med pa kho nar spyod pa ni dper na ji ltar shing rta kha lo sgyur ba'i skyes bu med pa dang phyogs med par 'khyams pa lta bur 'gyur ro/_/de la rlung gyur lus sbegs shing /_/rgyu med ngu zhing tshig rtsub smra/_/dgod dang 'dzum dang gar byed dang
[\[117b.3\]]glu len rol mo byed pa dang /_/lus skyod pheg ni rdob pa dang /_/gling bu pi wang la sogs kyi/_/sgra yi lad mo yang yang zlo/_/rgyun du kha nas sbu ba 'dzag_/phan tshun rgyug cing mang du smra/_/rgyan min pas ni rgyan du byed/_/bzhon pa min par 'gro bar rtsom/_/kha zas la ni gdu
[\[117b.4\]]bar byed/_/de rnyed na ni mi 'odad byed/_/mig zlum mig ni dmar ba dang /_/kha zas zhu nus nad ldang 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la rlung las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni lus sbegs shing rid pa dang /_rgyu med par ngu ba nas pheg rdob pa'i bar du byed de/_rgyu med pa ni gnas skabs ma yin
[\[117b.5\]]pa ste/_gang du ngu ba la sogs pa'i bya ba'i rigs pa dag la ni mi byed la/_mi byed par rigs pa dag la ni byed pa'o/_/'dzum pa ni chung zad dgod pa'o/_/gling bu la sogs pa'i lad mo byed pa na de dang rjes su mthun par byed pa'o/_/rgyan ma yin pa ni rtsa shing la sogs pa ste/
[\[117b.6\]]des rgyan du byed pa'o/_/bzhon pa ma yin pa ni shing las byas pa'i rta la sogs pas 'gro bar rtsom pa'o/_/kha zas la gdu ba ni zas skom la sogs pa la chags pa'o/_/rnyed na mi 'dod pa ni de la mngon par mi dga' ba'o/_/kha zas zhu nas nad ldang ba ni/_nad de stobs can du
[\[117b.7\]]'gyur ba'o/_/gzhan dag ni go bar zad do/_/mkhris las spyo zhing khro ba dang /_/khu tshur bong bas rdeg cing rgyug_/grib ma chu ni grang mo 'dod/_/gcig pu 'dug cing lus mdog ser/_/med par me ni 'bar ba dang /_/skar ma mar me mthong ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la/
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]mkhris pa las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni gzhan dag la tshig ngan pas sbyo ba dang /_khro zhing 'khrug pa dang /_khu tshur la sogs pas rdeg cing 'gro ba dang /_btsog pa dang /_sa phyogs gang na me 'bar ba la sogs pa med bzhin du me'i phung po la sogs pa mthong ba
[\[118a.2\]]yin no/_/bad kan slon zhing yi ga 'chus/_/kha zas rtsol dang smra ba nyung /_/bud med 'dod cing dben la dga'/_/khu chu snabs ni 'dzag pa dang /_/'jigs rung gtsang sbra la mi dga'/_/gnyid che gdong ni skrang ba dang /_/nub mo shas cher smyo ba dang /_/zos ma thag tu
[\[118a.3\]]ldang ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni slon bro ba dang /_/yi ga 'chus pa la sogs pa dang /_dben bar gcig pu 'dug par dga' pa dang /_/'jigs su rung zhing smad par bya ba la gnas pa dang /_gtsang sbra chung ba la sogs pa dang /_kha zas
[\[118a.4\]]zos ma thag tu smyo byed kyi nad shas cher ldang ba'i bar yin no/_/'dus pa'i rgyu dang mtshan ma ni/_/kun ldan de yi bdag nyid can/_/smyo byed mi bzang par shes bya/_/de ni sman pas yongs su spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las gyur ba'i smyo byed ni nad gzhi rgyu thams cad dang mtshan
[\[118a.5\]]ma thams cad dang ldan pa yin te/_de lta bu ni 'dus pa'i nad de'i bdag nyid can yin la/_/smyo byed de ni shin tu mi bzad cing /_'jigs su rung ba yin pas/_gsor mi rung ba'i phyir sman pas spang bar bya'o/_/nor dang chung ma sogs bral bas/_/brnag dka' ba las sems
[\[118a.6\]]gdung bas/_/smyo zhing zhum la yang yang brgyal/_/kyi hud kyi hud smre sngags 'don/_/glo bur du ni ngu zhing brgyal/_/de yi yon tan mang du sems/_/mya ngan gyis gdungs sems khong chud/_/gnyid yar rnam par 'khyams pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sems kyi gdung ba na smyo byed
[\[118a.7\]]ni nor dang chung ma la sogs pa yid du 'ong ba dang bral bas/_/brnag dka' ba la sems kyi gdung ba skye la/_de'i dbang gis mdog skya bo 'od 'od por gyur ba dang /_sems zhum pa la sogs par 'gyur zhing /_nor ram chung ma dang bral ba de'i yon tan yang dang yang du sems
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]shing mya ngan gyis gdungs pa la sogs pa yin no/_/dug gis gdong ni sngo ba dang /_/gzhi nyams dbang po stobs chung ba/_/shugs kyi bar du'ang 'khrul bar byed/_/mig dmar de ni spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug las gyur pa'i smyo byed ni mi'i gdong sngo ba dang /_/gzi
[\[118b.2\]]mdangs nyams pa la sogs pa dang /_bshang gci la sogs pa'i shugs 'byin zhing bar du yang 'khrul zhing myos par 'gyur ba dang /_mig dmar por 'gyur ba yin te/_de yang gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o/_/de nas rlung gyur smyo byed la/_/dang por snum gyi btung ba
[\[118b.3\]]blud/_/ces bya ba la/_de nas de dag gi gso ba ni rlung las gyur ba'i smyo byed la ni dang bo thog ma kho nar sman mar blud nas gso bar bya'o/_/lam 'gags gyur la dang por ni/_/snum bcas sbyar ba 'jam po bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa sbubs kyi lam 'gags pa las smyo byed du
[\[118b.4\]]gyur ba la ni dang bo kho nar snum dang bcas pa'i skyug sman dang /_bkru sman dang 'jam po'i sbyor bas gso bar bya'o/_/bad kan mkhris gyur dang po ni/_/snum dang dugs byas skyug sman dang /_/bkru sman mas gtong bcas pa dang /_/mgo bo'i bkru sman dag kyang bya/_/zhes bya ba
[\[118b.5\]]la/_bad kan dang mkhris ba las gyur ba'i smyo byed la ni dang po kho nar snum dang dugs kyi cho ga byas la skyug sman la sogs pa btang bas gso bar bya'o/_/de ltar lus ni dag byas na/_/yid ni dran pa rnyed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul de ltar byas pas smyo byed kyis btab
[\[118b.6\]]pa'i nad pa de'i lus sbyang ba byas ba'i rgyus sems gsal zhing yid dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de lta na yang rjes 'brangs na/_/sna sman mig sman rnon po gtang /_/sems dga' dbugs 'byung skrag pa dang /_'jig dang rdeg dang sdigs mo byed/_/lus dri la byug dang bsku ba dang /
[\[118b.7\]]dud brngub sman mar blud pa dag/_/sbyar te de ni dag gyur na/_/yid ni tha mal ba la sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul de lta bu'i gso ba byas su zin kyang nad de rjes su 'brang zhing 'brel pa yin na sna sman rnon po la sogs pa btang ba dang /_sems dga' ba la sogs pa byas te/_des ni
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]yid tha mal par bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/shing kun dang ni rtsabs ru tsha/_/tsha ba gsum ni srang gnyis gnyis/_/mar bre bzhi ni ba gcin bcas/_/bskol bas smyo byed 'byung bo dang /_/brjed byed gdon ni sel mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing
[\[119a.2\]]kun la sogs pa'i sman srang gnyis gnyis dang /_mar bre bzhi ba gcin dang bcas par bskol ba btung ba la sogs par sbyar na smyo byed la sogs pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/bra m+hi'i khu ba bre do dang /_/mar bre gang dang tsha ba gsum/_/sha ma dur byid bim pa dang /_/shang ka puSh+pa dong ga
[\[119a.3\]]dang /_/sab+ha la dang byi dang ga_/zho ni gnyis gnyis lde gur bskol/_bram+hi'i rtsa ba zhes bshad de/_/mar ni srang res bskyed de gtang /_/che tshad srang bzhi'i bar zos na/_/smyo byed brjed byed mdze yi nad/_/sel zhing mo gsham bu skyed byed/_/skad snyan tshig gsal dran pa dang /_/yid
[\[119a.4\]]gzhungs dpal ni skyed par byed/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman bram+hi bskol ba'i khu ba bre do dang mar bre gang dang /_tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i sman sna re re zho gnyis gnyis kyi lde gu bskol ba ni bram+ha'i sman mar zhes bya bar bshad de/_mar de srang gcig nas srang re bskyed de srang bzhi bar du zos na/_mar des smyo
[\[119a.5\]]byed la sogs pa'i nad sel zhing dpal skyed pa'i bar du byed do/_/'bras bu gsum dang bi sha la/_/pa tra e la thang shing dang /_/e la ba lu ka dang ni/_/thal tres rnam gnyis ser bo gnyis/_/s+thi ra rnam gnyis pri yang ku/_/rgya spos ru rta bri ha ti/_/nA ga ge sar dong ga btsod/_/se'u 'bru
[\[119a.6\]]bal bu'i lo ma dang /_/dzA ti kha 'bus byi dang ga_/dan da shug pa ut+pa la/_/tsan+dan dkar po zho gnyis gnyis/_/zhun mar bre gang bcas bskol ba/_/dge ba'i sman mar zhes bshad 'dis/_/'byung po'i gdon sogs smyo byed dang /_/brjed byed lud pa sdig can 'joms/_/skya rbab
[\[119a.7\]]g.yan pa skem dang dug_/rmongs bag gcin snyi dbyig dug rims/_/khu ba med pa'am bu med pa 'am/_/dran pa gdon gyis brlams pa dang /_/yid gzhungs med cing tshig 'khrul dang /_/dran nyams me drod chung la phan/_/stobs skyed bkra shis tshe ring zhing /_/mdangs skyed skal ldan
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]lus rgyas byed/_/bu skyed byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_pa tra e la ni ha re Nu ka'o/_/e la ba lu ka ni ma lung ka'o/_/thal tres rnam gnyis ni sha ri ba dkar po dang /_nag po gnyis so/_/ser po gnyis ni yung ba dang skyer pa'o/_/s+thir rnam gnyis ni sa la par+Ni dang
[\[119b.2\]]kriSh+Na par+Ni'o/_/pri yang ku ni gan d+ha pri yang ku'o/_/dzA ti ni sna ma'i me tog ste/_de kha 'bus pa'o/_/ut+pa la ni ut+pa la sngon po'o/_/gzhan ni grags par zad de sman de dag zho gnyis gnyis kyi tshad du byas pa'i lde gu dang /_/zhun mar bre gang bskol ba'i sman mar ni dge ba'i sman mar zhes drang
[\[119b.3\]]srong dag gis bshad de/_sman mar 'dis ni 'byung bo'i gdon la sogs pa 'joms pa nas bu skyed pa'i mchog yin pa'i bar gyi yon tan dang ldan pa yin no/_/'di las thal tres rnam gnyis sogs/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig chu nang bskol/_/de yi khu ba mar dang ba/_/lan cig skyes 'o
[\[119b.4\]]bzhi 'gyur dang /_/me da rnam gnyis ram nye ba/_/bum gtsang stong dang kha sral phre'u/_/bu ram shing dang par+Ni gnyis/_/bskol ba yi ni sman mar ni/_/dge ba chen po zhes bya ste/_brtas byed 'dus pa'i nad 'joms shing /_/snga ma bas kyang yon tan lhag_/ces bya ba la/
[\[119b.5\]]bshad ma thag pa'i sman 'di dag las dang po'i bdun ma gtogs pa thal tres rnam gnyis la sogs pa sman sna nyi shu rtsa gcig khu ba bskol ba'i cho gas chur bskol te/_sha ri ba rnams gnyis la sogs pa sman spyir bre gang chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol la sman gyi khu ba bzhi cha lus pa mar bre
[\[119b.6\]]gang dang ba be'u lan cig skyes pa'i 'o ma bre bzhi dang /_me da rnam gnyis la sogs pa spyir srang brgyad bskol ba'i sman mar ni dge ba chen po'i sman mar zhes bya ste/_des lus brtas par byed pa dang /_'dus pa'i nad sel bar byed pa dang /_dge ba'i sman mar yon tan cher lhag pa yin no/
[\[119b.7\]]spang spos pu ta ke shi dang /_/chu rtsa shu dag kha sral phre'u/_/kyi lce ba dang ram nye ba/_/tsa rong dza ya pu tse shel/_/sle tres tsa tra ba ra ha/_/a ti tsha tra sa ta la/_/ma hA pu ru Sha dan Da/_/na ku li gnyis skyu ru ra/_/bri sh+tsi ka la ka dam pa/_/sa la par+Ni bcas bskol mar/_/sha za
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]chen po'i mar zhes bya/_des ni nyin bzhi pa rims dang /_/smyo byed brjed byed gdon 'joms shing /_/blo dang yid gzhungs dran pa skyed/_/byis pa rnams kyi lus 'phel byed/_/bdud rtsi dang ni 'dra ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_spang spos la sogs pa'i
[\[120a.2\]]sman dang /_/mar tshul bzhin du bskol ba'i sman mar ni ming sha za chen po'i sman mar zhes bya ste/_des ni nyin bzhi pa'i rims la sogs pa sel ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no/_/bram+hi in dri byi dang ga_/shing kun spang spos mur ba dang /_/ra sna sgog skya bong nga dkar/_/
[\[120a.3\]]shu dag bya'u rug bi sha la/_/nA ga dan ti byi tsher ba/_/dzo ti sma ti tsha ba gsum/_/a ru ra dang sa nag rnams/_/glang po'i gcin btags ri lu byas/_/grib bskams snar blugs mig bsku zhing /_/lus bskus spos bdugs smyo byed sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_bram+hi ni bram man ya sti ka
[\[120a.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/in dri ni in dra ba ru na'o/_/la la ni sug smel la bya'o zhes zer ro/_/mor ni gan+d+ha mo ra'o/_/bi sha la ni lang ga li'o/_/dzo ti sma ti ni mar ma ta zhes bya ba phug ron gyi rkang ba 'dra ba ming gi rnam grangs ku ni zhes bya'o/_/nA ga dan da ni nA ga byi na'o/_/sa nag ni so ra shi zhes
