[\[160b.7\]]pa gong du bshad ma thag pa'i sbyor ba dang yon tan thams cad mtshungs shing 'dra bar slob dpon gyis bstan cing bshad pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel ba/_tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]las/_/phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bzhi ba'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas mig nad thams cad kyi nad kyi dmigs brtag pa bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_mig nad kyi yan lag gi char gtogs pa bshad nas mig thams cad
[\[161a.2\]]kyi nad gang yin pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/rlung gi mig nas mchi ma 'dzag_/sna rgyas cung zad skrangs pa dang /_/mur 'gram dpral mig smin ma kha/_/na zhing zug la 'bar ba dang /_/rngu ma skam zhing mchi ma grang /_/sla nyung na ba ldang dub can/_/
[\[161a.3\]]'byed dang 'dzums par dka' ba dang /_/srin bu 'gro ba snyam du sems/_/mig ni bus pa lta bur snang /_/zug rngu phra mos khyab snyam byed/_/snum dang dro bas nyer zher 'gyur/_/mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad rlung gis mchi ma
[\[161a.4\]]'dzag par gyur pa na/_sna rgyas zhing bus pa'am/_gang ba lta bur gyur pa dang /_cung zad skrangs pa dang /_mur 'gram la sogs pa lhang lhang por na zhing zug pa dang /_mig 'phar zhing 'gul ba dang /_rngu ma zhes bya ba'i mig gi dri ma skam po 'byung ba dang /_mchi ma grang zhing
[\[161a.5\]]sla ba dang /_nyung zhing 'byung ba dang /_na ba ldang dub byed pa can du 'gyur zhing mi brtan pa dang /_mig dbye ba dang /_'dzums par dka' zhing sdug bsngal ba dang /_grog ma la sogs pa'i srin bu steng na 'gro ba snyam du sems pa dang /_mig bus pa ltar rgyas par snang ba
[\[161a.6\]]dang /_khab kyis btsags shing zug rngu phra mos khyab pa snyam du byed pa dang /_snum pa dang dro bas bde zhing nad nyi bar zhi bar gyur pa yin te/_nad de ni rlung gis mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya'o/_/de ma btsos na gdung bar 'gyur/_/rna ba sgra 'byung mgo 'khor dang /_/dpral ba
[\[161a.7\]]mig dang smin ma sogs/_/gtsub shing gis ni gtsubs snyam byed/_/ces bya ba la/_/mchi ma 'dzag pa zhes bya ba'i nad de ma bcos te yal bar dor na mig nad gdung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_gdung bde ni rna ba nas sgra zing zing por 'byung bar 'gyur pa dang /_/mgo
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]bo 'khor ba dang /_dpral ba la sogs pa gtsub shing gis gtsubs shing dkrugs pa snyam du sems par byed pa yin no/_/de yang bag med yal bar bor/_/gdung bas bcom gyur nad de yis/_/sna tshogs tshul ni 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/mig mthong nyams byed rma
[\[161b.2\]]'byung 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/yang gdung ba zhes bya ba'i nad de bag med pas yal bar bor na mig nad gdung bas bcom pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad du 'gyur te gdung bas bcom pa zhes bya ba'i nad des ni mig nad sna tshogs shing tha dad pa'i tshul du ma dag 'byung bar 'gyur
[\[161b.3\]]zhing mig gi mthong ba nyams shing long ba'i rma 'byung bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/mur 'gram kha dang 'jing pa las/_/rlung ni gzhan du 'jug 'gyur zhing /_/mi bzad na la gnag pa dang /_/dmar zhing skrangs la mig mi sdug_/zhum zhing kun nas mchi ma 'dzag_/de ni
[\[161b.4\]]rlung gis gzhan gyur yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdung bas bcom pa zhes bya ba de ma bcos te yal bar bor na mur 'gram la sogs pa las rlung gzhan du 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du mi bzad pa'i gnag pa la sogs pa'i nad skyed par byed pa dang /_mig
[\[161b.5\]]mi sdug cing mig kun nas zhum par 'gyur ba dang /_thams cad nas mchi ma 'dzag par 'gyur te/_de ni rlung gis gzhan du gyur pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad yin no/_/de bzhin mig ni yon po dang /_/chung ba rlung gis phyin ci log_/ces bya ba la/_snga ma bzhin du
[\[161b.6\]]rlung gis gzhan du 'gyur pa dang nad kyi tshul mthun zhing /_gzhan yang yon po dang rang gi tshad las chung bar gyur pa ni rlung gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/mkhris pa'i mchi 'dzag mtshan ma ni/_/tsha grang du ba 'byung snyam sems/_/mig chu'i phyi rol gnag pa dang /_/
[\[161b.7\]]nang na rnag 'drul mchi ma tsha/_/ser zhing mig dmar ser por mthong /_/rma la lan tshwas btab snyam sems/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan nyid ni tsha bar gyur ba dang /_skrangs pa dang /_du ba 'byung ba snyam du sems pa
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]la sogs pa 'byung ba dang /_dngos po ser por mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_rma la lan tshwas btab pa dang 'dra bar mig na bar 'gyur pa yin no/_/me mdag gtor ba 'dra ba dang /_/mcher pa'i gong bu lta bur snang /_/mig nang gdung bar gyur pa
[\[162a.2\]]yin /_/zhes bya ba la/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa de yal par bor na/_mig nad gdung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_de ni mig lam me mdag gtor ba snam du sems pa dang /_mcher ba'i gong bu ltar gnag pa snang bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/bad kan
[\[162a.3\]]las gyur mchi 'dzag ni/_/tshor ba med skrang rab tu g.ya'/_/gsher zhing snum la shas cher dkar/_/mig gdung spyi bag 'dzag pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa ni mig tshor ba med cing bem bem por gyur pa dang /_shas cher
[\[162a.4\]]skrangs pa dang /_g.ya' ba la sogs pa yin no/_/gdung ba des ni nag po dma'/_/'bras bu dkar po mtho ba dang /_/cham pas thebs shing sna rgyas la/_/mig ni rdul gyis gang snyam byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan gyis mchi ma 'dzag pa ni mig tshor ba med cing yal
[\[162a.5\]]bar bor ba na/_gdung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur la/_des ni mig 'bras nag po dma' bar 'gyur pa dang /_'bras bu dkar po mtho zhing 'bur bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du cham pas thebs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/khrag gyur dmar ris mig tu dmar/_/mig 'bras
[\[162a.6\]]dkar po dmar ba dang /_/khrag 'dzag dmar po mthong ba dang /_/mkhris pa'i mchi 'dzag mtshan nyid yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag par gyur pa ni/_mig la ri mo dmar bo shar shar por snang ba nas/_mig 'bras dkar po dmar po nyid du
[\[162a.7\]]snang zhing /_dngos po dmar po nyid du snang ba dang /_de bzhin du mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa'i mtshan nyid gang dag yod pa de 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gdung ba mig ni mtha' dmar zhing /_/phyung ba dang ni mtshungs par na/_/me tog ban+du ka ltar dmar/_/
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]shin tu na zhing reg mi bzod/_/lung tang khrag tu nub pa 'dra/_/gnag cing me ltar snang ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa de yal bar bor na mig nad gdung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_de'i mtshan ma ni mig gi mtha' ma gzags pa ltar dmar
[\[162b.2\]]bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du mig phyung ba dang mtshungs par mi bzad bar na par 'gyur ba dang /_me tog ban+du ka'i mdog ltar mig shin tu dmar ba dang /_shin tu lhang lhang por na ba dang /_reg mi bzod pa dang /_lung tang khrag gi nang du nub pa dang 'dra ba'i mdog tu mig
[\[162b.3\]]'bras nag por snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_dngos po rnams me dang 'dra bar mthong ba yin no/_/gdung ba rang gi ji bzhin du/_/thams cad 'dzag pa las lhag na/_/mur 'gram so dang mkhur tshos dang /_/mgo bo lhag par na bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_mig nad gdung
[\[162b.4\]]ba zhes bya ba'i nad rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang /_khrag las gyur pa thams cad ni/_rang gi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du na pa yin no/_/rlung la sogs pa las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa thams cad las lhag par mi bzad par na ba dang /_de bzhin du
[\[162b.5\]]mur 'gram la sogs pa lhag par na bar byed pa yin no/_/rlung mkhris shas cher drud snyam sems/_/zag cing na la phul snyam sems/_/shin tu rtsub cing mig mchu mig_/'dzums dang 'byed par dka' ba dang /_/na zhing skams par gyur pa dang /_/grang 'dod
[\[162b.6\]]smin cing skam dang bcas/_/mig skam smin pa zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_mig la rlung dang mkhris pa gnyis kyi shas che zhing lhag par gyur na ni/_drud pa snyam du sems pa la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/nad gzhi gsum ni khrag bcas la/_/skrang 'gyur de
[\[162b.7\]]ni rab skrangs shing /_/na dang tsha dang 'dzag dang bcas/_/u du m+l+wa ra'i 'bras smin 'dra/_/mig 'bras dkar por 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mchi ma grang zhing dro ba dang /_/spyi bag ska sla ras kyis 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi gsum po khrag dang bcas
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]pas ni skrangs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad du 'gyur te/_de ni rab tu skrangs pa dang /_na ba la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du mig 'bras dkar por u du m+WA ra'i 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba dang /_mchi ma phyed 'ga' ni grang bar/
[\[163a.2\]]mchi ma phyed 'ga' ni dro bar 'byung /_/phyed 'ga' ni spyi bag dang /_/phyed 'ga' ni ska ba dang /_phyed 'ga' ni sla ba la sogs par res kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/skrang chung cung zad skrangs zhes bya/_/de bzhin mtshan nyid gzhan gyis smin/_/zhes bya ba la/_cung zad
[\[163a.3\]]skrang pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad ni skrangs pa cung zad tsam du 'gyur ba dang /_bshad ma thag pa'i mig nad skrangs pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba dang /_mig nad 'di'i khyad par ni 'di yin te/_gang skangs ba cung zad chung ba dang /_de bzhin du sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid smin pa dang
[\[163a.4\]]tsha ba dang na ba med bar gnas la/_de bzhin du u du m+WA ra'i 'bras bu smin pa dang 'dra ba la sogs pa yin no/_/mig smin pas nyen skrangs pa yi/_/rtsom che mchi ma rnyog can 'dzag_/bad kan gyis bsgos mig 'bras ni/_/dkar po dmar zhing 'drul ba dang /_/tsha zhing
[\[163a.5\]]mthong ba nyams pa dang /_/nad ni mal na mi gnas yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mig smin pas nyen pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad ni skrangs pa'i rtsom pa dang por che bar 'gyur pa dang /_mchi ma rnyog pa can 'dzag pa dang /_bad kan gyis bsgos shing byugs pa 'dra bar snang ba
[\[163a.6\]]dang /_mig gi 'bras bu dkar po mdog dmar zhing mig 'dzag cing 'drul ba dang ldan pa dang /_tsha bar 'gyur ba dang /_mthong ba nyams shing long ba dang nad mal na mi gnas shing kun tu 'pho bar gyur pa yin no/_/khrag mkhris shas che'i nad kyis ni/_/zas kyi dngas
[\[163a.7\]]ma skyur por 'gyur/_/mig gi rtsar ni song nas ni/_/mig ni dmar por byed par 'gyur/_/skrang tsha smin zhing mchi ma 'dzag_/shin tu long long por mthong na/_/skyur gyis skyed pa'i nad ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris pa shas che ba'i rlung la sogs pa'i
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]nad kyis zas kyi bcud dngas ma zhes bya ba skyur por gyur nas/_de nyid kyis khrag dang mkhris pa shas cher byas la/_yang mig gi rtsar song ba dang /_des mig dmar por byed par 'gyur la/_de bzhin du skrang zhing tsha ba la sogs par 'gyur te/_mig nad 'di ni skyur
[\[163b.2\]]gyis skyed pa zhes bya'o zhes drad srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/de ldar kun gtogs nad bcu drug_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis mig nad du gtogs pa'i nad ni bcu drug yod do/_/de la gdung bas bcom pa ni/_/mig smin bcas pa spang
[\[163b.3\]]bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mig nad 'di dag gi nang nas gdung bas bcom pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad dang /_mig smin pa zhes bya ba'i nad dang bcas pa ni/_gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o/_/rlung gyur zhag lngas mig la gnod par byed/_/bad kan las gyur gdung bas
[\[163b.4\]]zhag bdun gyis/_/de bzhin khrag gyur zhag gsum gyis 'joms byed/_/mkhris gyur 'phral du log spyod kyis gnod skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad gdung ba ni log pa'i sbyod pa ste/_kha zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa mig la gnod par byed pas
[\[163b.5\]]zhag lnga la mig la gnod cing nyams par byed do/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i gdung ba ni/_spyod lam dang kha zas log pas zhag bdun gyis mig la gnod cing 'joms par byed do/_/khrag las gyur ba'i mig nad gdung ba ni zhag gsum gyis mig 'joms shing gnod par
[\[163b.6\]]byed do/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad gdung ba ni kha zas dang spyod lam la sogs pa log pas 'phral du gnod pa skyed cing mig 'joms par byed do/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas
[\[163b.7\]]nges par sbyar ba las/_/phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bco lnga pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas mig nad thams cad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba ni/_go rims kyis na gso ba 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/mchi 'dzag sngar byung tshul nyid la/_/mkhur bkang
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]sno sman rnon po gtang /_/rlung 'khrugs ma gtogs nad bzhan la/_/smyung ba dag kyang bya ba yin/_/zhes bya pa la/_mchi ma 'dzag pa'i nad thams cad kyi sngar byung ba'i tshul la mkhur ba bkang ba rnon po dang /_sna sman rnon po gtang bar bya'o/_/de'i
[\[164a.2\]]rjes la rlung 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i nad ma gtogs pa nad gzhan la smyung ba byas pas gso bar bya'o/_/tsha dang dmar dang gos pa dang /_/skrang sogs zhi phyir kun la ni/_/sug smel gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang /_/na le sham dang btsag yug snam/_/lde gur byas pas bsku
[\[164a.3\]]bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mchi ma 'dzag pa thams cad kyis tsha ba dang /_dmar ba dang /_ljan ljin gyis gos pa la sogs pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_sug smel la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gus mig gi phyi rol nas bsku bar bya ste/_de yang rdzi ma la mi gnod par bya'o/_/
[\[164a.4\]]rlung gyur rgyam tsha skyer khaN+Da/_/shing mngar rgya spos tsan+dan nam/_/rgyam tsha dong gra skyer khaN+Da/_/mar gyi nying gu bdar ba'am/_/yang na seng phrom sbyar ba gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de la rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni rgyam tsha la sogs pa'i sman mar gyi nying gu zhes bya ba
[\[164a.5\]]mar gyi steng gi dngas ma dang bcas pa bdar ba'i lde gus phyu rol nas bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na seng phrom mar dang bdar ba'i lde gus phyi rol nas bsku bar bya'o/_/khrag mkhris gyur la spang spos dang /_/shug pa shing mngar ra mnye ba /_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris
[\[164a.6\]]pa las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni spang spos la sogs pa'i lde gus phyi rol nas bsku bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur pri yang ku/_/ldong ros sbrang rtsi sbyar ba bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni/_gan+d+ha pri yang ku la sogs pa'i ldi gus phyi rol
[\[164a.7\]]nas bsku bar bya'o/_/'dus pa las gyur kun gyis bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa la sogs pa'i mig nad la ni rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang bad kan gyi sman thams cad bsres pa'i mig sman gyi lde gus phyi rol nas bsku bar bya'o/_/na le
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]sham ni dkar po cha gcig dang /_/ldong ros cha bzhi seng phrom cha bcu drug_/zhib tu btags te ras gtsang phur mas gtums/_/nad ldang med la mig tu gdab par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/na le sham dkar po cha gcig ldong ros cha bzhi ste/_de'i bzhi 'gyur seng phrom
[\[164b.2\]]cha bcu drug ste/_dang po'i bcu drug 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad zhib tu btags te/_ras gtsang ma'i nang du phur mar gtums la/_nad ldang ba'i mod la mig tu phur ma sprug cing gdab par bya'o/_/rgya sran nag po ba lci ra'i ril khu/_/legs btsos sen mos shun pa
[\[164b.3\]]bshus gyur pa/_/de yis mtshan mo lan cig bskus pa yis/_/mig nad 'khrugs pa mod la zhi bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rgya sran ku lad+tha dgon pa ba'i lci ba dang /_ra'i ril ma'i khu bar tshos btsos la sen mos shun pa bshus te rgya sran de'i phye ma mtshan mo'i dus
[\[164b.4\]]su lan cig bskus shing mig tu btab na mig nas 'khrugs pa mod kho na la zhi bar byed do/_/shu ti shing mngar sbangs ma a ru ra/_/zhib btags ras kyi thum po lhod par bcings/_/zangs kyi snod du skyur rtsabs nang du bcug_/mig tu bzhag na mig nad sna tshogs
[\[164b.5\]]sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_shu ti la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa'i sbyor bas 'bras kyi rang skyur ram skyur khu'i nang du bcug pa de mig tu bzhag cing glan na mig nad rnam pa sna tshogs dag sel cing 'joms par byed do/_/skyer pa srang gcig chu bre phyed du yang /_/khu ba brgyad
[\[164b.6\]]cha lus par sbrang rtsi btab/_/de bzhin mig tu bskus par gyur na ni/_/nad gzhi thams cad 'khrugs pa'i mig nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyer pa srang gcig chu srang bcu drug gi nang du bskol la brgyad cha lus par sbrang rtsi gtab ste/_mig tu ji lta ba bzhin du bskus
[\[164b.7\]]na mig nad sna tshogs pa nad gzhi so so dang 'dus pa las gyur pa sel bar byed/_/shi kru'i lo ma'i khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas/_/mig tu blugs na rlung dang mkhris pa dang /_/bad kan 'dus pa las gyur mig nad rnams/_/mig nad mang po dag kyang myur du sel/_/zhes bya
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]ba la/_shi kru'i lo ma bskol ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i mig sman gyis kyang rlung la sogs pa las gyur pa'i mig nad sel to/_/i raN+da ni gzhon nu'i lo ma dang /_/rtsa ba brdungs te ra yi 'o mar bskol/_/blugs sam zan dron mig tu glan pa
[\[165a.2\]]yis/_/rlung gyur mchi 'dzag nad ni mod la 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_/e raN+Da gzhon nu'i lo ma dang rtsa ba gtun gyi nang du brdungs te ra'i 'o ma dang bskol te thigs pa mig tu blugs pa 'am/_de bzhin du zan dron mo mig tu glan na/_rlung las gyur pa'i mchi ma 'dzag
[\[165a.3\]]pa'i nad gsar pa mod la 'joms par byed do/_/rlung gyur pa la bil ba sogs/_/bskol ba'i sman thigs blugs pa'am/_/e raN+Da'i rtsa bri ha ti/_/ma du shi kru dro 'jam blugs/_/zhes bya ba las/_rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad mchi ma 'dzag pa la ni bi' ba la sogs pa'am/_/
[\[165a.4\]]e raN+Da'i rtsa ba la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba dro 'jam tsam gyi thigs pa'i rgyun mig tu blugs na phan no/_/sha rang gaSh+Ta ba la ka_/rgya spos u dum+WA ra'i shun/_/chu dang 'o mar bcas bskol ba'i/_/thigs blugs gzer ni sel mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/sha rang ga
[\[165a.5\]]la sogs pa'i shing gi shun pa chu'i nang du bskol ba'i thigs pa blugs na mig gzer zhing na ba sel ba'i mchog dam pa yin no/_/btsod dang skyer pa rgya skyegs dang /_/rgun 'bru ut+pal shing mngar gnyis/_/bskol te bsgrangs par kha ra gdab/_/mig blugs khrag
[\[165a.6\]]mkhris mig nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_btsod la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrags par kha ra btab pa grang mo'i thigs pa blugs na yang khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mig nad 'joms so/_/shing mngar ka shi ru'i phye ma/_/ras ma 'jam pos lhod par
[\[165a.7\]]bcing /_/char chu'i nang du sbangs pa ni/_/khrag mkhris las gyur mchi 'dzag sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba ji skad du bshad pa ltar byas pa yang yon tan de dang 'dra'o/_/shing mngar skyer pa stag tsher ba/_/thum po nu zho kha rar bcas
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]ra yi 'o mar sbangs pa blugs/_/tsha na mdog dmar mchi 'dzag sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing mngar la sogs pa ras gtsang ma'i thug bur byas te/_bud med kyi nu zho dang kha rar bcas pa'am/_ra'i 'o ma sbyar ba'i thigs pa mig tu blugs na tsha ba la sogs pa sel bar byed
[\[165b.2\]]do/_/seng phrom dkar po shing mngar bcas/_/mar brngos legs par btags pa ni/_/ras la gtums te nu zhor mnye/_/khrag mkhris snad pa'i mig nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_seng phrom dkar po shing mngar dang bcas pa mar la brngos pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas mig sman du
[\[165b.3\]]btang na khrag dang mkhris pa dang snad pa las gyur pa'i mig nad sel lo/_/dong gra nim pa 'bras bu gsum/_/seng phrom ba sha ka'e khu ba/_/dro 'jam blugs pas bad kan sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_dong gra la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba dro 'jam tsam gyi thigs pa blugs na yang bad
[\[165b.4\]]kan las gyur pa'i mig nad sel to/_/'dus par 'di dag bsres pa phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las 'gyur pa'i mig nad la ni/_sman 'di dag bsres pa bskol ba'i thigs pa blugs na phan no/_/rlung la mar ni rnying pa dang /_/mkhris pa kha rar bcas pa dang /_/bad
[\[165b.5\]]kan la ni tsha ba gsum/_/bskol dang thal sman bcas pa blud/_/de 'og khrag kyang dbyung ba dang /_/de nas snam gyur bkru sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad la ni/_/mar rnying pa btung bar bya la/_/mkhris pa las gyur pa la ni/_/mar rnying pa de
[\[165b.6\]]nyid kha ra dang bcas pa blud par bya la/_bad kan las gyur pa la ni mar rnying pa de nyid tsha ba gsum dang bskol cing /_thal sman gyi phye ma btab pa blud la/_de'i rjes la khrag dbyung zhing gtar ga gdab pa dang /_de'i rjes la yang snum gyi cho ga byas la bkru sman gtang bar
[\[165b.7\]]bya'o/_/dro bas tsha ste gzer ba la/_/skam sa'i srog chags sha btags pas/_/mgo dang gdong bsku/_zhes bya ba la/_mig dro zhing tsha bas gzer bar gyur pa la ni/_skam sa'i srog chags kyi sha zhib tu btags pas mgo dang gdong byug par bya'o/_/tsha ba la/_'o
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]ma mar bcas grang mos bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te tsha bar gyur na/_'o ma mar dang bcas pa grang mos mgo bo dang /_gdong bsku bar bya'o/_/rab rib gso ba'i cho ga yang /_/brtags te ji bzhin gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rab rib
[\[166a.2\]]gso ba'i stobs las kyang brtags te de'i sman rab rib gso ba'i skabs su ji skad bshad pa dag gtang bar bya'o/_/cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni/_/gdung ba la sogs rnams la'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar bshad pa'i cho ga 'di dag thams cad ni
[\[166a.3\]]gdung ba la sogs pa'i mig nad lhag ma rnams la'ang phan zhing bsngags pa yin no/_/gdung ba yong ye ma zhi na/_/smin ma'i steng du me btsa' gdab/_/ces bya ba la/_gdung ba zhes bya ba'i mig nad rnam pa thams cad du zhi bar ma gyur na smin ma'i steng du ji skad bshad
[\[166a.4\]]pa'i cho gas me btsa' gdab par bya'o/_/ba zho snum med kyis dngul snod/_/byugs te sngon por gyur pa dang /_/skam nas zho ga chu ri lur/_/byas pas rlung gyur mig nad 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba'i zho snum med cing spris ma bshus pa'am/_skyur pos dngul gyi
[\[166a.5\]]snod byugs la de sngon por gyur cing skom pa dang /_/bsdus te zho ga chus ru lur byas pas bskus na rlung las gyur pa'i mig nad 'joms par byed do/_/dzA ta'i me tog kha 'bus dung /_/shing mngar ba la 'bras bu gsum/_/char chu dang btags ri lur byas/_/khrag
[\[166a.6\]]mkhris las gyur mig nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_dzA ti zhes bya ba sna ma'i me tog kha 'bus pa dang /_dung la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin du ri lur byas pa'i mig sman gyis ni khrag mkhris las gyur pa'i mig nad sel bar byed do/_/rgyam tsha 'bras bu tsha ba gsum/_/rgya mtsho'i
[\[166a.7\]]lbu ba dung snying po/_/e la ba lu sra rtsi pog_/ri lus bad kan mig nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyam tsha dang 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i mig sman gyis bad kan las gyur pa'i nad gang dag yin pa sel bar byed do/_/shing mngar pra puN+Da rI ka/_/skyer pa srang
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]ni brgyad brgyad dag_/chu bre bcu drug nang bskol btsags/_/slar bskol ska bar gyur pa ni/_/ra gan dud pa srang bcu dang /_/rna le sham phye zho gnyid gzhug_/de la ri lu'am phye mar byas/_/bskus na mchi 'dzag thams cad dang /_/dmar na drud pa byed snyam
[\[166b.2\]]'joms/_/'phral du mig ni gsal bar byed/_/sbyor 'di phyugs bdag ces bya ste/_/sman pa rnams kyi gsang ba mchog_/ces bya ba la/_shing mngar sogs pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bskol la bzhi cha lus pa dang btsags te yar bskol la/_gzar bu la
[\[166b.3\]]chags pa tsam gyi bar du ska bar gyur pa dang /_ra gan gyi dud pa la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin du bcug ste/_de'i 'og tu ri lur byas pa'am/_phye mar byas pas bskus na mchi ma 'dzag pa la sogs pa 'joms par byed pa dang /_'phral du de'i mod la mig gsal zhing
[\[166b.4\]]dngas par byed pa yin te/_mig sman gyi sbyor ba 'di ni ming phyugs bdag ces bya ste/_shin tu gsang par byed pa yin no/_/mig smin skam pa mar blud cing /_/'tsho byed kyi ni sman mar ni/_/blud cing mig ni brta bya dang /_/til mar chung nga'i sna sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_/
[\[166b.5\]]mig smin ma skam po'i nad la ni mar blud na phan no/_/de bzhin du 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan dang bskol ba'i sman mar blud cing mig brta ba dang /_de bzhin du sman mar de nyid kyi sman gtang ba dang /_til mar gyi thigs pa chung ngu'i sna sman gtang ba'o/_/'di la 'o ma rgyam tshar
[\[166b.6\]]bcas/_/dro 'jam thigs pa blugs pa'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_mig smin ma skam po 'di la 'o ma la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin btang na yang phan no/_/bca' sga bud med nu zhor btags/_/mar sbyar mig tu bskus na 'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la
[\[166b.7\]]la/_yang na de la bcal sga la sogs pa'i mig sman bskus na yang phan no/_/yang na rlan can sha yi zhag_/dong gra rgyam tsha cung zad btab/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na rlan can gyi srog chags kyi sha'i zhag dong gra dang rgyam tsha cung zad bsres pa'i mig sman yang
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]phan no/_/skra ni mar bskus me long gis/_/mnyes te kham phor kha sbyor bcug_/bsregs te lcags snod mar dang bcas/_/snag tsha de ni mig sman mchog_/ces bya ba la/_mi'i skra mar bsku ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ji skad smos pa bzhin du
[\[167a.2\]]byas pa'i snag tsha ni mig smin ma skam po'i mig sman gyi mchog yin no/_/skrangs bcas cung zad skrangs pa la/_/snum chos byas te gtar ga gdab/_/snum byas rgun 'bru a ru ra/_/dur byid mar bcas bkru sman btang /_/zhes bya ba la/_mig gi nang skrangs pa dang
[\[167a.3\]]bcas pa dang /_cung zad skrangs pa la dang por snum chos byas te de'i 'og tu gtar ga gdab ba dang /_yang snum chos byas la ji skad smos pa'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/_/seng phrom dkar po mar la brngos/_/phyi mar byas te ras la gtums/_/chu dron la mnyes thigs pa
[\[167a.4\]]blugs/_/gzer 'joms pa yi mchog yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_seng phrom ji skad smos pa'i sbyor bas thigs pa mig tu blugs na/_mig nad kyi gzir 'joms par byed pa'i dam pa yin no/_/skyer pa pra puN+Da rI ka_/bskol ba'i thigs pa blugs pas phan/_/zhes
[\[167a.5\]]bya ba la/_yang na mig gzer ba la skyer pa 'am/_pra pun+Da rI ka bskol ba'i thigs pa mig tu blugs na phan no/_/mchi 'dzag na zhing drud snyam byed/_/sbyar sman 'di dag gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mchi ma 'dzag pa la sogs pa las 'og nas smos pa'i sbyar sman
[\[167a.6\]]'di dag kyang gtang bar bya'o/_/lcags kyi snod du zangs ma ba gcin sbyar/_/mar bdugs mig bskus gzer ni 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_lcags kyi snod kyi nang du zangs ma ba gcin dang sbyar la mar gyi dud pas bdugs pa mig tu bskus na/_mig gzer
[\[167a.7\]]zhing na ba 'joms par byed do/_/zangs ma'i snod du ba zho'i sbris ma bdar/_/rgyam tsha pi pi ling dang bcas pa mchog_/ces bya ba la/_yang na zangs ma'i snos kyi nang du ba'i zho dang bdar ba dang rgyam tsha dang pi pi ling sbyar ba'i mig sman ni mig na zhing gzer ba 'joms
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]par byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/zangs ma'i snod du nu zho dung bdar la/_/dong ga'i lo ma mar bcas dud pas bdug_/sbyar sman zhes bya mig tu bskus na ni/_/drud snyam byed sogs mi bzang nad myur sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_zangs ma'i snod kyi nang du bud med kyi nu
[\[167b.2\]]zho dang bdar te/_dong ga'i lo ma mar gyis bskus pas bdugs la/_mig tu bskus pa'i sbyar sman ni drud snyam du byed pa dang /_tsha ba la sogs pa'i mig nad mi bzad pa myur du sel bar byed do/_/u dum wA ra'i 'bras bu ni/_/lcags snod nang du nu zho bdar/_/sha
[\[167b.3\]]ma'i lo ma mar dud bdugs/_/mchi 'dzag gzer dmar drud pa 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_u dum wA ra'i 'bras bu ji skad smos pa bzhin du byas pa'i mig sman yang sbyar sman zhes bya ste/_mchi ma 'dzag pa la sogs pa 'joms par byed do/_/shi kru'i lo ma'i khu ba ni/_/
[\[167b.4\]]zangs ma gnyis kyi bar du bdar/_/mar dud bdugs pas skrangs pa dang /_/g.ya' dang mchi 'dzag nad rnams 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_shi kru zhes bya ba/_na le sham dkar po bskol ba'i khu ba zangs ma'i snod gnyis kha sbyar ba'i nang du bdar la/_mar gyi dud pas
[\[167b.5\]]bdugs pa yang sbyar sman zhes bya ste/_skrangs pa la sogs pa'i nad 'joms par byed do/_/til gyi chu dang khar ba ni/_/kham phor bdar te nim pa yi/_/'o ma mar bskol dud pas bdugs/_/gzer ram mchi 'dzag drud snyam sems/_/zhes bya ba la/_til gyi chu dang
[\[167b.6\]]khar ba kham phor gyi nang du bdar te nim pa'i lo ma mar gyis bskus pa'i nang du dud pas legs par bdugs pa'i mig sman yang sbyar sman zhes bya ste/_des bskus na gzer ba nas drud pa snyam du sems pa'i mig nad sel lo/_/sbyar sman gyis ni mig bskrus te/_/sman
[\[167b.7\]]shugs zug gzer dang bral nas/_/bud med nu zho'i thigs pa blugs/_/lan gsum phan chad de mi bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbyar sman zhes bya ba'i sman de dag gis mig bskus nas/_/sman gyis bskyed pa'i zug gzer gyi rtsom pa zhi zhing bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_de'i
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]'og tu bud med kyi nu zho'i thigs ba'i rgyun blugs par byas la/_sbyar sman de dag gis lan gsum phan chad ni mig bsku bar mi bya'o/_/bal bu'i lo ma pi pi ling /_/rgya spos lcags phye stang zil dang /_/dzA ti kha 'bus nag chur dang /_/
[\[168a.2\]]rgyam tsha ba gcin btags pa yi/_/lde gus zangs kyi snod bskus la/_/zhag bdun bzhag ste ba gcin dang /_/btags te ri lur byas nas ni/_/de 'og grib ma la bskams te/_/bud med nu zho dang bdar bsku/_/drud snyam byed dang mchi ma 'dzag_/skrang dang
[\[168a.3\]]g.ya' ba sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bal bu'i lo ma la sogs pa'i sman ba gcin dang btags pas zangs kyi snod la bskus la/_zhag bdun gyi par du bzhag ste/_bkog la de'i 'og tu ba 'am re'i gcin dang btags te ri lur byas la grib ma la
[\[168a.4\]]bskams te/_ri lu de bud med kyi nu zho dang bdar te/_mig tu bskus na mig nad drud pa snyam du sems pa la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/kaN+Daka re'i shun pa dang /_/shing mngar zangs ma'i bye ma ni/_/nga yi 'o mas lde gur byas/_/sha mi skyu ru ra'i lo
[\[168a.5\]]ma/_/mar gyis bskus pa'i dud pas bdugs/_/bskus na skrangs dang gzer nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_kaN+Daka re'i shun pa la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin du lde gur byas pa la sha mi dang skyu ru ra'i lo ma mar gyis bskus pa'i dud pas bdugs te bskus na
[\[168a.6\]]skrangs pa la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/skyur gyis bskyed la mkhris pa yi/_/mchi ma 'dzag pa'i cho gas gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyur gyis bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i mig nad la ni mkhris ba'i mchi ma 'dzag pa'i cho ga ji skad smos pas gso bar bya'o/_/
[\[168a.7\]]bad kan khrag mkhris kyis bskyed dang /_/'dus pas bskyed dang sgra ngan dang /_/rdzi ma 'gags dang mig smin skam/_/rnag gi chu seng pad+ma'i rtsa/_/mig mchu'i sha dang skyur skyed cung /_/mchi 'dzag gdung ba rlung ma gtogs/_/bco brgyad po dag chag par bshad/_/
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]yun ring du ni na ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/bad kan gyis bskyed pa dang /_khrag gis bskyed pa dang /_mkhris pas bskyed pa dang /_'dus pas bskyed pa dang /_sgra ngan dang /_rdzi ma 'gags pa dang /_mig smin ma skam po dang /_rnag gi chu ser can dang /_pad+ma'i
[\[168b.2\]]rtsa ba dang /_mig mchu'i sha dang /_skyur gyis bskyed pa dang /_cung zad skrangs pa dang /_mkhris pa'i mchi ma 'dzag pa dang /_khrag gi mchi ma 'dzag pa dang /_bad kan gyi mchi ma 'dzag pa dang /_mkhris pa'i mig nad gdung ba dang /_khrag gis gdung ba dang /_/
[\[168b.3\]]bad kan gyis gdung ba ste/_de ltar mig nad bco brgyad po dag ni yun ring du na zhing gnas par byed pa yin zhing /_thams cad kyang mig tshag par bshad pa yin no/_/'di dag gso ba so so yi/_/le'u'i nang du bshad pa yin/_/de'i 'og mig tshag spyi yi bshad/_/
[\[168b.4\]]ces bya ba la/_mig tshag pa 'di dag gi gso ba gang dag yin pa de so so'i le'u'i nang du bshad cing bstan pa yin zhing /_rang rang gi gang dag bshad pa yin la/_de las gzhan yang mig tshag pa yun ring du rjes su 'brel cing na ba'i thun mong gi sbyi'i gso ba da ltar 'dir ston
[\[168b.5\]]cing 'chad pa yin no/_/de nas mig tshag nad pa ni/_/snum chos slon ni byas nas kyang /_/gtar ga gdab cing khrig dbyung bya/_/bkru sman btang zhing mig chu ni/_/dag par gyur gyi bar du bzhar/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu mig tshag par gyur pa dag_/dang
[\[168b.6\]]por snum chos byas la skyug sman gtang zhing slon du bcug ste/_gtar ga gdab pa dang /_de'i 'og tu snum chos te bkru sman btang la/_de'i 'og mig gi chu dag cing nad med par gyur gyi bar du bzhar zhing zhal zhal gdab pa'i spyad kyis bsal bar bya'o/_/spangs ma
[\[168b.7\]]srang gcig na le sham/_/dkar po srang ni nyi shu dang /_/skyur rtsabs srang ni sum cu dag_/btags te zangs ma'i snod du gzhug_/lo mang lon pa'i mig tshag pa'am/_/chu ser 'dzag sogs zhi bar byed/_/gos dang tsha dang mchi ma 'dzag_/g.ya' skrangs de blugs
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]pa yis sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_/sbangs ma srang gcig la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin du btags te zangs ma'i snod du bcug la de'i thigs pa blugs na lo mang du lon pa'i mig tshag pa'am chu ser 'dzag pa la sogs pa zhi bar byed do/_/
[\[169a.2\]]de bzhin du gos pa la sogs pa'i mig nad kyang de blugs pas sel bar byed do/_/bye'u rug ka rany+dza'i sa bon/_/dzA ti'i me tog kha 'bus ba/_/brdungs te bskol la btsags nas ni/_/khu bar byas pa de dang ni/_/stang zil dang sbyar mig sman ni/_/mig tshag g.ya'
[\[169a.3\]]dang chu ser 'dzag_/g.ya' zhing 'drul ba sel mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bye'u rug pa la sogs pa gtun la brdungs te bskol la/_/ras gtsang mas btsags pa'i khu ba dang /_stang zil sbyar ba'i mig sman gyis ni mig tsha ba la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/skyer
[\[169a.4\]]pa'i khaN+Da sra rtsi phog_/rag nang dud pa ldong ros dang /_/rgyam tsho'i lbu ba rgyam tsha dang /_/na le sham dang btsag yug snam/_/sbrang rtsi btags pas mig sman ni/_/mig tshag 'drul g.ya' sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_skyer pa'i khaN+Da la sogs pa sbrang rtsi dang zhib tu btags
[\[169a.5\]]pa'i mig sman ni mig tshag pa dang /_'drul pa la sogs pa sel bar byed pa yin no/_/rgya spos a ru ra'i khu bar/_/dngul rdo btags pas mig tshag sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgya spos dang u ru ra bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_dngul rdo btags pa'i mig sman gyis kyang
[\[169a.6\]]mig tshag pa sel bar byed do/_/thang shing snum dang bcas pa ni/_/ra gcin nang du sbangs pa'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_thang shing snum dang bcas pa ra gcin gyi nang du sbangs pa'i mig sman yang mig tshag pa la phan no/_/rgyam tsha 'bras gsum pi pi ling /_/dung gi snying
[\[169a.7\]]po pu tse shel/_/zangs ma'i bye ma bcas ri lu/_/mig tshag ling tog sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rgyam tsha dang 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa zangs ma'i phye ma dang bcas pa ri lur byas pas kyang mig tshag pa dang /_ling tog sel cing 'jig par byed do/_/
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]yang na nag tshur phye ma ni/_/bye'u rug pa'i khu bar sbangs/_/zangs ma'i snod du zhag bcu bzhag_/de yis mig tshag chu ser 'dzag_/rdzi ma 'byi ba sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nag tshur gyi phye ma bye'u rug pa bskol ba'i khu bar sbangs pa zangs ma'i snod kyi nang
[\[169b.2\]]du zhag bcu'i bar du bzhag pa'i mig sman des ni mig des ni mig tshag pa la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/ldong ros dang ni skyer pa'i khaN+Da dang /_/de mnyam zangs ma'i phye ma zhib tu tags/_/phye ma mig sman thur ma gcig gis kyang /_/rdzi ma skyed cing mig tshag 'dis sel byed/_/
[\[169b.3\]]ces bya ba la/_ldong ros dang skyer pa'i khaN+Da cha mnyam du byas la de gnyis ji tsam du yod pa dang /_zangs ma'i phye ma mnyam du byas pa zhib tu btags te phye ma'i mig sman 'dis bskus na mig sman gyi thur ma gcig gis kyang mig tshag pa'i ba spu skyed cing sel bar byed
[\[169b.4\]]pa yin no/_/rgya skyegs bring ga skyer pa ni rgun ti/_/khu bar ras kyi dum bu lan bdun sbangs/_/sdong bu mar me de bus las byung ba'i/_/snag tsha mig tshag sel par byed mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgya skyegs la sogs ba'i khu bar ras kyi dum bu dri ma med pa bzang
[\[169b.5\]]po lan bdun gyi bar du sbangs la/_de'i sdong bu mar dang bcas par sbyar ba las byung ba'i snag tshas kyang mig tshag pa sel bar byed pa yin no/_/mig mchu mang du zhal zhal bya/_/de bzhin gtar ga bya ba dang /_/bkru sman yang yang bya ba ni/_/mig tshag can gyi nad
[\[169b.6\]]pas bstan/_/zhes bya ba la/_mig tshag pa'i nad pas ni mig mchu zhal zhal bya ba la sogs pa lan mang du bsten par bya'o/_/rnag gi chu 'dzag ma zhi'i mthar/_/thur ma phra mos bsreg par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rnag gi chu ser 'dzag pa zhi bar ma gyur na/_de'i thams
[\[169b.7\]]thur ma phra mos bsreg par bya'o/_/de ltar mig nad dgu bcu bzhi/_/nad gzhi mtshan nyid gso ba dag_/phan tshun 'dres pa med par ni/_/ma lus par ni bshad par yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul de ltar na mig nad kyi rgyu dang /_mtshan nyid dang /_gso ba'i tshul gyis
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]nad dgu bcu rtsa bzhir bshad pa yin la/_de dag kyang phan tshun 'dres shing 'dom pa med pa'i tshul gyis ma lus par bshad pa yin no/_/skyes bu nad med pa yis kyang /_/nas dang gro rnying drug cu ba/_/sA lu khre rgod rnying pa dang /_/mung+ga la
[\[170a.2\]]sogs pad mkhris 'joms/_/zhun mar mang du btab pa dang /_/tshod ma de 'dra skam sa yi/_/sha dang se'u 'bru kha ra dkar/_/bsten zhing char chu btung ba dang /_/gdugs cing l+h+wam ni bgo ba dang /_/cho ga bzhin du nad sbyangs pa/_/rnam pa kun tu bsten par bya/_/
[\[170a.3\]]zhes bya ba la/_skyed bu nad med pa dag gis kyang mig la gnod pa med cing phan par 'dod na nas rnying pa la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad du bsten par bya ba dang /_de bzhin du sran mu d+ga la sogs pa bad kan dang mkhris pa 'joms pa'i kha zas mar mang du btab pa dang /
[\[170a.4\]]tshod ma dang bad kan dang mkhris pa sel ba'i mar mang du btab pa bsten pa dang /_/skam sa'i sha dang /_se'u 'bru la sogs pa nas/_l+h+wam bgo pa'i bar cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa thams cad du bsten par bya'o/_/shugs bkag pa dang ma zhur za/_/phyed zhu za
[\[170a.5\]]dang rtug 'gag za/_/tsha dang phyi sa 'gag byed pa'i/_/zas dang sbyod lam sman kun spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_nad med pa'i mis kyang /_mig la phan par 'dod na/_shugs bkag pa la sogs pa dang /_/phyi sa 'gag par byed pa'i zas la
[\[170a.6\]]sogs pa rnam pa thams cad du spang bar bya'o/_/rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus na rtsa sbom po/_/gnyis gnas de yis mig ni nang du khyab/_/de bskus byug dang dril ba la sogs pa/_/rkang par byas na mig tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus na
[\[170a.7\]]rtsa sbom po gnyis gnas la des kyang mig nang du khyab pas na rtsa de la bsku ba la sogs pa byas na mig tu 'gro bar 'gyur zhing phan par 'gyur ba yin no/_/dri ma tsha dang snad pa la sogs pas/_/de gnod gyur na mig la gnod par 'gyur/_/de bas mig la phan 'dod l+h+wam
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]dang ni/_/bsku dang dril dang byug pa sogs sten bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsa de dri ma la sogs bas gnod par gyur na/_mig la gnod par 'gyur la/_de bas na mig la phan par 'dod pas rtag par dus thams cad du l+h+wam bgo ba dang /_snum gyis bsku ba dang /_bag
[\[170b.2\]]zan la sogs pas dril ba dang /_sman gyi lde gus byug pa dang /_bsku ba la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad du bsten par bya'o/_/yan lag brgya pa'i snying pa'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i
[\[170b.3\]]gnas kyi le'u bcu drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas rna ba'i nad kyi dmigs shis pa bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_mig nad kyi nges pa bshad nas rna ba'i nad kyi gzhi la sogs pa bshad par bya ba'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/cham pas
[\[170b.4\]]btab dang chu la rtse/_/rna ba brud pas rlung 'khrugs shing /_/sgra yi log pa'i sbyor ba dang /_/ldang ba'i rgyu gzhan gyis 'khrugs nas/_/rna ba'i rtsar ni rlung zhugs te/_/rna ba'i bu gar shugs drag gzer/_/gzhogs phyed na zhig rengs pa dang /_/grang ba dag ni mi 'phrod cing /_/
[\[170b.5\]]ring nas rnags shing smin nas kyang /_/chu ser cung zad 'dzag par byed/_/rgyu med rna ba stong snyam sems/_/zhum dang rgyas ba snyam du byid/_/ces bya ba la/_cham pa la sogs pa dang sgra yid du mi 'ong ba log pa'i sbyor ba thos pa dang rlung 'khrugs pa'i rgyu zas dang sbyod lam gzhan
[\[170b.6\]]dag gis kyang rlung 'khrugs par gyur cing /_rna ba'i rtsar zhugs te rna ba'i bu gar shugs drag tu gzer bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin du mgo bo'i gzhogs phyed na ba dang /_rengs shing 'gyur mi shes pa dang /_grang ba la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /_yun ring zhig na smin
[\[170b.7\]]cing rnags pa dang /_/rna ba'i nad de smin nas kyang /_chu ser cung zad 'dzag par gyur pa dang /_rgyu med cing gzhi med par rna ba stong pa snyam du sems pa dang /_thang 'ga' ni zhum thang 'ga' ni rgyas pa snyam du byed pa yin no/_/mkhris gyur tsha bcas na zhing gzer/_/grang
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]'dod skrang zhing rim gyis 'debs/_/myur du smin zhing smin nas kyang /_/chu ser ser por 'dzag par byed/_/chu ser des ni gang gang du/_/reg pa de dang der rnags 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa rang gi rgyus 'khrugs par gyur pa las rna
[\[171a.2\]]ba'i bu ga tsha pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_de myur du smin cing rnags pa dang /_smin nas chu ser ser por 'dzag par byed pa dang /_chu ser de gnas gang dang gang du reg pa de dang der rnams shing 'drul bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan las gyur mgo 'gram pa/_/mgrin pa lci zhing
[\[171a.3\]]nad shugs dal/_/g.ya' zhing grang la dro ba 'dod/_/smin nas rnag dkar ska ba 'dzag_/ces bya ba la/_/bad kan rang gi rgyus 'khrugs par gyur pa las/_rna ba'i bu ga dang mgo la sogs pa lci bar 'gyur ba dang /_nad kyi shugs dal zhing chung ba dang /_g.ya' ba
[\[171a.4\]]la sogs pa myong bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/snad la sogs pas gnod gyur pa/_/rna ba gzer bar byed par 'gyur/_/khrag dang mkhris pa ltar na dang /_/mtshan nyid cung zad lhag pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_snad pa la sogs pas gnod par gyur pa ni/_rna ba shas
[\[171a.5\]]cher gzer bar byed pa dang /_khrag dang mkhris pa dang 'dra bar na bar byed pa yin la/_de las kyang mtshan nyid cung zad tsam gyis lhag par gyur pa yin no/_/nad gzhi 'dus pas gzer ba dang /_/skrangs bcas rims 'debs mi bzad na/_/res kyis grang dang dro ba 'dod/_/
[\[171a.6\]]'od pa lta bu nyid du 'gyur/_/smin nas rnag ni dkar dang gnag_/dmar dang ska ba 'dzag par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyis rna ba gzer ba dang /_/skrangs pa la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /_res kyis ched 'ga' grang ba dang /_ched 'ga' dro ba
[\[171a.7\]]'dod par 'gyur ba dang /_'on pa lta bu sgra thos pa med par 'gyur ba la sogs pa yin no/_/sgra thos rtsar ni rlung zhugs pa/_/rgyu med par ni sna tshogs pa'i/_/sgra ni yang dang yang du thos/_/de ni rna ba'i sgra zhes bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung sgra thos par byed pa'i rtsa'i
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]nang du zhugs par gyur na/_rgyu med par sgra sna tshogs pa yang dang yang du thos par 'gyur ba yin te/_nad de ni rna ba'i sgra zhes bya bar drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/rlung ni bad kan dang 'dres pa'i/_/rna sgra yal bar bor na ni/_/skad gsang mthon por smras pa
[\[171b.2\]]thos/_/rim gyis 'on pa nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung rim gyis bad kan dang 'dres pa las/_sgra grag pa'i nad yal bar bor zhing ma gsos na skad gsang mthon pos thos par 'gyur ba 'am/_yang na rim gyis 'on pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/rlung gis bad
[\[171b.3\]]kan bskams gyur pas/_/de la rna bar gos gyur na/_/na zhing lci la 'gags gyur pa/_/de ni rna pa 'gags zhes bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan rlung gis bskams par gyur na/_des rna bar gos shing chags la byugs pa lta bur 'gyur la rgyu des rna ba na ba la sogs par 'gyur
[\[171b.4\]]te nad de ni rna ba 'gags pa zhes bya'o/_/zhes slob dpon gyis bshad do/_/bad kan las ni rna ba g.ya'/_/skrang sra de yi ming gis bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las rna bar g.ya' ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang slob dpon gyis de'i ming gis bshad de
[\[171b.5\]]g.ya' zhing skrangs la sra ba zhes bshad do/_/mkhris pas bad kan tshig gyur pa/_/nad bcas pa 'am nad med kyang /_/rnag ska 'dzag cing mang du 'drul/_/rna ba rnag can byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pas bad kan tshig par byas shing smin pa'i gnas
[\[171b.6\]]skabs su gyur pa na/_rna ba rnag can zhes bya ba'i nad du 'gyur te/_de ni nad dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/rlung sogs pa yis rna ba'i sha/_/khrag la gnod gyur 'drul bar za/_/srin bus bskyod cing mi bzod na/_/rna nad srin bu can
[\[171b.7\]]zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad rang gi rgyus bskyed pa dag gis rna ba'i sha dang khrag gnyis la gnos par byas shing 'drul bar gyur pa'i dbang gis za zhing 'cha' bar byed pa'i srin bus bskyod pa na mi bzad par na ba'i nad de ni ming srin bu can zhes bya'o/_/rna ba
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]phug pa'i rma las byung /_/rma ni snga ma'i mtshan nyid can/_/khong 'bras 'gyur ba'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_/rna ba phug pa las byung ba'i rma byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni/_sngar bshad pa'i nad gzhi'i skabs nas smos pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi khong 'bras su 'gyur
[\[172a.2\]]ro/_/gzhan du'ang 'gyur/_zhes bya ba la/_gzhan du'ang 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/_khong 'bras rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa gzhan dag kyang /_nad gzhi'i skabs nas sngar bshad pa lta bur gyur pa las 'di nyid ni khong 'bras kyi dbye ba tsam du zad pas de'i phyir grangs su
[\[172a.3\]]logs shig tu ma bgrangs pa yin no/_/thor bu 'brum bu skrangs las 'byung /_/de las rna ba rnags pa dang /_/'on par byed pas gnod par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba thor bu dang 'brum bu skrangs pa las nad gzhi so so dang 'dus pa dang ldan pa dang khrag las gyur pa
[\[172a.4\]]rlung 'byung bar 'gyur la/_thor bu 'brum bu de las rna ba rnags pa la sogs pas gnod par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na 'di las thor bu dang 'brum bu'i rna ba'i nad ces bya ba gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/mngal du rlung gis rna ba'i sha/_/zhum 'gyur 'khums pa zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya
[\[172a.5\]]ba la/_mngal gyi gnas skabs su rlung las rna ba'i 'gram gyi sha 'khums shing 'dus par gyur pa ni rna ba 'khums pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/mngal du sha mdzer sra na med/_/pi pi ling 'dra mang po'ang gcig_/nad me pi pi ling zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mngal gyi gnas
[\[172a.6\]]skabs nyid du sha'i mdzer pa sra zhing na ba med pa pi pi ling gi tshad tsam mang po 'am gcig 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ming pi pi ling zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa las gyur gas pa ni/_/mdog 'dra na zhing sra ba dang /_/skrangs gyur de ni ma gsos na/_/smin nas yungs mar lta bur ni/_/
[\[172a.7\]]'dzag cing 'tsho ba dka' bar 'gyur/_/rma 'tshobs nas kyang nges par ni/_/rna ba'i sha ni zhum par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa'i rgyu las skrangs pa gang kha dog 'dra ba la sogs par 'gyur ba de ni ming gas pa zhes bya ste/_skrangs pa de ma gsos te yal bar bor nas
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]smin cing rnags pa 'gyur na yungs mar lta bu 'dzag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/rtsa la gnas pa'i rlung gis ni/_/rna shal skam pa de ming can/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung rna ba'i rtsa na gnas shing rna rtsa skam par byed pa'i nad de ni de'i ming can de rna shal
[\[172b.2\]]skam pa zhes bya'o/_/rna shal pi lbang rgyud ltar phra/_/sra ba rgyud can zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gis rna shal pi lbang gi rgyud ltar sra zhing phra bar gyur pa de ni ming rgyud can zhes bya'o/_/gzhon sha can ni yun ring du/_/btang snyoms bor nas 'phral du bskyed/_/rna shal
[\[172b.3\]]skrang zhing nad bcas la/_/dmar zhing 'byar bar gyur pa ni/_/de ni rlung gis 'byar zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_shin tu gzhon sha can gyi rna ba 'jam po yun ring du btang snyoms su bzhag nas/_de'i rjes la 'phral du de'i mod la rna ba'i bu gar bskyed cing brgyangs par
[\[172b.4\]]gyur na rna shal skrangs pa dang /_na ba dang bcas shing dmar la slar 'byar bar 'gyur te/_de ni rlung gis 'byar ba zhes bya'o/_/gnod 'gyur rgyan lci khur sogs kyis/_/khrag dang mkhris pa 'khrugs gyur pas/_/dmar zhing tsha na smin pa dang /_/skrang dang 'brum bu
[\[172b.5\]]'brum phran dang /_/dmar zhing tsha la rnags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyan lci ba la sogs pa'i rgyus khrag dang mkhris pa 'khrugs par byas pas dmar ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i nad de ni ming gnod par gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung dang bad kan gyis rna shal/_/
[\[172b.6\]]skrang zhing nad med sra ba dang /_/brtan zhing mdog 'dra g.ya' ba dang /_/de ni mnye ba zhes byar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung dang bad kan gyi rgyus rna shal skrang zhing /_/skrangs pas kun tu khyab la/_/na tsha chung zhing sra ba dang /_/brtan par byas pa la sogs pa'i nad de ni
[\[172b.7\]]mnye ba zhes bya ba dang /_gal li ri zhes kyang bya'o/_/phug nyes rna ba brgyangs pa las/_/g.ya' bcas tsha grang smin cing na/_/'dus pa las gyur skrangs pa de/_/sdug bsngal 'phel byed ces bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba phug pa nyis shing nang brgyangs drags pa las
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]g.ya' ba la sogs pa'i nad du 'gyur te/_nad de'i ming ni sdug bsngal 'phel ba zhes bya'o/_/bad kan khrag gyur srin bu phra/_/g.ya' zhing gnag la rnag bcas pa/_/srin bu phra mos bldags zhes bya/_/de ma gsos na rna shal ba/_/zhes
[\[173a.2\]]bya ba la/_bad kan dang khrag las gyur pa'i srin bu phra mo g.ya' pa la sogs pa dang bcas pa ni rna shal bldags pa zhes bya ste/_/de ma bcos shing yal bar bor na rna shal za zhing bldags par 'gyur ro/_/de las 'dus gyur pi pi ling /_/gzer can gas
[\[173a.3\]]'khums gsor mi rung /_/rgyud can gcig pu 'tsho ba tsam/_/lhag ma rnams ni gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba'i nad 'di rnams kyi nang nas pi pi ling zhes bya ba dang /_gzer can zhes bya ba dang /_gas pa zhes bya ba dang /_/rna ba
[\[173a.4\]]'khums pa zhes bya ba de ni gsor mi rung ngo /_/rgyud can gcig pu ni re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du gsor rung ngo /_/lhag ma nyi shu ni gsor rung ba yin no/_/de ltar rna ba'i nad kyi ni/_/dbye ba nyi shu rtsa lngar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis rna ba'i
[\[173a.5\]]nad kyi dbye ba ni grags nyi shu rtsa lnga yod do zhes slob dpon gyis bshad do/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu bdun pa'i rnam par 'grel
[\[173a.6\]]pa'o//_//de nas rna ba'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_go rims kyis na le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/rlung las gyur pa'i rna nadal/_/sha khu blud cing rlung 'joms pa'i/_/sman bskol mar ni mtshan mo blud/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung
[\[173a.7\]]las gyur pa'i rna ba'i nad la ni/_mtshan mo nyal khar nad pa la sha khu blud par bya zhing rlung 'joms pa'i sman rtsa ba bcu pa la sogs pa dang bskol pa'i mar blud par bya'o/_/rna ba dugs byas de rjes la/_/a shat+tha dang e raN+Da/_/bil ba arka'i lo ma dang /_/til mar
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]rgyam tshar bcas pa dang /_/phur ma btso ba byas pa yi/_/khu ba dro 'jom tsam mam ni/_/la phug gu gul rna ba dgang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba dang por dugs bya zhing snum chos kyi cho ga byas nas de'i rjes la a shwat+tha la sogs pa'i lo ma'i sman gyi phur ma
[\[173b.2\]]btso ba 'am yang na la phug dang gu gul bskol ba'i khu ba gang yang rung bas rna ba dgang bar bya'o/_/rlung 'joms sde tshan skyur rnams dang /_/gcin gyi nang du snum chen ni/_/bskol ba de ni rna ba'i nad/_/mi bzad pa yang myur du sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung 'joms
[\[173b.3\]]pa'i sde tshan thang shing la sogs pa dang /_skyur te skyur rtsabs dang /_zhog chu dang dar ba la sogs pa rnams dang /_ma he dang ba lang la sogs pa'i gcin gyi nang du snum chen po ste/_zhun mar dang til mar dang rkang dang zhag ces bya ba bskol ba des ni rna ba'i nad mi bzad
[\[173b.4\]]cing brnag par dka' ba yang sel bar byed do/_/rtsa ba chen po lnga yi shing /_/gang yang rung ba gso mas dkri/_/til mar gyis bskus 'bar ba'i rtse/_/snum 'dzag 'phral du nad sel byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rtsa ba chen po lnga'i shing gang yang rung ba cig dang /_de
[\[173b.5\]]bzhin du sa ra la zhes bya ba'i shing sor bcu tsam la gso mas cha gsum dkris la til mar gyis bskus te 'bar ba'i rtse mo la tshig pa'i tshe snum gang zhig 'dzag par gyu pa des ni 'phral du rna ba'i nad sel zhing 'joms par byed do/_/de bzhin thang shing ru rta dang /_/sgron shing
[\[173b.6\]]las kyang de bzhin bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du thang shing la sogs pa dag kyang shing sor bcu tsam la gso mas dkri zhing til mar gyis bskus la 'bar ba'i rtse mo nas 'dzag pa'i snum gang zhig byung ba de bsags pa dro 'jom tsam du blud na yang rna ba'i nad 'phral du sel bar
[\[173b.7\]]byed do/_/rlung nad cham pa la bshad pa'i/_/gso bas 'dir yang phan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i cham pa la phan pa'i sman gang yin pa de 'dir rlung las gyur pa'i rna ba'i nad la yang phan pa yin no/_/mgo bo bkru dang chu grang btung /_/nyin mo'ang yongs
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]su spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba'i nad de la/_mgo bo bkru ba dang /_chu grang btung ba ni nyin mo yang spang bar bya'o/_/mkhris gyur kha ra dkar por bcas/_/mar gyis snum byas bkru sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur
[\[174a.2\]]pa'i gzer nad la ni/_kha ra dkar po dang bcas pa'i mar gyis snum gyi cho ga byas pa la mkhris pa sel ba'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/_/rgun 'bru shing mngar nu zho bskol/_/rna ba bkang pa'ang bsngags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgun 'bru la sogs pa'i sbyor bas rna ba
[\[174a.3\]]bkang ba yang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rna ba gzer ba la phan no/_/shing mngar tsan+dan dUr ba dkar/_/pu shel tse dang ram nye ba/_/seng phrom pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang /_/pad+ma'i sdong bu dzi ba ka_/btsod dang thal tres bskol ba dang /_/shing mngar khu ba bre gang dang /_/'o ma bre do
[\[174a.4\]]bcas pa dag_/til mar phul gang bskol ba dang /_/'di yis rnar blugs rna dgang bsku/_/yang na sbrang rtsi nyi tshes dgang /_/gzer dang tsha dang na ba sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing mngar la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /_shing mngar bskol ba'i khu ba bre gang la sogs pa ji
[\[174a.5\]]skad smos pa bzhin du bskol ba til mar 'di rna bar blugs pa la sogs pa byas na/_gzer ba la sogs pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na sbrang rtsi nyi tshes bkang na yang gzer ba la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/shing mngar la sogs mar dang bcas/_/rna ba kun tu byugs na 'ang
[\[174a.6\]]phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing mngar dang tsan+dan la sogs pa bshad ma thag pa'i sman mar dang bcas pa'i lde gus rna ba kun tu byugs shing bskus na yang gzer ba la sogs pa la phan no/_/bad kan las gyur pi pi ling /_/mar bskol snum gyur skyug tu gzhug_/ces
[\[174a.7\]]bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur ba'i rna ba'i gzer la ni/_/pi pi ling dang zhun mar bskol ba'i snum gyi cho ga byas la skyug sman gtang ste slon du gzhug go/_/bad kan sel ba'i sna sman dang /_/mkhur bkang dugs dang dud pa brngub/_/ces bya ba la/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]rna ba'i gzer la ni bad kan sel ba'i sna sman la sogs pa bya'o/_/sgog skya sge'u gsher shi kru dang /_/la phug chu shing mu rang ga_/bskol ba'i khu ba dam pa ni/_/dro 'jam rna bar blugs na'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_sgog skya la sogs pa'i khu ba dro 'jam tsam blugs
[\[174b.2\]]na yang mchog tu phan pa yin no/_/arka'i myu gu skyur khur btags/_/til mar rgyam tshar bcas pa gang /_/snu ha'i shing bu brus par ni/_/bcug la arka'i lo mas g.yogs/_/phur ma btsos pa'i tshul du bsregs/_/de yi khu ba gzer 'joms mchog_/ces
[\[174b.3\]]bya ba la/_shing arka'i myu gu rang skyur la sogs pa khu ba skyur po'i nang du btags la ji skad smos pa'i phur ma btsos pa'i tshul du bsregs pa'i khu ba ni gzer 'joms par byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/ma du lung ga'am ka pid tha'i/_/khu bas bkang ba byas na phan/_/zhes
[\[174b.4\]]bya ba la/_yang na ma du lung ga'i khu ba'am ka pid tha'i khu bas rna ba bkang na yang gzer ba la phan no/_/yang na tshas bkang de rjes la/_/rgya mtsho'i wu ba'i phye mas gdab/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na rna ba tshas bkang la de'i 'og tu rgya mtsho'i wu ba'i phye ma btab na'ang phan no/_/ra
[\[174b.5\]]lug gcin dang 'o mas shun/_/til mar bskol bas bkang na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na ra lug gi gcin la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'ang phan no/_/yang na yungs mar shing kun dang /_g.yer ma dong gra bskol ba blugs/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na yungs mar la
[\[174b.6\]]sogs pa'i sbyor ba ji skad smos pa ltar btang na 'ang phan no/_/khrag gyur mkhris pa lta bur gso/_/gtar ga myur du gdab par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i rna ba'i nad la mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rna ba'i gzer ltar gso bar bya'o/_/smin cing
[\[174b.7\]]rna ba khrag 'dzag la/_/dud pa mkhur bkang sna sman sbyar/_/sbu gu'i cho ga dag dang ni/_/rma red cho ga gang yin bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba'i nad smin cing rnag 'dzag par gyur na dud pa brngub pa la sogs pa sbyar bar bya zhing /_de bzhin du sdu gu'i cho ga ji
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]skad bshad pa dag kyang sbyar bar bya la/_rma red pa'i gso ba gang dag yin pa de yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/gos par ye'us dus gnyis su/_/rna ba phyi zhing dag par bya/_/gu gul dud pas bdugs nas kyang /_/sbrang rtsi yis kyang dgang bar bya/_/zhes
[\[175a.2\]]bya ba la/_rna bar rnag la sogs pa chags shing gos par gyur na/_ras bal gyi ye'us nyin re zhing dus gnyis su phyi zhing dag par byas la/_de'i rjes la gu gul gyi dud pas bdugs te sbrang rtsis yongs su dgang par bya'o/_/bye'u rug khu ba bskol ba dang /_/bu ram
[\[175a.3\]]khu bas bsgos pa yi/_/ras bal ye'u rab phras byug_/de yi phye ma gdab par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rna ba rnag can de bye'u rug pa'i khu ba la sogs pas bsgos pa'i ras bal gyi ye'u phra mos byug par bya ba dang /_phye ma la sogs pa'i sman de dag zhib tu
[\[175a.4\]]btags pa'i phye mas gdab par bya'o/_/gzer dang rnags dang lci ba la/_/cho ga 'dis ni bzlos par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga 'di nyid ni gzer la sogs pa yang zlog par byed pa yin par drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/pri yang ku dang
[\[175a.5\]]am+pash+tha/_/shing mngar dang ni da ta ki_/ut+pa la yi lo ma dang /_/btsod dang seng phrom rgya skyegs dang /_/ka pid tha yi khu ba dang /_/til mar bskol te de blugs na/_/rnag 'dzag pa ni myur 'chad byed/_ces bya ba la/_pri yang ku la sogs ba'i ldi gu dang /_ka pid
[\[175a.6\]]tha la sogs pa bskol ba'i til mar de rna bar blugs shing bkang na rnag 'dzag pa myur du 'chad par byed do/_/sgra bcas 'on pa dag la ni/_/rlung gi gzer 'joms sman gtang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba sgra dang bcas pas 'on par gyur pa gnyis la ni/_rlung gi rna ba'i nad
[\[175a.7\]]kyi gzer 'joms par bshad pa'i sman gang dag yin pa gtang bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur bad kan ni/_/slon sman sogs kyis dang por bsal/_/zhes bya ba la/_/sgra dang bcas pa dang 'on pa bad kan las gyur pa dag la ni dang por slon sman la sogs pas bad kan
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]bsal bar bya'o/_/e raN+Da dang shi kru dang /_/la phug gzhon nu'i 'o ma dang /_/khu ba til mar bzhi 'gyur dang /_/lo ma brgyad 'gyur bcas pa dang /_/shing mngar ram nye ba'i lde gu/_/bcas par bskol ba rnar blugs dang /_/bsku dang rna ba bkang ba yis/_/sgra bcas
[\[175b.2\]]'on dang gzer ba 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_e raN+Da la sogs pa'i lo ma bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_til mar de'i bzhi 'gyur dang /_lo ma til mar brgyad 'gyur dang bcas pa dang shing mngar dang ram nye ba'i lde gu bskol te tel mar lus pa rna bar blugs pa la sogs pa byas na sgra la
[\[175b.3\]]sogs pa dang bcas pa'i nad 'joms par byed do/_/shing kun bong nga dkar po dang /_/shu ti skyer shun swa rdzi ka_/til mar tsha dang bcas bskol bas/_/bkang na gzer dang chu ser 'dzag_/sgra bcas lon pa sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_shing kun la sogs pa'i lde gu
[\[175b.4\]]dang /_til mar gyi bzhi 'gyur gyi tsha dang bskol ba'i til mar gyis rna ba bkang na rna ba gzer ba dang bcas pa yang sel bar byed do/_/rna ba sgra dang bcas pa la/_/yungs mar gyis ni bkang na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba sgra zi zi po dang bcas pa la ni/_yungs
[\[175b.5\]]mar btsir ba'i mar gyis rna ba dgang bar bya'o/_/la phug skam po'i dum bu yi/_/thal ba shing kun bca' sga dang /_/shu ti ru rta shu dag dang /_/thang shing shi kru skyer khaN+Da/_/ya bak+Sha ra rtsabs ru tsha/_/rgyam tsha rdul tsha swa rdzi ka_/stag pa'i tsher ma kha ru tsha/_/gla sgang rgun
[\[175b.6\]]cha bzhi 'gyur dang /_/kha lu khu ba de dang 'dra/_/chu shing khu ba mnyam bskol ba'i/_/til mar bkang bas rna ba'i nad/_/g.ya' dang sgra bcas 'on pa dang /_/rnag 'dzag gzer zhing srin bu can/_/shin tu gso dka' thal sman gyi/_/til mar gyis ni myur du 'joms
[\[175b.7\]]kha dang so yi nad la'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_la phug skam po'i dum bu thal bar byas pa dang /_shing kun la sogs pa'i sman gyi bzhi 'gyur rgun tsha dang /_kha lung gi khu ba bzhi 'gyur dang /_chu shing gi khu ba bzhi 'gyur dang /_til mar bskol la rna ba bkang na rna ba'i nad
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]gso dka' ba yang myur du sel bar byed la/_thal ba'i til mar 'di ni kha dang so'i nad la yang phan zhing bsngags pa yin no/_/de nas tshor ba med pa la/_/nye ba la ni gtar ga gdab/_/ces bya ba la/_de nas rna ba tshor ba med cing bem bem por gyur na de
[\[176a.2\]]dang nye ba la gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/skrang zhing rnags la thos pa ni/_/mi gsal gyur la skyug sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba skrung zhing rnag 'dzag pa dang thos pa mi gsal zhing 'on pa la ni skyug sman blud de slon du gzhug par bya'o/_/byis pa rgan dang
[\[176a.3\]]yun ring du/_/lon pa'i 'on pa spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_byis pa'i tshe nas 'on pa dang /_rgas nas 'on pa dang /_yun ring du 'on zhing lo mang du lon pa'i 'on pa la ni/_gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya'o/_/sgra bcas rnags par gyur pa la/_/snum dang dugs byas dag
[\[176a.4\]]par bya/_/rna ba sbyangs nas de rjes la/_/rna ba sbyangs pa'i til mar dag_/kha lung khu ba rgyam tsha dang /_/tsha dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa'ang blugs/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba sgra dang bcas shing rnags par gyur pa'i rna nad la ni snum dugs byas pas rna ba sbyangs shing gsher bar byas la/
[\[176a.5\]]de'i 'og tu rna ba'i ye'us sbyang zhing dag par bya'o/_/de ltar rna ba sbyangs nas/_de'i rjes la rna ba sbyang ba'i til mar ji skad smos pas dgang ba 'am/_yang na kha lung la sogs pa'i sman rna bar blugs par bya'o/_/dag byas rtsub par gyur na ni/_/mar gyi nying khus dgang bar
[\[176a.6\]]bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbyang bas sbyangs shing dag par byas pas rna ba rtsub par gyur na/_mar gyi nying khus rna ba gnyis bkang ba phan no/_/rim 'di rna spabs gang la'ang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba rna spabs kyis gang ba la yang sngar bshad pa'i rim pa 'di nyid phan no/_/g.ya'
[\[176a.7\]]dang skrang la rna sman sogs/_/bad kan sel bar byed pa phan/_/skrang la tsha dang dro bas byug_/ces bya ba la/_rna ba g.ya' ba zhes bya ba'i rna nad la ni/_rna sman dang /_dud brngub pa dang /_bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa bad kan sel ba dag phan no/_/de bzhin du skrang
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]pa la yang rna sman dud pa brngub pa la sogs pas phan no/_/'dir skrang pa la ni khyad par du tsha ba dang /_dro ba'i sman gyi lde gus byug pas phan no/_/rna ba rnag 'dzag 'bu can la/_/rna ba chu 'dzag gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba rnag can dang rna ba srin bu can la ni rna ba chu 'dzag
[\[176b.2\]]pa'i gso ba thams cad byas na phan no/_/mchog tu rna nad srin can la/_/yungs mar dron po blugs par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna nad srin bu can la ni khyad par du yungs mar dron pos dgang bar bya'o/_/rna ba'i 'bras la khong 'bras kyi/_/gso ba dang ni skyug sman gtang /_/
[\[176b.3\]]zhes bya ba la/_rna ba'i khong 'bras smin pa dang /_/ma smin pa la ni sngar bshad pa'i khong 'bras kyi gso ba ji skad bshad pa bzhin bya zhing skyug sman gtang bas gso bar bya'o/_/snad pa'i khong 'bras gso ba ni/_/mkhris gyur rna gzer gso bar bya/_/zhes
[\[176b.4\]]bya ba la/_snad pa'i khong 'bras la ni mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rna ba gzer ba'i gso ba thams cad bya'o/_/'brum pa thor bu sna ltar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba'i 'brum bu dang rna ba'i thor bu la ni sna'i 'brum bu dang thor bu ltar gso bar bya'o/_/rna ba
[\[176b.5\]]gas pa ma smin la/_/rna ba'i khong 'bras ltar gso zhing /_/nad gzhi ji bzhin las kyang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba gas pa zhes bya ba'i nad ma smin pa la ni rna ba'i khong 'bras kyi gso ba ji skad smos pa ltar bya zhing /_de bzhin du nad gzhi ji lta bu'i tshul kyang gso bar bya'o /_/rna shal
[\[176b.6\]]skam la rlung gzer ltar/_/rna sman bsku ba la sogs bya/_/dugs bya snyi bar gyur pa na/_/rna shal til mar bskus shing mnye/_/shing mngar pi la ya'i sa bon/_/a shwa gan+d+ha nas bcas bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna shal skam pa zhes bya ba'i rna ba'i nad la ni rlung las gyur pa'i rna
[\[176b.7\]]ba'i gzer ltar rna sman dang bsku ba dang dugs la sogs pa bya'o/_/de ltar dugs kyis snyi bar gyur pa dang /_rna shal til mar gyis bskus la pi la ya'i sa bon la sogs pa bsku zhing mnye bar bya'o/_/de nas rgyas byed snum gyis ni/_/bsku ba rtag tu bsten par bya/_/zhes
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu rna shal mnyes pa'i rjes la rgyas par byed pa'i snum gyis rtag tu bsku bar bya'o/_/nye'u shing a shwa gan+d+ha dang /_/e raN+Da dang pa ya s+ya/_/dzi ba ka dang 'o mar bcas/_/til mar bskol bas bsku ba ni/_/rna shal rgyas
[\[177a.2\]]byed mchog yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_nye'u shing la sogs pa bskol ba'i til mar gyis bsku ba ni rna shal mchog tu rgyas par byed pa yin no/_/'tsho byed sde tshan lde gu dang /_rlan can sha ni bskol ba dag_/rna shal 'phel zhing rgyas byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'tsho
[\[177a.3\]]byed kyi sde tshan gyi lde gu la sogs pa dang bskol ba yang phan no/_/rna shal rab zad bcad pas ni/_/lhag ma sbyar la gso zhing bskyed/_/ces bya ba la/_rna shal shin tu zad cing chad du nye ba la ni/_gtsags bus bcad la rna shal lhag ma sbom po de ji skad bshad pa'i rim
[\[177a.4\]]pa bzhin du sbyar la/_de'i 'og tu gso zhing bskyed par bya'o/_/de bzhin rgyud 'dra 'tsho tsam bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul de bzhin du pi wang gi rgyud 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i rna ba'i nad kyang 'di bzhin du re zhig mi la ba tsam du gso bar bya'o/_/'byar ba zhes bya ba'i mig nad la yang
[\[177a.5\]]bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga 'di nyid bya'o/_/'byar ba la yang cho ga 'di/_/gnod gyur bsil sman bsku ba dang /_srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/gnod par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i rna nad la ni bsil sman bsku zhing srin bu pad pas gtar ga bya'o/_/'dzam bu a
[\[177a.6\]]mra'i lo ma dang /_/ba la shing mngar seng phrom til/_/btsod dang ut+pal ka dam pa/_/thal tres ti'i mar bcas pa dang /_/skyur rtsabs bcas par bskol ba 'di/_/til mar bsku bar bya ba dang /_/me dbal skabs bshad mar gyis bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnod
[\[177a.7\]]par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i rna nad la ni/_'dzam bu la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /_til mar dang de'i bzhi 'gyur gyi skyur rtsabs dang bskol ba'i til mar bskus na phan no/_/yang na med bal gyi skabs su bshad pa'i sman mar gyis bsku bar bya'o/_/mnye bgo ta rka ta/_/zhag dang
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]bcas pa'i til mar dang /_tA la'i lo ma a rka dang /_/a shwa gan+d+ha bye'u rug pa/_/so ma ra dza 'bras bu dang /_/rgyam tsha lang ka lir bcas bskol/_/til mar bsku bar bya ba dang /_/rna sman rnon po gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mnye ba zhes bya ba'i rna ba'i nad la ni go
[\[177b.2\]]ta dang /_karka ta zhes bya ba ku ta lir gnyis kyi zhag dang bcas pa'i til mar la sogs pa bskol bas bsku bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin du rna sman rnon po dag kyang gtang bar bya'o/_/dbug nyes pa la a sman ta/_/'dzam bu a mra'i lo ma ni/_/bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par
[\[177b.3\]]bya/_/rna shal til mar gyis bsku zhing /_/shing mngar btsod dang stag tsher ba/_/yung ba'i phye ma zhib po gdab/_/rgya skyegs byi dang ga bskol ba'i/_/til mar gyis ni bskus na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_dbug nyes pa'i rna ba'i nad la ni/_a sman ta ka la sogs
[\[177b.4\]]pa bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya'o/_/yang na rgya skyegs la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i til mar gyis bskus na dbug nyes pa'i nad sdug bsngal 'phel pa zhes bya ba sel bar byed do/_/srin bus zos la ba'i lci bas/_/lan mang du ni dugs byas la/_/
[\[177b.5\]]byi dang ga yi snying po ni/_/lug gi gcin sbyar lde gus bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin bus zos pa'i nad rna ba lhags pa zhes bya ba'i nad la ni ba'i lci bas dugs bya ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya'o/_/dug mo nyung dang ing gu dang /_ka rany+dza yi sa bon dang /_/dang ga'i
[\[177b.6\]]shun pa'i lde gus bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na dug mo nyung la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na yang nad de la phan no/_/yang na de dang nim pa yi/_/lo ma na le sham dang bcas/_/sbrang rtsi'i lde gus rma la bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na 'bus ba ldags pa zhes
[\[177b.7\]]bya ba'i nad de la/_sngar bshad pa'i sman dug mo nyung la sogs pa de dag kun dang nim pa'i lo ma la sogs pa'i sman lug gi gcin dang sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/rna ba chad la sbyang byas te/_/skyon med khrag dang de 'tsham pa'i/_/bcing ba dag gis sbyar
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]bar bya/_/sbyar nas 'phral bcang sbyang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rna ba'i nad kyis chad pa'am stobs kyis drangs te rna ba chad pa la slon dang khrus kyis sbyar ba byas te/_nad kyi slon med pa'i khrag dang /_de dang 'tsham pa'i bcing bdag gis bcings
[\[178a.2\]]te sbyar bar bya la/_de ltar sbyar nas ni bcad ma thag pa'i dag par bya ba'i tshogs sbyang bar bya'o/_/de nas skra mthar mdud byas te/_/rna shal bcad dang zhal zhal bya/_/bcad pa dang ni bsrung ba bya/_/mtshams ni mnyam par sbyar bya zhing /_/mthon dman med pa nyid du bya/_/
[\[178a.3\]]zhun mar dang ni sbrang rtsis byug_/ras bal gyis ni glan pa dang /_/skud pas dam lhod ran par bcings/_/rma yi khrag ni bcad pa yi/_/sman gyi phye mas gdab bya zhing /_/spyod pa de la bstan par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i rjes la nad pa'i skra'i tha ma'i mtshams su
[\[178a.4\]]mdud pa byas la/_/rna shal bcad pa dang /_zhal zhal bya ba dag byas nas rna ba'i mtshams shin tu mnyam zhing legs par sbyar la/_mthon dman med pa nyid du byas te bzhag la/_de'i 'og tu zhun mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i ras bal gyi glan la/_skud pas shin tu
[\[178a.5\]]dam par yang ma yin la/_shin tu lhod pa yang ma yin par ran par bcings la/_khrag bcad pa'i phye ma gtar ga'i skabs nas smos pa'i phye mas gdab par bya la/_de'i 'og tu rma la phan zhing gnod pa med pa'i sbyod pa gang dag yin pa de la bstan cing bslab par bya'o/_/
[\[178a.6\]]zhag bdun nas ni ma btsos pa'i/_/til mar bskus la ras bal dgrol/_/legs 'byor spu ni skyes pa dang /_/mtshams 'byor mnyam zhing brtan pa dang /_/tshad ldan nad ni med pa dang /_/rim gyis rna ba skyed par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_zhag bdun gyi rjes la til mar sman
[\[178a.7\]]ma btsos pas bskus la/_ras bal dal gyis bkrol te/_/rna ba legs par 'byor zhing spu skyes pa dang /_mtshams 'byor zhing mnyam pa la sogs pa dang ldan nas rim gyis rna ba de skyed cing 'phel bar byed do/_/nya lcibs kha sral phre'u dang /_/bri hati 'bras ser po gnyis/_/
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]ba la ha ti pi pi ling /_/a shwa gan+d+ha yungs dkar ser/_/ko shata ka'i rtsa ba dang /_/kar bI ra ru shi ka_/lo ma bdun pa pi pi ling /_/sa nag sbrang ma'i gnas dang ni/_/bye'u chu skyes srin bu'i sha/_/de bzhin seng phrom sdong bu rnams/_/'di dag lde gu til mar bcas/_/
[\[178b.2\]]ma he'i mar dang glang po rta'i/_/gcin dang bcas par bskol ba ni/_/bskus na rna ba 'phel byed mchog_/ces bya ba la/_/nya lcibs la sogs pa dang sbrang mas brtsigs shing rang gi gnas su byas pa'i sa dang /_byi'u la sogs pa 'di dag btags te lde gur byas la
[\[178b.3\]]til mar dang bcas pa'i ma he'i gcin la sogs pa thal ches pa tsam gyi bar du bskol bas bskus na yang rna ba 'phel bar byed pa'i sman gyi mchog yin no/_/de nas na tshod ldan pa yi/_/sbyang ba byas nad rna chad gso/_/sna dang mnyam pa'i sha lpags ni/_/mkhur tshos las
[\[178b.4\]]ni bcad nas kyang /_/rna dang nye ba'i sha lpags ni/_/srab mo nyid du bzhar bar bya/_/de nas ras bal bcas pa yi/_/khab kyis mkhur ba btsem par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas mi na tshod dang ldan zhing gzhon par gyur pa sbyang ba byas nad rna ba chad pa de gso bar bste/_/de yang
[\[178b.5\]]nad pa de nyid kyi sna dang mnyam pa'i shing la sogs pa'i shun pa bcad la/_de dang mnyam pa'i pags pa dang sha mkhur tshos las bcad de rna ba dang nye ba'i sha dang pags pa de srab mor bya'o/_/de nas ras bal gyis skud pa dang ldan pa'i khab kyis mkhur ba nas mkhur bar btsems te
[\[178b.6\]]brtod par bya'o/_/sna bcad mtshon gyis bzhar nas ni/_/mkhur tshos las bcad pags pa yis/_/sna ni legs mer btsem par bya/_/kha yi dbugs ni dbyung ba'i phyir/_/snar ni sbu gu can gzhug bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna de bas de'i 'og sna bcad pa'i 'phro de
[\[178b.7\]]mtshon gyis bzhar nas mkhur tshos las bcad pa'i pags pa rlog ste/_pags pa steng du phyung la sna dang legs par btsems la glan nas legs par drub par bya'o/_/de nas kha'i dbugs dbyung bar bya ba'i phyir sna'i nang du sbubs can smyig ma la sogs pa gnyis gzhug
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]bar bya'o/_/de rjes til mar slon par bsku/_/rma ni sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku/_/khrag bcad pa yi sman gzhan yang /_/zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas gdab/_/de nas mar dang sbrang rtsis bsku/_/bcings la spyod pa bstan par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/
[\[179a.2\]]de'i 'og tu til mar slon par bskus la/_/rma shing dang sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku pa dang /_/gzhan yang khrag bcad pa'i sman zhib tu btags pa'i phye mas bsku bar bya'o/_/de nas sbrang rtsis bskus te ras mas dkris la chu dron gyis nyer sbyod bya ba la sogs pa spyod pa bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[179a.3\]]de nas gnas skabs shes byas nas/_/rma gsar gso ba'i cho ga bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu gnas skabs kyi khyad par shes par byas la/_rma gsar pa gso ba'i cho ga 'og nas bshad pa dag bya'o/_/rma 'byor sna yi nye 'khor gyi/_/sha lhag legs par
[\[179a.4\]]gcad par bya/_/de nas shin tu zhib tu btsem/_/dma' ba dag kyang bskyed par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma de 'byor nas sna'i nye 'khor gyi sha lhag gang dag yod pa gcad par bya'o/_/de nas yang de bzhin du legs par btsems shing dma' bar gyur pa ni sha skyed
[\[179a.5\]]pa'i cho gas slar sha bskyed par bya'o/_bcad ma thag la ci rigs par/_/bzhag ste cho ga 'di nyid bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'phral du sna bcad ma thag pa la ni ci rigs par sna de nyid glan te gso pa'i cho ga 'di nyid bya'o/_/mchu bcad pa la sbu gu dag_/ma gtogs sna sbyar
[\[179a.6\]]bzhin du bya/_zhes bya ba la/_mchu bcad pa la yang sna'i nang du sbu gu gzhug pa ma gtogs pa sna sbyar ba'i cho ga thams cad 'di nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par
[\[179a.7\]]sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bco brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas sna nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_nam tshong yan chad kyi nad bshad pa'i skabs kyis na/_sna nad kyi nad gzhi la sogs pa bstan par bya ba'i
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/ba mo rlung dang rdul dang ni/_/smra drags gnyid log gnyid g.yar drags/_/sngas ni mtho dang dma' drags dang /_chu gzhan 'thungs par gyur pa dang /_/chu mang 'thungs dang nyal po dang /_/skyugs dang mchi ma bkag pa yis/_/
[\[179b.2\]]rlung shas che ba'i nad 'khrugs nas/_/sna ni sra ba nyid 'gyur zhing /_/cham pa skyed par byed pa yin/_/'phel na zad pa skyed par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ba mo la sogs pa'i nyes pa las/_rlung shas che ba'i nad 'khyugs shing ldang bar gyur nas/_sna sra zhing 'thas
[\[179b.3\]]la rgyas par gyur pas/_cham pa zhes bya ba'i nad skyed par byed pa yin no/_/de 'phel pa na ma bcos shing yal bar bor na zad pa zhes bya ba'i nad skyed par byed do/_/de la ba mo ni mtshan mo'i dus su nam mkha' las bab pa'i chu grang mo ba bas pa'o/_/drags pa ni gnyid
[\[179b.4\]]log pa dang /_ma log pa gnyis ka dang sbyar ro/_/sngas ni mal gyi mgo bo'i phyogs su bzhag pa gang yin pa'o/_/chu gzhan 'thungs pa ni sngar bstan pa dang mi 'dra ba'i chu gzhan 'thungs pa'o/_/gzhan dag ni go bar zad do/_/de la rlung gyur cham pa ni/_/kha skam
[\[179b.5\]]sbrid pa drag tu 'byung /_/sna 'gags zug cing na ba dang /_/mur 'gram so dang klad pa dang /_/smin ma nas ni sna rtse'i bar/_/srin bu rgyu ba snyam du sems/_/skad 'gags ring nas smin pa dang /_/mchil snabs grang bar 'dzag pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la sna nad cham
[\[179b.6\]]pa de dag gi nang nas rlung las gyur pa'i cham pa ni kha skam pa la sogs pa nas/_mchil snabs grang mo 'dzag par byed pa'i bar yin no/_/mkhris gyur skom dang rims kyis 'debs/_/mgo 'khor sna nang 'brum pa 'byung /_/rna rtse gnag cing dro la rtsub/_/mchil snabs
[\[179b.7\]]dmar ser 'dzag pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i cham pa ni/_skom dad la sogs pa nas mchil ma dang snabs rtsub pa dang dmar ba dang ser ba 'dzag pa'i bar yin no/_/bad kan lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/slon zhing lus lci yi ga 'chus/_/kha mngar
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]bro zhing g.ya' ba dang /_/mchil snabs snum dkar ska ba 'dzag_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i cham pa ni dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa yin no/_/'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/rgyu med 'phel dang 'grib par byed/_/ces bya
[\[180a.2\]]ba la/_nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las byung ba'i cham pa ni/_rlung dang /_mkhris pa dang /_bad kan dang gsum char gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /_de glo bur du rgyu med par ched 'ga' ni 'phel/_ched 'ga' ni 'bri bar byed pa yin no/_/nad khrag sna yi rtsar zhugs nas/_/
[\[180a.3\]]cham pas 'debs par byed 'gyur ba/_/brang na tshor ba med pa dang /_/mig dmar dbugs kyi dri mi zhim/_/mig dang rtsa ba sna g.ya' zhing /_/'di ni mkhris gyur mtshan nyid ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad khrag las gyur pa'i cham pa ni/_brang tshor ba med cing bem bem
[\[180a.4\]]par 'dug pa dang /_mig dmar po la sogs pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i cham pa'i mchan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/cham pa thams cad ma gsos na/_/gnod pa mi bzad skyed byed 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshad ma thag pa'i cham pa thams cad yal bar
[\[180a.5\]]bor na/_nad mi bzad cing drag po skyed par byed do/_/ji skad bshad pa'i bla brnan ni/_/'phel bas dbang po kun gnod byed/_/me drod nyams nyes dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa brang dang rtsib logs zug_/glo bur du ni shas cher 'khrugs/_/khra dri nga zhing skam par byed/_/sna
[\[180a.6\]]nang 'drul zhing skam pa dang /_/yang yang sna 'gags dag par byed/_snabs ni rnag 'dra dkar zhing dmar/_/dud pa can ni 'dzag par 'gyur/_/'di la srin bu snum zhing ring /_/dkar zhing phra ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_cham pas gnod cing ma rungs par gyur pa de ngi
[\[180a.7\]]skad bshad pa'i bla brnan 'phel zhing rgyas pas dbang po kun la gnod cing gdung bar byed pa dang /_/de bzhin du me drod nyams pa la sogs pa byed pa dang /_/de bzhin du yang dang yang du sna 'drul ba dang /_skam par byed pa dang /_sna 'gags pa dang dag par yang dang yang du byed pa la
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]sogs pa dang /_'di la srin bu snum pa las skye zhing 'byung bar byed pa yin no/_/de smin mtshan pa lus yang zhing /_/sbrid pa zhi bar gyur pa dang /_/snabs ni spyin zhing ser ba dang /_/dri dang ro ni tshor ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_cham pa de smin par gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni/_lus yang
[\[180b.2\]]pas dri dang ro tshong ba'i bar yin no/_/snabs sbyin zhing ser ba ni spra tshil lta bur 'byung ba'o/_/snar ni rnon po brngubs pa dang /_/nyi 'od skud pa rtsa sogs dang /_/rlung 'khrugs byed pa gzhan gyis kyang /_/sna yi mtshul par zhugs gyur pas/_/bskyod de rlung ni 'khrugs gyur pa/_/
[\[180b.3\]]sum mdor zhugs 'gyur 'gags nas ni/_/ldog nas mi bzad sbrid pa ni/_/snabs 'dzag bcas par skyed par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sna tsha zhing dro ba brngubs pas rlung 'khrugs par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du de dang 'dra ba gzhan gyis kyang 'khrugs nas sna'i mtshul pa'i rus pa
[\[180b.4\]]'jam pa gzhon nu bskyod cing bsgul bas rlang 'khrugs par gyur la/_de mtshul pa'i sum mdor zhugs pa dang /_rgyu ba 'gags te slar ldog nas sbrid pa mi bzad pa skyed par byed pa ste/_de'i ming ni cham pa ma rungs pa zhes bya'o/_/sna yi bu ga skem byed cing /_/rlung gis bad kan
[\[180b.5\]]skyed par byed/_/sna nang gra mas gang snyam sems/_/dbugs 'byung dkar bar gyur pa de/_/sna skams pa zhes bya bar bshad/_/sna rgyas pa ni 'byung 'gyur ba/_/sna ni bkag pa 'drar sems shing /_/rlung gis 'gag par byed par 'gyur/_/dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub
[\[180b.6\]]'gags pa las/_/bu ga gdangs pa ltabu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gis sna'i bu skams te bad kan skyed par byed pa la sogs pa'i nad de ni skams pa zhes bya'o drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/sna rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i sna nad ni sna bus shing brgyangs pa lta bur
[\[180b.7\]]'byung bar 'gyur ba la sogs pa yin no/_/mkhris pas sna khung rnags gyur pa/_/sha lbags tsha zhing gzer dang bcas/_/de ni sna yi shu bar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris pa 'phel bas sna khung gi nang rnags par gyur cing smin la de'i sha dang lpags pa tsha ba dang gze ba dang
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]bcas par 'gyur te/_nad de'i ming ni sna'i shu ba zhes bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur chu ser ni/_/chu 'dra rgyun du 'dzag pa dang /_/mchog tu mtshan 'dzag de ming can/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyur pa'i chu ser ni chu dang 'dra ba rgyun du 'dzag cing /_khyad par du mtshan
[\[181a.2\]]mo 'dzag pa ni de'i ming can de sna chu 'dzag pa zhes bya'o/_/bad kan 'phel bas sna khung du/_/bu ga 'gags shing cham pa skyed /_/dbugs ni ngar ngar por 'byin cing /_/cham pa las kyang nad tshabs che/_/sna las lug ltar rnag 'dzag cing /_/rgyun du spyi bag ser po dang /_/
[\[181a.3\]]smin ma'i rnag ni 'dzag 'gyur zhing /_/de yi sna ni snabs bcas yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna'i nang du bad kan 'phel bas sna khung gi bu ga 'gags par byas te dbugs ngar ngar por 'byin par byed la/_cham pa bas nad tshabs che zhing lhag pa dang sna'i nang nas lug ltar rnag
[\[181a.4\]]'dzag pa dang /_rnag de yang rgyun du 'dzag cing /_spyi bag la sogs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste nad de ni lug gi cham pa zhes bya'o/_/khrag gi sna ni tshig snyam sems/_/phyi dang nang du reg mi bzod/_/du ba lta bu'i dbugs 'byin pa/_/bsregs 'dra de ni 'bar ba yin/_/zhes
[\[181a.5\]]bya ba la/_/khrag 'khrugs pas sna'i nang nas tshig pa snyam du sems shing sna'i nang dang /_phyi rol du reg mi bzod pa dang /_du ba lta bu 'byin pa'i nad de ni bsregs pa dang 'dra ba yin pas na sna nad 'bar ba zhes bya'o/_/rkan gyi phugs su nad 'khrugs pas/_/rlung ni kha dang sna nas
[\[181a.6\]]'byung /_/mchil snabs dri nga 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de ni sna nad rul pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rkan gyi rtsa ba'i phugs su rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs pas rlung kha dang sna nas rlung 'byung zhing mchil snabs dri ma nam pa 'byung pa'i nad de ni sna nad rul pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/'dus pa
[\[181a.7\]]'am snad pa las gyur pa'i/_/rnag dang khrag ni sna nas 'dzag_/mgo bo tsha zhing na byed pa/_/de ni rnag khrag can zhes bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_snad cing rma byung pa las gyur pa'i rnag dang khrag 'dres pa 'dzag pa la sogs pa de ni mig rnag khrag can zhes bya'o/_/rlung gis mkhris pa
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]bad kan dag_/sna ni skams par gyur pa las/_/bad kan skams te gong por gyur/_/de ni bsgongs pa zhes bya'o/_zhes bya bal/_rlung gis mkhris pa dang bad kan sna'i nang du skams shing /_gong gong por gyur pa dag ni sna nad bsgongs pa zhes bya'o/_/'brum bu thor
[\[181b.2\]]bu nad gzhi yi/_/mtshan nyid ci 'dra dag las dbye/_/zhes bya ba la/_/sna'i 'brum bu dang /_sna'i thor bu ni nad gzhi gsum gyi mtshan nyid las ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya zhing dbye bar bya'o/_/kun las dbugs 'byung dka' pa dang /_/rgyun du chu 'dzag sbrid pa 'byung /_/sna 'gags
