[\[181b.3\]]lta bur smra ba dang /_/sna nas rnag 'dzag klad pa na/_/zhes bya ba la/_'brum bu dang thor bu'i nad kun las kyang dbugs 'byung bar dka' ba nas/_klad pa na ba'i bar gyi nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rnam pa bco brgyad las/_/cham pa ma rungs 'tsho ba tsam/_/zhes bya ba la_/
[\[181b.4\]]tshul de ltar sna nad rnam pa bco brgyad las cham pa ma rungs pa zhes bya ba ni re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du gsor rung pa yin la lhag ma rnams kyang gsor rung nyid yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges
[\[181b.5\]]par sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bcu dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas snad nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_go rims snga ma'i tshul gyis na le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/sna nad kun la dang por ni/_/rlung med khang par 'dug nas
[\[181b.6\]]ni/_/snum chos dugs dang skyug sman dang /_dud pa brngub dang mkhur bkang bsten/_/gos ni lci zhing dro ba bgo/_/mgo bo shin tu mthug pas dkri/_/kha zas yang skyur lan tshwa snum/_/dro ba dang ni bska ba bza'/_/bu ram 'o ma skam sa'i sha/_/lan tshwa tsha ba gsum shas che/_/
[\[181b.7\]]nas dang gra ni mang po dang /_/zho dang se 'bru'i khu ba bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna nad cham pa thams cad la ni kho nar rlung med pa'i khang par 'dug pa dang /_de bzhin du snum chos la sogs pa bsten pa dang /_gos lci ba bgo ba la sogs pa dang /_kha zas yang zhing skyur ba la
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]sogs pa bza' dang /_bu ram la sogs pa'i bza' btung bsten par bya'o/_/la phug gzhon nu'i khu ba dang /_/ku lad+tha yi khu ba'ang bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_cham pa de dag la la phug bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_rgya sran ku lad+tha bskol ba'i khu ba yang phan
[\[182a.2\]]pa yin no/_/rtsa bcu'i khu ba dro 'jam mam/_/chang snying dngas ma blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te skom par gyur na rtsa ba bcu bskol ba'i khu ba la sogs pa blud par bya'o/_/tsa rong ag+ni man+tha dang /_/shu dag zir go snyod snom/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na tsa rong zhes bya ba sman tsor
[\[182a.3\]]ka dang /_ag+ni man+tha la sogs pa btags pa'i thum po cham pa can gyis snom par bya'o/_/bal bu'i lo ma tsha ba gsum/_/dbyi mo da trig star bu dang /_/zir tsi tra srang gnyis gnyis/_/shing tsha gan+d+ha b+ha dra dang /_/sug smel zho ni gnyis gnyis dang /_/bu ram rnying pa srang lnga
[\[182a.4\]]bcu/_/bskol te ri lur byas pa ni/_/zos na cham pa dbugs mi bde/_/lud pa lu ba 'joms byed cing /_/skad snyan yi ga 'byed mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bal bu'i lo ma la sogs pa ji skad smos pa'i sbyor bas bskol te/_de thams cad las ri lur byas pa zos na
[\[182a.5\]]cham pa la sogs pa 'joms shing skad snyan par byed pa dang /_yi ga 'byed par byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/shu ti'i shun pa ba la dang /_/so na ka dang e raN+Da/_/bil ba'i rtsa pa dong grar bcas/_/zhag mar spra tshil dud pa brngub/_/ces bya ba la/_shu ti la sogs pa'i sman
[\[182a.6\]]zhag dang mar dang spra tshil dang bsres pa'i dud pa brngubs na yang cham pa la phan no/_/yang na phye dang mar dang bcas/_/kham phor sbyar ba'i nang du bcug_/bsregs pa'i dud pa brngub par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na phye dang mar sbyar ba kham phor nang du bcug pa'i dud pas
[\[182a.7\]]brngubs na yang phan no/_/khrus dang mya ngan khro ba dang /_/shas cher gnyid log chu grang spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_cham pa can gyis spang bar bya'o/_/de yan chad ni thams cad sbyi'i gso ba bshad pa yin no/_/rlung gyur cham pa rlung 'joms pa'i/_/sman ni bskol ba'i khu ba
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i cham pa la ni rlung 'joms pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya'o/_/lan tshwa lnga ni bskol ba 'am/_/bi da ri sogs sde bskol blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na sman gyi khu ba gnyis po 'di las gang yang rung ba dang bskol ba'i mar
[\[182b.2\]]blud na yang phan no/_/dugs dang sna sman la sogs bya/_/gzhogs phyed nar bshad gso ba'ang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rlung las gyur pa'i cham pa la dugs la sogs pa'am gzhogs phyed na pa'i gso ba gang dag yin pa de bshad par bya'o/_/khrag mkhris las gyur
[\[182b.3\]]thug pa ni/_/mar sar mngar ba'i sman bskol blud/_/ces bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i cham pa la ni sman mngar ba dang mar dang bskol ba'i thug pa blud par bya'o/_/sman chu blugs shing byug pa dang /_/nus bsil grang mo dag gis bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/yang
[\[182b.4\]]na khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i cham pa la ni nus pa bsil ba'i sman bskol ba'i chu grang mo blugs pa dang /_de'i lde gus bsku bal sogs pa bya'o/_/dwa ba'i shun pa 'bras bu gsum/_/shi ri par+Ni pri yang ku/_/shing mngar seng phrom til mar gyi/_/bcu 'gyur 'o ma skyer
[\[182b.5\]]par bcas/_/bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing dwa ba la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /_til mar gyi bcu 'gyur gya \u0f72'o ma dang skyer par bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur smyung ba dang /_/yungs kar lde gus mgo bsku 'am/_/zhes bya
[\[182b.6\]]ba la/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i cham pa la ni smyung ba'am yungs kar gyi lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/thal sman bcas pa'i blud de/_/slon gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_yang na bad kan las gyur pa'i cham pa la ni thal sman dang bcas pa'i mar blud la de'i 'og tu slon du gzhug
[\[182b.7\]]par bya'o/_/rgyam tsha tsha ba gsum/_/byi dang ga dang dug mo nyung /_/zi ra ra gcin sbyar ba yi/_/sna sman dag na gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgyam tsha la sogs pa ra'i gcin dang sbyar te btsags pa'i sna sman btang na yang bad kan las gyur pa'i cham pa la phan no/_/'dus
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]gyur tsha dang rno sbyar ba'i/_/mar gyi sna sman blugs pas gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i cham pa la ni sman tsha ba dang rno ba dang sbyar ba'i sman mar la sogs pas gso bar bya'o/_/gcong chen srin gso'i rim gyis ni/_/cham pa ma
[\[183a.2\]]rungs 'tsho tsam bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gcong chen po dang srin bu gso ba'i rim gyis ni/_cham pa ma rungs pa re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du bya'o/_/tsha ba gsum dang e raN+Da/_/thang shing ru rta byi dang ka_/bong nga dkar po ing+gu dang /_/dur byid pa rta ka'i sa bon/_/yungs kar
[\[183a.3\]]nye'u 'phral rus pa/_/ag+ni man+tha'i me tog dang /_/pi lu shi kru'i sa bon dang /_/rta sbangs khu ba gcin dang ni/_/glang po'i gcin dang gcin tu sbyar/_/zar ma'i skud dkris reng bu yi/_/dud pa kha dang sna nas brngub/_/ces bya ba la/_tsha ba gsum la sogs pa'i sman rta sbangs btsir ba'i khung
[\[183a.4\]]dang gcin dang glang po che'i gcin dang gcig tu sbyar ba'i reng bu zar ma'i skud pas dkris pa'i dud pa brngub par bya'o/_/smin dang sbrid pa 'byung zhes pa/_/sna sman rnon po bud pas phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_smin pa zhes bya ba dang sbrid pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i sna nad la ni sna sman rnon po'i phye ma
[\[183a.5\]]bud par bya'o/_/bca' sga ru rta pi pi ling /_/rgun 'bru byi dang ga'i lde gu/_/mar ram til mar bcas bskol ba'i/_/sna sman sbrid pa rnags pa sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_bca' sga la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /_mar ram til mar bskol ba'i sna sman btang na sbrid pa dang rnags pa sel
[\[183a.6\]]bar byed do/_/sna skam pa la ba la'i mar/_/btung sogs sha khur sbyar ba bza'/_/snum gyi dud pa dugs kyis gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna skams pa zhes bya ba'i sna nad la ni ba la'i til mar rlung nad gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa btung pa dang sna nas gtang ba la sogs pa bya
[\[183a.7\]]ba dang /_/de bzhin du sha khu dang sbyar ba'i kha zas bza' ba dang /_/snum gyi dud pa brngub pa dang /_/dugs bya bas gso bar bya'o/_/sna rgyas la yang cho ga 'di'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i sna nad la yang sna skams pa'i gso ba 'di nyid sbyar bar bya'o/_/sna rnags
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]'bar la mkhris 'joms sman/_/chu 'dzag sna sman sogs rnos bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna rnags pa dang sna 'bar ba snyam du sems pa'i sna nad gnyis la ni mkhris pa 'joms pa'i sman bsten cing /_phan tshun nas chu 'dzag pa'i sna nad la ni sna sman dang mkhur ba bkang ba la sogs
[\[183b.2\]]pa rnon pos bya'o/_/rnag can la ni bad kan gyi/_/gso ba dang ni 'dra bar bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna nad rnag can dang sna nad cham pa la ni bad kan gyi cham pa dang 'dra bar gso bar bya'o/_/rgya skyegs dang ni ka rany+dza/_/na le sham dang byi dang ga_/shing kun bu ram pi pi ling /_/
[\[183b.3\]]lug thug gcin sbyar sna sman ni/_/slon byas 'og tu gtang bar [(]ba[,]bya[)]/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna nad rnag can dang cham pa la ni slon sman btang nas rgya skyegs la sogs pa lug gi gcin dang sbyar ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya'o/_/shi kru dan da bri ha ti/_/tsha ba gsum dang lce myong tsha/_/
[\[183b.4\]]bye'u rug pa dang byi dang ga_/til mar bskol ba'i sna sman yang /_/btang na mchog tu phan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_shi kru zhes bya ba na le sham dkar po dang /_dan da dang bri ha ti'i sa bon tsha ba gsum la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i til mar dang bskol ba'i sna sman ni sna nad rnag can
[\[183b.5\]]dang cham pa la mchog tu phan pa yin no/_/rnag dang khrag can sar pa ni/_/khrag gi cham pa lta bur gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_rnag dang khrag can gyi sna nad sar pa skyes ma thag pa la ni khrag las gyur pa'i cham pa ltar gso bar bya'o/_/shin tu 'phel la rma 'khyims ltar/_/zhes bya ba
[\[183b.6\]]la/_rnag dang khrag shin tu 'phel ba la ni rma 'khyims pa ltar gso bar bya'o/_/'brum bu rmen bu tsha ba la/_/dan ti dur byid lce myong tsha/_/ldong ros dang ni pi pi ling /_/tsi tra ka yi lde gu ni/_/mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba yi/_/reng bu snar ni gzhug par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sna'i
[\[183b.7\]]'brum bu dang rmen bu tsha bar gyur pa la ni dan ti la sogs pa'i lde gu mar dang sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i reng bu snar gzhug par bya'o/_/shi kru la sogs sna sman yang /_/rnag can gso ba'i skabs su bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_'brum bu rmen bu'i sna nad 'di la ni/_/shi kru la sogs pa'i
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]sna sman yang phan pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas
[\[184a.2\]]kha nad kyi dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_/stod kyi yan lag yin pa'i phyir/_/go rims kyis na kha nad kyi nad gzhi dang rgyu la sogs pa bsten par bya ba'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no/_/nya dang ma he phag gi ni/_/sha dang la phug rjen pa dang /_/ma sha'i
[\[184a.3\]]sran tshod 'o ma zho/_/tsha dang bu ram shing kun dang /_/bur bran kha sbub nyal bsten dang /_/so shing gis snad goms pa spong /_/dud pa mkhur bkang skyugs pa dang /_/gtar ga dbug ni nyes pa yis/_/bad kan shas che'i nad 'khrugs pas/_/kha yi nang gi nad skyed
[\[184a.4\]]'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_nya dang ma he'i sha la sogs pa za zhing bsten par byed pa dang /_kha sbub tu nyal ba dang /_so shing gis snad cing ma rungs par gyur pa dang /_kha zas goms pa la mi dga' zhing spong ba dang /_dud pa brngubs pa la sogs pa nyes par gyur pa
[\[184a.5\]]dag gis bad kan shas che bar gyur pa'i rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs shing ldang bar gyur nas kha'i nang gi nad sna tshogs pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la rlung gis mchu gas 'gyur/_/mchu ral ba yi nad ces bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_de la kha'i nad de dag gi nang
[\[184a.6\]]nas rlung gis mchu gang gsar shing gnyis su byas pa de ni ming mchu ral ba zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/rlung gis mchu la gnod gyur pa/_/mchu sra nad tshabs che ba yin/_/mchu 'gas rdol bar 'gyur ba dang /_/gnag cing rtsub pa mchu 'khrugs yin/_/
[\[184a.7\]]zhes bya ba la/_rlung gis mchu la gnod par gyur pa'i nad ni mchu sra zhing rgyas te shing ltar 'dug pa dang /_shas cher na ba dang /_mchu 'gas shing zhig pa dang /_rdol zhing zags par 'gyur ba dang /_mdog gnag cing rtsub par gyur pa ni/_/mchu 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]mkhris pas tsha ba mi bzod ser/_/'brum phran yungs kar 'dra bas khyab/_/myung smin mang du rnags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mchu nad tsha ba'i dngos po mi bzod pa dang kha dog ser ba dang /_yungs kar 'dra ba'i 'brum phran gyis kun tu khyab cing
[\[184b.2\]]g.yogs pa dang /_myur du smin cing rnags pa dang /_rnag dang chu ser mang ba dang ldan pa ni mkhris pas gnod pa'i mchu nad yin no/_/bad kan las gyur grang ba yis/_/mi bzod pa dang lci zhing skrang ba dang /_/'brum phran dkar pos khyab pa yi/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan
[\[184b.3\]]las gyur pa'i mchu nad la ni grang bas reg na mi bzod pa dang lci zhing skrang ba dang /_'brum phran kha dog dkar pos tsem tsem por khyab pa yin no/_/'dus gyur sna tshogs par snang zhing /_/dri nga'i spyi bag 'dzag pa dang /_/glo bur shas cher skrang zhing zhum/_/na dang min rnag
[\[184b.4\]]mi snyoms/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i mchu nad dog sna tshogs par snang ba dang /_mchu'i ljan ljin dri mi zhim pa dang /_/spyi bag nal nal por 'dzag pa dang /_glo bur du rgyu med par lan 'ga' ni shas cher skrangs pa dang /_phyed 'ga' ni zhum zhing
[\[184b.5\]]skrang /_lan 'ga' ni na/_lan 'ga' ni na bar mi byed pa dang /_rnag cing smin pa mi snyoms te/_lan 'ga' ni myur du smin la/_lan 'ga' ni ring nas smin pa yin no/_/khrag las gyur pa khrag 'dzag cing /_/khrag gi mdog dang 'dra ba dang /_/'di la 'bra go lta bu yi/_/
[\[184b.6\]]khrag zad chu bur 'byung ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i mchu nad ni rgyun du khrag 'dzag pa dang khrag gi mdog can du snang ba dang mchu nad 'di la khrag zad par gyur pa dang /_chu bur 'bra go lta bu 'phyang ba yin no/_/sha gyur sha yi gong po 'dra/_/rim gyis
[\[184b.7\]]srin bu skye zhing 'gul/_/zhes ba la/_sha las gyur pa'i mchu nad ni sha'i gong po 'dra bar gyur pa dang rim gyis sran bu skye zhing 'gul bar gyur pa yin no/_/tshil gyur g.ya' zhing 'drul ba dang /_/skrang 'jam til mar lta bur 'dzag_/ces bya ba la/_/tshil gyi gnod
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]pa las gyur pa'i mchu nad g.ya' zhing 'drul pa dang /_skrang zhing ljan ljin dang chu ser til mar lta bu 'dzag cing 'jam por 'dug pa yin no/_/snad pa las gyur gas pa dang /_/yang dang yang du 'byed 'gyur la/_/slar yang 'drub par 'gyur pa dang /_/mchu
[\[185a.2\]]ni g.ya' bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_snad cing rma byung ba las mchu nad du gyur pa ni/_yang dang yang du gas par 'gyur ba dang /_yang dang yang du 'bye par 'gyur ba dang /_/slar yang de las 'drubs te rmen bur 'gyur pa dang /_mchu de yang dang yang du g.ya' bar byed
[\[185a.3\]]pa yin no/_/rlung dang bad kan 'dres pa las/_/chu yi chu bur lta bur 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang bad kan 'dres par gyur pa las mchu nad chu'i chu bur lta bur mtho ba dag 'byung ba ni/_mchu nad chu'i chu bur zhes bya ste/_/de ltar na mchu'i nad bcu gcig tu bshad pa yin no/_/
[\[185a.4\]]mkhur ba'i 'bras 'byed skrang zhing brtan/_/mkhur ba tsha zhing rims dang bcas/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhur tshos su skrang zhing brtan pa dang /_mkhur ba tsha ba 'ur 'ur por gyur cing rims dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni mkhur bar 'bras 'byed pa'i nad ces bya ste/_de ltar na mkhur
[\[185a.5\]]pa'i nad ni gcig yin no/_/rlung gyur so nad dro la sred/_/grang bas reg na lhag par na/_/gzer zhing bcag pa snyam du sems/_/grang bas zhig par de bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i so'i nad dro ba la sred cing bstan pa bzod pa dang /_grang bas reg na
[\[185a.6\]]lhag par na zhing lhang lhang por zug pa dang /_de bzhin du gzer ba dang na bas bcag cing 'brul pa snyam du sems pa'i so nad de grang bas zhig pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung dang chu yis so brtse ba/_/grang dang skyur ba mi bzod par/_/skyur ba zos pa nyid kyis 'gyur/_/nad bcas 'gul par
[\[185a.7\]]byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_so brtse ba zhes bya ba'i nad ni rlung dang grang ba la sogs pa sos bsten par mi bzod pa dang /_nad de yang skyur pa zos pa nyed las gyur pa dang de bzhin du nad dang bcas shing 'gul bar byed pa yin no/_/sogs so ni zegs pa dang /_/na zhing zug la
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]g.yo ba yin /_/zhes bya ba la/_so zegs shing na ba la sogs pa yin no/_/so 'gul so ni g.yo ba dang /_/za ba'i tsha na lhag par na/_/zhes bya ba la/_so 'gul ba zhes bya ba'i nad ni so g.yo zhing ldeg pa dang /_lhag par yang zas za ba'i tshe na na par gyur pa yin no/_/so sto so ni
[\[185b.2\]]mi sdug par/_/so rnams skye bar 'gyur pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_so sto zhing mi sdug par gyur pa skye bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/so lhag so ni skyes pa ste/_/de ni 'phel ba zhes kyang bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_so rnams las gang lhag pa'i so skyes par gyur pa de ni/_so lhag
[\[185b.3\]]ces bya ba'i so nad yin te de ni slob dpon la las de so 'phel ba'i nad yin no zhes zer ro/_/skye bar 'gyur ba'i tshe na ni/_/na zhing skyes nas de zhi byed/_/ces bya ba la/_so lhag de skye bar 'gyur pa'i tshe na ni shin tu na bar 'gyur la/_de skyes zin nas ni zhe bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/ma
[\[185b.4\]]bkrus so yi dri ma 'am/_/bad kan rlung gis skams pa las/_/dri nga brtan gyur so dreg yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha ma sbyangs shing ma bkrus la so shing la sogs pas dag pa ram byas pa'i so'i dri ma gang dag yod pa de rlung gis skam par byas pa las so dreg dri mi zhim zhing brtan
[\[185b.5\]]par chags pa'i nad de ni ming so dreg ces bya'o/_/de ni yal bar bor ba las/_/so ni dum bur zegs gyur pa/_/grugs shing so ni gogs pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nyid yal bar bor na so nad khar lta bu zhes bya ba 'byung ngo /_/yang gang gis so dum bu dum bur yang dang yang
[\[185b.6\]]gogs pa de ni dum bur gogs pa'i so nad ces bya'o/_/khrag dang mkhris pa rlung gis so/_/sngon por gyur pa so sngon yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_so khrag dang mkhris pa dang /_/rlung gi nad zhugs par gyur pas so'i mdog sngon por gyur pa ni so sngon gyi nad ces bya'o/_/nad kyi
[\[185b.7\]]rlung ni shas cher 'gyur/_/rtsa bar bcas pa'i so la brten/_/so dbus skams te stong par byas/_/so ni zas kyi dri mas gang /_/rul bas srin bu phra mo ni/_/skye bar 'gyur te de 'og tu/_/rgyu med ba rnag dka' ldang du ba can/_/sbom che gnas la shas cher na/_/bcad pa 'drar
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]snang rnag khrag 'dzag_/de ni so srin can zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad kyi tshogs rlung gi shas che zhing rgyas par gyur ba rtsa ba dang bcas pa'i so la brten cing gnas pas so'i dbus skams par gyur pa las so de'i nang khong stong du byas
[\[186a.2\]]la/_khong stong gi so der zas kyi dri mas gang ba de rul bar gyur pa dang /_srin bu'i rigs phra mo skye bar 'gyur la de'i 'og tu nad pa de la rgyu med par so'i nad ched 'ga' 'byung zhing ched 'ga' 'byung zhing ched 'ga' zhi ba'i ldang dub can du 'byung ba dang /_nad kun 'byung ba dang nad kun g.yo zhing bskyod pa dang /_/
[\[186a.3\]]mdog gnag pa dang /_shas cher na ba dang /_so bcad pa lta bur snang ba dang /_rnag dang khrag gi tshogs 'dzag par gyur pa'i nad de ni so srin bu can gyi nad ces bshad do/_/de ltar na so'i nad ni grangs bcur bshad pa yin no/_/bad kan dang ni khrag gis rnyil/_/rnags
[\[186a.4\]]shing rul par gyur pa dang /_/mnyen la zags shing gnag pa de/_/grang bas nyen pa yin par bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan dang khrig gi nad de g.yos par gyur pas rnyil rnags shing dri nga bar gyur la/_rul zhing 'drul la rgyu med par khrag rgyun du 'dzag pa dang /_/
[\[186a.5\]]de mnyen zhing 'jam pa dang /_khrag zags par gyur pa dang /_mdog gnag par gyur pa de ni rnyil nad grang bas nyen pa zhes bya bar bshad do/_/khrag mkhris rnags pa las byung ba/_/rnyil ni tsha bar byed pa dang /_/khrag gis skrangs ba mtho ba dang /_/g.ya' zhing khrag ni 'dzag pa
[\[186a.6\]]dang /_/khrag chad nas ni rgyas par 'gyur/_/so na 'gul zhing nad tshabs chung /_/kha dri mnam 'gyur nyer bdar yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rnyil gyi nad nye bar bdar ba zhes bya ba ni rnyil tsha ba 'ur 'ur pos khyab par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du khrag las
[\[186a.7\]]gyur pa'i skrangs pa de mthon por 'gyu ba dang /_de bzhin du khrag 'dzag pa dang /_shas cher g.ya' ba dang /_de bzhin du khrag de chad cing 'khyil bar gyur pa na ni rnyil gyi sha de rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /_so na zhing 'gul bar 'gyu ba dang /_nad tsha bas cung zad chung bar 'gyur pa dang /
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]kha'i nang dri mi zhim zhing mnam par 'gyur pa'i rnyil gyi nad de ni nye bar bdar ba'i nad ces bya'o/_/so ni gnyis sam gsum thad kar/_bad kan las gyur rgya shug tsam/_/skrangs pa sra zhing mi bzad na/_/myur du smin pa so 'bud yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_so gnyis sam gsum
[\[186b.2\]]gyi thad kar bad kan 'khrugs par gyur pa las rgya shug gi tshi gu tsam du skrang zhing sra ba dang /_skrangs pa de mi bzad par na zhing myur du smin par 'gyur ba de ni so'i sha 'bur ba zhes bya ba'i nad ces bya'o/_/rnyil ni nad bcas khrag gis ni/_/phyi dang nang du skrang zhing lci/_/na zhing
[\[186b.3\]]cha lags pa las/_/rnag khrag 'dzag so'i khong 'bras yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad dang bcas pa'i khrag gis rnyil gyi sha phyi dang nang du skrangs pa dang /_lci bar 'dug pa dang /_na zhing tsha ba 'ur 'ur pos gnas pa dang /_degs par gyur pa las rnag dang
[\[186b.4\]]khrag 'dzag par gyur pa ni so'i khong 'bras zhes bya'o/_/so rtsar khrag mkhris las gyur na/_skrang zhing nad dang bcas pa dang /_/kha chu 'dzag cing rnyil 'drul ba/_/khong stong gi ni nad ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_so rnams kyi rtsa bar khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad skrangs pa
[\[186b.5\]]dang /_kha chu 'dzag pa la sogs pa ni khong stong gi nad ces bya'o/_/'dug pa las gyur rims dang bcas/_/rnag dang bcas pa'i khrag 'dzag la/_/so yi sbrel mtshams zhig pa ni/_/khong stong chen po zhes bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_skrangs de nyid 'dus pa'i nad
[\[186b.6\]]las gyur cing skrangs pa dang /_rims kyis 'debs pa dang /_de bzhin du rnags dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa ni/_ming khong stong chen po zhes bya'o zhes drang srong chen po rnams kyis bshad do/_bad kan gyis ni so yi mthar/_/sha mdzer ltar skrang 'gram pa
[\[186b.7\]]dang /_/rna ba na byed sbyod la mnyams/_/de ni sha lhag ces byar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan 'khrugs par gyur pas sha'i mdzer pa lta bu'i skrangs pa 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_/des 'gram pa dang rna ba na bar byed pa/_rang gi spyod lam kha zas zab nyams par byed pa'i nad de ni
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]sha lhag skyes pa'am/_sha'i rmen bu zhes bya bar bshad do/_/rnyil ni bdar bar gyur pa las/_/nad tshabs chen por 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/gang zhig so ni 'gul gyur ba/_/de ni snad pa las byung yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_so shing la sogs pas
[\[187a.2\]]bdar cing brud par gyur pa las shas cher na ba la sogs par gyur pa'i nad de ni so snad pa las byung ba zhes bya'o/_/rnyil la brten par byed pa'i nad/_/gsor rung yal bar bor ba gang /_/nang du de ni nad 'dzag pas/_/des ni rgyun lam phra ba skyed/_/de ni yang yang rnag 'dzag cing /_/
[\[187a.3\]]pags pa sha dang rus pa 'bigs/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang gi rnyil la brten pa la ni nad gsor rung zhing bcos su 'dod pa gang yin pa dag yal bar bor bar gyur na nad de'i skyon nang du 'dzag pas de'i nang gi rgyun lam gyi bu ga phra mo bskyed la bu ga de las yang dang yang du rnag
[\[187a.4\]]'dzag cing pags pa dang sha dang rus pa 'bigs par byed do/_/de yang rang rang mtshan nyid ni/_/ji skad bshad pas lngar shes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_phra mor 'bigs pa'i nad de yang nad rang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par lngar 'gyur ba yin par shes par bya'o/_/de ltar
[\[187a.5\]]na rnyil gyi nad ni bcu gsum du shes par bya'o/_/lce ni sha kha'i lo ltar rtsub/_/tshor ba med gas rlung gnod yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gi nad kyis gnod par gyur pa'i lce'i nad ni/_shing sha kha zhes bya ba'i lo ma ltar reg na rtsub pa dang /_tshor ba med cing bem bem por
[\[187a.6\]]'dug pa dang /_kha mang du gas pa yin no/_/mkhris pas tsha zhing nad bcas 'gyur/_/mdzer pa dmar pos khyab pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pas gnod par gyur pa'i lce ni tsha ba 'ur 'ur por 'dug pa dang /_nad dang bcas pa yin la/_de bzhin du mdzer pa dmar
[\[187a.7\]]pos khyab par gyur pa yin no/_/bad kan las gyur shal ma li'i/_/tsher mas khyab gyur lci zhing mthug_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan gyis gnod par gyur pa'i lce ni shal ma li'i tsher ma 'dra ba'i sha'i mdzer pas khyab par gyur pa dang /_rang bzhin lci zhing mthug par/_/
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]gyur pa yin no/_/bad kan mkhris pas 'og tu skrang /_/mtho zhing gyong bar byed pa dang /_/smin na nya yi dra 'dra la/_/sha 'drul chu ser can zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis 'og tu skrang zhing mtho ba dang /_de nyid kyis ni lce gyong zhing srab par byed pa
[\[187b.2\]]dang /_smin cing rnags par gyur na nya rul ba'i dri 'dra la/_lce'i sha 'drul cing zhigs pa de ni lce nad chu ser can zhes bya'o/_/lce rtsa'i 'og dang 'brel pa ni/_/skrang zhing lce yi rtse mo 'dra/_/mdzer pa byung zhing kha chu 'dzag_/lce ni rings shing rtsub pa dang /_/g.ya' dang nad bcas tshig
[\[187b.3\]]mi thon/_/za bar mi nus lce lhag yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lce'i phugs kyi rtsa'i 'og dang 'brel pa de skrang zhing lce'i mo 'dra ba'i mdzer pa byung ba dang /_kha chu dang khrag 'dzag pa dang /_/lce rengs shing gyong ba dang /_kha zas za mi nus pa de ni ming lce lhag ces bya ba yin no/_/
[\[187b.4\]]de dang 'dra ba lce steng na/_/gnas pa nye ba'i lce zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshad ma thag pa'i mtshan nyid dang 'dra ba'i skrangs pa'i nad lce'i steng na gnas pa ni nye ba'i lce zhes bya ba'i ming 'dis bshad pa yin no/_/de ltar na lce'i nad ni drug yod pa yin no/_/rlung 'khrugs
[\[187b.5\]]pa ni rkan gyi shar/_/'brum phran sra zhing nad bcas 'gyur/_/mang zhing mthug la 'dzag par bcas/_/rkan gyi 'brum phran zhes de bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung gi nad 'khrugs pas rkan gyi shal gnod par gyur na 'brum phran sra zhing na ba dang bcas pa dang /_mang
[\[187b.6\]]ba dang /_mthug cing 'brum bu 'dus pa dang /_chu ser 'dzag pa dang bcas par 'byung ste/_/'brum bu de ni ming bad kan gyi 'brum phran zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/bad kan khrag gis rkan phugs su/_/nya yi lgang pa 'dra zhing 'jam/_/'phyang zhing
[\[187b.7\]]skrangs la spyi bag can/_/kha zas sna nas 'byung bar byed/_/lkog 'gags skom dang lud pa dang /_/slon byed lkog ma'i sha lhag yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan khrag dang 'dres pas rkan gyi phugs su nya'i lgang pa 'dra ba 'jam zhing rab tu 'phyang la sbyi bag can du
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]skrangs pa dang /_de'i dbang gis kha zas sna nas 'byung bar byed pa dang /_lkog ma 'gags pa la sogs pa skyed par byed do/_/nad de ni lkog ma'i sha lhag ces bya ba yin no/_/rkan gyi dbus su nad med sha/_/'dus pa rkan 'dus zhes bya'o/_/zhes
[\[188a.2\]]bya ba la/_rkan gyi dbus kyi phyogs su sha 'dus shing spungs pa nad med par skyes pa gang yin pa pa de ni ming rkan 'dus pa zhes bya'o/_/rkan gyi dbus su pad+ma 'dra/_/khrag las skyes pa chu bur yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rkan gyi dbus kyi phyogs su pad+ma 'dra bar skrangs pa khrag
[\[188a.3\]]las skyes pa'i nang gang yin pa de ni ming chu bur zhes bya'o/_/bad kan la 'khrugs pas ring nas 'phel/_/nad med rus sbal 'dra zhes bya/_zhes bya ba la/_bad kan 'khrugs par gyur pa las skrangs pa'i nad gang yang yun ring zhig nas 'phel ba gang yin pa de ni ming rus sbal
[\[188a.4\]]'dra ba zhes bya'o/_/bad kan tshil gyis rgya sran 'dra/_/nad med brtan pa 'bur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan dang tshil 'phel bar gyur pa las skrang nad gang rgya sran gyi dbyibs 'dra zhing yun ring du gnas par 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ming 'bur ba zhes bya'o/_/mkhris
[\[188a.5\]]pas rnags pa smin zhes bya/_/rnag 'dzag nad dkyel che ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa 'khrugs pas rkan gyi nang du rnags par gyur pa ni smin pa zhes bya'o/_/de ni rnag 'dzag pa dang nad kyi dkyil che ba yin no/_/rlung mkhris las gyur cha nyon mongs/_/rkan skam de yi ming
[\[188a.6\]]can yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rkan gyi nad tsha zhing skrangs pa de shas cher sdug bsngal ba dang /_rkan gyi phyogs skam pa gang yin pa de ni de'i ming can te rkan skam pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar na rkan gyi nad rnam pa brgyad yin no/_/lce dang 'brel pa lkog
[\[188a.7\]]ma'i nad/_/sha yi myu gu myur 'phel zhing /_/mi bzad lam ni 'gog byed pa/_/myur gsod byed pa gag pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lkog ma'i phyogs su lce dang 'brel cing lce rtsa las byung ba lkog ma'i nang sha'i myu gu lta bu'i sha lhag skye zhing 'phel bar byed la/_mi bzad
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]cing brnag par dka' ba lkog ma'i lam 'gog par byed pa myur du gsod cing 'joms par byed pa gang yin pa de ni mig gag pa zhes bya'o/_/de ni rlung gyur lkog ma kha/_/skam byed 'gram ba rna nad skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_gag pa de rlung las gyur pa la ni lkog ma dang kha
[\[188b.2\]]skam par byed pa dang /_'gram pa dang rna ba'i nad skyed par byed pa yin no/_/mkhris pas rims skom rmongs bag can/_/lkog 'gags dud bas bdugs snyam sems/_/myur smin myur du 'phel ba dang /_/dmar zhing reg na mi bzod byed/_/ces bya ba la/_mkhris
[\[188b.3\]]pa las gyur pa'i gag pa ni rims dang skom dad la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing lkog ma 'gags pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no/_/bad kan gyis dkar 'byar bag can/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i gag pa'i mtshan nyid ni dkar zhing mdog
[\[188b.4\]]skya ba dang sbyin zhing 'byar bag can du 'dug pa yin no/_/khrag gyur 'brum bus khyab pa dang /_/me mdag 'dra zhing rna nad skyed/_/mkhris pa las gyur mtshan nyid mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag 'khrugs pa las gyur pa'i gag pa ni 'brum bu phra mos khyab pa dang /_me mdag
[\[188b.5\]]dang reg pa'i tshul 'dra ba'am mdog 'dra ba dang /_rna ba gnyis na bar byed pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gag pa'i mtshan nyid dang mthun pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/'dus gyur rnag phugs gting ring zhing /_/mtshan ma kun dang ldan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi
[\[188b.6\]]gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i gag pa ni rnag phugs gting ring zhing zab ste mi mngon pa dang /_rlung la sogs pa'i mtshan pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/bad kan shas cher skrangs ba dang /_/rmen bu rgya shug 'dra zhing mtho/_/gra ma tsher mas gang snyam byed/_/lam
[\[188b.7\]]'gag byed pa rtsa ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad las bad kan shas che bar gyur pas ni/_lkog ma'i phyogs skrangs pa dang /_/rmen bu sha khyud rgya shug gi dbyibs 'dra zhing mtho ba skye ba dang /_gra ma 'am tsher mas nang du gang ba snyam byed pa dang /
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]lkog ma'i ngos na 'gag par byed pa ni/_/ming pad+ma 'am/_ku muda'i rtsa ba 'dra pa'i phyir rtsa ba zhes bya'o/_/blum zhing mtho la tsha ba dang /_/lkog ma'i ngos gnas 'dus pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lkog ma'i ngos na gnas pa'i skrangs pa'i nad zlum pa la
[\[189a.2\]]sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can de ni ming 'dus pa zhes bya'o/_/'gram pa'i mtshams gnas mgul pa'i nad/_/ras bal sa bon lta bur zlum/_/spyi bag nad tshabs chung bar skrang /_/sra ba mchu rtse can zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mgul pa'i phyogs su skrangs pa'i nad dgang
[\[189a.3\]]bal gyi sa bon dang dbyibs 'dra ba'i zlum po spyi bag can shas cher min ba skrang zhing sra pa de ni ming mchu rtse can zhes bya'o/_/phyi dang nad du mi bzad skrang /_/lkog ma'i lam gyi gtan pa 'dra/_/mgo lci snum dang kha chu 'dzag_/rims skyed lkog mchu 'dzings pa yin/_/zhes
[\[189a.4\]]bya ba la/_lkog ma'i phyogs su skrangs pa'i nad gang phyi nang du shas cher skrang zhing lkog ma'i rgyun lam gyi gtan pa 'dra bar skye zhing mgo bo lci ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni/_lkog ma'i mchu 'dzings pa zhes bya'o/_/skrangs pa shas cher min zhing /_/chu zheng de dar gdu bu
[\[189a.5\]]yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lkog ma'i phyogs su skrangs pa gang nad tshabs chung zhing dpangs rgyar chu dang zheng gdu bu dang 'dra bar skrangs pa'i nad gang yin pa de ni ming gdu bu zhes bya ste/_/gdu bu dang dbyibs 'dra ba'i phyir ro/_/nad kyis lkog mar sha mdzer ni/_/gcig gam mang
[\[189a.6\]]skyes nad tshabs chung /_/dbugs 'byin dka' zhing zas ming dka'/_/rtsa ba che ba lkog ma'i mtshan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs par gyur pas lkog ma'i gnas su sha'i mdzer pa gcig gam/_mang po 'byung bar gyur cing dbugs 'byin par dka' ba
[\[189a.7\]]la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa de ni lkog ma'i mtshon zhes bya'o/_/sha yi mdzer pa mang pos khyab/_/rab skam tsha la mgo po na/_/mdung ltar shin tu nad skyed byed/_/mdzer pas khyab pas mdung 'dra yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha'i mdzer pa mang pos khyab cing g.yogs
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]pa rab tu skom pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i mdzer pa mar po mdung ltar shin tu nad skyed par byed pa'i lkog ma'i nad de ni mdung lta bu'i nad ces bya'o/_/lkog ma kun ni myur khyab cing /_/myur skye myur smin shas cher na/_/rul ba'i rnag 'dra 'dzag gyur pa/_/skrags pa lkog
[\[189b.2\]]ma'i khong 'bras yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lkog mar skrangs pas khyab pa'i nad gang lkog ma thams cad khyab par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du myur du smin par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du shas cher na ba la sogs pa'i nad de ni lkog ma'i khong 'bras zhes bya'o/_/lce yi
[\[189b.3\]]mtha' ma lkog ma sogs/_/skrang zhing smin pa med pa'i nad/_/skrang zhing smin pa med pa'i nad /_/brtan pa khrag gis skyed byed pa/_/nad med lkog ma'i rmen bu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lce'i mtha' ma dang lkog ma'i phyogs la sogs par skrangs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de ni lkog ma'i rmin bu
[\[189b.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/rlung dang bad kan tshil gyis ni/_/lkog ma'i phyi rol lba ba skyes/_/de ni 'phel bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/rlig par ltar 'phyang na ba med/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung dang bad kan dang tshil gyis nad 'khrugs par gyur pa las/_lkog ma'i phyi rol du lba ba skyes par gyur cing /_/
[\[189b.5\]]de shas cher na ba med la rlig pa ltar 'phyang ba yin no/_/de ni rlung gyur dmar ba'am gnag_/na zug rtsa ris nag por bcas/_/'phel bas lkog ma kha skam zhing /_/lce yis ro mi tshor bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_lkog ma'i lba ba de rlung shas che ba las gyur pa yin na ni/_/
[\[189b.6\]]dmar ba 'am shas cher gnag par snang zhing na zhing zug pa shas che bar gyur pa dang /_rtsa'i ri mo nag po dang bcas pa dang /_de 'phel bar gyur na lkog ma skams pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/bad kan las lci reg na grang /_/brtan zhing skya la g.ya'
[\[189b.7\]]dang bcas/_/'phel na rkan dang lkog mar chags/_/kha ni mngar ba bro bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_lkog ma'i lba ba de bad kan las gyur pa'i rang bzhin lci ba dang /_reg cing mya ngan grang ba la sogs pa yin la/_de 'phel bar gyur na bad kan dang lkog ma'i phyogs su spyi bag
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]can chags par 'gyur ba dang /_kha'i nang ro mngar ba bro bar byed pa yin no/_/tshil gyur bad kan lta bur na/_/de ni 'phel 'bri lus 'dar byed/_/'phel bar byed ba'i tshe na ni/_/lkog mar sgra bcas skad gsang nyams/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshil
[\[190a.2\]]'phel ba las gyur pa'i lba ba ni bad kan gyi lba ba dang rang bzhin 'dra zhing de ched 'ga' ni 'phel la/_ched 'ga' ni 'bri bar byed de/_tshil rgyas na ni 'phel la/_tshil brin 'dri bar shes par bya'o/_/gzhan yang lba ba 'phel bar byed ba'i tshe na ni lkog mar sgra ngar ngar po dang bcas pa
[\[190a.3\]]dang /_skad gsang nyams shing chung bar 'gyur ro/_/bad kan gyis ni rlung rgyun bkag_/lkog skam skad gsang nyams pa dang /_dka' bas dbugs 'byin mun zhugs snyam/_/rlung las skad nyams gang yin 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan 'khrugs par gyur pa
[\[190a.4\]]las gang gi tshe rlung rgyu ba'i rgyun bkag par 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin du mi de lkog ma skams pa dang /_skad gsang shin tu nyams par 'gyur ba dang /_dbugs nyam thag par 'byin pa dang /_mun par zhugs pa snyam du mun 'thibs zhes byed par 'gyur ba dang /_rlung gi nad
[\[190a.5\]]gang gis skad gsang nyams pa zhes bya bar nyams par 'gyur te/_de ltar na lkog ma'i nad bco brgyad yin no/_/rlung ni kun tu 'gro byed pas/_/kha nang rma ni 'pho bar byed/_/dmar la rtsub pa skyed byed cing /_/mchu dmar pags pa lhod pa dang /_/lce yis grang ba mi bzod
[\[190a.6\]]lci/_/gas shing tsher mas khyab 'drar snang /_/kha mnam gdangs par dka' ba ni/_/kha yi shu ba zhes byar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung kun 'gro ba g.yo bar byed pas kha'i nang du rma 'pho zhing yan man du gnas 'pho bar byed ba dang /_mdog dmar zhing rtsub pa skyed par byed
[\[190a.7\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du mchu zangs ltar dmar ba dang /_pags ba lhod cing 'gul ba dang /_/lces grang ba mi bzod cing rang bzhin lci ba dang /_mchu gas shing tsher mas khyab pa ltar snang ba dang /_rnags shing shu ba byung bas kha gdangs pa bka' bar gyur pa'i nad de ni ming
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]kha'i shu ba zhes bshad do/_/bad kan bzhang 'brum skran sogs kyis/_/'og tu gnod bar byas pa'i rlung /_/gyen 'byung kha ni dri mi zhim/_/de ni steng gi rkub ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan la sogs pas rlung 'og tu rgyu ba bkag par gyur pas gnod par gyur na/_rlung
[\[190b.2\]]de gyen du 'byung bas kha de dri mi zhim par 'gyur te/_de'i ming ni steng gi rkub ces bya ste/_'phyen gyi rlung steng du 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/mkhris gyur kha shu ka rnag cing /_/tsha na kha ni cha bro la/_/rma la lan tshwas byugs snyam sems/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i
[\[190b.3\]]kha'i shu ba ni kha rnags par 'gyur ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_na ba dang /_kha'i nad tshwa bro bar 'gyur ba dang /_rma lan tshwa byugs shing bskus pa dang 'dra bar 'gyu ba yin no/_/khrag las gyur pa'ang de dang 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i kha shu ni mkhris pa las
[\[190b.4\]]gyur pa'i kha shu dang mtshan nyid 'dra bar shes par bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur kha mngar bro/_/g.ya' zhing rma ne 'byil bag can/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i kha shu ni/_kha'i nang ro mngar ba bro ba dang /_shu pa'i rma de g.ya' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can
[\[190b.5\]]yin no/_/mkhur tshos nang du brtan nas ni/_/'brum bu gnag cing [(]skye ba [,]skya ba [)]'byung /_/de ni mnye zhing bcad pa dang /_/bskyod na 'phel bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan 'phel bar byed pa mkhur tshos kyi nang du brten cing gnas na 'brum bu gnag cing [(]skya ba [,]skye ba [)]'byung bar
[\[190b.6\]]'gyur te/_'brum bu de lag pas mnye zhing bskyod pa la sogs pa byas na/_slar 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/nad ni khrag bcas gyur kha shu/_/kha shu nad ni khrag bcas 'gyur/_/'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad khrag dang
[\[190b.7\]]bcas pa las gyur pa'i kha shu ni/_mtshan nyid sngar smos pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin no/_/de nyid so shing la sogs la/_/mi dga' kha dri mi zhim 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad khrag dang bcas pa de nyid so shing la sogs pa la mi dga' zhing bsten par mi byed pas/_kha dri mi
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]zhim zhing dri ma nam par 'gyur ro/_/mchu dang mkhur tshos so rtsa dang /_/lce dang rkan dang mgul pa dang /_/kha dang thams cad dag gi ni/_/nad ni bdun cu rtsa lnga yin/_/bcu gcig gcig dang bcu dang ni/_/bcu gsum de bzhin drug dang brgyad/_/bco brgyad
[\[191a.2\]]brgyad po dag dang ni/_/de dag go rims bzhin du sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_mchu'i nang ni bcu gcig yid par bshad do/_/mkhur tshos la ni gcig yod do/_/so la ni bcu yod do/_/so rtsa la ni bcu gsum yod do/_/lce la ni drug yod do/_/rkan la ni brgyad yod do/_/mgul pa la ni bco brgyad
[\[191a.3\]]yod do/_/kha la ni brgyad yod do/_/de ltar na kha nad ni spyir bdun cu rtsa lnga yod pa yin no/_/so sto sha dang khrag gyur mchu/_/chu bur chu ni med pa dang /_/rkan gyi rus sbal 'brum phran dang /_/mid khong stong stong che mchu 'dzings/_/skad nyams so sngon steng gi rkub/_/mdung 'dra gdu bu chu
[\[191a.4\]]ser can/_/'dus gyur mid pa mchu nad dang /_/khrag dang 'dus gyur gag pa dang /_/so gogs so ni chag pa dang /_/smin pa'i nye ba'i lce dang ni/_/lkog ma'i lba ba skad nyams dang /_/dbugs mi thon pa lo gcig lon/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad de rnams kyi nang nas/_/so sto
[\[191a.5\]]ba la sogs pa'i nang ni gsor mi rung ba yin te/_so nad las ni so sto ba'o/_/mchu nad las ni sha las gyur pa dang /_/khrag las gyur pa'o/_/chu bur ram rmen bu las ni nang na chu yod pa'i chu bur ma gtogs par 'brum bu'i chu bur lta bu dang /_/rlung gi chu bur dang /_bad kan gyi
[\[191a.6\]]chu bur dang skrang pa gsor mi rung ngo /_/bad kan gyi nad las ni rus sbal lta bu dang /_'brum phran zhes bya ba dag gsor mi rung ngo /_/yang so nad las ni khong stong dang khong stong chen po gsor mi rung ngo /_/mid pa'i nad las ni mchu 'dzings dang /_skad 'gags pa dang /_yang so'i nad
[\[191a.7\]]las ni sngon po dang /_kha'i nad las steng gi rkub dang /_mgul pa'i nad las mdung 'dra ba dang /_gdu bu lta bu dang /_lce'i nad chu ser can dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa'i mid pa dang /_mchu nad dang /_khrag dang 'dus pa las gyur pa'i gag pa dang /_so gogs ba dang chag par gyur
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]pa dang /_smin pa'i nye ba'i lce yang gso dka'o/_/lkog ma'i lba ba la sogs pa lo gcig lon pa yang gso dka' ba yin no/_/so brtse sogs 'tsho ba tsam/_/zhes bya ba la/_so brtse ba dang gas pa'i nad gnyis ni re zhig 'tsho ba tsam du bya ba yin no/_/lhag ma mtshon dang sman
[\[191b.2\]]gyis gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_mchu la sogs pa'i nad lhag ma rnams ni 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul du mtshon dang sman gyi sbyor bas gso bar bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par
[\[191b.3\]]sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nye shu rtsa gcig pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas kha nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/mchu ral ba yi mtha' brud de/_/btsems la rma ltar gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mchu ral ba zhes bya ba'i mchu nad kyi mtha' ma brud
[\[191b.4\]]de/_gtsags bus brud cing zhal zhal byas te sbyar la legs par btsems te rma gso ba'i tshul ltar gso bar bya'o/_/shing mngar seng phrom kra ku ni/_/thal tres ut+pa la shra pa ni/_/mon sne'u dme ru pa to la/_/til mar bskol bas bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na
[\[191b.5\]]mchu ral ba la shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu dang /_til mar bskol bas bsku bar bya'o/_/rlung 'joms mngar ba'i sde tshan dang /_/bskol ba'i til mar sna sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang de la rlung 'joms pa'i sman gyi sde tshan dang /_mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan dang
[\[191b.6\]]bskol ba'i til mar sna nas gtang bar bya'o/_/rlung gyur mchu nad so rtsi pog_/sbra tshil gu gul thang shing ni/_/snum chen bskol ba'i ras bal dag_/sbangs pa'i ye'us glan par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i mchu nad la ni sra rtsi pog la sogs pa dang snum chen po
[\[191b.7\]]gang yang rung ba bskol pa'i nang du sbangs pa'i ras bal gyi yi'us glan par bya'o/_/shing mngar phyi mar bcas pa dang /_/de nyid kyis ni bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na shing mngar gyi phye ma dang /_snum chen po de nyid sbyar bas bskus na yang rlung las gyur pa'i mchu nad la
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]phan no/_/e raN+Da yi lo ma ni/_/'o mar bskol bas sbu bas dugs bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rlung las gyur ba'i mchu nad la/_e raN+Da'i lo ma 'o mar bskol ba'i sbu gu las dugs bya'o/_/mchu ral skabs bshad sna sman dang /_/mgo bo brta ba dag
[\[192a.2\]]kyang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na gong du mchu ral ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i sna sman dang /_de bzhin du mgo bo brta zhing bsku ba dag kyang bya'o/_/mkhris pas snad pa'i mchu nad la/_/srin bu pad pas khrag dbyung bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'am/_snang pa las
[\[192a.3\]]gyur pa'i mchu nad la ni srin bu pad pa la sogs pas gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/seng phrom sbrang rtsi sra rtsi pog_/shing mngar bcas pa'i phye ma gdab/_/ces bya ba la/_yang nad de la seng phro mal sogs pa'i phye ma 'am lde gus bskus na phan no/_/sle tres shing
[\[192a.4\]]mngar rma shing dang /_/bskol ba'i mar gyis bskus na 'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na khrag dang snad pa'i mchu nad la sle tres la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i mar gyis bskus na yang phan no/_/mkhris pa'i khong 'bras ltar yang gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dir mkhris pa
[\[192a.5\]]dang kha snad pa las gyur pa'i mchu nad la ni mkhris pa'i khong 'bras kyi gso ba ji skad smos pa dag kyang bya'o/_/khrag las gyur pa sar pa la/_/de dag nyid kyis gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i mchu nad sar pa yun ring du ma lon pa la ni mkhris pa'i gso
[\[192a.6\]]bar bshad pa 'di dag nyid kyis gso bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur mchu nad la/_pa to'i thal ba tsha ba gsum/_/sbrang rtsi dang ni sbyar bas bsku/_/gtar ga byas nas phye ma gdab/_/bad kan 'joms par byed pa yin/_/dud brngubs sna sman mkhur bkad bya/_/zhes
[\[192a.7\]]bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i mchu nad kyis nyen pa la ni pa to la la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gus bsku ba dang /_/gtar ga gdab pa la sogs ba bya'o/_/tshil gyur dugs byas dbral nas ni/_/me yis nges par bsreg par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshil las gyur pa'i
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]mchu nad la ni dugs byas la dbral ba la sogs pa bya'o/_/pri yang ku dang 'bras bu gsum/_/seng phrom sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshil las gyur ba'i mchu nad la ni pri yang ku la sogs pas bsku bar bya'o/_/chu yi chu bur brtol nas sbyang /_/sman rnon
[\[192b.2\]]sbrang rtsis bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_chu'i chu bur ni dang por brtol nas sbyang zhing dag par byas la/_sman rnon po pi pi ling la sogs pas bsku bar bya'o/_/gting ring pa 'am rab 'phel la/_/thang sman dag gam me btsas gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_chu'i chu bur
[\[192b.3\]]gting ring zhing nang du zhugs pa'am rab tu 'phel ba la ni thang sman nam me bcas bsreg par bya'o zhes bya'i don to/_/mkhur ba'i chu ser smin skabs su/_/skrangs pa'i nad ltar gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhur ba chu ser 'byung ba smin cing rnags par gyur pa'i
[\[192b.4\]]skabs su ni mdo'i gnas su bshad pa'i skrangs pa'i nad ltar gso bar bya'o/_/so grang ba la dugs bya ste/_/so rtsa brud de til mar bsreg_/ces bya ba la/_so grang bar gyur pa la ni dang por dugs byas la/_rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gtsags bus brud de til mar
[\[192b.5\]]bskol bas bsreg par bya'o/_/gla sgang rgyam tsha sbrang rtsi dang /_/se 'bru'i shun pa 'bras bu gsum/_/skyer pa'i khaN+Da 'dzam bu'i rkang /_/bca' sga sbyar bas bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang so'i phreng ba de gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/
[\[192b.6\]]'o ma can bskol mkhur ba bkang /_/e raN+Dapar sna sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_'o ma can gyi shing bskol ba'i khu bas mkhur ba dgang ba 'am/_e raN+Da'i mar gyi sna sman gtang bar bya'o/_/so brtse de bzhin bye ba la/_/rlung 'joms gso ba thams cad bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/
[\[192b.7\]]so brtse ba dang po gas shing bye ba la ni rlung 'joms pa'i zas dang skom dang sman thams cad kyis gso bar bya'o/_/til dang shing mngar sbrang rtsi ni/_/'o mar bskol ba'i mkhur bkang bcang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na nad de gnyis la til la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i khu ba
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]mkhur bar bcangs na phan no/_/so 'gul ba la ba bcu'i/_/khu ba mar bskol mkhur ba bkang /_/zhes bya ba la/_so 'gul ba'i nad la ni rtsa ba bcu bskal ba'i khu ba dang /_zhun mar ram til bskol ba mkhur bar bcangs na phan no/_/spangs ma
[\[193a.2\]]seng phrom pi pi ling /_/'bras bu gsum dang rma shing dang /_/rgyam tsha yis ni bdar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang so 'gul ba la spangs ma la sogs pas so bdar na yang phan no/_/snum bag gis ni sna sman dang /_/mkhur bkang gnas skabs ji bzhin bsten/_/
[\[193a.3\]]zhes bya ba la/_yang so 'gul ba la snum bag can gyi sna sman la sogs pa gnas skabs ji lta ba bzhin du bsten par bya'o/_/so lhag skyes la 'bras sman gyis/_/bskus te gogs par gyur pa dang /_/srin can so ltar phyung nas ni/_/de tshe de dang 'dra bar gso/_/zhes
[\[193a.4\]]bya ba la/_so lhag skyes pa zhes bya'i so nad la ni thal sman gyis bskus te gogs shing bye bar gyur pa dang /_srin bus zos pa'i so ltar phyung la/_de dang 'dra ba kho nar gso bar bya'o/_/khrag ni chod par ma gyur na/_/bsregs la rma ltar gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_so
[\[193a.5\]]lhag skyes pa de phyung ba'i tshe khrag chod par ma gyur na gnas de bsregs la/_de'i 'og tu rma ltar gso bar bya'o/_/so dreg chags la so rtsa la/_/gnod pa med par bsal bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_so dreg chags pa la ni so'i rtsa ba la gnod pa med par byas te/_so
[\[193a.6\]]brud pa'i gtsags spyad kyis de brud cing bsal bar bya'o/_/thal sman sbrang rtsir bcas pas ni/_/de yi 'og tu bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar so dreg bzhar nas thal sman gyi phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus so la bsku bar bya'o/_/so gogs pa la'ang 'di
[\[193a.7\]]nyid dang /_so brtser bshad pa'i gso ba bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_so gogs pa'i nad la yang so dreg chags pa'i gso ba 'di nyid dang /_so brtse pa la bshad pa'i gso ba thams cad bya'o/_/srin can so ni mi 'gul la/_/dugs byas nas ni khrag dbyung bya/_/snum gyis
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]bsku zhing mkhur bkang dang /_/sna sman kha zas rlung 'joms sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_so srin bus zos pa mi 'gul bar gnas pa la ni dang por dugs byas la khrag dbyung bar bya la rlung la phan pa'i snum gyis bsku ba la sogs pas gso bar bya'o/_/khong stong
[\[193b.2\]]bur ma sbra tshil gyis/_/gang ba'i thur mas bsreg par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_so khong stong du 'dug pa la ni bu ram mam spra tshil gyis gang ba'i thur mas de bsreg par bya'o/_/lo ma bdun pa a rka yi/_/lo mas bkang na srin gzer 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang khong
[\[193b.3\]]stong de la lo ma bdun pa'am/_arka'i lo mas bkang na srin bus zos pa'i zer 'joms par byed do/_/shing kun nag tshur kad pa la/_/swa rdzi ka dang byi dang ga_/ru rti phye ma ras la gtums/_/sor glan zug gzer myur du 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing kun la sogs pa'i
[\[193b.4\]]phye ma ras gtsang mar gtums te so'i steng du bzhag na yang zug gzer gyi nad myur du sel par byed do/_/yang na 'di nyid bskol ba yi/_/til mar mkhur bar dgang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na shing kun la sogs pa 'di nyid dang /_bskol ba'i til mar gyis mkhur ba
[\[193b.5\]]bkang bar bya'o/_/yang na bri ha ti rnam gnyis/_/bu ga dam pa e raN+Da/_/bskol ba'i khu bas mkhur ba bkang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na bri ha ti gnyis ni kaN+Da ka ri dang /_bri ha ti dang /_de la sogs pa sman gyi sbyor ba bya'o/_/de ltar gso ba mang po yis/_/nang ni zhi bar
[\[193b.6\]]ma gyur na/_/skam pa phra mo dag gis sam/_/so dbyung ba yi cha spyad kyis/_/dang por rtsa ba nas bslangs te/_/gtan nas de ni dbyung bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rnam pa de lta bu'i sman gyi gso ba sna tshogs pa dag gis nad de zhi zhing med pa ram song na skam pa phra mo
[\[193b.7\]]'am/_yang so dbyung ba'i cha spyad du byas pas de mi 'gul ba yin yang dbyung bar bya'o/_/til mar shing mngar phyed bcas pa'am/_/sbrang rtsis de'i mkhur bkang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar so phyung nas til mar dang shing mngar gyi phye ma sbyar ba 'am/_yang na shing
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]mngar gyi phye ma dang sbrang rtsir sbyar bas mkhur ba bkang bar bya'o/_/de 'og shing mngar bi da ri/_/brid ta ga dang ka shi ru/_/til mar bcu 'gyur 'o ma dang /_/bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i 'og tu bi da ri la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i sna
[\[194a.2\]]sman gtang bar bya'o/_/rid cing nyam chung rgan po dang /_/rlung nad kyis nyed so mi dbyung /_/ya so dbyung bar mi bya ste/_/de ni bla brnan mang po skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_rid pa la sogs pa dang /_de bzhin du gzhan dag gi ya so ni dbyung bar mi bya ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni nad kyi bla
[\[194a.3\]]brnan skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de yang 'byin na snum pa dang /_mngar dang bsil ba'i rim pas gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_/de ltar dbyung du mi rung ba de yang 'byin na snum pa la sogs pas gso bar bya'o/_/grang bas nyen la khrag dbyung zhing /_/sbrang rtsir bcas pas
[\[194a.4\]]bsku bar bya/_/gla sgang ardzu na'i shun pa/_/pri yang ku dang skyer khaN+Da/_/bca' sga sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_grang bas nyen pa'i so nad la ni khrag phyung la gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/de bskol bas ni mkhur bkang dang /_/
[\[194a.5\]]mngar sman til mar bskol snar blugs/_/zhes bya ba la/_gla sgang la sogs pa'i mkhur ba bkang ba bcang ba dang /_de bzhin du mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan dang til mar bskol ba'i sna sman gtang bar bya'o/_/rnyil ni nye bar bdar bal/_/chu tshan mkhur bkang bas dugs bya/_/
[\[194a.6\]]dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'am sha kha yi/_/lo mas mang du brud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rnyi la nye bar bdar bzhes bya ba'i so nad la ni/_chu tshan mkhur ba bkang bas dugs bya ba dang /_gtsags bu'i rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'am/_/shing sha kha la sogs pa'i lo ma rtsub
[\[194a.7\]]mos mang du brud par bya'o/_/rgya skyegs rma shing pri yang ku/_/rgyam tsha ru rta btsag yug snam/_/na le sham dang bca' sga dang /_/shing mngar skyer pa'i khaN+Da dang /_/mar gyi snying po sbrang rtsi dang /_/sbyar ba de 'og bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i 'og tu rgya skyegs la
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]sogs pa'i sman mar khu'i snying po dngas ma dang sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/_/mar khu 'am til mar mkhur spo ba/_/dro 'jam de yi rjes la bya/_de ltar byas pa'i rjes la mar khu'am til mar dro 'jam tsam gyis de mkhur ba bkang zhing spo bar bya'o/_/mngar
[\[194b.2\]]ba'i sde dang bskol ba'i mar/_/mkhur bkang sna sman byas na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba'am/_lde gu dang bskol ba'i mar gyis mkhur ba bkang ba'am sna sman bya'o/_/so 'bur bal dugs byas la/_/bcad dang dbug dang brud bar
[\[194b.3\]]bya/_/shing mngar bca' sga swardzi ka_/rgyam tsha'i phye ma bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_so 'bur ba'i nad la ni dugs bya ste/_bcad pa la sogs pa byas la/_de'i 'og tu shing mngar la sogs pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/so yi khong 'bras tsha rno dro/_/rtsub pa'i
[\[194b.4\]]mkhur bkang bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_so'i khong 'bras zhes bya ba'i nad byung ba la ni sman tsha ba la sogs pa'i khu bas mkhur ba bkang ba dang /_lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/pu tse shel dang ba spru ba/_/ru rta nas tshig 'khus phyes bdar/_/zhes bya ba la/_so'i khong 'bras de la pu tse
[\[194b.5\]]shel dang btags pa'i phyes bdar na yang phan no/_/bsil sman gyis ni smin mi gzhug_/smin nas dral la gting ring bsreg_/ces bya ba la/_so'i khong 'bras de nus pa bsil sman phyi dang nang nas btang bas smin du mi gzhug par rnags pa las zlog pa'i phyir
[\[194b.6\]]bsrung bar bya la/_smin cing rnags nas gtsags bus dral la gting ring bar 'dug na bsreg par bya'o/_/khong sdong bcad de brung nas ni/_/gla sgang seng phrom 'bras bu gsum/_/shu ti rma shing skyer khaN+Da/_/rgya skyegs shing mngar ka pa la/_/sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku bar bya/_/
[\[194b.7\]]zhes bya ba la/_so khong stong du gyur pa la ni/_/dang por brud cing bzhar la/_de'i 'og tu gla sgang la sogs pas bsku bar bya'o/_/de nyid khu bas mkhur ba bkang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na gla sgang la sogs pa'i sman de dag gnyid kyi khu bas mkhur ba bkang na phan no/_/
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]shing mngar seng phrom ngUr ba dkar/_/thal tres tsan+danaa ga ru/_/khur dkar po btsag yug snam/_/pad+ma dkar po stag tsher ba/_/bskol ba'i til mar sna sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na khong stong gi nad de la sheng mngar la
[\[195a.2\]]sogs pa'i lde gu dang bskol ba'i til mar sna sman btang na yang phan no/_/sha lhag skyes pa bcad nas ni/_/shu dag te dzo ba ti dang /_/pa tha nas tshig 'khus thal ba/_/swardzi ka dang sbrang rtsis bsku/_/zhes bya bal/_sha lhag skyes pa'i nad la ni shu dag la
[\[195a.3\]]sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/'bras bu gsum dang pa to la/_/nim pa bskol bas mkhur ba bkang /_/zhes bya ba la/_sha lhag skyes pa de bcad nas 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba blud na yang phan no/_/snad pa las byung nad la ni/_/
[\[195a.4\]]dkyil 'khor rtse mo 'dra bas sbyangs/_/de nas thal sman sna sman gtang /_/mkhur bkang la sogs bsil sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_snad pa las byung ba zhes bya ba'i so nad la ni dkyil 'khor gyi rtse mo 'dra ba'i gtsags bus so'i rtsa ba sbyangs shing dag par byas
[\[195a.5\]]la/_de'i 'og tu thal sman gyis bskus la sman bsil pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa'i sna sman dang mkhur ba bkang ba dag bya'o/_/lus kyi gong 'og nas sbyang bya/_/de 'og mgo bo'i bkru sman bya/_/so yi rtsa ni gsos nas kyang /_/phyung ste nad dang ldan pa yi/_/bu ram
[\[195a.6\]]spra tshil bkang bas bsreg_/ces bya ba la/_lus kyi gong 'og skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis sbyangs la/_de'i 'og tu so'i rtsar rgyu ba'i rtsa sbubs la gnod pa med par gsos la so phyung ste/_nad sna chogs dang ldan pa'i rtsa sbubs yan man kun khyab par byed pa bu ram
[\[195a.7\]]mam/_spra tshil gyis bkang ba'i thur mas bsreg par bya'o/_/dzA ti seng ldeng sbra tshil dang /_/gze ma bskol ba'i khu bas bkru/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rtsa de seng ldeng la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu bas bkru bar bya'o/_/'o ma can shing chus mkhur
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]bkang /_/de bskol til mar sna sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_'o ma can gyi shing bskol ba'i khu bas mkhur bkang bar bya ba'am/_yang na 'om can gyi shing gi lde gu dang bskol ba'i til mar sna sman gtang bar bya'o/_/rlung gyur lce ni rtsub pa la/_/
[\[195b.2\]]rlung gi mchu nad gso bar bya/_/zhes bya bal/_rlung las byung ba'i lce'i nad tsher ma ltar rtsub pa la ni/_rlung gi mchu nad kyi gso ba gang yin pa dag bya'o/_/mkhris pa las gyur lce nad la/_/bzhar te khrag ni dbyung bar bya/_/bsku dang mkhur ba bkang ba dang /_/
[\[195b.3\]]sna sman mngar ba dag kyang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur ba'i lce'i nad tsher ma lta bu byung ba la ni gzhar zhing gtar ga bya ste khrag phyung la/_de'i 'og tu mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan gyi lde gus bsku ba dang /_sman de dag bskol ba'i khu bas mkhur ba bkang ba
[\[195b.4\]]dang sna sman bya'o/_/de bzhin bad kan las gyur la/_/yungs kar tsha ba gsum la sogs/_/sman ni rnon pos gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du bad kan las gyur pa'i lce'i nad tsher mas khyab pa lta bu la ni snga ma bzhin du bdar la/_yungs kang
[\[195b.5\]]la sogs pa'i sman rnon pos bsku ba dang /_mkhur ba bkang ba la sogs pa bya'o/_/lce las chu ser 'dzag pa gsar/_/mtshon mi reg par de bzhin gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_chu ser 'dzag pa zhes bya pa'i lce nad las skyes nas ring por ma lon pa'i sar pa la
[\[195b.6\]]yungs kar la sogs pa'i sman bsku ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du byas la/_chu ser 'dzag pa'i nad de la khyad par du mtshon gyis bzhar ba dang gtar ga mi bya'o/_/lce lhag skyes pa lce bteg ste/_/lcags kyus lce lhag drangs nas ni/_/rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra
[\[195b.7\]]bas bcad/_/rno dang dro bas bdar sogs bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lce lhag skyes pa ni lce bteg ste lcags kyus lce lhag de phyir drangs nas/_rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gtsags spyad kyis bcad par bya zhing /_sman rno ba dang dro bas gtar ga la sogs pa
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]bya'o/_/nye ba'i lce la khrag gzags te/_/nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal bas bdar/_/zhes bya ba la/_nye ba'i lce la ni sha kha la sogs pa'i lo ma rtsub po 'am/_sor gdub lta bu'i mtshon gyis gtar zhing khrag gzags la/_de'i 'og
[\[196a.2\]]tu nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal bas bdar zhing brud par bya'o/_/sha lhag skyes la bad kan 'joms/_/sna sman mkhur bkang bdar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lkog ma sha lhag gam rmen bu skyes pa la ni bad kan 'joms par byed pa'i sman la sogs pa btang bas gso
[\[196a.3\]]bar bya'o/_/ga go nas pon lta bur ni/_/'phel zhing rtsa ni mi mngon dang /_/rtse mos lce yi rtsa bar slebs/_lcags kyu yis ni bzung nas kyang /_/rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yis/_/rtse mo rtsa ba ran par gcad/_/ces bya ba la/_lkog mar sha lhag
[\[196a.4\]]skyes pa 'phel bar gyur cing /_ga gon gyi sa bon dang 'dra bar skyes pa dang /_rtsa ris mi mngon par gyur pa dang /_lce de'i rtse mo lce'i rtsa bar babs shing slebs pa ni mu tsu tri 'am lcags kyus bzung la/_rtse mo dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i btsags bus de ran bar gcad
[\[196a.5\]]par bya'o/_/bcad drags khrag zags 'chi bar byed/_/bcad chung nad ni 'phel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_lce chung ngam sha lhag skyes pa bcad drags na ni khrag zags par byas nas 'chi bar 'gyur la/_rtse mo nas bcad dam chung na ni nad zhar la 'phel zhing
[\[196a.6\]]skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bong nga pa tha na le sham/_/shu drag ru rta pa ri la/_/rgyam tsha sbrang rtsir bcas pa yis/_/bcad pa dag ni bdar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_legs par bcad nas bong nga la sogs pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas bdar
[\[196a.7\]]zhing bskus na phan no/_/pa ri pe la ni kun tan na ta'o/_/pu tse shel dang bong nga dkar/_/pa ta nim par sna dang /_/shu dag chu yis mkhur bkang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bu tse shel la sogs pa de bskol ba'i khu bas mkhur ba dag dbar bya'o/_/'dus dang so 'dur
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]rus sbal 'dra/_/de bzhin bzhar te gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_so 'dus pa dang 'bur ba dang rus sbal 'dra ba'i nad la yang snga ma bzhin du bzhar te gso zhing bcos par bya'o/_/rkan rnags ma smin pa la ni/_/nag tshur sbrang rtsi skyer khaN+Da/_/bsku bar bya'o/_/
[\[196b.2\]]zhes bya ba la/_rkan gyi rnags pa'i nad smin par ma gyur pa la ni nag tshur la sogs pa'i sman gyis bdar bar bya'o/_/bsil dang mdar/_sman bskol khu bas mkhur bkang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_nus pa bsil ba dang /_ro mngar ba'i sman dang /_bskol ba'i khu
[\[196b.3\]]bas mkhur ba bkang ba byas na yang phan no/_/smin nas na ya'i gzhi ltar dras/_/dro dang rna bas bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rkan rnags pa smin nas ni mtshon gyis na ya'i gzhi ltar dras la mar sar dang /_sman dro ba dang rno ba sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/_/na ya'i
[\[196b.4\]]gzhi ni gang du na yang rtse ba'i gzhi spang leb la sogs par mig mangs ris su bris pa ste/_de dang 'dra bar dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gtsags bus ri mo mang por dra zhing dgas par bya'o/_/ba sha ka dang pa to la/_/nim pa la sogs rno ba yi/_/sman gyi khu bas mkhur
[\[196b.5\]]ba dgang /_/zhes bya ba la/_rkan rnags pa'i sman rnog po ni/_ba sha ka la sogs pa'i snan kha ba la bya ste/_de'i khu ba mkhur bar bcangs na yang phan no/_/rkan skam skom dad gdung med pa/_/zas zos rjes la zhun mar ni/_/bca' sga pi pi ling bskol blud/_/skyur
[\[196b.6\]]bse mkhur ba spob bcang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rkan skam pa'i nad skom dad kyi gdung ba mid pa la ni/_zas zos ba'i 'og tu zhun mar bca' sga la sogs pa bskol ba blud la/_de bzhin du chang dngas ma la sogs pa skyur bas mkhur ba spo ba bcangs na yang phan
[\[196b.7\]]no/_/skam sa'i sha khu snum pa dang /_/zhun mar 'o ma'i sna sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rkan skam pa'i nad de la/_skam sa'i srog chags kyi sha khu snum dang bcas pa zas kyi rjes la blud na phan la/_de bzhin du zhun mar la sogs pa'i sna sman btang na yang
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]phan no/_/lkog ma'i nad la gtar ga gdab/_/sna sman la sogs rnon po bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lkog ma'i nad thams cad la ni gtar gdab cing khrag dbyung ba dang /_sman rnon po'i sna sman dang /_mkhur ba bkar ba dang bsku ba la sogs
[\[197a.2\]]pa'i las byas na phan no/_/skyer pa'i shun pa skyer khaN+Da/_/dug mo nyung bskol khu ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_skyer pa'i shun pa la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba rkan gyi nad la blud par bya'o/_/a ru ra yi khu ba ni/_/sbrang rtsir ldan pa sbyin par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/
[\[197a.3\]]yang na a ru ra bskol ba'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa blud na yang lkog ma'i nad la phan no/_/'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/_/nas tshig 'khus thal skyer pa dang /_/tsi tra ka dang skyer khaN+Da/_/pa ta te dzo ba ti dang /_/nim pa tsha dang ra gcin bskol/_/mkhur ba spo dang ri lu
[\[197a.4\]]dang /_/phye ma gdab pa dag kyang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la lkog ma'i nad de dag la 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa dang /_tsha ba gsum la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i mkhur ba spo ba dang /_ri lu bcang ba dang /_phye mas gdab pa dag kyang bya'o/_/lcang ma gi ri kar+Na dang
[\[197a.5\]]gla sgang thang shing bca' sga dang /_/shu dag dan da mur ba yi/_/lde gu dro bskus skrangs nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_lcang ma la sogs pa'i phye ma dang sbyar ba'i lde gu dro 'jam tsam bskus na lkog ma'i nad kyi skrangs pa dang na ba sel bar byed pa'i na no/_/de nas phyi nang dugs
[\[197a.6\]]byas te/_/sor gdub cha spyad dag gis sam/_/rgyam tsha ldan pa'i sen mo yis/_/rlung gyur gag pa bzhag bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/de nas rlung las gyur pa'i gag pa la phyi dang nang nas dugs legs par byas la/_sor gdub lta bu'i cha spyad dam rgyam tsha dang bcas pa'i sen
[\[197a.7\]]mos brud cing bzhar bar bya'o/_/rtsa ba lnga bskol mkhur bkang dang /_/til mar mkhur spo sna sman gtar/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i gag ba de la rtsa ba lnga pa chen po bskol ba'i khu bas mkhur ba bkang ba dang /_de bzhin du til mar gyis mkhur ba spo ba dang /_/
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]sna sman dag byas na phan no/_/mkhris pa las gyur gtar ga gdab/_/kha ra sbrang rtsi bri yang ku/_/seng phrom rma shing bcas pa bdar/_/de bskol khu ba mkhur bar bcad/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i gag pa la ni/_dang bo gtar ga gdab cing
[\[197b.2\]]khrag phyung la/_kha ra la sogs pa'i sman gyis bskus shing bdar ba dang /_kha ra la sogs ba de dag bskol ba'i khu ba nyid mkhur bar bcang bar bya'o/_/rgun 'bru ba ru sha ka bskol/_/mkhur ba bkang pa'ang phan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na mkhris pa las
[\[197b.3\]]gyur pa'i gag pa la rgun 'bru la sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'di byas na yang phan no/_/khrag las gyur pa'ang de bzhin du/_/gtar ga gdab ste gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i gag pa la ni de bzhin du mkhris pa las gyur pa dang 'dra bar gso zhing gtar ga
[\[197b.4\]]bdab pa dang khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur gag pa yi/_/dud pa tsha ba'i sman bcas gdab/_/a pa marga'i 'bras bu dang /_/gi ri kar+Ni byi dang ga_/rgyam tsha tsan+Dan til mar bskol/_/sna sman mkhur bkang bya ba bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad
[\[197b.5\]]kan las gyur pa'i gag pa la ni/_khang pa'i dud pa la sogs pa'i sman gyis btab cing /_/a pa [(]ma[,] marga [)]la sogs pa'i sman bskol pa'i khu ba mkhur bar bcang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin 'dus dang rtsa ba dang /_/mchu rtse lkog ma'i mtshon la'ang bya/_/zhes bya ba
[\[197b.6\]]la/_lkog ma'i nad 'dus pa dang rtsa la sogs pa bzhi po dag la yang /_bad kan las gyur pa'i gag pa dang 'dra bar gso bar bya'o/_/khong 'bras khrag gzags 'bras bu gsum/_/gi lbang yug snam skyer khaN+Da/_/seng phrom rgyam tsha rma shing dang /_/pi pi ling
[\[197b.7\]]bsku mkhur bkang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lkog ma'i khong 'bras la ni 'bras la ni gtar gas khrag phyung la/_'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gus bsku zhing bskol ba'i khu bas mkhur ba bkang ba bcang bar bya'o/_/rlung las gyur pa'i lba ba la/_/dugs byas nas ni
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]khra gang byung zhing /_/til dang zar ma le brgan rtsi/_/pi la ya dang gso 'bras kyis/_/rma 'drubs nas bskus dkri bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i lkog ma'i lba bal ni dugs bya zhing gtar gas khrag phyung la rma 'drubs
[\[198a.2\]]par gyur ba dang /_til la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis bskus te dkri bar bya'o/_/shi kru seng phrom ta rka ri/_/ta la ha ti pi pi ling /_/ba spru ba dang a ru ra/_/arka'i rtsa ba po son cha/_/e ke+eShikar bcas pa ni/_/chang ngam rang skyur btags pas bsku/_/lde gus
[\[198a.3\]]yang dang yang du bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i lba ba de la shi kru la sogs pa'i sman chang ngam rang skyur kany+dzi dang btags pa'i lde gus yang nas yang du bsku bar bya'o/_/sle tres nim pa dug mo nyung /_/ha na sa pa ti bal gnyis/_/thang shing dang ni pi pi
[\[198a.4\]]ling /_/bskol ba'i til mar blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i lba ba la sle tres la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i til mar bskus na yang phan no/_/bad kan la yang 'di dag ni/_/bya zhing lhag par dugs bsku bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las
[\[198a.5\]]gyur pa'i lba ba la yang rlung las gyur pa'i gso ba 'di dag nyid bya zhing /_de las kyang lhag par dugs dang lde gus bsku ba dag shas cher bya'o/_/a za gan+ha bong nga dkar/_/a za shing gi bi sha l+ya/_/ku ba kha bo 'ol ma se/_/shi re sha dang rgya skyegs shing /_/thal
[\[198a.6\]]chu'i lde gu bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i lba ba la ni a za gan+d+ha la sogs pa'i sman gyi phye ma rgya skyegs kyi shi dang mthal ba'i chu dang lde gur byas la bsku bar bya'o/_/thal ba drag po gcin bskol btsags/_/khro rgod bza' zhing btung
[\[198a.7\]]bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_thal ba drag po ni rtsa'i thal ba dang chu btsags pa las byas pa ste/_ming gi rnam grangs chu'i thal ba zhes kyang bya'o/_/de gcin dang bskol ba btsags te khre rgod za zhing de blud na bad kan las gyur pa'i lnga ba sel to/_/dug mo nyung sogs
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]lan tshwa lnga/_/til mar lhan cig bskol ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na dug mo nyung gi sde tshan la sogs pa'i sman dang lan tshwa lnga po dang bcas bar til mar bskol la/_khre rgod bza' zhing de blud par bya'o/_/bad kan 'joms pa'i dud pa dang /_/slon sman sna
[\[198b.2\]]sman la sogs bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i lpa ba la dud pa brngub pa la sogs pa bad kan sel ba rnams bsten par bya'o/_/tshil gyur pa la gtar ga gdab/_/bad kan 'joms pa'i cho ga bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshil las gyur pa'i lba ba la ni/
[\[198b.3\]]snum chos byas la gtar ga gdab pa dang /_bad kan bsal ba'i sbyor ba bya'o/_/'di la a sa la sogs pa'i/_/khu ba gcin ni snga dro blud/_/ces bya ba la/_tshil las gyur pa'i lba ba la a sa na la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba'i khu ba gcin dang sbyar ba snga dro dang po'i cha
[\[198b.4\]]la blud par bya'o/_/des ma zhin thams cad ni/_/smin byas rma ltar gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lkog ma'i nad thams cad gso ba'i sbyor ba de dag byas su zin kyang zhi zhing med par ma gyur na/_de smin par byas pa rma'i gso ba ltar bya'o/_/kha shul ni 'bras bu gsum
[\[198b.5\]]pa ta rgun 'bru dzA ti ni/_/'o mar bskol ba'i sbrang rtsir bcas/_/kha ni bsku zhing bcang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha shu'i nad thams cad la 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi btab pa ste/_kha ra bcang zhing bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na
[\[198b.6\]]zin thig la sogs sde/_/gza' zhing bsten pa nyid du bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na kha'i shu ba la 'bras bu gsum la sogs bzos nas zin thig la sogs pa'i sde tshan bza' bar bya'o/_/rlung gi kha shur pi pi ling /_/rgyam tsha sug smel phye ma gdab/_/ces bya ba la/_/
[\[198b.7\]]rlung las gyur pa'i kha shul ni pi pi ling la sogs pa'i phyi mas gdab pa'am/_'de gus bsku bar bya'o/_/yang na rlung 'joms sman bskol ba'i/_/til mar sna sman mkhur bkang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rlung las gyur ba'i kha shul rlung sel ba'i sman gyi sde tshan
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]bskol ba'i til mar sna sman dang mkhur ba bkang ba byas na phan no/_/khrag mkhris gyur la khrag mkhris 'joms/_/bad kan las gyur de 'joms bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i kha shu la ni khrag dang mkhris pa sel ba'i cho gas phan
[\[199a.2\]]no/_/bad kan las gyur pa'i kha shu la ni bad kan sel bar byed pa'i cho ga bsten par bya'o/_/'brum phran sra zhing brtan pa la/_/sha kha'i lo ma sogs kyis bzhar/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i shur 'brum bu phra mo brtan zhing mi 'gyur bar gnas pa gang yin pa de la
[\[199a.3\]]ni sha kha'i lo ma la sogs pas bzhar zhing bsal bar bya'o/_/'dus pa las gyur gso ba ni/_/nang gzhi ji bzhin shas cher bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i kha shul ni nad gzhi gang shas che ba'i dbang du byas te gso bar bya'o/_/chu bur gsar zhing ma 'phel ba/_/
[\[199a.4\]]bcad la swardzi ka'i thal ba/_/bca' sga sbrang rtsi gdab par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdzer pa chu bur gsar du byung zhing ring po ma lon pa ma 'phel ba la ni dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gtsags bus bcang la/_swardzi ka la sogs pa'i phyi mas gdab par bya'o/_/de bskol mkhur ba bkang bar bya/_/
[\[199a.5\]]sle tres nim pa'i lde gu ni/_/sbrang rtsi til mar bcas pa'ang rung /_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar chu bur bcad nas sman snga ma de bskol ba'am/_sle tres la sogs pa'i khu bas mkhur ba bkang bar bya'o/_/nas zan za zhing til mar rnos/_/sna sman dang ni bsku byug bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang chu bur
[\[199a.6\]]can de la nas kyi zan bza' ba la sogs pa'i sbyor bar bya'o/_/kha dri nga la slon sman dang /_/dud pa sna sman rnon po gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_/kha dri mi zhim pa la slon sman btang la/_slon pa'i 'og du dud pa brngub pa rnon po dang sna sman gtang bar bya'o/_/btsod dang seng phrom da ta ki/_/shug pa pri yang ku yi chus/_/kha yi nang ni
[\[199a.7\]]bkru ba dang /_/phye mas kha ni dag par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang kha'i nang dri nga zhing mnam pa la sogs pa'i phye ma dang bcas pa'i chu dang kha bkru zhing dag par bya'o/_/grang nyen nye bar bdar bshad pa'i /_/sna sman la sogs bsten par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang kha dri nga ba la ni grang bas nyin pa dang nye bar
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]bdar ba zhes bya ba'i nad gso ba'i skabs su bshad pa'i sna sman la sogs pa yang bya'o/_/'bras bu gsum dang rtsa mkhris tsi tra ka_/shing mngar yungs kar gla sgang tsha ba gsum/_/ya bak+Shar ser po rnam gnyis dang /_/da trig tsan+pa na lcang ma star bu dang /_/a shwat+tha dang 'dzam
[\[199b.2\]]bu'i myu gu dang /_/da nan dzA ya ka ra bI ra'i shun/_/seng ldeng snying po bskol te ska bar gyur/_/de yi phye ma btab ste ri lu bya/_/de ni kha nang rtag tu bzhag gyur na/_/mchu dang rkan sogs nad ni mi bzad 'joms/_/mchog tu kha skams pa dang gag pa dang /_/ro mi tshor sel lus 'phags bdag
[\[199b.3\]]pos bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_'bras bu gsum la sogs pa bskol ba'i tshogs btsos te ska bar gyur pa dang /_yang 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa de nyid kyi phye ma btab ste ri lur byas te kha'i nang du rtag tu bzhag na mchu dang rkan la sogs pa'i nang mi bzad cing gso dka' ba
[\[199b.4\]]dag kyang sel bar byed la/_mchog gam khyad par du kha skams pa dang /_gag pa la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed la/_sbyor ba 'di ni lus 'phags po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyal pos bshad pa yin no/_/seng ldeng srang brgya chu bre bcu drug bskol/_/khu ba de dang tsan+dan a ga ru/_/gur
[\[199b.5\]]gum bal ba ri pe la dang /_/thang shing seng phrom rgun 'bru pu shel tse/_/btsod dang tso tsa shug pa byi dang ga_/pri ka rgya spos kad pal chu srin sder/_/sug smel d+he ma ka dang rma shing bcas/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis til mar bre gang bskol/_/de ni btur dang sna sman mkhur bkang byas/_/kha yi
[\[199b.6\]]nad kun 'joms byed bya rgod ltar/_/mig gsal rna ba phag 'drar gsang bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_seng ldeng srang brgya la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin du bskol la/_til mar de btung ba dang sna sman la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas na mig ni bya rgod ltar gsal bar 'gyur la/_rna ba
[\[199b.7\]]phag dang 'dra bar gsang bar 'gyur ro/_/tsa kra marda skyer pa seng phrom gyi/_/lde gus gdong la byugs par gyur na ni/_/ngo khabs sme ba dri ma la sogs sel/_/zla ba lta bu'i mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngar bshad ma thag pa'i til mar gyis bskus la tsakramarda zhes
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]bya ba pra pun da dang skyer pa la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na/_ngo khabs sel ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/sa ha radza srang stong chu bre ni/_/bcu drug nang bskol brgyad cha lus pa ru/_/seng ldeng 'dzam bu shing mngar e raN+Da/_/a mra a ti mar ut+pal
[\[200a.2\]]sngo/_/zhi ba btags til mar bre gang nang du bskol/_/de ni kha yi nang du bcangs gyur na/_/kha yi nad kun 'joms shing khyad par du/_/so yi phreng ba 'gul ba brtan par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sa ha ra dza nI la puSh+pa ste me tog sngon po can yin te/_de las srang stong chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol de/_/de'i
[\[200a.3\]]brgyad cha lus pa'i nang du seng ldeng la sogs pa'i sman srang re lhag tsam bcug ste/_til mar bre gang lhan cig bskol ba'i til mar de mkhur ba bkang zhing kha'i nang du bcangs par gyur na/_kha nad sel cing so brtan par byed pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no/_/seng ldeng snying po srang ni nyis brgya
[\[200a.4\]]dang /_/a ri me da sa ni srang brgyad dag_/chu bre drug cu bzhi bskol bzhi cha lus/_/btsags te slar yang ska ba'i bar du bkol/_/de nang dbyi mo rma shing bal ka_/tsan+dan rnam gnyis seng phrom stag tsher ba/_/shing mngar rgya skyegs a dza ri rnam gnyis/_/da ta ki dang kat+pha la'i 'bras bu/_/ser
[\[200a.5\]]po rnam gnyis 'bras bu gsum dang ni/_/dri sna bzhi dang gla sgang a ga ru/_/btsod dang spang spos n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu/_/shug pa btsong dang e la ba lu ka_/zho ni gnyis gnyis btab ste bsgrangs pa ru/_/dzA ti pa tra dzA ti pha la dang /_/li shi a ko la dang ka ko la/_/srang re ga bur srang bzhi bcug par bya/_/de las ri
[\[200a.6\]]lur byas la rtag tu ni/_/khar bzhag na ni kha nad thams cad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_seng ldeng gi snying po srang nyis brgya dang /_/a ri med sa zhes bya ba a ti la'i shun pa srang brgyad/_/chu bre drug cu rtsa bzhi'i nang du bskol la/_/de las chu bre bcu drug lus pa dang btsags te slar ska bar gyur gyi par su bskrol la/_/
[\[200a.7\]]de'i nang du dbyi mo la sogs pa zho gnyis gnyis btags pa'i phye ma zhib mo bcug la de grangs par gyur pa dang /_/dzA ti pa tra la sogs pa srang re re dang /_ga bur srang bzhi de'i nang du bcug la/_/de'i 'og tu de las ri lur byas la/_dus rtag tu khar bzhag na kha'i nad thams cad sbyong bar byed do
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]bskol dang reng bu'i sman ni go bzlog pa/_/btags pa 'di yi til mar bskol bar bya/_/kha nad kun sel bar ni de bshad do/_/so brtan byed pa'i mchog kyang 'di nyid yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bskol ba dang reng bur byas pa'i sman seng ldeng gi snying po dang /_sa ha tsa ra'i sman tshan
[\[200b.2\]]gnyis go bzlog pa'i tshul 'di nas bshad pa'i cho ga ltar byas te/_des nas ha tsa ra srang brgyad byas la/_seng ldeng srang gcig tu byas te/_gzhan thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar bar byas te/_til mar des ni kha nad thams cad sel bar byed pa yin no/_/ri lu 'di ni seng lding sbyar
[\[200b.3\]]til mar/_/a ri me da sa dang bskol ba dag_/nyin re bsten par byed na nad med pa 'ang /_/so ni nges par brtan par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ri lu 'di nyid seng ldeng dang byas la/_de bzhin du til mar dang /_a ri me da sa bskol ba'i ri lu dang /_til mar de dag
[\[200b.4\]]tha mal par gnas pa dag gis kyang rtag tu bsten na so brtan par 'gyur ro/_/rgun 'bru sle tres dzA ti'i myu gu dang /_/skyer pa byi tsher 'bras bu gsum bskol ba'i/_sbrang rtsir sbyar ba 'di ni mkhur bar bcangs/_/kha yi nad du gtogs pa thams cad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgun
[\[200b.5\]]'bru la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba yang nad de la phan no/_/skyer pa ba tha ru rta gla sgang bcod/_/yung ba seng phrom te dzo ba ti dang /_/pu tse shel gyi phye ma sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/bskus na rnyil nad nyam thag g.ya' ba dang /_/rnag dang 'dzag pa'i nad rnams sel bar
[\[200b.6\]]byed/_/[(]cas[,]ces [)]bya la/_skyer pa'i shun pa la sogs pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba bskus na yang rnyil gyi nad kyis nyen pa la sogs pa sel par byed do/_/khyim gyi dud pa pa tha skyer khaN+Da/_/tsha ba gsum dang nas tshig 'khus thal ba/_tsi tra ka dang lcags phye 'bras bu gsum/_/
[\[200b.7\]]te dzo sbrang rtsir sbyar ba ni/_/nag po khar bcangs so dang 'gul nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_khyim gyi steng gi ngos la chags pa'i dud pa nag po dang /_pa tha la sogs pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gu nag po zhes bya ba khar bcangs na/_so 'gul ba'i nad sel bar byed do/_/
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]skyer pa'i shun pa ldong ros rgyam tsha dang /_/ba bla nas tshig 'khus pa'i thal ba'i phye/_/sbrang rtsi mar sbyar phye ma ser po can/_/khar bzhag so dang mgul pa'i nad rnams sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyer pa'i shun pa la sogs ba'i phye ma ni ser po can zhes bya ste/_de kha dang so'i nad la bcang bar bya'o/_/
[\[201a.2\]]ba gcin a ru ra bskol thim gyur par/_/shu ti ru rta ba le ka'i phye zos/_/nang gi kha nad phra mo yan chad ni/_/rgyal por brten na gnod pas mi tshugs shing /_/nang du bzhag na nad rnams sel par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ba gcin gyi nang du a ru ra bskol te/_ba gcin de a ru ra'i nang du thim par gyur ba de lta bu'i
[\[201a.3\]]a ru ra dang shu ti la sogs pa'i phye ma dang bcas pa mis zos par gyur na/_kha'i nang gi nad phra mo rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur te/_ji ltar 'gro ba rnams kyis skyob par gyur pa'i rgyal po dam pa la brten na 'tshe ba'i tshogs kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/lo ma bdun pa gla sgang pu shel tse/_/
[\[201a.4\]]a ru ra dang tig ta ba to la/_/shing mngar dong gra tsa n+dan pu shel tse/_/bskol ba 'thungs na kha yi shu ba 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_lo ma bdun pa la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba 'thungs na kha'i nang gi shu ba dang rnags pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/pa to la dang bca' sga 'bras bu gsum/_/pi sha l+ya dang tig
[\[201a.5\]]ta kyi lce ba/_/sle tes bskol ba sbrang rtsir bcas blud dam/_/khar bzhag kha yi nad kun ma lus 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_pa to la la sogs pa'i sman bskol ba'i khu ba btsags pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa blud cing btung ba 'am/_khar bzhag cing 'khur ba bkang ba byas na kha'i nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/skyer ba bskol
[\[201a.6\]]ba'i khu ba ni/_ska gyur yug snum btsag dang bcas/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pa kha nang bzhag_/shu ba rma 'khyims sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_skyer pa bskol ba'i khu ba ska bar gyur pa yug snum dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba khar bzhag na shu ba la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/nim pa shing mngar pa to la/_/ba sha ka dang dzA ti
[\[201a.7\]]dang /_/seng ldeng a ri me da sa/_/'bras bu gsum po re re la'ang /_/de bzhin du ni gtang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_nim pa la sogs pa'i sman re re zhing bshad ma thag pa'i khu ba'i cho ga dang 'dra bar btang na yang yon tan de dang 'dra'o/_/seng ldeng lcags phye 'bras bu gsum/_/ma ta yan ti a rdzu na/_/a ti ma ra bskol
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]ba ni/_/mkhar bcangs kha nad so nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_seng ldeng la sogs pa'i sman chu dang bskol ba mkhar bar bcangs na yang kha nad dang so'i nad rnams sel bar byed do/_/kha dang so rtsa mgul nad bal cher ni/_/bad kan khrag las mang du 'byung ba yin/_/de bas nad de bsal bar bya ba'i
[\[201b.2\]]phyir/_/nad khrag lan mang du ni dbyung bar bya/_/mgo dang lus kyi skyug sman bkru sman dang /_/kha dang cha dang mkhur bkang bca' bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha'i nad dang /_so rtsa'i nad dang /_mgul pa'i nad phal mo che ni bad kan dang khrag las mang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin pas/_de'i phyir na nad de rnams
[\[201b.3\]]la nad brag yang dang yang du dbyung bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin du mgo bo dang lus kyi bkru sman gtang bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin du skyug sman dang bkru sman kha ba dang /_tsha bas mkhur ba bkar bar bya ba yin no/_/de bzhin bad kan khrag ni sel ba yi/_/gso ba'i nad ni phal cher bsngags pa yin/_/zhes
