[\[241a.5\]]bya'o/_/'o ma can shing myu gu shun/_/'o mar btags pas bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshan ma can la sogs pa gsum po la ni 'o ma can gyi shing gi myu gu dang shun pa 'o ma dang btags pas bsku bar bya'o/_/ngo shig a rdzu na'i shun pa'am/_/btsod dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yi/_/lde
[\[241a.6\]]gu 'am rta dkar rmig pa ni/_/bsregs pa'i snag tsha mar sbyar bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_ngo shig la ni a rdzu na'i shun pa'i lde gu la sogs pas bsku bar bya'o/_/tsan+dan dmar po btsod dang ni/_/ru rta seng phrom pri yang ku_/sran chung n+ya gro d+ha'i myu gu/_/lde gus ngo shig sel byed cing /_/bzhin
[\[241a.7\]]mdangs gsal par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_tsan+dan dmar po la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na ngo shig la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/zi ra gnyis dang til nag dang /_yungs kar 'o ma bcas pa ni/_/btags pa'i lde gus gdong bskus na/_/ngo shig sel zhing zla 'drar byed/_/
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]ces bya ba la/_za \u0f72ra gnyis ni zi ra nag po dang dkar po'i dbyibs gnyis te/_/de la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na ngo shig dang mtshan ma can gyi skyon med par byed de zla ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/sran chung phub ma med pa brdos pa/_/'o ma sbrang rtsi mar btags bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na sran
[\[241b.2\]]chung sbun pa med par byas te brngos pa 'o ma dang btags te sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar bas bskus na yang gdong gi ngo shig la sogs pa'i skyon sel bar byed do/_/tsher ma rno ba'i shal ma li'i/_/'o mar btags pas bskus na'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na shal ma li'i tsher ma rnon po 'o ma dang
[\[241b.3\]]btags la/_/gdong bskus nas yang ngo shig la sogs pa sel zhing bzhin zla ba dang 'dra bar byed do/_/rgya shug tshi gu bu ram bcas/_/sbrang rtsi ri bong khrag sbyar bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rgya shug gi tshi gu la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na yang yon tan snga ma dang 'dra'o/_/ru rta kha lung
[\[241b.4\]]khu ba yi/_/nang sbangs sbrang rtsir bcas pa'am/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na ru rta kha lung gi khu ba'i nang du zhag bdun sbangs pa'i lde gu dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bskus na yang yon tan dang 'dra'o/_/rkang mar rtsa ba ra'i 'o ma/_/sbrang rtsir bcas ba'i lde gu'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rkang
[\[241b.5\]]mar la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na yang phan no/_/rkang mar rtsa ba ba lang rus/_/sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pas bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rkang mar gyi rtsa ba dang ba lang gi so lde gur byas la/_sbrang rtsi mar dang sbyar bas bskus na yang phan no/_/'dzam bu a mra'i lo ma dang /_/ser
[\[241b.6\]]po rnam gnyis zho ga chu/_/bu ram sa rab sbyar ba'am/_/tin du ka yi lo ma yi/_/khu bar btags pa'ang mdog gsal byed/_/ces bya ba la/_'dzam bu dang a mra'i lo ma dang ser po rnam gnyis la sogs pa sbyar ba'i lde gu'am yang na tin du ka'i lo ma dang /_shun pa rang gi
[\[241b.7\]]khu ba dang bcas pa'i lde gus bskus na yang bzhin gyi kha dog gsal bar byed do/_/ut+lal sngo dang ru rta dang /_/tsan+dan ser po bri yang ku/_/rgya shug tshig gu'i lde gu yis/_/gdong ni bskus zhing dril gyur na/_/pad+ma'i mdog dang 'dra bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ut+lal sngo po la
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]sogs pa'i lde gus gdong bskus shing dri lan yang /_/gdong pad+ma'i mdog dang 'dab ma 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/tsan+dan ser po ni ka li yi ka ste/_/tsan+dan gsum pa'o/_/sman ni 'di dag btags pa dang /_/shing mngar dang bcas bskol snum ni/_/nad gzhi ji bzhin ma lus la/_/
[\[242a.2\]]btung dang bsku ba la sogs bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lde gu'i don smos pa'i sman gong du smos pa 'di dag nyid dang /_shing mngar dang bcas bar bskol ba'i snum nad gzhi dang dus la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du btung ba dang /_bsku ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya'o/_/nas dang seng phrom sra rtsi phog_/
[\[242a.3\]]sbra tshil sbrang rtsi pu shil tse/_/mar dang bu ram ba gcin ni/_/gzar bur chags kyi bar du bskol/_/de bskus pa yis sme pa dang /_/ngo shig mdzer pa myur sel byed/_/gdong ni pad+ma 'drar byed cing /_/rkang pa pad+ma'i 'dab 'drar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nas la sogs pa nas ba gcin gyi
[\[242a.4\]]par gzar bu la chags kyi bar gyi lde gus bskus na ngo shig sel bar byed pa la sogs pa'i yon tan skyed par byed do/_/gur gum shing mngar bu shel tse/_/tsan+dan ser dang rgya skyegs dang /_/tsan+dan dkar dang n+ya gro d+ha'i/_/rkang pa gzhon nu shug pa dang /_/de bzhin pad+ma ge sar dang /_ut+pal
[\[242a.5\]]sngon po btsod dang bcas/_/srang re chu bre bzhi nang du/_/bskol te bzhi cha lus pa ru/_/rgya skyegs btsod dang le brgan rtsi/_/shing mngar gur gum zho gnyis gnyis/_/phye ma til mar srang brgya dang /_/de yi nyis 'gyur 'o ma bskol/_/de ni sna sman tshul bsten na/_/sme ba ngo shig skra dkar
[\[242a.6\]]dang /_/gnyer ma gdong gi dri ma sel/_/gdong gi sha rgyas mdog gsal byed/_/ces bya ba la/_/gur gum la sogs pa srang re ji skad smos pa bzhin du bsten na sme ba la sogs pa sel bar byed cing gdong gi sha rgyas pa dang /_mdog gsal bar byed pa
[\[242a.7\]]yin no/_/btsod dang seng phrom sha ba ri/_/rgya skyegs ldong ros du ba ri/_/gur gum ru rta ser po gnyis/_/gi'u wang tsan+dan rnam gnyis dang /_/n+ya gro d+ha yi lo ma dang /_/dngul chu rma shing tsan+dan ser/_/d+ha du ra yi shun pa yi/_/sa bon pad+ma ge sar dang /_/sbra tshil spangs ma shug pa
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]sogs/_/zhag dang 'o ma rkang dang mar/_/'o ma can shing 'o ma ni/_/bskol ba'i mar ni bskus gyur na/_/ngo shig gnyer ma sogs 'joms shing /_/bzhin ni pad+ma'i mdangs 'drar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sha ba ri ni ba ti ka ri 'dra'o/_/du pa ri ni a da ka'o/_/gzhan ni go bar zad de/
[\[242b.2\]]btsod la sogs pa'i sman mar bskol ba'i tshul du bskol ba'i sman mar de btung ba dang /_sna sman la sogs par bsten ngo shig dang khabs dang gnyer ma la sogs pa sel bar byed cing /_bzhin ras zla ba'i mdangs dang ldan par byed do/_/bring ga ra dza'i khu bar ni/_/'o ma chu bskol sna sman
[\[242b.3\]]bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_bring ga ra dza'i khu ba la sogs pa'i sna sman btang na yang phan no/_/pags pa tshor med la rlung gi_/gso ba dang ni me btsa' bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_pags pa tshor ba med pa'i nad la ni rlung las gyur pa'i mdze nad kyi gso ba dang /_me btsa' gdab par byas na phan no/_/lpags
[\[242b.4\]]nad zlum por bad mkhris bshad/_/mdze nad sel ba thams cad phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_lpags nad zlum po kor kor por na ba la ni/_bad kan dang mkhris pa la phan pa'i sman thams cad dang /_de bzhin du mdze nad la phan pa'i sman dang kha zas la sogs pa thams cad phan no/_/yan
[\[242b.5\]]lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas gsang ba'i gnas kyi nad dmigs shes pa bshad par bya'o/_/
[\[242b.6\]]bud med nyal po spangs pa las/_/mod la bsten par gyur pa'am/_/nad dang bcas shing dog pa la/_/dri ma can dang zla mtshan nam/_/skye gnas gzhan dang mi 'dod dang /_/'grod min gsar du btsas pa dang /_/dga' ba'i mthar ni dug can sogs/_/chus reg pa'am
[\[242b.7\]]ma bkrus dang /_/bskyed pa'i bsal bas sman rnon po'i/_/lde gu la sogs bskus pa dang /_/khu tshur so dang sen mo dang /_/gra ma dug can gyis reg dang /_/shugs dag pa dang yun ring du/_/reg pa rtsub pas bdar pa'am/_/nad gzhi 'khrugs pas gsang bar zhugs/_/
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]sos 'dzin lta bu la sogs nad/_/nyi shu rtsa gsum 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes pa bud med la 'khrig pa spyod pa'i nyal po spangs par gyur pa las mod la 'phral du bud med bsten cing spyod par gyur pa'am/_yang bud med nad dang bcas
[\[243a.2\]]pa'am/_mtshan dog pa'am/_dri ma can zla mtshan 'dzag bzhin pa'am/_yang na skye gnas mi mthun par gyur pa gzhan dag gam/_bud med mi 'dod bzhin du nan gyis 'jug pa'am/_yang na bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa ste slob dpon kyi chung ma la sogs pa lta bu'am/_gsar du
[\[243a.3\]]bu btsas par gyur pa dang /_yang na dga' ba'i mtha' ste/_'khrig pa spyad pa'i rjes la dug la sogs pa dang 'dres pa'i chus bkrus shing reg par gyur pa'am/_chus bkrus par ma gyur pa'am/_yang na pho mtshan bskyed par bya ba'i bsam pas sman rnon po'i lde gus pho mtshan la bskus
[\[243a.4\]]pa dang /_de bzhin du khu tshur ram so 'am sen mo dang gra ma dug can gyis reg par byas pa dang /_de bzhin du bshad pa la sogs pa'i shugs dgag pa dang yang na yun ring du reg pa shin tu rtsub pas bdar bar gyur pa'am/_rlung la sogs pa'i gnad gzhi 'khrugs pas gsang ba zhes
[\[243a.5\]]bya ba mtshan gyi nang du zhugs pa ste/_rgyu de dag gis sos 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i nad nyid shu rtsa gsum skyed par byed do/_/sos 'dzin lta bu 'dir lnga ste/_/nad gzhi re re khrag las gyur/_/'dus pa'i nad las gyur ba'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dir de dag gi nang nas sos 'dzin pa'i
[\[243a.6\]]nad rnam pa lnga ste/_rlung la sogs pa nad gzhi re re las gyur pa gsum dang /_khrag las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa'o/_/de yang rlung gyur pho mtshan skrangs/_/nad mang rtag ldang lpags gas pa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la sos 'dzin pa zhes bya ba rnam pa lnga las
[\[243a.7\]]rlung las gyur pa'i sos 'dzin pa ni skrangs pa dang /_/nad mang po sna tshogs kyis 'debs pa dang /_rtag tu ldang ba dang /_pags pa gas par 'gyur pa yin no/_/mkhris pa las gyur skrangs rims 'debs/_u dum+WA ra'i 'bras smin 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]pa'i sos 'dzin pa ni skrangs pa dang /_rims kyis 'debs pa dang /_skrangs pa'i mdog u dum+WA ra'i 'bras bu smin pa 'dra ba yin no/_/bad kan gyis mkhrang snum pa dang /_/g.ya' zhing skrangs la lci ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i sos 'dzin pa ni pho mtshan nam mkhrang pa dang
[\[243b.2\]]snum pa la sogs pa yin no/_/khrag gyur 'brum du nag po 'byung /_/khrag 'dzag rims kyis 'debs par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_khrag las gyur pa'i sos 'dzin pa ni 'brum bu phra mo nag po 'byung bar 'gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du khrag 'dzag pa la sogs pa yin no/_/
[\[243b.3\]]'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun dang ldan/_/rlig 'bras gnyis kyang skrangs par byed/_/mi bzad na zhing ltung ba dang /_/gas shing srin bu skye ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gsum char 'dus pa las gyur pa'i sos 'dzin pa'i mtshan ma ni nad gzhi gsum char gyi mtshan nyid dang
[\[243b.4\]]ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du rlig pa'i 'bras bu gnyis kyang skrangs par byed pa dang /_de bzhin brnag par dka' zhing mi bzad par na la ltung bar 'gur ba dang /_srin bu rnams skye bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/de las khrag gyur 'tsho ba tsam/_/'dus pa las gyur 'chi bar byed/_/ces bya ba
[\[243b.5\]]la/_lnga ba de dag la khrag las gyur pa'i sos 'dzin pa mi la btsam du re zhig 'tshor rung ba yin la/_'dus pa las gyur pa ni gsor mi rung ba yin no/_/nang 'khrugs pa las pho mtshan gnas/_/sha khrag las ni pho mtshan gyi/_/phyi 'am yang na nang du ni/_/mdzer pa g.ya'
[\[243b.6\]]bar byed pa 'byung /_/khrag ni spyi bag 'dzag par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs pa las pho mtshan gyi gnas su sha khrag la brten te/_de'i phyi rol bam nang du sha'i 'dzer pa g.ya' bar byed pa la sogs pa 'byung bar byed pa yin no/_/mo mtshan de
[\[243b.7\]]'dra gdugs ltar 'dug_/de ni 'brum nad/_/ces bya ba la/_de bzhin du mo mtshan du yang sha'i mdzer pa snga ma de dang 'dra bar 'dzer pa dang g.ya' bar byed pa la sogs pa la dbyibs gdugs ltar 'dug par 'gyur te/_mdzer pa'i nad de ni 'brum nad
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]ces bya'o/_/ma gsos na/_pho mo'i khu khrag nyams byed gsod/_/ces bya ba la/_nad de dag gso bar ma byas na skyes pa'i pho mtshan nyams shing khu ba 'byung bar mi byed par gsod pa dang /_/bud med kyi khrag nyams shing gsod par byed do/_/pho mtshan gyi
[\[244a.2\]]ni phyi 'am nang /_/bad kan khrag gyur 'brum phran ni/_/tshad dang dbyibs ni yungs kar 'dra/_/stug po'i yungs kar zhes byar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_pho mtshan gyi phyi rol lam nang du bad+ma kan dang /_khrag las gyur pa'i 'brum phran tshad dang dbyibs yungs kar 'dra ba stug por byung ba
[\[244a.3\]]de ni/_yungs kar lta bu'i 'brum phran zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/bad kan khrag gyur 'brum bu ni/_/ring zhing mang por gyur pa la/_/dbus nas gas pa gang yin pa/_/de ni nges pa 'joms zhes bya/_/na zhing ba sbu brtse bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bad kan dang
[\[244a.4\]]khrag 'khrugs par gyur pa las/_'brum bu phra mo dbyibs ring zhing mang por 'byung bar 'gyur la/_des mtshan kyi dbus nas gas par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ming nges par 'joms pa zhes bya ste/_de ni na ba dang ba spu brtse bar byed pa yin no/_/khrag mkhris las gyur 'dzam bu yi/_/
[\[244a.5\]]rus pa ltar 'dug khong stong can/_/zhes bya ba la/_pho mtshan khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'brum bu 'dzam bu'i rus pa'am/_tshi gu 'dra ba myur du smin par byed pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni med khong stong can zhes bya'o/_/'bras byer gcin snyi 'dra shes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bras byer ba zhes bya
[\[244a.6\]]ba'i mtshan nyid kyi nad ni rang bzhin gcin snyi ba dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/_/khrag mkhris las gyur 'brum phran ni/_/ma sha mung+ga 'dra mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'brum phran mon sran rde'u'i dbyibs 'dra ba skyes pa gang yin pa de ni mchog ces bya ba yin par shes
[\[244a.7\]]bar bya'o/_/pad+ma'i steng du ge sar bzhin/_/'brum bu 'brum phran gyis khyab pa/_/de ni pad+ma can zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/'brum bu gang mtshan gyi steng du pad+ma la ge sar byung ba lta bu'i 'brum phran gyis khyab pa gang yin pa de ni pad+ma can zhes bya'o/_/lag pa gnyis kyis rab mnyes pa/_/de ni mnyes
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]pa'i 'brum bur 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshan lag pa gnyis kyis shin tu mnyes pa las 'brum bur gyur pa ni mnyes pa'i 'brum bu zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ni mnyes par gyur pa las/_/rlung 'khrugs gyur pa mnyes pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshan ma lag pas yang dang yang
[\[244b.2\](]du mnyes [,]du ma nyes [)]nyes par gyur pa las rlung 'khrugs par gyur pa'i nad ni ming mnyes pa zhes bya'o/_/mi mnyam sra zhing yon por ni/_/rlung 'khrugs gyur pa gtun shing yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las gyur pa'i mtshan nad rang bzhin mi mnyam pa dang /_sra ba dang yon por gyur pa ni drang srong
[\[244b.3\]]rnams kyis gtun shing zhes bshad do/_/rlung gis mnyes pa la sogs pa'i/_/nad 'khrugs mtshan gyi pags pa ni/_/ldog cing tsha la nad bcas shing /_/la lar shu ba dag tu 'gyur/_/'dus shing mdud pa chags pa ni/_/de yi nor bu thur du 'phyang /_/pags pa ldog pa'i nad
[\[244b.4\]]ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung las mnyes pa la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs par 'gyur pa dang /_pho mtshan gyi pags pa phyir ldog cing nad dang bcas par gyur pa dang /_la lar pags pa de shu ba byung bar gyur la/_de yang phyogs gcig tu 'dus shing mdud pa'am/_rmen bu
[\[244b.5\]]chags pas mtshan de'i mgo bo nor bu zhes bya ba/_thur du 'phyang bar gyur pa de ni pags pa ldog pa'i nad ces bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do/_/bad kan bcas las g.ya' zhing sra/_/rma 'tshob dka' zhing pags pa gas/_/gas pa'i nad ces bya bar bshad/_/ces bya ba
[\[244b.6\]]la/_pags pa de bad kan dang bcas pas g.ya' ba dang sra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i nad de ni gas pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung gis pags pa gnod 'gyur zhing /_/nor bu 'byar zhing gcin 'gag 'gyur/_/de las rgyun phran nad med 'byung /_/nor bu'i kha ni 'gags gyur
[\[244b.7\]]pas/_/de ni nor bu'i nad ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_pho mtshan gyi pags pa la rlung gis gnod cing ma rung bar gyur pas/_nor bu'i phyogs su 'byar cing gcin gyi rgyun 'gags par gyur pa de nas gcin gyi rgyun phra zhing nad med par 'byung bar 'gyur la/_nor bu kha 'gags par
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]gyur pa ni pho mtshan gyi rtse mo'i nor bu'i nad ces bya'o/_/bad kan las gyur mtshan gyi nang /_/gra mas gang snyam mdud pa'i nad/_/ces bya ba la/_pho mtshan gyi nang gra mas gang ba snyam du sems pa'i nad de ni bad kan las gyur pa yin te/_de ni mdud pa can gyi nad
[\[245a.2\]]ces bya'o/_/gra mas gnod pa'i khrag gi nad/_/tshor ba nyams pa de ming can/_/zhes bya ba la/_gra mas gang ba lta bu'i nad kyis khrag la gnod par gyur la/_des na tshor ba nyams par gyur pa de ni de'i ming can te tshor ba nyams pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung dang khrag mkhris las gyur
[\[245a.3\]]pa/_/bu ga'i rtse mo phra ba yis/_/mtshan gyi nang ni kun tu khyab/_/de ni kha brgya pa zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshan gyi nang na bu ga phra mo dang ldan pas kun tu khyab par gyur pa'i nad rlung dang khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa de'i ming ni kha brgya ba zhes bya'o/_/khrag
[\[245a.4\]]mkhris las gyur pags pa rnams/_/tsha zhing rims bcas pags pa smin/_/zhes bya ba la/_pho mtshan gyi pags par khrag dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i nad rnags pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni pags pa smin pa zhes bya'o/_/'dus pa las gyur sha rnams
[\[245a.5\]]ni/_/thams cad ngan pas smin pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad gzhi gsum 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad pags pa rnags shing nad sna tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa ni ming sha smin pa zhes bya'o/_/'brum bu gnag cing dmar pa yi/_/'brum bu dag gis gnod gyur zhing /_/pho
[\[245a.6\]]mtshan shin tu na ba gang /_/de ni khrag gi 'brum bu yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshan gang la 'brum bu gnag pa la sogs pa dag gis gnod par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ming khrag gi 'brum bu zhes bya'o/_/sha yi mdzer pa sngar bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshan la sha yi mdzer
[\[245a.7\]]pa skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sngar bshad pa yin no/_/khong 'bras nad gzhi gsum las skyes/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshan la khong 'bras nad gzhi gsum las gyur pa 'byung ste/_/de yang sngar bshad pa yin no/_/'dus pas mtshan ni rnags gyur zhing /_/sha ni
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]nag por gyur pa dang /_/kun nas zhig par byed pa gang /_/de ni til nag ces brjod bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_'dus pa'i nad 'khrugs pa las pho mtshan rnags pa la sogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni til nag ces bya'o/_/sha las gyur pa'i 'brum bu
[\[245b.2\]]rnags/_/khong 'bras til nag ces bya'o/_/bzhi po 'di dag spang bar bya/_/lhag ma rnams ni myur du gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshan gyi nad de rnams kyi nang nas sha'i 'brum bu la sogs pa bzhi bo dag ni yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/lhag pa nad bcu drug pa ni myur
[\[245b.3\]]du gso bar bya'o/_/kha zas gnod pa zos pa dang /_/mal stan mi bder nyal ba dang /_/nyal po bsten ni drags pa dang /_/nang na nad khrag sman gnod dang /_/sa bon nyes pa rnam smin pas/_/mngal gyi nad ni nyi shur 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha zas mi 'phrod pa la sogs pa'i rgyus mngal gyi nad nyi shu
[\[245b.4\]]'byung bar 'gyur te/_kha zas gnod pa zos pa dang /_mal stan mi bde ba la gnod pa dang bcas par nyal ba dang /_'khrig pa'i nyal po ha cang bsten drags pa dang /_de bzhin du nad khrag can gyi zla mtshan 'dzag pa dang /_gnod par byed pa'i sman bsten pa
[\[245b.5\]]dang /_sa bon nyes pa dang ldan pa dang /_sngon gyi las ni mi dge ba byas pa'i rnam par smin pas nad du 'gyur ro/_/rlung gis mngal la gnod gyur bas/_/na zug yangs shing tshor ba med/_/grog mas khyab pa snyam du sems/_/sra zhing rtsub pa
[\[245b.6\]]sgra dang bcas/_zla mtshan sla zhing lbu ba can/_/nyung zhing gnag pa 'dzag par byed/_/chu so rtsib logs lhod pa dang /_/na zhing rim gyis skran bskyed la/_/rang ngan nyes pa de dang de/_/de ni rlung can yin zhes bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_/rlung
[\[245b.7\]]gis nad 'khrugs par gyur pa las mo mtshan nam mang du na zhing zug par 'gyur pa dang /_yangs shing kha 'bye ba dang /_tshor ba med cing bem por 'dug pa dang /_grog mas khyab cing rgyu ba snyam du sems pa dang /_sra zhing rengs pa dang /_rtsub pa
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]dang /_sgra dang bcas par byed pa dang /_zla mtshan sla ba la sogs pa 'dzag pa dang /_chu so la sogs pa lhod pa dang /_lhang lhang por na ba dang /_rim gyis gnas der skran skye bar 'gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa'i nad
[\[246a.2\]]kyi nyes pa 'dir ma smos pas gzhan yang byed de/_nad de ni ming rlung can zhes bya'o/_/de nyid shas char spyad na skrang /_/bcas pa nyal po drags zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung can gyi nad de nyid la shas cher nyal po spyad cing bsten drags na skrang ba dang bcas par
[\[246a.3\]]'gyur te/_de ni nyal po drags pa'i nad ces bya'o/_/shin tu gzhon la 'khrig pa spyad/_/rgyab dang chu so byin par ni/_/na zhing mngal la gnod byed pa/_/de ni spyad sngas pa zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bud med shin tu gzhon pa la 'khrig pa spyad pas/_rgyab dang /_chu so dang /
[\[246a.4\]]byin pa na zhing /_mngal lam mo mtshan la gnod par byed pa de ni spyad sngas pa'i nad ces bya'o/_/shugs 'khyil pa yi mngal du ni/_/rlung gis gnod par gyur pa las/_/zla mtshan lbu ba can 'byung ba/_/'khyil pa lta bur snang gyur pa/_/nad 'di 'khyil ba can zhes bya/_/zhes
[\[246a.5\]]bya ba la/_gang gi tshe shugs bkag pa la sogs pa'i rgyus mngal du rlung gis gnod pa skyed par gyur pas zla mtshan lbu ba can 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_de yang dba' 'khyil ba ltar snang ba 'di ni 'khyil pa can zhes bya'o/_/gang tshe rlung ni rtsub pos bu/_/skye zhing skye zhing gsod
[\[246a.6\]]byed pa/_/skyes nas gsod pa zhes byar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_gang gi tshe rlung 'khrugs pa'i rtsub pa'i dbang gis mngal gyi nang du skye zhing skye zhing 'chi bar byed pa de ni skyes nas gsod pa zhes bya'o/_/'grangs drags mi mnyam gnas par ni/_/'dod pa spyad pas
[\[246a.7\]]rlung 'khrugs shing /_/gzhan gyis gnod par gyur pa las/_/mtshon gyi bu ga sha rus la/_/gnod gyur mngal ni yon por 'gyur/_/na gyur nang du kha bltas yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bud med kha zas kyis 'grangs drags pa mi mnyam par gnas pa la 'dod pa sbyad pas
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]rlung nad gzhan gyis bskyod cing gnod par gyur ba las/_mo mtshan gyi bu ga dang sha dang rus pas gnod par gyur pas yon por 'gyur te/_nad de'i ming ni nang du kha bltas pa zhes bya'o/_/kha zas rlung can bsten pa yis/_/zla mtshan rlung gis gnod gyur zhing /_bud
[\[246b.2\]]med mo mtshan zhum gyur bar/_/byed pa de ni khabs mig yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha zas rlung can bsten pa'i dbang gis rlung 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing /_bud med kyi mo mtshan zhum par gyur pa de ni ming khabs mig can zhes bya'o/_/dus su shugs bkag rlung 'phel
[\[246b.3\]]bas/_/bshang dang gci ba 'gag byed cing /_/mo mtshan skam par byed pa dang /_/shas cher na ba mngal skams yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dga' bar sbyod pa'i dus su shugs bkag pas rlung 'khrugs te/_bshang ba dang gci ba 'gag par byed pa'i nad de ni mo mtshan
[\[246b.4\]]skam zhing shin tu na bar byed pa yin pas na mngal skams pa zhes bya'o/_/zhag drug gam ni zhag 'dun nas/_/rlung gis mngal gnas khu ba 'byin/_/nad bcas pa 'am nad med pa/_/de ni khu ba slon zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bud med gang 'dod pa sbyad nas zhag drug
[\[246b.5\]]gam bdun rlung gis mngal gyi gnas nas khu ba nad med pa 'am nad dang bcas pa 'byin par byed pa'i nad de ni khu ba slon pa zhes bya'o/_/bud med mngal dang sa bon gyi/_/nyes pa rlung gis gnod gyur zhing /_/'khrig par mi dga' nu ma med/_/ma ning yin te gsor mi rung /_/
[\[246b.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_bud med kyi mngal du skyes pa'i sa bon gyi nyes par rlung gis nad skyed de 'khrig pa la mi dga' zhing skyes pa mi 'dod pa gyur pa dang /_nu ma med par gyur pa ni ming ma ning zhes bya ste/_de ni gsor mi rung ba yin no/_/mngal gyi nang du rlung gis ni/_/gnod gyur mo mtshan
[\[246b.7\]]khong khar gnas/_/bye ba'am lhod par gyur pa dang /_/rlung can bzhin du na gyur pa/_/sha ni mtho bar gyur pa ste/_/mo mtshan che nad tshabs che bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mngal gyi nang du rlung gis gnod pa byas nas/_mngal gyi kha dang khong bar gnas te mo mtshan bye ba'am/_/lhod
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]lhod por gyur cing rlung can gyi nad ltar na ba dang /_sha mthol mo mtshan che zhing rgyas par gyur pa ni/_mo mtshan che ba dang nad tshabs che ba zhes bya'o/_/mkhris pa mngal na gnas pa yi/_/nang gi nad gzhis gnod gyur pa/_/tsha ba'am rnags par byed 'gyur
[\[247a.2\]]zhing /_/dri mnam rims kyis 'debs pa dang /_/shin tu tsha zhing ro ltar mnam/_zla mtshan sngo nag ser por 'dzag_/nad de mkhris pa can zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa rang gi gnod pa'i rgyus 'khrugs par gyur pa mngal na gnas pa de tsha ba la sogs zla mtshan 'dzag par 'gyur te/_/
[\[247a.3\]]nad de ni mkhris pa can zhes bya'o/_/zla mtshan cher 'dzag khrag can yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_zla mtshan shas cher 'dzag pa ni ming khrag can zhes bya'o/_/bad kan skyed par byed pa yis/_/mo mtshan gnod gyur na ba med/_/grang zhing g.ya' la dkar ba dang /_/spyi bag tu ni 'dzag par byed/_/nad de bad kan las
[\[247a.4\]]gyur yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan skyed par byed pa'i kha zas la sogs pas bad kan 'khrugs te/_de'i dbang gis mo mtshan na ba med cing grang pa la sogs pa'i nad dang ldan pa ni bad kan can gyi mngal nad ces bya'o/_/rlung mkhris 'khrugs pas zla mtshan zad/_/tsha zhing lus skems mdog
[\[247a.5\]]mi sdug_/de ni khrag zad pa zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung dang mkhris pa 'khrugs pas zla mtshan zad pa la sogs pa khrag zad pa'i nad ces bya'o/_/mkhris pa shas che nyal po bsten/_/sbrid pa sgregs pa bkag pa las/_/mkhris par bcas pa'i rlung gis ni/_/mngal du gnod pa skyed
[\[247a.6\]]par 'gyur/_/skrang zhing nyam thag reg mi bzod/_/zla mtshan sngo dang ser po 'byung /_/pho ba'i lto ni lci ba dang /_/'khru zhing yi ga 'chus par byed/_/chu so brlan ni zhing zug_/rims skyed yongs rgyas nad ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bud med mkhris pa shas che ba la nyal po bstan par 'gyur ba
[\[247a.7\]]dang /_sbrid pa sgregs pa bkag par gyur pa'i rgyu las mkhris pa dang rlung 'khrugs par gyur pas mngal du nad skyed par byed do/_/de ni skrangs pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gang yin pa de ni yongs su rgyas pa'i nad ces bya'o/_/rlung dang bad kan nad kyis khyab/_/mngal
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]nas skya zhing sbyi bag 'dzag_/nye bar 'dzag pa zhes bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_mngal du rlung dang bad kan gyi nad kyis khyab par gyur pa las skya ba la sogs pa 'dzag pa'i nad de ni nye bar 'dzag pa zhes bya'o/_/srin bu skyes zhing g.ya' bas 'dod pa
[\[247b.2\]]la/_/rab gdungs de ni rnam par g.yeng zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mngal du srin bu skyes shing g.ya' ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de ni rnam par g.yeng ba zhes bya'o/_/dus min sbyod par gyur pas rlung /_/bad kan khrag dang 'dres gyur te/_/zla
[\[247b.3\]]mtshan lam ni 'gags byed de/_/mngal du lte ba skyed par byed/_/de ni pad+ma'i snying po yi/_/zhes bya ba la/_dus ma yin par spyad pa'i rgyus rlung 'khrugs shing bad kan dang khrag 'dres par gyur pa las mngal du zla mtshan 'gags par byas
[\[247b.4\]]nas lte ba lta bur skyed par byed pa de ni pad+ma'i snying po can zhes bya'o/_/nad gzhi gsum ni mo mtshan gyi/_/mngal gnas rang rang gnod pa skyed/_/'dus pa las gyur nyes pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung la sogs pa'i nad gzhi gsum [(]po [,]pho [)]mo mtshan dang mngal du
[\[247b.5\]]gnas pa las rang rang gi gnod pa skyed cing nad 'byin pa ni 'dus pa las gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar bud med mngal nad kyis/_/khu ba 'dzin par mi byed de/_/des na mngal du bu mi chags/_/mi bzad nad kyang skye 'gyur zhing /_/khrag 'byung gzhang 'brum skran la sogs/_/rlung sogs
[\[247b.6\]]nad ni kun skyed byed/_/ces bya ba la/_tshul de ltar na mngal gyi nad rnam pa nyi shur bshad pa yin la/_des na bud med kyi mngal du sa bon 'dzin par mi byed de/_de'i phyir bu mi chags pa dang /_mi bzad pa'i nad khrag 'byung ba dang /_gzhang 'brum la sogs pa'i nad dang rlung las gyur pa'i
[\[247b.7\]]nad thams cad skyed par byed do/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel ba tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel ba'o//_//
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]de nas gsang ba'i gnas kyi nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/sos 'dzin 'dra ba gsar byung la/_/pho mtshan dbus nas gtar ga gdab/_/bsil ba'i gso bas sbyang bar bya/_/khyad par du ni bkru sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_/sos 'dzin pa'i nang du skyes ma zug pa la ni
[\[248a.2\]]rnags par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/_/pho mtshan gyi dbus nas gtar ga gdab pa la sogs pa'i gso ba bya'o/_/smin na til gyi lde gu ni/_/sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad de gal te smin par gyur na gtsags bus brtol nas til gyi lde gu dang sbrang rtsi dang mar
[\[248a.3\]]sbyar bas bsku bar bya'o/_/'dzam bu a mra klu shing dang /_/nim pa kam po dza'i myu gu/_/rgya shug bil pas li ka/_/rgya skyegs ti ni sha shing shun/_/'o ma can gyi shing gi shun/_/'bras bu gsum ni chur bskol ba'i/_/khu ba de ni bkru ba dang /_/de bskol til mar gyis rma 'tshob/_/
[\[248a.4\]]ces bya ba la/_/gzhan yang 'dzam bu la sogs pa'i myu gu dang /_rgya shug la sogs pa'i shun pa dang /_'o ma can gyi shing gi shun lpags dang /_'bras bu gsum sman khu ba bskol ba'i sbyor bas bskol la/_des sos 'dzin pa'i nad la bkru bar bya zhing /_de dang bskol pa'i til mar
[\[248a.5\]]gyis bsku bar bya'o/_/spangs ma seng phrom btsag yug snam/_/sug smel ldong ros ba bla dang /_/nag tshur rgya tsha skyer khaN+Da/_/rgyam tsha ha re Nu ka yi/_/phye ma sbrang rtsi sbyar bas bsku/_/sos 'dzin lta bu'i rma 'tshob byed/_/ces bya ba la/_spangs ma la sogs pa'i sman ji skad smos
[\[248a.6\]]pa'i sbyor bas lde gu byas pas bskus na yang nad de'i rma 'tshob par byed do/_/kham phor sbyar bar 'bras bu gsum/_/bsregs pa mar bcas rma 'tshob byed/_/ces bya ba la/_'bras bu gsum kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bsregs pa'i phye ma mar dang bcas te bskus na yang rma 'tshob par byed
[\[248a.7\]]do/_/'di ni spyi yi gso ba yin/_/re re skrang pa lta bur gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_gso ba 'di ni sos 'dzin pa lta bu'i spyi'i yin gyi/_/nad gzhi tha dad pa las gyur ba ni skrang pa'i nad ltar gso bar bya'o/_/sman pas ci nas rnags par ni/_/mi 'gyur de ltar 'bad par bya/_/rnags
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]na rgyus pa rtsa dang sha_/zhig pas pho mtshan ma rung 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman pas sbyor ba thams cad kyis nad de rnags par mi 'gyur ba la 'bad par bya ste/_rnags na ni thams cad du ma rungs par 'gyur pa'i skyon yod do/_/'brum pa bcad dang bsregs pa yi/_/gso ba sos
[\[248b.2\]]'dzin lta bur bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshon gyis 'brum pa bcad pa dang /_bsregs pa'i rma gso ba yang sos 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar bya'o/_/brud nas yungs kar bye zhib dang /_/bskol sman phye mas gdab par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na de la dang por brud cing bzhar la/_yungs
[\[248b.3\]]kar gyi phye ma zhib tu btags pa btab par bya ba dang /_bskol sman snga ma'i phye mas gdab par bya'o/_/til mar de nyid kyis bsku zhing /_/rma 'tshob pa yi gso ba bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang sman gyi phye ma de dang bskol pa'i til mar gyis bsku zhing rma gso bar bya'o/_/mnye gso
[\[248b.4\]]ba ni 'di nyid bya/_/de dag gnyi gar gtar ga gdab/_/ces bya ba la/_yang sbyor ba 'di nyid ni mnye ba zhes bya ba mtshan gyi nad la yang bya la/_de bzhin du mnye ba yungs kar lta bu zhes bya ba gnyi ga la gtar gdab par bya'o/_/khong stong la ni gtar ga bya/_/rnags la rma ni dag
[\[248b.5\]]par bya/_/tin tu ka dang 'bras bu gsum/_/seng phrom lde gu til mar bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_khong stong zhes bya ba la ni dang por gtar ga gdab par bya la/_rnags pa la ni brtol te rma dag par byas nas/_tin tu ka la sogs pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya ba dang /_yang na sman de nyid dang
[\[248b.6\]]bskol ba'i til mar gyis bskus na rma 'tshob par byed do/_/'bras byer la ni gtar ga gdab/_/gso ba'i rim pa 'di nyid bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/'bras byer ba la ni gtar ga gdab cing /_/bshad ma thag pa'i gso ba 'di nyid bya'o/_/mchog ces bya ba'i 'brum bu ni/_/brtol te lcags
[\[248b.7\]]kyus blangs te gcad/_/lde gu phye ma sman khu ni/_/sbrang rtsir bcas pas gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mchog la ni gcad pa dang /_/lde gus gso bar bya'o/_/mnye dang pad+ma can la ni/_/mkhris pa'i me dbal gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mnye ba dang pad+ma can zhes bya ba la ni/_/
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]mkhris pa las gyur pa'i me dbal gyi gso ba ji skad smos pa bya'o/_/pags smin tshor ba med pa la'ang /_/pho mo'i gso ba 'di nyid bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_pags pa smin pa dang tshor ba med pa'i nad skyes pa dang /_bud med gnyig la yang mkhris pa'i me dbal
[\[249a.2\]]gso ba ji skad smos pa bya'o/_/mnye la dugs ni bya ba dang /_/ba la'i sman mar dro 'jam blugs/_/mngar ba'i sman sbyar dkri dugs bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mnye ba zhes bya ba'i mtshan gyi nad la ni dugs bya ba dang /_ba la'i sman mar dro 'jam tsam blugs pa dang /_mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan
[\[249a.3\]]sbyar ba'i dkri ba'i dugs bya'o/_/gtun shing 'dra la gtar ga gdab/_/bad kan rmen bu lta bur gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_gtun shing 'dra ba la ni rngabs rwa la sogs pas khrag dbyung la/_de'i 'og tu bad kan las gyur pa'i rmen bu dang tshul mthun par gso ba bya'o/_/pags pa ldog la
[\[249a.4\]]mar gyis bsku/_/sa lba la sogs snum gyur pas/_/zhag gsum mam ni zhag lnga ru/_/dkri ba'i dugs ni sbyad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_pags pa ldog pa'i mtshan gyi nad la ni mar gyis bskus la/_de'i 'og tu sa lba la sogs pa dugs kyi le'u las bshad pa bzhin du
[\[249a.5\]]snum las zhag lnga'am zhag gsum gyi bar du dkri ba'i dugs bya'o/_/dugs bya de yi 'og tu ni/_/snum gyur pags pa drang bar bya/_/nor bu rim gyis btsir nas ni/_/chud nas nye bar dkri bar bya/_/nor bu yang yang snum tshes bya/_/kha zas snum can sbyin pa'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba
[\[249a.6\]]la/_de'i 'og tu yang dugs byas la/_mar gyi snum chos byas te/_pags pa drangs la nor bu chud par bya'o/_/chud nas kyang yang dkri bar bya'o/_/yang na 'di la kha zas snum pa dang bcas pa yang sbyin par bya'o/_/gas pa la yang cho ga yi/_/rim pa ji bzhin byas pa'ang phan/_/zhes
[\[249a.7\]]bya ba la/_bshad ma thag pa'i sbyor ba 'di ni gas pa zhes bya ba'i nad la yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/'gags pa sbu gu kha gnyis pa/_/rgya skyegs kyis ni dkris pa la/_/snum bskus bu gar bcug nas ni/_/rlung 'joms snum ni blugs par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_nor bu 'gags par gyur
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]ba la ni/_sbu gu kha gnyis pa rgya skyegs kyis bsgos pa la snum bskus pa bcug la/_rlung 'joms pa'i sman blugs par bya'o/_/sbu gu zhag ni gsum gsum nas/_/legs par skyed de spang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i 'og tu zhag gsum gsum nas sbu gu de bskyed de spang bar
[\[249b.2\]]bya'o/_/sbu gu'i sbyor bas ma grub na/_/mkhas pas mdoms kyi srubs can ni/_/bor te mtshon gyis dral nas kyang /_/de 'og rma gsar cho ga bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de lta bu sbu gu'i sbyor ba ni gso bas grub cing /_sos par ma gyur na/_sman pa mkhas pas srubs can ma gtogs par mtshon
[\[249b.3\]]gyis dral la/_de'i 'og tu rma gsar pa gso ba'i cho ga ltar gso bar bya'o/_/rmen bur sbu gu'i dugs byas la/_/snum zhing dro bas dkri bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rmen bu mdun pa can gyi mtshan gyi nad la ni sbu gu'i dugs kyis dugs byas la/_snum pa bro ba'i dugs kyis dkri bar bya'o/_/kha
[\[249b.4\]]brgya ba ni bzhar nas kyang /_/bska ba sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsru/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha brgya pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan gyi nad la ni gtsags bus bzhar la sman ro bska ba dang sbrang rtsis bsku bar bya'o/_/khrag gi 'brum bu khrag gi ni/_/khong 'bras bzhin du gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag gi
[\[249b.5\]]'brum bu zhes bya ba'i nad la ni khrag las gyur pa'i khong 'bras dang 'dra bar gso'o/_/kun la rma yi gso ba ni/_/gnas skabs ji bzhin sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mtshan gyi nad thams cad la yang gnas skabs dang sbyar te/_rma gso ba'i tshig sbyar ba dang /_/lde gus bsku ba la
[\[249b.6\]]sogs pa'i gso ba bya'o/_/mngal gyi nad la mang du ni/_/snum chos dugs dang mas gtong sogs/_/rlung 'joms pa yi gso ba bsngags/_/rlung las gyur la mchog tu sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_mngal gyi nad thams cad la ni phal cher snum chos dang /_dugs la sogs pa'i rlung
[\[249b.7\]]gso ba'i sbyor ba bya'o/_/de las kyang khyad par du rlung las gyur pa la ni lhag par bya'o/_/bud med kyi ni mngal gyi nad/_/rlung ma gtogs par 'byung mi 'gyur/_/de bas rlung ni bsal byas la/_/nad gzhan gyis ni gso sman bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir nad de ni rlung ma yin pa gzhan
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]las shas cher mi 'byung bas/_de'i phyir dang por de bsal la/_de'i 'og tu gzhag gso bar bya'o/_/ba la'i til mar blud bya zhing /_/'dren ma skye de'i 'o ma blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang bud med de la ba la'i til mar la sogs pa blud par bya'o/_/snum chos dugs
[\[250a.2\]]byas te mngal/_/nyes par gnas pa mnyam du gzhag_/yon po lag pas drang por bsrang /_/zhum pa slar ni bskyed par bya/_/byung ba slar ni gzhug bya zhing /_/gyes pa yongs su bzlog par bya/_/mngal ni gnas nas g.yos gyur pa/_/bud med zug rngur gyur par 'dod/_/
[\[250a.3\]]ces bya ba la/_mngal nyes par gnas pa la snum chos la sogs pa bya ste/_de'i 'og tu lag pas mnyam du legs par gzhag pa dang /_yon po ni drang bor bsrang bar bya ba dang /_zhum pa bskyed pa la sogs pa bya ste/_gang gi phyir bud med kyi mngal rang gi gnas las
[\[250a.4\]]g.yos bar gyur pa de ni zug rngu dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro/_/bud me la ni slon sman sogs/_/'jam pos yongs su sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bud med mngal gyi skyon yod pa la ni slon sman la sogs pa'i las rnam pa lnga po 'jam pos gso bar bya'o/_/rnam pa kun tu dag gyur
[\[250a.5\]]nas/_/'jam rtsi bsku byug sman bu blugs/_/byug dang ye'u gzhug pa sogs/_/gso ba'i las ni lhag ma sbyad/_/ces bya ba la/_bud med la rnam pa thams cad du sbyang ba byas nas/_de'i 'og tu 'jam rtsi la sogs pa'i gso ba lhag ma rnams bya'o/_/rgun 'brum
[\[250a.6\]]tang ba la 'bras bu gsum/_/ka sa mar dang ser po gnyis/_/sle tres nye'u shing sher+ya ka_/shu ka na ya ba spru ba/_/pa ru sha ka zho gnyis gnyis/_/mar ni bre gang bcas par bskol/_/de blud mngal gyi rlung nad dang /_/bu skyed byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/
[\[250a.7\]]rgun 'brum la sogs pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba ji skad bshad pa'i sman mar blud na yang mngal gyi rlung nad sel ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no/_/zi ra go snyid pi pi ling /_/shu dag rgyam tsha ba sha ka/_/nas tshig 'khus thal ti mus/_/tsi tra ka dang kha rar bcas/_/btags te
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]chang gi dngas mar sbyar/_/mar brngos de ni byin gyur na/_/mngal nad rtsib logs snying nad dang /_/skrang dang gzhang 'brum sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_zir la sogs pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba ji skad smos pa btang na yang mngal nad la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/kha lung khu ba sha ka'i
[\[250b.2\]]rtsab/_/zir nag po go snod dang /_/sen rtsi rgyam tsha'i phye ma ni/_/chang dang sbyar te blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_kha lung la sogs pa'i phye mchang dang sbyar te blud na yang phan no/_/ra sna gze ma ba sha ka_/bskol ba gzer 'joms mchog yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na ra sna la
[\[250b.3\]]sogs pa'i khu ba blud na yang phan no/_/sle tres dan da 'bras bu gsum/_/bskol ba'i khu ba 'ang blugs par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang sle tres la sogs pa'i sman gyi khu ba bskol ba'i chu blugs na yang phan no/_/rgya spos kaN+Da ka ri dang /_/ru rta rgyam tsha thang shing rnams/_/bskol
[\[250b.4\]]ba'i khu ba til mar bskol/_/sbangs pa'i ye'us mngal nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang rgya spos la sogs pa'i sman dang /_til mar bskol ba'i til mar la sbangs pa'i ye'u mngal gyi nang du bcug na yang phan no/_/mngal nad mkhris pa las gyur las/_/chu blugs bsku
[\[250b.5\]]byug ye'u yi/_/gso ba bsil zhing mkhris 'joms pa/_/snum chos don du mar gyis bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mngal gyi nad pa ni bsil zhing mkhris pa sel ba'i sman chu blugs pa la sogs pa bya ba dang /_de bzhin du snum gyi cho ga yang zhun mar gyis bya'o/_/
[\[250b.6\]]nye'u shing rtsa ba srang bzhi brgya/_/brdungs te btsir ba'i khu ba dang /_/'o ma de mnyam mar bre ni/_/bzhi yin nang du bskol bar bya/_/'tsho byed sde tshan nye'u shing dang /_/pa ru sha ka rgun 'brum dang /_/bi la ya dang ba la gnyis/_/shing mngar zho ni gnyis gnyis phye/_/bskol te bsgrangs par
[\[250b.7\]]sbrang rtsi dang /_/pi pi ling ni srang brgyad brgyad/_/kha ra dkar po srang bcu gzhug/_/de las srang ni phyed byed sbyin/_/mngal khrag khu ba'i nad sel zhing /_/ro tsa bu skyed byed mchog yin/_/glo rdol zad byed khrag mkhris dang /_/lud pa dbugs mi bde ba dang /_/mig ser rlung dang khrag dang
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]ni/_/me dbal dang ni snying nad dang /_/brjed byed kyis nyen da rgan dang /_/myos byed skem byed 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nye'u shing srang bzhi brgya'i khu ba dang /_'o ma de dang cha mnyam par bya ba dang /_'tsho byed kyi sde tshan dang /_nye'u shing la sogs pa zho
[\[251a.2\]]gnyis gnyis dang /_mar bre bzhi bskol la bsgrungs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi srang brgyad dang /_pi pi ling srang brgyad dang /_kha ra srang bcu bcug ste/_de las srang phyed phyed byin na mngal gyi khu bakhrag gi nad sel ba la sogs pa dang /_smyo byed kyi bar gyi nad nges par 'joms par byed pa
[\[251a.3\]]yin no/_/de bzhin 'o ma zhun mar dang /_/'tsho byed sde tshan bskol ba ni/_/bu skyed mkhris las gyur pa'am/_/mngal nad sel ba'i dam pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du 'o ma dang zhun mar dang /_'tsho byed kyi sde tshan dang bskol ba'i sman mar byin na yang yon tan de dang 'dra zhing
[\[251a.4\]]bu skyed ba dang mkhris pa'i mngal nad sel ba'i mchog yin no/_/ba la bre ni sum cu gnyis/_/bskol ba'i til mar mar bre bzhi/_/'o ma bzhi 'gyur pi pi ling /_/ka ka na mi ka ra dkar/_dzi ban ti dang ram nye ba/_/s+thi ra nye'u shing zir gnyis/_/mon sran gre'u ba ya s+ya/_/
[\[251a.5\]]ma sha ba r+Ni sra ba ni/_/pi lu'i lo ma lhan cig bskol/_/blud na rlung mkhris las gyur ba'i/_/mngal nad sel zhing bu skyed byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ba la bre sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bskol ba'i mar dang til mar de blud na rlung dang mkhris pa las gyur pa'i
[\[251a.6\]]mngal nad sel bar byed cing bu skyed par byed pa yin no/_/khrag gi mngal nad khrag mdog las/_/rjes su 'brel ba brtags nas kyang /_/nad gzhi bsags pa'i tshul las ni/_/khrag bcad pa yi sman gtang bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag gi mngal nad la ni gtar ga'i cho ga las bshad
[\[251a.7\]]pa'i tshul gyis nad gzhi'i mtshan nyid shes par byas la nad gzhi dang rjes su mthun pa'i khrag gcod pa'i sman gtang bar bya'o/_/shing mngar sbrang rtsi chu shing rtsa/_/ta la'i sa bon skyer pa'i rtsa/_/dri yang ku dang 'bras drus chu/_/sbyar ba blud na khrag 'dzag pa/_/mdog skya dmar po sel bar/_/
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]byang /_/ces bya ba la/_shing mngar la sogs pa sbyar ba'i chu blud na yang khrag 'dzag pa sel bar byed do/_/pa tha 'dzam bu a mra yi/_/tshi gu dang ni bra gzhun dang /_/skyer pa'i khaN+Ta am baSh+Ta/_/btsod dang shal ma li'i thang chu/_/dug mo nyung gi shun lpags dang /_/gur gum bil ba bong
[\[251b.2\]]nga dkar/_/seng phrom gla sgang btsag yug snam/_/shing mngar tsan+dan dmar po dang /_/kad pa la dang mA tsi ka/_/ka Tang+ka dang dug mi nyung /_/byi tsher ba dang da ta ki/_/ma du ka dang stang zil ni/_/skar ma rgyal la bab pa la/_/btus shing btags te sbrang rtsi dang /_/'bras kyi chur sbyar blud
[\[251b.3\]]na ni/_/gzhang 'brum tsha dang par 'khru ba dang /_/gang yang khrag tu 'khru ba dang /_/gang yang srin bu'i nad rnams dang /_/byis pa'i nad gang yin pa 'joms/_/mngal gyi nad dang zla mtshan nad/_/gnag cing dkar dang dmar ba sel/_/phye ma rgyal gyi rjes 'gro ba/_/phan zhes rgyun shes
[\[251b.4\]]bu yis bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_'dzam bu dang a mra'i tshi gu ni sha bor ba'i rus pa'o/_/a ma baSh+Ta ni ma yo ra sha kha'o/_/shal ma li'i thang chu ni mo tsa ras 'o/_/ka Tad+ka ni so na ka'o/_/gzhan dag gi go bar zad de/_ba ta la sogs pa'i sman de dag skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe btus la
[\[251b.5\]]btags te sbrang rtsi dang 'bras kyi chur sbyar te blud na ni gzhang 'brum la sogs pa'i nad sel par byed cing /_/mngal gyi nad zla mtshan nag po 'dzag pa la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/phye ma 'di ni rgyal gyi rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ste/_/nad thams cad la phan pa yin no/_/bad kan las gyur mngal
[\[251b.6\]]nad la/_/rtsub dang dro ba'i sman kun sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan las gyur pa'i mngal nad la ni zas dang skom dang sman dang spyod lam la sogs pa rtsub ba dang /_/dro ba'i phyogs sbyar bar bya'o/_/skya ru'i lo ma da ta ki/_/shing mngar ut+pal lig bu mig/_/'dzam bu a mra'i tshi gu dang /_/
[\[251b.7\]]seng phrom sa nag kad pa la/_/se'u 'bru shing tsha tin+du ka_/u dum lbAr bil ba gzhon/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis btags pa'i phyi/_/rag cin 'o ma nyis 'gyur dang /_/til mar bre gang bskol bar bya/_/til mar bre gang bskol bar bya/_/de bsku ba dang 'jam rtsi dang /_/ras bal ye'u gzhug par bya/_/skrang zhing phyir logs mtho
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]zhing sra/_/de bzhin spyi bag 'dzag pa dang /_/phyir 'bur nad du zhum pa dang /_/'brum bu gzer dang bcas la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyu ru ra'i lo ma la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ji skad smos pa'i tshul du bskol ba'i til mar bsku ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas na mngal
[\[252a.2\]]skrang ba la sogs pa'i nad la phan no/_/nas zan i ru sbyar chang dang /_/bu ram chang dang til mar bsten/_/pi pi ling dang lcags phye dang /_/a ru ra sbyar sbrang rtsi phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_/nas zan dang a ru ra sbyar ba'i chang bsten zhing /_/bu ram chang la sogs pa bsten pa dang /_/pi pi
[\[252a.3\]]ling gi sbyor ba dang /_/lcags phye'i sbyor ba dang /_/a ru ra'i sbyor ba sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa btang na yang phan no/_/nag tshur rgyam tsha 'bras bu gsum/_/a mra 'dzam bu'i tshi gu bcas/_/data ka'i phye sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/sbyi bag 'dzag pa dag par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nag tshur la sogs
[\[252a.4\]]pa'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba byin na yang mngal nas spyi bag 'dzag pa dag par byed do/_/rgya skyegs 'dzam bu da ta ki/_/mo tsa ra sa la mang gi/_/sra rtsi pog gi phye ma yis/_/dri mi zhim dang spyi bag 'dzag_/rnags shing sra ba sel bar byed /_/ces bya ba la/_rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i
[\[252a.5\]]sbyor bas ni dri mi zhim ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba sel bar byed do/_/dong ga la sogs sde tshan ni/_/bskol ba'i khu ba blugs par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang dong ga la sogs pa'i sde tshan gyi khu ba blugs na dri mi zhim pa la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/sra zhing rtsub par gyur pa la/_/mnyen pa'i
[\[252a.6\]]cho ga bya ba dang /_/sha brdungs pa yis glan pa dang /_/kri sa ra dang 'o thug gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_/mngal sra ba la sogs pa la ni sha brdungs te btsos shing spod btab ste glan pa dang /_/de bzhin du til dang 'bras la sogs pa'i kri sa ra dang /_/'o ma dang 'bras btsos pa'i 'o thug gzhug
[\[252a.7\]]cing glan par bya'o/_/dri ngar til mar dri zhim pa'am/_/lde gu dri zhim bsku ba'am/_/dri bzangs kun gi phye ma'am/_/rul ba'i dri ni sel byed bzhug_/ces bya ba la/_mngal dri mi zhim par gyur pa la ni dri zhim pa'i sman thams cad dang sbyang ba'i til mar ram lde gu'am phye mas bskus shing btang
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]pas dri nga ba sel bar byed do/_/bad kan can la phal cher sman/_/tsha ba ba gcin mas gtong phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_mngal bad kan gyi nad shas che ba la ni sman tsha ba'i shas che ba ba gcin dang bcas shing sbyar ba mas gtong ba phan no/_/mkhris pa shing mngar 'o mar bcas/_/rlung gyur skyur
[\[252b.2\]]bcas til mar phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa shas che ba'i mngal gyi nad la ni shing mngar dang 'o mar sbyar ba mas gtong ba phan no/_/rlung gi shas che ba'i nad la ni skyur ba'i bag dang lhan cig bskol ba'i til mar gyi mas gtong ba phan no/_/'dus pa las gyur nad la ni/_/thun mong gis
[\[252b.3\]]ni gso ba phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa las gyur pa'i mngal nad la ni gso ba'i sbyor ba thun mong byas na phan no/_/de ltar mngal nad dag gyur na/_/sa bon skyon med tha mal bar/_/rnam par shes pa 'jug pas na/_/bud med la ni bu chags 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_'dus ba las
[\[252b.4\]]gyur pa'i mngal dag pa dang ldan pa dang /_sa bon zla mtshan nyes pa'i skyon med ba tha mal ba dang ldan pa la ni srid pa bar ma'i rnam par shes pa 'jug pas na/_/bud med gal te nad dang bcas pa yin na de lta bu la bu chags par 'gyur ro/_/skyes pa yi ni dbang po yang /_/las rnam lnga yis
[\[252b.5\]]dag bya zhing /_/mdog las nad gzhi brtags nas ni/_/nad bcas de 'joms sman gyis gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes ba'i dbang po yang las rnam pa lngas sbyang bar bya zhing /_khu ba'i mdog las nad gzhi brtags la/_gal te nad dang bcas pa yin na ni/_nad rang rang sel zhing 'joms
[\[252b.6\]]ba'i sman gyis gso bar bya'o/_/ru rta rgya spos shu dag btsod/_/'bras bu gsum dang kha ra dkar/_/shing mngar me da ser po gnyis/_/la la phud dang pu tse shel/_/shing mngar ram nye pa ya s+ya/_/a shwa gan+b+ha nye'u shing pa/_/zho ni gnyis gnyis btags pa'i phye/_/mar bre gang dang 'o ma ni/_/bzhi
[\[252b.7\]]'gyur dang ni bcas pa bskol/_/blud na mngal dang khu ba yi/_/nyes pa thams cad sel byed cing /_/tshe ring lus ni rgyas byed la/_/yid gzhungs pa dang bkra shis dang /_/bu skyed par ni byed mchog yin/_/'bras bu'i sman mar zhes byar bshad/_/zla mtshan rgyu tshe 'thungs gyur na/_/bu ni
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]'chi bar byed pa yang /_/'tsho zhing sgrum ma rnams la bsngags/_/'di ni mchog tu byis pa yi/_/lus rgyas gdon 'joms byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ru rta dang rgya spos la sogs pa'i sman sna re zho gnyis gnyis zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma mar bre gang dang 'o ma bre
[\[253a.2\]]bzhi dang bskol te/_mar 'ba' zhig lus pa blud na mngal dang khu ba'i nyes pa thams cad sel bar byed cing tshe ring ba nas mngal du bu chags par byed pa'i mchog yin te/_'di ni ming 'bras bu'i sman mar zhes bya bar bshad do/_'di zla mtshan rgyu zhing mngal chags par byed pa'i dus su
[\[253a.3\]]blud na bu 'chi bar byed na yang 'tsho zhing mngal chags par 'gyur ba 'am/_sbrum ma rnams la yang bsngags shing phan pa dang mar 'di khyad par du byis pa rnams kyi lus rgyas shing brtas pa dang /_gdon 'joms par byed pa'i mchog yin no/_yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel
[\[253a.4\]]pa'i tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//mtshon spyad kyis gso ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//_//de nas dug nad gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/sngon ni lha dang lham
[\[253a.5\]]yin/_/bdud rtsi 'dod pas bsrubs pa na/_/bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i sngon rol du/_/skyes bu shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs/_/mche ba bzhi pa gzi brjid 'bar/_/skra ser mig ni me 'bar ba/_/nge mthong 'gro ba sdug bsngal gyur/_/des na 'di ni dug ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sngon
[\[253a.6\]]thog mar lha dang lha ma yin bdud rtsi 'dod pa'i phyir 'o ma can gyi rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las/_/bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i sngon du skyes bu shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mche ba bzhi pa lus kyi gzi brjid che ba/_/skra ser zhing kham pa/_/mig me ltar 'bar ba zhig byung bar gyur la/_/de mthong bas 'gro
[\[253a.7\]]ba rnams sdug bsngal bar gyur te/_des na 'di la ming du dug ces bya ba yin la/_de'i phyir de'i cha las byung ba sdug bsngal skyed par byed pa thams cad la yang dug ces bya ba yin no/_/tshangs pas hUM zhes brjod pa dang /_/bslu ba'i bdag nyid can spongs te/_/gzugs de rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]gzugs la de ni zhugs par gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i 'og tu tshangs pas hUM zhes brjod de tshar bcad pa dang /_/sdug bsngal bar byed pa'i bslu ba'i bdag nyid can de rang gzugs sbangs te gnod par byed pa'i gzugs de rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i gzugs la zhugs par gyur to/_/brtan dug
[\[253b.2\]]nus pa mi bzad par/_/sdong bu la ni gnas pa gang /_/ka la ku ta dbang po'i bu/_/btsan dug ha la ha la sogs/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug de sdong bu la sogs pa la gnas par gyur ba gang yin pa de ni nus pa mi bzad cing rang bzhin brtan par gyur pa ka la ku ta dang /_/dbang po'i bu
[\[253b.3\]]ste i n+d+ra bad tsha dang /_/btsan dug ste sring gi dang /_/ha la ha la la sogs pa'i dug tu gyur pa ni sems med cing brtan la mi g.yo ba'i gzugs la gnas pas na/_/brtan pa'i dug ce 'am mi rgyu ba'i dug ces bya'o/_/rgyu ba'i dug ni mi bzad gyur/_/sbrul dang phag dang mche ba can/_/
[\[253b.4\]]zhes bya ba la/_dug mi bzad pa gang sbrul dang srog chags phag dang /_/mche ba can la sogs pa la gnas pa'i dug de ni sems can la brten pa yin pas rgyu ba'i dug ces bya'o/_/rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu ba'i/_/bcos ma ma yin dug tu bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_de ltar rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dug
[\[253b.5\]]ni bcos ma ma yin pa'i dug ces bya ste/_rang bzhin gyi dug yin ba'i phyir ro/_/bcos ma sna tshogs sman la ni/_/sbyar ba sbyar ba'i dug ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang dug tu gyur ba'i sman sna tshogs pa la sogs ba sbyar ba ni bya ba'i las kyis bsgrubs pa yin pas na/_sbyar ba'i dug
[\[253b.6\]]ces bya ste/_bcos ma'i dug kyang de nyid yin no/_/de ni sbyor ba'i dbang las ni/_/shin tu ring nas gsod pa'am/_/skrang dang skya rbab dmu rdzing dang /_/smyo byed gzhang 'brum la sogs skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_sbyar ba'i dug de ni sbyor ba'i dbang gis dug yun ring zhig na gsod par byed pa'am
[\[253b.7\]]skrang ba la sogs pa'i nad skyed par byed ba yin no/_/rno dro rtsub cing dang ba dang /_/khyab cing myur gsod yang ba dang /_/'dar zhing phra la ro mi gsal/_/'ju bar mi byed pa yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug de ni rno ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bcu po de dang ldan zhing 'ju bar mi byed pa yin no
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]rno sogs yon tan dang ldan pas/_/de ni mdangs las go bzlog yin/_/mi ni rlung mkhris shas che ba/_/srog ni 'phral du 'phrog par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_dug de ni rno ba la sogs pa yon tan bcu dang ldan pas mdangs kyi yon tan las go bzlog par
[\[254a.2\]]gyur pa yin la/_/de bzhin du mi rlung dang mkhris pa shas che ba dag ni srog mod la 'phrog par byed pa yin no/_/dug gis lus su phyin pa dang /_/dang por khrag la gnod par byed/_/bad kan mkhris pa rlung rjes la/_/nad gzhi grogs dang lhan cig 'byung /_/zhes bya ba la/_/gang gi
[\[254a.3\]]phyir dug gis lus la phyin cing song ba na/_/dang por khrag la gnod par byed nas/_/de'i rjes la bad kan dang mkhris pa dang rlung la gnod par byed de/_/nad gzhi gsum cha mnyam pa la ni bad kan la sogs pa la gnod cing lhan cig 'byung bar byed do/_/de nas snying la gnas
[\[254a.4\]]nas ni/_/lus la gnod pa byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas dug de snying la gnas nas lus 'joms shing gnod par byed par 'gyur ro/_/mi rgyu'i dug ni btang gyur na/_/lce gnag lus ni rengs pa dang /_/brgyal dang slon dang sdang dang ngal/_/gnas skabs dang
[\[254a.5\]]por 'byur bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas dug de snying la gnas nas lus 'joms shing gnod par byed/_/'dug par gyur nas dug gi shugs dang po la lce gnag cing lus rengs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis par 'dar zhing rngul ba dang /_/tsho zhing lkog ma na ba
[\[254a.6\]]dang /_/dug gis ma zhu'i gnas phyin na/_/snying ni na bar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi shugs gnyis pa la ni lus 'dar ba dang /_/rngul la sogs pa 'byung zhing shugs de'i tshe dug gis ma zhu ba'i gnas su phyin pas lhag par yang snying na bar byed do/_/gsum par rkan
[\[254a.7\]]ni skams pa dang /_/ma zhu'i gnas su shin tu gzer/_/de'i mig nyam chung ser ba dang /_/skrang ba nyid du 'gyur ba dang /_/zhu ba'i gnas phyin zug pa dang /_/skyigs bu lud pa rgyu ma 'khrugs/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi shugs gsum par ni rkan skams pa la sogs pa dang /_/nad
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]pa de'i mig nyam chung zhing ser ba la sogs par 'gyur ba yin no/_/dug gi shugs ni bzhi pa la/_/mgo bo lhag par lci bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi shugs bzhi pa la ni mgo bo lhag par lci bar 'gyur ro/_/lnga par mchil snabs 'dzag pa dang /_/lhu tshigs nab 'byung
[\[254b.2\]]'gyur la/_/mdog mi sdug cing nad kun 'khrugs/_/zhu ba'i gnas kyi 'og tu na/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi shugs lnga par ni lhu tshigs na ba la sogs pa dang /_/rlung la sogs pa'i nad kun 'khrugs pa dang /_/zhu ba'i gnas kyi 'og tu lhag par na bar 'gyur ro/_/drug par
[\[254b.3\]]'du shes nyams pa dang /_/shin tu 'khrul bar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_drug par ni 'du shes nyams pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/bdun par phrag gong rgal tshigs dang /_/dpyi tshigs bye na 'chi 'gyur yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi shugs bdun pa la ni rgal
[\[254b.4\]]tshigs na ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/dug gi shugs ni dang po la/_/slon zhing chu grang dag gis gtor/_/mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi/_/dug gi sman ni myur du blud/_/ces bya ba la/_dug gi shugs dang po la ni slon sman la sogs pa bya'o/_/gnyis par skyug sman
[\[254b.5\]]bkru sman gtang /_/snga ma bzhin du dug sman blud/_/ces bya ba la/_dug gi shugs gnyis pa la ni bkru sman dang skyug sman btang la snga ma bzhin du dug gi sman zhun mar dang /_/sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o/_/gsum bar dug gi sman blud cing /_/de bzhin mig sman sna sman gtang /_/
[\[254b.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_dug gi shugs gsum pa la ni dug sman blud pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/bzhi par snum dang bcas pa yi/_/dug gi sman ni btang na phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_bzhi pa la ni dug gi sman la sogs pa sbyin par bya'o/_/lnga par shing mngar khu ba dang /_/sbrang rtsir sbyar ba blud na
[\[254b.7\]]phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi shugs lnga pa la ni dug sman shing mngar la sogs pa blud par bya'o/_/drug par 'khru ba lta bur gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi shugs drug pa la ni 'khru ba'i gso ba ji skad smos pa ltar bya'o/_/bdun par sna sman dud pa dang /_/sbyi bor rgya gram byas
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]nas ni/_/sha 'am khrag ni gzhug bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi shugs bdun pa la ni sna sman gyi dud pa bdug pa dang /_sbyi bor rgya gram byas te batral la sha dang khrag der gzhag par bya'o/_/ko sha ta ki lang ga li/_/pa tha lcam pa a ru ra/_/sA lu sle tres
[\[255a.2\]]shi ri sha_/gi ri kar ni yung ba dang /_/a hA sbrang rtsi ba spru ba/_/bri ha ti gnyis tsha ba gsum/_/shi ri ba dang ba la ste/_/'di rnams bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_/bskol ba'i nas thug bsgrangs par ni/_/sbrang rtsi mar dang bcas pa gzhug_/gnas skabs gzhan la dug 'joms ba'i/_/sman
[\[255a.3\]]dang gso pa thams cad bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/ko sha ta ki la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba dang /_/nas thug byas pa las bsgrangs te sbrang rtsi la sogs pa bcug nas/_/skabs gzhan du zhes bya ba nas skabs kyi bar du dug 'joms pa'i sman nas thug de dang /_/skyug sman la
[\[255a.4\]]sogs pa thams cad bya'o/_/shing mngar tsan+pan ma du ka_/pad+ma ge sar de bzhin bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du shing mngar la sogs pa bskol ba'i khu ba dang nas thug byas te bsgrangs par sbrang rtsi dang /_/mar bcug pa'i dug sman gnas skabs kyi bar du gtang bar bya'o/_/
[\[255a.5\]]dngul rdo rgya spos ru rta dang /_/ba bla ldong ros pri yang ku/_/tsha ba gsum dang 'bu su hang /_/nA ga puSh+pa ge sar bcas/_/shing mngar spang spos ha re Nu/_/gi'u lbang mon sne'u rme ru dang /_/shi ri beSh+Ta sra rtsi pog/_/shu ti gur gum ba la dang /_/bal bu ta ma li'i lo ma/_/stag pa dang ni me
[\[255a.6\]]shel lci/_/ser bo gnyis ni sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/bu mo khrus dang smyung ba byas/_/gos dkar bgos pa byas nas ni/_/dge sbyong bram ze mchod byas te/_/dug sman mchog ni sbyar bar bya/_/de tshe sman pas sngags 'dis ni/_/bdag nyid bsngags te brjod par bya/_/skyes bu seng ger
[\[255a.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/sred med bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ji ltar khyab 'jug g.yul ngor ni/_/gzhan gyis pham par ma mthong ste/_/bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yis kyang /_/bdag la dug me grub par shog_/na mo be+eDU r+ya ya ma de/_/hu T+ya hu T+ya rak+Sha mAM/_/sarba bi she b+h+yaHgo+o ri
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]gan+ng+ha ri tsa N+Da li ma tang gi swA hA/_/'thag pa'i sngags gnyis pa ni/_ha ri ma ye swA hA/_/zhes bya ba la/_dngul rdo la sogs pa sman bu mo khrus dang gtsang sbrar bcas pa smyung bar gnas pa gos dkar po bgos pas dang po dge sbyong dang bram ze la mchod pa byas te/_skar ma rgyal la bab
[\[255b.2\]]pa na/_dug sman gyi mchog 'di sbyar bar bya zhing sbrang rtsi dang bsre bar bya'o/_/de nas de'i sman pas sngags dang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bsngags te/_skyes bu seng ge zhes bya ba nas swAhA'i bar du brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'thag pa'i tshe yang sngags gnyis pa ba
[\[255b.3\]]ha mA ye swA hA/_/zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o/_/ma lus dug dang ro langs dang /_/gdon gyi las dang sdig pa dang /_/gsod byed nad dang mu ge dang /_/'thab par 'dod dang 'jigs pa la/_/sman btung sna sman mig sman bsku/_/gdu bu la sogs la sbyar bya/_/'di ni zla shar zhes
[\[255b.4\]]bya ste/_/zhi dang bde legs byed mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug sman 'di ni ming zla ba shar ba zhes bya ste/_ma lus pa'i dug dang ro langs la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa nas/_'jigs ba'i bar la sna sman la sogs pas btang na/_zhi ba dang bde legs dam pa'i mchog
[\[255b.5\]]yin no/_/dug rnying dug sel sman gyis zil mnan pa/_/nags me rlung dang nyi tshan gyis skams pa 'am/_/rang bzhin gyis ni yon tan mi ldan pas/_/nyams pa'i dug ces bya ba'i dug tu 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gang rnying par gyur pa 'am/_dug sel ba'i sman gyi
[\[255b.6\]]zil gyis mnan pa'am/_yang na nags kyi me dang rlung la sogs pas skams pa'am/_yang na rang bzhin gyis rno ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang mi ldan pa ni nyams pa'i dug ces bya bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/'di ni nus pa chung bas mi rtogs te/_/bad kan dang 'dres lo ni mang
[\[255b.7\]]por gnas/_/zhes bya ba la/_nyams pa'i dug ces bya ba 'di ni nus pa chung ba'i phyir 'di ni 'phral du gsal bar mi rtogs te/_/gal te bad kan dang 'dres na ni lo mang po'i bar du yang gnas par 'gyur pa yin no/_/des nye na gyur pa mdog ngan 'khru bar byed/_/nad khrag skom dang
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]yi ga 'chus pas nyen/_/brgyal zhing slon la rnam rmongs skad 'dzer dang /_/dug gi dmu rdzing mtshan mas gnod par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_nyams pa'i dug des nyen par gyur pa'i skyes bu ni mdog ngan pa dang /_bshang ba 'khru bar gyur pa dang /_/
[\[256a.2\]]nad khrag dang bcas pa dang /_skom dad dang yi ga 'chus pa'i nad gnyis kyis nyen pa dang /_brgyal zhing myos pa dang /_slon zhing skyugs pa dang /_sems rnam par rmongs zhing skad ngar ngar por 'dzer ba dang /_dug las gyur pa'i dmu rdzing gi mtshan ma gang dag yin pa dag
[\[256a.3\]]dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/ma zhu'i gnas brten bad kan rlung nad skyed/_zhu ba'i gnas brten mkhris dang rlung nad skyed/_/mi yi yan lag zhig cing skra 'byi bas/_/ji ltar bya ni spu btogs pa lta bur byed/_/ces bya ba la/_nyams pa'i dug de ma zhu ba'i gnas la brten pa ni
[\[256a.4\]]bad kan dang rlung gi nad skyed par byed la/_zhu ba'i gnas la brten na ni mkhris pa dang rlung gi nad skyed par byed pa dang /_/mi'i yan lag zhig cing skra 'byi bas na/_ji ltar bya sgro gshog dang spu btogs pa lta bur byed pa yin no/_/dngas ma'am khrag la gnas par
[\[256a.5\]]byed na ni/_/lus zungs las byung nad ni sna tshogs skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na gnod pa'i dug de dngas ma la sogs pa la gnas na ni lus zungs la brten pa'i nad rnam pa tha dad pa skyed par byed do/_/mdun gyi rlung dang ma zhu grang /_/yul dmus gnod zas nyil par
[\[256a.6\]]nyal/_/lus zungs gnod par byas pa na/_/de bas gnod pa'i dug ces bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_mdun nas ldang ba'i rlung dang ma zhu ba dang /_grang ba la sogs pas lus zungs la gnod pa na dug de lhag par gnod par byed pas na/_de'i phyir nyams pa'i dug la gnod
[\[256a.7\]]pa'i dug ces kyang bya'o/_/gnod pa'i dug nyen dugs byas la/_/steng dang 'og nas sbyang bar bya/_/gnod pa'i dug ni sel ba'i sman/_/sbrang rtsi sbyar te lde gu sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnod pa'i dug gam nyams pa'i dug gis nyen pa'i mi ni dang por legs par dugs byas
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]la/_skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis steng 'og sbyangs la/_gnod pa'i dug 'joms pa'i sman sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba sbyin par bya'o/_/pi pi ling dang bya ma ka/_/sbang spos seng phrom sug smel dang /_/ku tan na ta sa rdzi ka_/ru rta shing mngar tsan+dan dang /_/yug snam btsag dang
[\[256b.2\]]bcas ba'i sman/_/gnod pa'i dug sel zhes bya ste/_/gzhan yang zlog par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_pi pi ling la sogs pa'i dug sman ni gnod ba'i dug sel zhes bya ste/_des ni dug gzhan yang sel bar byed pa yin no/_/dug mdas phog par gyur pa
[\[256b.3\]]dag/_yang dang yang du mun thibs byed/_/mdog ni mi sdug gyur pa dang /_/myur du yid 'byung sdug bsngal 'thob/_/'dis ni srin bus khyab pa ltar/_/lus tsha tsag tsag por 'gyur ro/_/gdong mo rgyab dang phrag pa mgo/_/lhu tshigs rnams su na bar byed/_/khrag ni
[\[256b.4\]]nad can gnag pa 'dzag_/skom dad brgyal tsha rims kyis 'debs/_/mig ni gnag cing slon pa dang /_/btud mar lud pa dbugs mi bde/_/rma dmar mtha' mar ser ba dang /_/dbus na gnag cing shin tu na/_/'phral du skrangs shing rnags pa dang /_/sha yang
[\[256b.5\]]nag por gyur nas ni/_/gnag cing shin tu 'drul bar byed/_/sbyi bag can du 'dzag par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_skyes bu dug mdas phog pa ni yang dang yang du mun thibs zhes byed cing mun par zhugs pa snyam du sems pa dang /_mdog mi sdug pa la sogs par 'gyur ba dang /_/
[\[256b.6\]]rma'i mtha' shin tu ser cing dbus na dug gi gnod pas gnag pa dang /_'phral du skrangs shing rnags pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/gnad du phog par ma gyur ba/_/myur du snying la phan byed bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gnad kyi steng du ma phog pa la ni myur du snying
[\[256b.7\]]la phan par byed pa'i sbyor ba mar la sogs pa gang dag yin pa bya'o/_/zug rdu phyung la lcags bsregs pas/_/rma ni legs par bsreg par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus la zug rdu phyung la/_de'i 'og tu lcags bsregs pas rma bsreg par bya'o/_/yang na mu ka ka dang ni/_/
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]gi ri kar+Ni dkar po dang /_/kad pa la yi shun pa dang /_/btsod dang shir sha bya rgod sen/_/bsregs pa'i thal bas bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rma de mu ka ka la sogs pa bsregs pa'i thal bas bsku bar bya'o/_/shu ka na sa bong nga dkar/_/kaN+Da
[\[257a.2\]]ka ri'i rtsa bas bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rma de shu ka na sa la sogs pa'i rtsa ba'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/dug 'thung sos btab gso ba dag/_/ci rigs par ni de la bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug mdas phog pa de la dug 'thungs pa'i gso ba dang sbrul la sogs pas sos
[\[257a.3\]]btab pa'i gso ba dag gis kyang ci rigs par gso par bya'o/_/rma yi sha ni rnags pa de/_/mkhris pa'i me dbal lta bur gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma'i sha rnags pa la sogs pa la ni mkhris pa'i me dbal dang 'dra bar gso bar bya'o/_/bde phyir khyo la bud med dang /_/
[\[257a.4\]]rgyal po la ni dgras bslabs te/_/zas dang sbyar ba'i dug bsres pa/_/nye 'khor skye bor ster bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_rang gi bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir dgra bos bud med la bslabs te dug ster du 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin du rgyal po la de'i dgra bos nye 'khor gyi skye bo la
[\[257a.5\]]bslabs te kha zas dang sbyar ba'i dug bsres te ster bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/sna tshogs lus kyi dri mar bcas/_/mi mthun sman dang thal ba dang /_/nus pa chung bar gyur pa'i dug_/sbyar ba'i dug ni sbyar ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_srog chags sna tshogs pa'i lus kyi dri ma dang mi
[\[257a.6\]]mthun zhing mi 'phrod pa'i sman dang thal ba dang /_nus pa chung bar byed pa'i dug gcig tu bsres te sbyar ba ni dug sbyar ma zhes bya'o/_/des nyen mdog skya rid pa dang /_/me drod nyams shing lud pa dang /_/dbugs mi bde dang rims kyis nyen/_/rlung ni mi mthun rgyu ba dang /_/gnyid
[\[257a.7\]]che yid ni zhum par byed/_/gcin snyi lto ba mchin pa dang /_/mcher pa na zhing skad gsang dma'/_/nyam chung sgyid ni zhan pa dang /_/skrangs shing rtag tu sbo ba dang /_/rkang pa lag pa skam zhing zad/_rmi lam du ni ce spyang dang /_/byi la sbrul dang ne'u le dang /_/spre'u mthong zhing
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]phal cher ni/_/nags tshal mtsho ni skams par mthong /_/bdag nyid nag por mthong 'gyur zhing /_/ser po nag por mthong bar byed/_/mig sna rna ba med pa dang /_/de yi dbang po nyams par mthong /_/'di dang gzhan yang gnod pa yi/_/bla brnan mi bzad mang pos gces/_/
[\[257b.2\]]zhes bya ba la/_/sbyar ba'i dug des gzir bar gyur pa'i mi ni mdog skya bo bseng bseng por gyur pa dang /_/lus rid cing rjud pa la sogs pa dang /_/sgyid zhan zhing las la spro ba chung ba la sogs pa dang /_zad byed kyis btab pa dang /_rmi lam du yang phal cher ce sbyang la sogs
[\[257b.3\]]pa mthong ba dang /_bdag nyid nag po la sogs pa mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_rna ba dang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po nyams par mthong ba dang /_'di dag dang gzhan yang gnod pa'i bla brnan mi bzad pa rnam pa mang pos gtses par 'gyur ba yin no/_/'ga' zhig 'phral du ma gsos
[\[257b.4\]]na/_/sbyar dug gis nyen 'chi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbyar ba'i dug gis nyen pa las 'phral du gso ba ma byas na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/dbyig dug slon byas kha zas ni/_/de la phan pa'i bza' btung sbyin/_/sbyangs nas gser ni bsten bya zhing /_/mdo nas bstan
[\[257b.5\]]pa bzhin du bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dbyig dug gis zin pa la ni dang por skyug sman btang ste/_de la phan pa'i kha zas byin la khong pa sbyangs nas gser la sogs pa'i bsten pa'i cho ga mdo'i gnas las bstan pa bzhin du bya'o/_/gser dang zangs kyi phye ma ni/_/sbrang rtsi kha ra dkar por
[\[257b.6\]]sbyar/_/lde gus dug ni mi bzad dang /_/dbyig dug thams cad sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gser dang zangs ma'i phye ma sbrang rtsi dang kha rar sbyar te/_lde gu byas pa zos na yang mi bzod pa'i sbyar ba'i dug sel bar byed do/_/mur ba sle tres pi pi ling /_/rgya spos dbyi mo pa to la/_/
[\[257b.7\]]gla sgang shu dag tsi tra ka/_/byi dang ka ni dar ba dang /_/chu dron zho ga chur sbyar ba/_/skyur khu dang sbyar blud na ni/_/dbyig dug gis bcom me drod sbyong /_/zhes bya ba la/_dbyig dug gis me drod nyams bar gyur pa la ni mur ba la ni mur ba la sogs pa'i sman chu dron la sogs pa gang rung dang sbyar ba
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]blud par bya'o/_/zur pa ma nu phug ron gyi/_/sha bskol khu ba bsgrangs pa ni/_/dbyig dug skom dang lud pa na/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde rims sel/_/zhes bya bal/_zur pa dang ma nu zhes bya ba puSh+kar mU la sha khu dang sbyar te bskol ba'i khu ba bsgrangs pa blud na yang
[\[258a.2\]]dbyig dug las gyur pa'i skom dad la sogs pa sel bar byed do/_/dug gi rang bzhin dus dang zas/_/nad gzhi lus zungs tshogs 'dus pa/_/dug gi nyam nga zhes bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi rang bzhin mi bzad pa dang /_de mthun rkyen du byad pa'i dus dang kha zas la
[\[258a.3\]]sogs pa 'dus shing gcig tu phrad pa ni dug gi nyam nga ba zhes bya ste/_tshogs pa de dang ldan pa brgya las gcig cig 'tsho bar gyur ba yin no/_/bkres skom nyam ni chung ba dang /_/khro dang mya ngan 'jigs ngal dang /_/ma zhu ba dang 'khru ba dang /_/mkhris pa rlung ni 'phel ba dang /_/til
[\[258a.4\]]gyi me tog 'bras bu snum/_/sa yi rlangs pa 'brug sgra dang /_/gling bu pi lbang rol mo yi/_/sgra dang mdun gyi ser bu dang /_/ut+pal dri dang myos pa yi/_/dug gi nyam nga 'phel bar byed/_/dbyar ni char gyi dus yin pas/_/bu ram lta bur rlan can 'gyur/_/lus la khyab byed dbyar
[\[258a.5\]]'das nas/_/ri byi 'char bas de med byed/_/de bas sprin bral dus su ni/_/nus pa chung ba nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug ni bkres skom la sogs pa 'phel bar byed cing sprin las byung ba yin pa'i phyir dbyar bur ma rlan can lta bur zhu zhing lus la khyab par byed la dbyar
[\[258a.6\]]'das nas skar ma ri byi 'char ba de'i tshe ni nus pa de 'bri zhing med par byed do/_/de bas na sprin dang bral ba'i dus ston gyi tshe ni dug gi nus pa chung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rang bzhin goms pa dang /_/gnas dus shugs stobs che chung ba/_/brtags te mkhas pas shes byas
[\[258a.7\]]la/_/de rjes gso ba'i las spyad bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar tshul 'dis ni rang bzhin dang goms pa dang gnas dang dus dang shugs dang stobs che ba dang /_chung ba blos brtags te de la mkhas par byas nas/_de'i 'og tu gso ba'i las la 'jug par bya'o/_/bad kan can ni
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]slon dang dro/_/rtsub dang rno ba'i sman bsku zhing /_/bska dang kha dang tsha ba yi/_/zas kyi dug ni bsal bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi dug ni slon pa la sogs pas bsal bar bya'o/_/mkhris can bkru sman sman chu blugs/_/shin tu bsil ba'i sman bsku zhing /_/bska dang kha
[\[258b.2\]]dang mngar ba dang /_/mar bcas kha zas sbyin pas gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa can gyi dug ni bkru sman dang /_/shin tu bsil pa'i sman gyi chu blugs pa la sogs pas bsal par bya'o/_/rlung gi bdag nyid can mngar dang /_/skyur dang lan tshwa mar bcas pa'i/_/bza'
[\[258b.3\]]ba mar bcas bsku byug dang /_/de bzhin sha ni bza' bas gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_rlung gi bdag nyid can gyi dug ni kha zas mngar ba la sogs pa mar dang bcas pa dang /_de bzhin du bsku byug dang bcas pas gso bar bya'o/_/bkru sman bsku byug kha zas sman/_/
[\[258b.4\]]mar med bsngags pa ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi nad la bkru sman la sogs pa'i sbyor ba gang yang rung ba la mar med pa ni bsngags pa ma yin te/_gzhan du ni de thams cad la mar dang bcas pa mchog tu phan pa yin no/_/dug kun gnas skabs thams cad du/_/dug
[\[258b.5\]]'joms mar dang 'dra ba yi/_/sman ni gzhan dag yod min te/_/mchog tu rlung shas che la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du dug 'joms par byed pa'i kha zas ni mar dang 'dra ba gzhan med la/_/khyad par du yang rlung gi shas che ba la mchog tu
[\[258b.6\]]phan no/_/bad kan gnas zhugs gso bar sla/_/mkhris pa'i gnas brten 'bad pas gso/_/rlung gi gnas su zhugs pa'i dug_/shin tu gso dka' gsor mi rung /_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi gnas su zhugs pa'i dug ni gso bar sla ba yin pas na 'bad pa med
[\[258b.7\]]pas 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/mkhris pa'i gnas la brten pa'i dug ni shin tu 'bad pas gso bar bya ba yin no/_/rlung gi gnas su zhugs pa'i dug ni shin tu gso dka' ba'am gsor mi rung ba yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]zhes bya ba/_slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas sbrul gyis zin pa gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/mdor na sa yi steng na sbrul/_/gsum ste gdangs ka can
[\[259a.2\]]lus bskyil/_/khra bo yin te/_/zhes bya ba la/_sa'i steng na sbrul gyi tshogs mdor bsdus na rnam pa gsum ste/_la la ni gdengs ka can gzar bu'i mgo lta bu yin no/_/la la ni lus bskyil ba yin no/_/la la ni khra bo yin no/_/de yi ni/_dbye ba mtha' yas gyur
[\[259a.3\]]pa dag_/skye gnas dbye bas rgyas par ni/_/dgos pa med phyir ma bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdengs ka can la sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba'i sbrul de dag ni skye gnas kyi dbye bas rgyas par phye na dbye ba mtha' yas mod kyi/_de ni skabs 'dir dgos pa med pa'i phyir bdag gis
[\[259a.4\]]'dir ma bshad do/_/mchog tu rtsub dang tsha ba dang /_/skyur dro mngar bsil dag las ni/_/gdengs ka can la sogs pa'i dug_/rim gyis rlung sogs 'khrug par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gdengs ka can gyi dug ni mchog tu rtsub pa dang tsha ba yin pas rlung nad skyed par byed pa yin
[\[259a.5\]]no/_/lus bskyil ba'i dug ni skyur ba dang dro ba yin pas mkhris pa skyed par byed pa yin no/_/sbrul khra bo'i dug ni khyad par du mngar ba dang bsil ba yin pas bad kan skyed par byed pa yin no/_/gzhon dang rgan po bar ma dang /_/dbyar dang dgun dang sos kar ni/_/'di dag dug
[\[259a.6\]]ni 'phel 'gyur zhing /_/gzhan dag dus tshigs rnams su 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de ltar na gdengs ka can dang /_lus 'khyil ba dang /_khra bo ni rim gyis gzhon pa dang rgan po dang bar ma na tshod kyi rim pa dang /_dbyar dang dgun dang sos ka'i dus dag tu 'phel
[\[259a.7\]]zhing shas che ba yin te/_de yang gdengs ka can ni gzhon pa dang /_dbyar gyi tshe ni dug gi shas che ba yin la/_lus 'khyil pa ni rgan pa dang /_dgun stod dang /_dgun smad kyi dus te/_dgun smad kyi tshe dug bdo ba yin la/_khra bon bar ma dang
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]sos ka'i tshe dug bdo ba yin no/_/sbrul de dag las gzhan pa thams pa ni dus tshigs rnams la dug gi shas che ba yin no/_/'khor lo gshol dang g.yung drung gdugs/_/lcags kyu'i mtshan mar ldan pa yin/_/gdengs ka can ni myur 'gro ba dang /_/thams cad gdengs ka can zhes
[\[259b.2\]]bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrul gdengs ka can ni 'khor lo dang gshol la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan zhing /_mgo po'i gdengs ka can yod pa dang myur du 'gro bar byed pa yin no/_/lus 'khyil sna tshogs pa yi ni/_/zlum por 'dug pa lus 'khyil zhing /_/ring zhing 'gros
[\[259b.3\]]ni bul ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus 'khyil bzhes bya ba'i sbrul ni ri mo zlum po sna tshogs pas khyab pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs ring zhing 'gros bul ba yin no/_/ri mo sna tshogs ldan pa dang /_/snum zhing kha dog sna tshogs pas/_/chu zheng bris 'gyur
[\[259b.4\]]khra bo yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrul khra bo ni ri mo sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha dog sna tshogs pas 'phred dang gyen du chu zheng du bris pa yin no/_/go d+ha'i bu ni go d+ha can/_/dug ni gdengs ka can mnyam la/_/rkang bzhi ba yi/_zhes bya ba la/_/go ng+ha'i bu ming go ng+ha can zhes bya ba'i
[\[259b.5\]]sbrul gyi bye brag ste/_de ni gdengs ka can gyi dug dang mnyam par ldan pa'am/_yang na rkang bzhi pa yin no/_/sbrul gzhan ni/_'di dag nyid ni 'dres pa las/_/'dren ma'i mtshan nyid can te des/_/'dus ba'i nad ni ldang bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gdengs ka can dang /
[\[259b.6\]]lus bskyil ba dang /_sbrul khra bo 'di dag gi mtshan nyid 'dren ma yin par shes par byed pa ste/_de dag gis ni 'dus ba'i nad skyed par byed ba yin no/_/zas kyi don dang 'jigs pa dang /_/rkang pas reg las dug rab 'khrugs/_/rkang gi rgyu dang 'dres pa dang /_/lha dang
[\[259b.7\]]drang srong gshin rjes bskul/_/sbrul gyis zin par gang bshad pa/_/phyi ma bzhin du dug shas che/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrul gyi rigs tha mal pa de dag ni zas kyi don dang rnam par 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i rgyus sam/_lha dang drang srong dang gshin rjes bskul zhing rbad pa'i
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]dbang gis sbrul gyis 'dzin par byed la/_de yang phyi ma bzhin du dug gi shas che ba yin no/_/des na thams cad pas kyang gshin rje'am 'chi bdag gis bskul bas 'dzin par byed pa de'i dug mi bzad pa yin no/_/'jug ba'i rgyu ni shes byas nas/_/
[\[260a.2\]]gso ba ji bzhin bya ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrul rnams kyi 'jug pa'i rgyu shes par byas nas/_rang gi gso ba ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o/_/phal pa sdig can ngang tshul bas/_/lam bkag nas ni gnas pa yin/_/gang du kha chu gsher ba tsam/_/lus la snang bar byed
[\[260a.3\]]'gyur zhing /_/mche ba'i rma ni mi mngon gang /_/de ni mchus gnod byed ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrul phal pa ni rang bzhin ngan pa can yin pas lam bkag nas 'dug pa yin la/_lus kyi phyogs gang du kha chu'am gsher ba tsam snang bar 'gyur gyi/_mche bas zin pa'i
[\[260a.4\]]rma mi mngon par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mchus gnod par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/mche ba gcig las rjes gnyis mngon/_/khrag med gyur pa bldags zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrul gang gis zin pa na lus la mche ba gcig gi rjes las gnyis su mngon zhing de yang khrag med
[\[260a.5\]]par gyur pa ni ming bldags pa zhes bya'o/_/mche ba'i rjes ni khrag bcas gnyis/_/rnam par gcad pa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus la sbrul gyi mche ba'i rjes gnyis khrag dang bcas par snang ba ni rnam par gcad pa zhes bya'o/_/de gsum ni/_sha bcad shin tu phug pa
[\[260a.6\]]dang /_/khrag dbyung so yis zin zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mche bas zin pa gsum po de dag ni sha bcad pa las khrag rgyun du 'dzag pa ni sos 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/_/mche ba'i rjes ni bzhi snang ba/_/de bzhin sos 'dzin btsir bar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_mche ba'i
[\[260a.7\]]rjes gang la lus la rjes bzhi snang zhing /_de bzhin du khrag rgyun mi chad par snang ba de ni sos 'dzin pa btsir ba zhes bya'o/_/de la dang po dug med gnyis/_/phyi ma gnyis po gsor mi rung /_/zhes bya ba la/_sos btab pa de dag gi nang nas mchus gnod par byed pa dang
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]bldags pa zhes bya ba gnyis ni dug med pa yin no/_/phyi ma sos 'dzin pa dang /_sos 'dzin pa btsir ba zhes bya ba ni gsor mi rung ba yin no/_/sbrul gyi dug ni khrag dag la/_/ma brtan lus la gnod mi byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sbrul gyi dug ni khrag la ma brten par lus la
[\[260b.2\]]gnod par mi byed kyi/_de la brten nas gnod par byed pa yin no/_/khrag ni chung zad la brten yang /_/til mar thigs pa bzhin du mched/_/ces bya ba la/_dug ni khrag cung zad la brten yang til mar gyi thigs pa chu la blugs pa bzhin du mched par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[260b.3\]]sdar ma sbrul gyis reg pa las/_/'jigs pas rlung ni 'khrug par byed/_/lan 'ga' skrang bar byed pa de/_/sbrul gyis lus ni bcom zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu sdar ma sbrul gyis reg ste sngangs pa las rlung 'khrug par 'gyur zhing /_lan 'ga'
[\[260b.4\]]skrang bar byed pa yang yin te/_de ni sbrul gyis lus bcom pa zhes bya'o/_/bgrod dka' mun par zug gyur ba/_/la la rtog pas zin pa dang /_/dug gi shugs dang slon dang rims/_/brgyal ba'am tsha ba skye ba'am/_/na zhing rmongs bag 'khru bar 'gyur/_/de ni rtog pa'i dug
[\[260b.5\]]ces bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu la la lam bgrod dka' bar mun pa'i nad du rgyu ba las tsher ma la sogs pa 'ga' zhig gis zug par gyur pa dang /_de sbrul gyis zin pa'i rtog pa skyes te/_de'i dbang gis dug gi shugs slon ba la sogs ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de lta
[\[260b.6\]]bu de la ni rtog pa'i dug ces bya'o/_/dug bcas nad kyis zug pa dang /_/skrang dang g.ya' dang rims bcas pa/_/la la tsha zhing rmen bur 'gyur/_/de las bzlog pa dug med yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mche ba'i dug dang bcas pa ni shas cher zug pa dang sbangs pa la sogs
[\[260b.7\]]pa dang ldan ba yin no/_/dug med pa ni zug pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma med pa yin no/_/gdengs ka can shugs dang po la/_/nad khrag nag por 'dzag par 'gyur/_/mig dang gdong sogs gnag pa dang /_/srin bu rgyu ba snyam du sems/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdengs ka can
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]gyi shugs dang po la ni nad khrag nag por 'dzag par 'gyur ba dang /_gdong gnag pa dang /_lus la srin bu rgyu ba snyam du sems pa yin no/_/shugs gnyis par ni rmen bu skye/_/gsum bar mgo ni lci bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi shugs
[\[261a.2\]]gnyis pa la ni rmen bu skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_shugs gsum par mgo bo lci bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/bzhi par mig 'byed dka' ba dang /_/sos btab rnags shing mchil ma slon/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdengs ka can gyis zin pa'i shugs bzhi pa la ni mig 'byed par
[\[261a.3\]]dka' ba la sogs ba yin no/_/lnga bar tshigs 'bye snyam sems dang /_/rgyud gzhan tshigs ni 'jig pa dang /_/lus tsha skyigs bu 'byung ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i shugs lnga pa la ni lhu tshigs 'bye ba snyam du sems pa la sogs pa yin no/_/drug par snying na lus lce
[\[261a.4\]]zhing /_/brgyal zhing 'khru la zas mi 'ju/_/zhes bya ba la/_shugs drug pa la ni snying na ba la sogs pa yin no/_/bdun par khu ba'i gnas phyin nas/_/phrag gong rgyab dang rgal tshigs dang /_/rked pa zhig pa snyam sems zhing /_/spyod lam thams cad las
