[\[261a.5\]]nyams 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdengs ka can gyi shugs bdun pa la ni khu ba'i gnas su dug de phyin par 'gyur te/_phrag gong na ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lus bskyil bas zin na/_/nad khrag ser por 'gyur ba dang /_/de yi lus ser tsha ba
[\[261a.6\]]skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_sbrul lus 'khyil pa zhes bya bas zin pa ni khrag ser por gyur pa la sogs pa yin no/_/gnyis par skrang bar 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus bskyil ba'i shugs gnyis pa ni lus skrang bar 'gyur ro/_/gsum par sos btab rnags
[\[261a.7\]]pa dang /_/rdul dang skom dad skyo bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_shugs gsum pa la ni sos btab ba'i rjes rnags pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi par khong tsha rims kyis 'debs/_/lnga par lus kun khyab par tsha/_/zhes bya ba la/_bzhi ba dang lnga pa'i dug gi shugs
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]ni khong tsha ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/sbrul ni khra bos zin gyur na/_/khrag ni skya bor 'gyur ba dang /_/des ni lus mdog skya bor 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrul khra bos zin par gyur na khrag gi tshogs skya bar 'gyur la/_rgyu des na lus kyang mdog skya bor 'gyur ro/_/gnyis
[\[261b.2\]]par lus ni lci bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_shugs gnyis pa la ni lus shin tu lci bar 'gyur ro/_/gsum par sos btab rnags pa dang /_/mig dang kha sna las 'dzag 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_shugs gsum ba la ni rnags pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi
[\[261b.3\]]par mgo lci gnye'u rengs 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi shugs bzhi pa la ni mgo bo lci ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/lnga par lus tshigs na ba dang /_/grang ba'i rims kyis 'debs par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_shugs lnga pa la ni lus tshigs na ba la sogs par
[\[261b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/lhag ma gnyis po snga mar mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_shugs drug pa dang bdun pa la ni gdengs ka can gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/shugs ni lnga par gso ba dag/_/bya yis de las phan chad min/_/zhes bya ba la/_de dag gi shugs lnga pa'i bar
[\[261b.5\]]gyis gso bar bya'i/_drug pa dang bdun pa la ni gso bar mi bya'o/_/chu yis g.yengs dang chags pa zad/_/skrag dang ne'u les 'phen pa dang /_/grang lhags nyi tshan rlung dang nad/_/bkres skom ngal bas gzir ba dang /_/phyogs gzhan nas ni ring par 'ong /_/dug
[\[261b.6\]]spangs lpags pa brjes pa dang /_/'jag ma sman dang tsher ma can/_/nags na rgyu ba gang yin dang /_/rig pa la sogs brten phyogs gnas/_/sbrul de dug ni chung bar 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_sbrul gang chus g.yengs pa dang /_chags pa spyod pa zad pa dang /_skrag
[\[261b.7\]]pa la sogs pa dang /_yul phyogs gang rig sngags la sogs pa gang rigs brten zhing grub ba'i phyogs na gnas pa ste/_sbrul de dag ni dug chung ba yin no/_/dur khrod bsti gnas shing gcig sogs/_/tshes lnga dang ni dus tshigs dang /_/tshes brgyad tshes dgu thun
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]mtshams dang /_/nam phyed dang ni nyi ma'i gung /_/bra nyi smin drug mchu dang skag_/sa ga chu stod khrums stod dang /_/snubs dang bra nye yud tsam la/_/gnad du bzung ba sbang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_dur khrod la sogs pa'i gnas su sprul gyis zin pa dang
[\[262a.2\]]tshes lnga la sogs pa'i dus dang /_bra nye la sogs pa'i skar ma la babs pa dang /_de bzhin du yud tsam zhes bya ba'i dus la zin pa dang /_gnad du bzung ba gang yin pa de ni gsor mi nus pas spang bar bya'o/_/zin pa'i mod la bzhin skya zhing /_/skra ni 'byi bar byed pa dang /_/
[\[262a.3\]]lce 'khums yang dang yang du brgyal/_/dbugs grang gang yin de mi 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang sbrul gyis zin ma thag bzhin skya bor gyur pa dang /_skra 'byi bar byed pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de mi 'tsho'o/_/skyigs bu dbugs mi bde zhing slon/_/lus
[\[262a.4\]]can zin pa'i mod la ni/_/snying nas gzer bar 'gyur ba dang /_/cig car 'byur ba de mi 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang skyigs bu la sogs pas zin pa'i mod la dus gcig tu 'byung ba de yang mi 'cho'o/_/'du shes stor cing lbu bar skyugs/_/rkang pa lag pa bzhin gnag
[\[262a.5\]]cing /_/sna zhom yan lag zhig pa dang /_/tshigs lhod bshang ba 'khru ba yi/_/dug 'thungs pa dang sbrul gyis zin/_/dug can mda' yis phog gyur pa/_/tshul ni 'di dag snang gyur na/_/srog zad par ni 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu gang sbrul gyis
[\[262a.6\]]zin pa'am/_/dug mdas phog pa 'du shes stod cing lbu ba slon pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa de ni nye bar 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/sna sman rnon po mi tshor zhing /_/rma nas khrag ni mi 'byung la/_/dbyig bas bsnun na rjes mi mngon/_/gshin rje'i thad du 'gro pa yin/_/
[\[262a.7\]]zhes bya ba la/_sna sman rnon po btang yang tshor ba med pa la sogs pa de yang mi 'tsho'o/_/de las gzhan du sman pa yis/_/'bar ba'i khyim nas 'byung ba bzhin/_/lkog mar phyin pa'i srog bsrung zhing /_/dug ni myur du bsal bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/sngar bshad pa'i mtshan
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]nyid dang mi ldan pa gzhan dag ni sman pas nges bar bsrung bar bya ste/_ji ltar 'bar ba'i khyim nas 'byung ba bzhin du lkog mar phyin zhing 'gags su nye ba'i srog de bsrung bar bya'o/_/lus can dug gis zin gyur pa/_/grangs brgya'i bar du gnas nas ni/_/lus zungs khrag sogs
[\[262b.2\]]la gnod cing /_/lus la khyab par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi sbrul gyi dug gis zin par gyur na rma'i sgor grangs brgya bgrangs pa'i dus tshigs tsam du gnas nas/_de'i 'og tu khrag la sogs pa'i lus zungs la gnod par byed cing lus la khyab par byed do/_/dus 'di'i
[\[262b.3\]]bar du gdug pa yi/_/mche bas zin pa bcad sogs las/_/bya zhing ci nas lus la ni/_/dug gi yal ga ma 'phros bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_grangs brgya rdzogs pa'i dus 'di'i bar du dug gis zin pa la/_bsregs pa la sogs pa bya zhing dug gi yal gas lus la khyab par
[\[262b.4\]]mi 'gyur bar bya'o/_/zin pa'i mod la myur du ni/_/sbrul ni de nyid za pa'am/_/sa 'am bong pa gcod byed na/_/rings pa kho nar sman pa yi/_/mchil mas byug par bya ba'am/_/rna sbabs kyis ni so rjes bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_/mi sbrul gyis zin ma thag sbrul de nyid myur du za bar
[\[262b.5\]]byed pa'am/_sa 'am bong ba sos 'debs par gyur na sman pas rings pa kho nar mchil mas byug pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/mche bas btab pa'i gong du ni/_/sor bzhir ras ma las byas pa/_/gso ma'am 'od ma la sogs bcing /_/sngags shes pa yis grub sngags bzla/_/
[\[262b.6\]]zhes bya ba la/_sman pas sbrul gyi mche bas btab pa'i sor bzhi'i ltag tu ras ma las byas pa'am/_gso ma la sogs pa las byas pa'i chings mas bcing zhing /_sngags zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags bzla bar bya'o/_/chu lon gyis ni chu ltab \u0f74ra/_/bcings pas dug ni 'phros
[\[262b.7\]]mi 'gyur/_/dug gi bcing sogs nyen pa yin/_/rtsa las rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug bcings pa gang yin pa des bkag par gyur na chu lon gyis chu bzlog pa dang 'dra ba rtsa'i sgo las dug de rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro/_/btsir nas sos btab dbyung bya zhing /_/tshigs dang gnad du
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ma chud de/_/sa bon nyams ba'i myu gu bzhin/_/dug shugs de ni 'byung mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sos btab pa de btsir zhing bsdams nas tshigs dang gnad du ma song bar de dbyung bar bya ste/_de ltar byas na sa bon nyams pa dang 'dra bar dug gi shugs 'byung bar
[\[263a.2\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/lus 'khyil so rjes mkhris bskyed pas/_/de ma gtogs pa gzhan dag ni/_/lcags dang gser la sogs pas sam/_/mgal me yis ni myur du bsreg_/me yis thal bar byed 'gyur na/_/ci phyir de ni 'byur bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus 'khyil pa zhes bya
[\[263a.3\]]pa'i so rjes ni mkhris ba skyed par byed pa yin pas/_de ma gtogs pa gdengs ka can dang khra ba ste gzhan dag gi dug ni lcags la sogs pa mer bsregs pa'am/_mgal me zhes bya ba shing phyed tshig pa'i mes bsreg par bya ste/_de lta bus ni myur bar thal ba nyid du byed par 'gyur
[\[263a.4\]]gyi/_/mi byed pa ma yin no/_/sa dang lci ba sman sogs kyis/_/kha bkang nas ni gzhib par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rma de la sa la sogs pa gang yang rung bas kha bkang dang gzhib par bya'o/_/chings ma'i nang du sha che'i phyogs/_/mchog tu zhal zhal bya ba dang /_/yan
[\[263a.5\]]lag mche bas zin bcas pa/_/dug sman gyis ni yang yang bsku/_/tsan+dan pu shel tse ldan pa'i/_/chu yis kyang ni blugs par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rma'i sor bzhi'i gong du bcings pa'i nang du sha che ba'i phyogs su zhal zhal byas la de dug sman bsku zhing tsan+dan la sogs
[\[263a.6\]]pa'i sman gyi chu blugs par bya'o/_/dug gis khyab par gyur pa la/_/gtar ga gdab pa gso mchog ste/_/khrag ni phyung bar gyur pa na/_/ma lus dug ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gis lus la khyab pas gtar gas khrag gdon pa ni gso pa'i mchog yin te/_/
[\[263a.7\]]khrag phyung bas dug 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/dug bcas khrag ni dri mi zhim/_/mer bsregs sgra ni tseg tseg zer/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug dang bcas pa'i khrag ni dri mi zhim par 'gyur ba de bzhin du mer bsregs na sgra 'tshag cing tseg tseg zer ba 'byung par 'gyur ro/_/nad gzhi ji bzhin dag
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]gyur pa/_/khrag ni snga ma bzhin shes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyon med ba'i khrag ji lta bu yin pa yang sngar bshad pa'i tshul las shes par bya'o/_/rtsa ni snang bar ma gyur na/_/rngabs rwa srin bu pad bas gtar/_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te rtsa mi mngon na rngabs rwa la sogs pas khrag dbyung
[\[263b.2\]]bar bya'o/_/khrag phyung ba yi lhag ma ni/_/dug gi drod kyis zhu gyur pa/_/shin tu bsil ba'i sman bsku dang /_/blugs pa yis ni bsal bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gtar gas khrags phyung ba'i lhag ma dug gi drod kyis lus la zhu zhing khyab par gyur pa ni bsil sman bsku ba la sogs
[\[263b.3\]]pas bsal bar bya'o/_/dug gi shugs kyis ma zhu bas/_/brgyal dang myos dang snying 'dzag 'byung /_/de ni bsil sman blugs pa dang /_/rlung yab spu ldang byed pas bsal/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir dug gi shugs kyis khrag ma zhu zhing 'thas par gyur na brgyal ba la
[\[263b.4\]]sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de las dang po ni bsil sman la sogs pas bsal bar bya'o/_/khrag ni sla bar gyur na dug_/'phral du shugs ni zhi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te dug ni sla zhing zag par gyur na/_mod la shugs zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/dug ni rno bas snying 'dar byed/_/
[\[263b.5\]]de bsrung phyir ni zhun mar dang /_/mar dang bcas ba'i sbrang rtsi 'am/_/dug sman mar dang sbrus pa blud/_/ces bya ba la/_dug ni shin tu rno ba yin ba'i phyir snying la gnod cing 'dar bar byed la/_de bas na snying de bsrung ba'i phyir zhun mar la sogs pa blud par bya'o/_/de yi snying ni 'gag
[\[263b.6\]]byed pas/_/snying gar bad kan sogs par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_skyes bu de la snying gi gnas su nad kyis 'gag par byed cing /_bad kan sogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/lus lci nad ni bslangs pa dang /_/snying 'phar de ni slon du gzhug_/gsher rdzas skyur rtsabs rgya sran dang /_/til
[\[263b.7\]]dang chang sogs ma gtogs pa/_/dug sel ba yi slon sman gtang /_/des ni lus la khyab mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i 'og tu lus lci ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/_des na skyur rtsa bas kan dzi la sogs pa ma gtogs pa dug sel ba'i sman gyi slon sman gtang bar bya ste/
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]de ltar byas na dug des lus la khyab par mi 'gyur ro/_/sbrul dang nyes pa rang bzhin dang /_/gnas dang shugs kyi khyad par ni/_/phra mo yan chad legs brtags la/_/gso ba khyad par can bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrul gyi khyad par dang /_nyes pa nas shugs kyi khyad
[\[264a.2\]]par phra mo yan chad kyang legs par brtags la/_de dang 'tsham pa'i gso ba khyad par can bya'o/_/srin bu ba re'i rtsa ba dang /_/gi ri kar Ni dkar po'i chu/_/btung ba gdengs ka can bzhin sbyar/_/sna sman ru rta sbrang rtsi gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_srin bu ba ri'i rtsa ba la sogs pa'i
[\[264a.3\]]sman ni gdengs ka can gyis zin pa la blud par bya'o/_/de bzhin du ru rta'i sna sman yang gtang bar bya'o/_/sbrul nag gis ni zin pa la/_/khrag gtar nas ni bca' ba dang /_/na go li ni sbyar ba bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi sbrul nag pos zin pa la gtar ga
[\[264a.4\]]gdab pa dang bca' ba la sogs pa'i lde gu dang /_rtsa rno ba'i dug gis sos 'dzin pa gso bar bya'o/_/btung bar btsod dang sbrang rtsi dang /_/khang pa'i dud pa mar sbyar blud/_/ces bya ba la/_sbrul nag pos zin pa la btsod la sogs pa blud na phan no/_/gdengs ka can dang ri mo can/_/
[\[264a.5\]]mi bzad dug gis zin pa la/_/tan+du li ya tang pa la dang /_/gi ri kar Ni rnam gnyis dang /_/kha lung khaN+na se 'bru ni/_/btung dang sna sman mig sman bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdengs ka can dang ri mo can gyi dug mi bzad pa la tan+du li ya la sogs pa'i dug sman btung ba la sogs pa btang na phan no/_/
[\[264a.6\]]a shwa gan+ng+ha rgun 'bru dang /_/gi ri kar Ni sa nag dang /_/ha ti pi pi ling dang ni/_/bye'u rug pa'i lo ma dang /_/bil ba se'u 'bru ka pid+tha/_/cha ni phyed phyed sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/dug sman yin te khyad par du/_/lus 'khyil sbrul gyi dug la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_a shwa gan+d+ha la sogs pa'i cha phyed phyed dang
[\[264a.7\]]sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i dug sman ni dug thams cad sel zhing mchog tu gdengs ka can gyi dug la phan no/_/lo ma lnga dang 'bras bu gsum/_/shing mngar nA ga puSh+pa dang /_/e la ba lu dzi ba ka_/zangs rtsi ba dang pu shel tse/_/khar shug pa utral/_/sbrang rtsi dang sbyar kha ba can/_/zhes
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]bya lus 'khyil dug 'joms so/_/bskus na skrang dang shu ba mched/_/'brum bu rims dang lus lci sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_lo ma lnga ba la sogs pa'i dug sman du sbyar ba ni ming kha ba can zhes bya ste/_des ni lus 'khyil pa'i dug sel ba dang bskus na skrang ba la sogs pa sel bar
[\[264b.2\]]byed do/_/tang pa la n+ya gro ng+ha'i myu gu/_/dzi ba ka dang zangs rtsi ba/_/ka ra dkar po shing mngar btsod/_/khu ba lus 'khyil dug la blud/_/ces bya ba la/_/lus 'khyil ba'i dug gis zin pa la ni tang bal la sogs pa'i sman chu dang sbyar ba blud par bya'o/_/'od ma'i shun pa sa bon dang /_/
[\[264b.3\]]bca' sga pa to la'i sa bon/_/shir sha'i sa bon bu tse shel/_/'bras kyi rtsa ba bong nga dkar/_/shu dag ba gcin bcas par btags/_yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ste/_/go na sa yi dug 'joms so/_/zhes bya ba la/_'od ma'i shun pa dang sa bon la sog pa sman gyi yan lag
[\[264b.4\]]brgyad po ba gcin dang sbyar ba btags te byin na go na sa'i dug sel bar 'gyur ro/_/ru rta bong nga pu tse shel/_/ha ra \u0f7aNu ka khyim dud pa/_/rgya spos sbrang rtsi tsha ba gsum/_/sbyar bas ri mo can dug sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_/ru rta la sogs pa'i dug sman gyis sbrul ri mo can gyi dug sel bar byed do/_/
[\[264b.5\]]'dam bu khra bo 'dras zin na/_/sa brkos 'og tu thun gnyis gzhug_/phyung ste bzhar la mar sar dang /_/'bras dngas yi lde gus byug/_/ces bya ba la/_'dam bu khra bo zhes bya ba'i dug gis zin pa la ni sa brkos pa'i 'og tu thun gnyis kyi bar rma de bcug la/_/de'i 'og tu phyung ste/_/
[\[264b.6\]]gtsags bus bzhar la mar sar dang 'bras dang sa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/'bras bu gsum gyi bye btab pa'i/_/mar ni rnying pa blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na sbrul gyis zin pa la 'bras bu gsum la sogs pa'i mar blud par bya'o/_/zhu zhing bkrus nas nas zan ni/_/sran tshod
[\[264b.7\]]dang ni bcas pa sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mar de zhu nas bkru sman bya ste/_nas zan la sogs pa sbyin par bya'o/_/ka ra bI ra arka yi/_/me tog lang+ga li'i rtsa ba/_/pi pi ling dang na le sham/_/pa tha skyur rtsabs lde gur byas/_/'di ni sbrul gzhan gyis zin pa'i/_/sbrul gyi dug kun sel
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ka ra bI ra la sogs pa skyur rtsabs dang lde gur byas te bskus pa'i sman 'di ni sbrul gzhan gyis zin ba thams cad kyi dug sman yin no/_/shri sha'i me tog khu ba dang /_/na le sham dkar zhag bdun spangs/_/btung dang sna sman byas gyur
[\[265a.2\]]na/_/sbrul gyi mche bas zin pa sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_na le sham dkar po zhes bya ba shi kru'i sa bon shiri sha'i me tog bskol ba'i khu ba'i nang du zhag bdun spangs te sbrul gyis zin pa la btung ba la sogs byin pas phan no/_/rgya spos ru rta srang gnyis gnyis/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi srang bzhi
[\[265a.3\]]bzhi/_/'di blud 'jog bos zin pa yang /_/bde ba skyed par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rgya spos la sogs pa yang ji skad smos ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa yin no/_/de nas gdengs ka can gyi shugs/_/dang por khrag ni dbyung bar bya/_/dug sman sbrang rtsi zhun mar dang /_/bcas pa myur du
[\[265a.4\]]blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdengs ka can gyis zin pa'i shugs dang po la ni khrag dbyung ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba bya'o/_/gnyis par slon sman btang nas ni/_/de bzhin dug sman blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_shugs gnyis pa la ni slon sman btang ba dang /_gtar ga la sogs pa snga
[\[265a.5\]]ma bzhin du bya'o/_/gsum par dug sman spyar bya zhing /_/mig sman dang ni sna sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gsum par ni dug sman gyi mig sman la sogs pa sbyar bar bya'o/_/bzhi par skyug sman btang nas na/_/sngar bshad pa yi nas thug blud/_/ces bya ba la/_shugs bzhi pa la ni dang por
[\[265a.6\]]skyug sman btang nas gong du bshad pa'i nas thug blud par bya'o/_/lnga pa drug par bsil sman gyis/_/bsku zhing sman chu yang yang blugs/_/slon sman rnon po gtang bya zhing /_/dug sel nas thug blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_shugs lnga pa dang drug pa la ni de la bsil sman bsku ba la sogs
[\[265a.7\]]pa'i sbyor ba rnams bya'o/_/bdun par dug sman rnog po yi/_/mig sman dang ni sna sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_shugs bdun par ni dug sman gyi sbyor ba la sogs pa bya'o/_/de nas sbyi bor rgya gram du/_/zab mo'i mtshon gyis batral nas ni/_/der ni sha 'am khrag gam ni/_/pags pa ngag ni
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]gzhug par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i 'og tu mi de'i mgo bor rgya gram bya rog rjes 'dra bar batral la der sha 'am khrag gam pags pa gzhug par bya'o/_/lus bskyil shugs ni gsum pal/_/slon sman btang la nas thug blud/_/ces bya ba la/_lus bskyil ba'i dug gi shugs
[\[265b.2\]]gsum pa la slon sman btang ba'i rjes la nas thug blud bar bya'o/_/drug par sman ni rtul po 'am/_/shug pa la sogs sde tshan blud/_/ces bya ba la/_lus bskyil ba'i shugs drug par sman rnon po ma yin pa 'am/_shug pa la sogs pa'i sde tshan bskol ba blud par bya'o/_/khra bo'i shugs ni dang po
[\[265b.3\]]la/_/zhal zhal zab tu gdab bya zhing /_/ku bas khrag ni bton nas ni/_/snga ma bzhin du dug sman blud/_/ces bya ba la/_sbrul khra bos zin ba'i shugs dang po la ni zhal zhal gting zab tu gdab la/_de'i 'og tu ku ba btab pas khrag dbyung ba'am snga ma bzhin du dug sman blud par bya'o/_/drug
[\[265b.4\]]par mig sman rnon po dang /_/sna sman phye ma bud pa gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_khra bos zin pa'i shugs drug pa la mig sman shin tu rnon po la sogs pa bya'o/_/ma smos pa yi shugs las ni/_/gdengs ka can skabs bshad ltar gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_ma smos pa'i shugs dang po dang
[\[265b.5\]]gnyis pa dang bzhi pa la sogs pa la ni gdengs ka can gyi skabs su bshad pa ltar bya'o/_/sbrum ma byis pa rgan po la/_/gtar ga mi gdab 'jam pos gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrum ma la sogs pa sbrul gyis zin pa la ni gtar ga mi gdab par gso pa 'jam pos bya'o/_/shing tsha
[\[265b.6\]]ldong ros rgya spos yung /_/ku sha'i khu ba chu srin sen/_/ta ma la yi ge sar dang /_/'bras bu chu grang sbyar ba blud/_/'di yis dbang po'i rdo rjes ni/_/lha min lta bur dug 'joms byed/_/ces bya ba la/_shing tsha la sogs pa'i sman 'di dag 'bras bkrus pa'i chu dang sbyar te blud pa ni ming rdo
[\[265b.7\]]rje zhes bya ste/_ji ltar brgya byin gyi rdo rjes lha ma yin 'joms pa ltar dug sel bar byed do/_/bil ba'i rtsa ba bye'u rug pa'i me tog_/rgya spos thang shing ka rany+dza'i 'bras bu/_/ser po rnam gnyis 'bras bu gsum dang ni/_/tsha ba gsum po ra gcin zhib btags pa/_/btung dang sna sman mig sman
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]sbyar ba yis/_/sbrul dang lu dbyi ba sdig pa sogs/_/dug dang dbyig dug ma zhu gsud dang rims/_/mi ni gdon gyis zin pa bde bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bil ba'i rtsa ba'i sman ra gcin dang zhib tu btags te btung ba la sogs par btang na sbrul la sogs pas zin pa dang /_ma zhu
[\[266a.2\]]ba dang /_gdon gyis zin pa la sogs pa rnams bde bar byed do/_/sos btab bsku ba la sogs kyis/_/ma lus bton par gyur kyang ni/_/nyams pa'i dug ni ji bzhin dang /_/slar yang shugs ni skye bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_mche ba'i dug gis zin pa la bslu ba la sogs pas ma lus par bton
[\[266a.3\]]par gyur kyang slar gnod pa'i shugs bskyed par gyur ba ni nyams pa'i dug gam dug tha mal pa la sogs pa dang 'dra bar byed pa yin no/_/dug dang bral nas rlung 'khrugs na/_/snum la sogs pas gso bya zhing /_/til mar chang dang rgya sran chu/_/ma gtogs rlung ni sel ba sbyin/_/zhes bya ba la/
[\[266a.4\]]dug gi shugs dang bral nas rlung gi nad 'khrugs par gyur na snum gyi mar la sogs pas sog bar bya'o/_/mkhris par mkhris pa'i rims sel ba'i/_/sman khu sman mar 'jam rtsis gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te mkhris pa 'khrugs na ni mkhris pa sel bar byed pa dang /_rims sel bar byed pa'i
[\[266a.5\]]sman gyis sel bar byed do/_/bad kan sbrang rtsir bcas pa yi/_/dong ka la sogs sde yis gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug dang bral nas bad kan 'khrugs par gyur na dong ka la sogs pa'i sde tshan sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba blud par bya'o/_/sbrul gyi rus pas gnod gyur dang /_/de bzhin rtog pa'i dug
[\[266a.6\]]gis nyen/_/ka ra rgun 'brum pa ya s+ya/_/shing mngar kha ra sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/sngags kyis btab pa'i chu dang bcas/_/gtor zhing spro bsrid dga' bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrul gyi rus pas zug pa la sogs pa la ni ka ra dang /_rgun 'brum la sogs pa'i sman la sogs pas gso bar bya'o/_/
[\[266a.7\]]ke ke ru dang mu tig margad dang /_/be+erUd+ya dang rdo rje mthon ka che/_/ras bal sa bon dug gis gnod ba'am/_/kha ba can gyi ri las skyes pa yi/_/so ma ra dza dang ni ba spru ba/_/de bzhin dro na ma hA dro na dang /_/sbrul la yod pa'i nor bu ma na si/_/nus pa dang ni ldan par gyur pa yi/_/dug ni dug gzhom bya
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]phyir bcang bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_ke ke ru dang mu tig la sogs pa'i rin po che dang /_sman sbrul gyi dug sel ba'i nus pa dang ldan pa rkang pa dang lag pa dang /_mgul dang mgo la gdags par bya'o/_/nub mo'i dus su rgyu tshe khyad par du/_/gdugs dang khar sil sgra dang bcas pa bcang /_/de yi grib
[\[266b.2\]]ma sgra yi skad phyung nas/_/sbrul gyi tshogs ni 'byer bar byed par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi nub mo'i dus su rgyu ba'i tshe gdugs dang khar ba sgra dang bcas pa bcang bar bya ste/_gdugs de'i grib ma dang khar sil de'i sgra skad kyis sbrul gyi tshogs 'byer zhing mthong ba'i yul las 'das par 'gyur ro/_/yan
[\[266b.3\]]lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa drug pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas srin bu'i dug gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/sprul nyid kyi ni bshang gci dang /_/kha chu
[\[266b.4\]]sgo nga lus rul skyes/_/nad ni re re 'dus pa dang /_/ldan pa'i srin bu'i dug rnam bzhi/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bu gang sbrul nyid kyi bshang gci la sogs pa rul pa las skyes par gyur cing /_/de dag kyang nad sna re re dang 'dus pa las gyur pa'i srin bu'i dug rnam pa bzhi yin no/_/rlung gi srin bus zin
[\[266b.5\]]gyur na/_/shas cher na zhing zug par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_rlung gi rang bzhin can gyi srin bus zin par gyur na/_tsha ba la sogs pas mtshan lhag par na ba dang zug par byed pa yin no/_/me yi srin bus 'dzag pa chung /_/tsha zhing dmar la shu ba mchad/_/ba lu'i 'bras bu smin pa'am/_/'bra
[\[266b.6\]]go'i 'bras bu smin pa 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_me'i rang bzhin can gyi srin bus zin pa na mchu'i rjes 'dzag pa chung ba dang /_tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/bad kan shas ches nad tshabs chung /_/u dum+WA ra smin pa 'dra/_/shas cher 'dzag pa'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi rang bzhin
[\[266b.7\]]can gyi 'bus zin par gyur na mchus btab pas nad tshabs chung ba la sogs pa yin no/_/'dus pa yi/_mtshan nyid thams cad ldan pa dang /_/shugs ni sbrul dang 'dra ba dang /_/skrang pa 'phel zhing khrag dri mnam/_/mgo dang mig lci brgyal mgo 'khor/_/dbugs mi bden spang bar bya
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]zhes bya ba la/_'dus pa'i rang bzhin can gyi 'bus zin pa ni mchu rjes mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa dang /_sbrul gyi shugs bdun dang ldan pa dang /_skrang pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin te/_de ni gsor mi rung bas sbang bar bya'o/_/kun tu skrangs pa lte ba can
[\[267a.2\]]tsha ba g.yo zhing yi ga 'chus/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bu thams cad kyis zin pa ni dbus lte ba can du mtho bar skrangs pa dang /_tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/sdig pa'i dug ni rno ba ste/_/dang por me ltar sreg par byed/_/steng du myur du mched byed cing /_/mche ba 'og tu 'dug pa yin/_/
[\[267a.3\]]zhes bya ba la/_sdig pa zhes bya ba'i 'bus zin pa'i dug ni rang bzhin rno ba dang /_dang por me ltar sreg par byed pa dang /_sos btab pa'i steng du myur du mched cing 'phel ba dang /_mche ba 'og tu 'dug pa yin no/_/zin ma thag ni rab tu gnag_/gas pa snyam du sems shing zug_/ces
[\[267a.4\]]bya ba la/_sdig pa'i mche bas zin pa ni 'phral du shas cher na bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin du rab tu na zhing gnag pa dang /_gas shing gyes pa snyam du sems pa yin no/_/de ni lci ba sogs rul dang /_/dug gis phog sogs rul ba dang /_/sbrul rul ba las skyes pa ni/_/dug tshabs
[\[267a.5\]]chung dang 'bring dang che/_/zhes bya ba la/_sdig pa de dag gi lci ba la sogs pa rul ba las byung ba de ni dug gi tshabs chung ba yin no/_/dug gis phog pa'i sha rul ba la sogs pa las 'byung ba ni 'bring yin no/_/sbrul gyi sha rul pa las skyes pa ni dug gi tshabs che ba yin no/_/tshabs
[\[267a.6\]]chung ser zhing dkar dang gnag_/rtsub dang khra zhing gzig mdog can/_/spu dang tshigs ni dmar ba dang /_/dmar zhing lto ba dkar ba lin/_/zhes bya ba la/_dug gi tshabs chung ba'i sdig pa ni ser ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/bar ma lto ru tshigs gsum pa/_/rked
[\[267a.7\]]pa ser skya dmar ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sdig pa'i dug bar ma'i lto bar dud ka can la sogs pa yin no/_/dug che ser skya khra ba dang /_/ri mo can la khrag 'dra zhing /_me 'dra tshigs ni gnyis sam gcig_/lto ba dkar zhing dmar ram gnag_/ces bya ba la/_sdig pa che ba ni ser skya
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no/_/des zin lce ni skrangs pa dang /_/lus rengs rims kyis nyen pa dang /_/bu ga las ni khrag rnag slon/_/dbang po'i don ni mi shes shing /_/rdul zhing brgyal la kha skom dang /_/rmongs zhing nad kyis nyen pa dang /_/sha ni zhig par byed pa ste/_/
[\[267b.2\]]phal cher srog ni 'dor bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sdig pa des zin pa'i mtshan ma ni lce skrangs pa la sogs pa dang /_de bzhin du dbang po'i don gyi yul mi shes shing rtogs par mi 'gyur pa dang /_sha zhig pa'i bar yin te/_de lta bu'i nad kyis zin pa'i mi ni phal cher srog dang
[\[267b.3\]]bral bar gyur ro/_/mchu sbom pas ni kha yis ni/_/'debs shing gsor rung sdig pa las/_/lhag par na byed lus rengs shing /_/mtshan gyi sbubs ni ldang ba dang /_/lus ni rngul bar byed 'gyur zhing /_/sos 'debs chu grang snyam du sems/_/zhes bya ba la/_mchu sbom pa
[\[267b.4\]]zhes bya ba'i 'bu ni mchus 'debs par byed la/_/de yang gsor rung ba'i sdig pa'i nad las lhag par na bar byed pa dang lus rengs pa la sogs par byed pa yin no/_/de nyid rnga mo'i dud ka dang /_/mtshan mo rgyu bas mtshan mo can/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nyid ni rnga mo'i dud ka dang /_mtshan
[\[267b.5\]]mo rgyu ba dang mtshan mo can zhes slob dpon gyis ming du btags pa yin no/_/srin bu rlung mkhris shas che zhing /_/rnga mo byi ba bad kan can/_/rnga mo'i dud pa zhes bya ba/_/phal cher rlung shas che ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bu srin bu zhes bya ba ni phal cher rlung dang mkhris pa'i shas che ba yin la/_/
[\[267b.6\]]rnga mo dang byi ba zhes bya ba ni phal cher bad kan gyi shas che ba yin la/_rnga mo'i dud pa zhes bya ba ni phal cher rlung gi shas che ba yin no/_/nad ni gang dang gang gi ni/_/mtshan ma shas che ba las brtag_/de dang de las gso ba'i sman/_/yon tan mi mthun pa yis gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_/
[\[267b.7\]]rlung la sogs pa'i nad gang dang gang gi shas che ba shes par byas la/_nad de dang de'i yon tan dang mi mthun pa'i sman gyis gso bar bya'o/_/snying gzer stod rlung gis rengs shing /_/rtsa mi snang zhing rus tshigs na/_/mgo 'khor lus bcings snyam du sems/_/mdog gnag rlung las gyur/_/
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]pa'i dug_/ces bya ba la/_rlung gi shas che ba'i dug ni snying gzer ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/dran nyams dbugs ni tsha bar byed/_/snying tsha kha ni kha bro la/_/sha 'gas skrang par byed pa dang /_/khrag ser ba ni mkhris pa can/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris
[\[268a.2\]]pa can gyi dug gis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni dran pa nyams pa dang /_dbugs tsha ba la sogs pa yin no/_/slon zhing snying na yi ga 'chus/_/kha chu 'dzag cing cham pas 'debs/_/grang bcas kha ni mngar bar bro/_/bad kan shas che'i dug nad yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan gyi bdag
[\[268a.3\]]nyid can gyi dug gis zin pa ni slon pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no/_/'ba' chas rma ni bsku ba dang /_/rlung sel til mar gyis bsku dang /_/sbu gu ma smin 'bru dugs dang /_/brta bar bya ba'i cho gas phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_de dag gi gso ba ni rlung gi bdag nyid can gyi
[\[268a.4\]]dug la ni til la sogs pa'i 'ba' chas bsku ba dang /_til mar gyis bsku ba la sogs pa byas na phan no/_/mkhris pa can la sman chu blugs/_/shin tu grang ba'i lde gus bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_mkhris pa can gyi dug la ni shin tu bsil ba'i sman gyi chu blugs pa dang ldi gus bsku
[\[268a.5\]]par phan no/_/bad kan can la bzhar zhing bcad/_/dugs dang skyug sman btang bas gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_bad kan can gyi dugs ni bzhar ba la sogs par bsal bar bya'o/_/srin bu rnam pa gsum po la/_/gso ba rnam pa gsum pos phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bu'i
[\[268a.6\]]rigs gsum po la ni gso ba rnam pa gsum po byas na phan no/_/dugs dang bsku dang sman chu blugs/_/phal cher dro 'jam gtang bar bya/_/gzhan du brgyal dang mche ba yi/_/rnags dang 'drul bar byed ma gtogs/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bu'i dug phal cher la dugs la sogs ba dro
[\[268a.7\]]'jam tsam bya ba ste/_gzhan du na brgyal ba la sogs pa la ni de dag byar mi rung ngo /_/mi skra yungs kar ser po dang /_/bu ram rnying pa'i dud pas bdug_/dug dang mche ba'i dug kun la/_/mchog tu phan par 'drob skyong 'chad/_/ces bya ba la/_dug gis zin pa thams cad la mi'i skra la
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]sogs pa'i dud pas bdug pa phan par drang srong 'drob skyong gis bshad do/_/dug sel sman ni thams cad dang /_/sbyang ba'i las kyang bya ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mche ba dug can gyis zin pa thams cad la sbyor ba 'di dag byas na yang phan no/_/srin bu sdig pa mi bzad dug_/'bus
[\[268b.2\]]zin sbrul gyis zin ltar gso/_/zhes bya ba la/_srin bu rnams kyi dug la ni sbrul gyi dug ltar gsos na yang phan no/_/tan du li ya cha mnyam pa'i/_/dur byid dang ni zhun mang blud/_/'bu yi dug gis gangs can ltar/_/bskyod par nus pa ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bus
[\[268b.3\]]tan du li ya la sogs pa'i sman 'thungs na yang srin bu'i dug gis gangs can bskyod par mi nus pa dang 'dra bar bskyod mi nus bar byed do/_/'o ma can shun lde gus bsku/_/sbyangs byas srin bu'i dug sel byed/_/ces bya ba la/_mi sbyangs pa byas nas 'o ma can gyi shing gi shun pa'i
[\[268b.4\]]lde gus bskus na yang srin bu'i dug sel bar byed do/_/mu tig lde gus bskus na yang /_/skrang dang dug dang tsha ba sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_mu tig btab pa'i lde gus bskus na yang skrang ba dang /_zug pa la sogs pa sel bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/shu dag shing kun byi dang ka_/
[\[268b.5\]]rgyam tsha ha ti pi pi ling /_/pa tha bong nga tsha ba gsum/_/'dro ba skyong gis ni bshad pa yin/_/yan lag bcu pa'i dug sman ni/_/'dro ba skyong gis ni bshad pa dag_/blud na srin bu'i dug kyang sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_shu dag la sogs pa'i dug sman yan lag bcu pa ni 'dro ba skyong
[\[268b.6\]]gis bshad pa yin te/_des kyang srin bu'i dug thams cad sel bar byed do/_/sdig pa'i dug gis 'phral zin la/_/'khor los btsir ba'i til mar bsku/_/sa la par+Ni bskol ba yi/_/dro 'jam yang na gzhan dag blugs/_/zhes bya ba la/_/sdig pa'i mche ba'i dug gis zin ba la/_/
[\[268b.7\]]'khor los btsir ba'i til mar sar pa dang /_sa la par Ni dro 'jam tsam mam/_yang na til gzhan dag las byung ba'i til mar blugs par bya'o/_/rgyam tsha dang ni bcas pa yi/_/zhun mar yang dang yang du blugs/_/zhes bya ba la/_/yang na mar dang rgyam tsha sbyar ba blugs par bya'o/_/yang
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]na skyur rtsabs dro 'jam mam/_/rgyam tsha 'o mar bcas pa blugs/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan du na sbyor ba 'di nyid byas na yang phan no/_/mar dang brngos pa'i go snyod dang /_/rgyam tshar bcas pas dkri bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang go snyod dang rgyam tsho'i lde gu mar
[\[269a.2\]]dang brngos pas dkris na phan no/_/mche bas zin pa dugs byas la/_/zhal zhal btab ste 'bras bu gsum/_/ser po gnyis dang tsha ba gsum/_shir sha'i me tog bsku bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mche bas zin pa la ni dang por dugs byas la/_gtsags bus zhal zhal byas te
[\[269a.3\]]'bras bu gsum po la sogs pa'i phye mas btab pa'am/_lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/rgyam tsha kha lung ba gcin skyur/_/bye'u rug pa'i rtse mo btags/_/'ba' cha'am lci ba dro 'jom tsam/_/bskus na 'ang phan par 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na rgyam tsha la sogs pa'i
[\[269a.4\]]lde gu 'am 'ba' cha'am/_ba'i lci ba dro 'jam tsam bskus na yang phan no/_/btung ba zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas/_/yang na 'o mar kha ra btab/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na zhun mar la sogs pa'i btung ba byin na yang phan no/_/phug ron rtug pa a ru ra/_/rgya sngos bca' sga kha lung gi_/
[\[269a.5\]]khu ba dang sbyar blud pa ni/_/sdig pas zin pa'i sman mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang phug ron gyi rtug pa la sogs pa yang mchog tu phan pa yin no/_/rnga mo'i so ni chu bal bcas/_/sdig pa'i dug ni 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na rnga mo'i so la sogs pa yang phan no/_/shing
[\[269a.6\]]kun ba la kha lung gi_/khu ba dang sbyar lde gu dang /_/mig sman ri lur byas na ni/_/sdig pa'i dug ni sel mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na shing kun la sogs pa'i sman gyi sbyor bas phan no/_/ka rany+dza dang ardzu na/_/gi ri kar+Ni se lu dang /_/shir sha'i me tog dug mo yungs/_/zhog
[\[269a.7\]]chu dang btags bskus na/_/sdig pa'i dug ni sel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na kar ny+dza la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yang phan no/_/gang zhig rmugs shing rngam pa 'thon/_/bla zhing mi bzad na gyur pa/_/de la yung dang a ru ra/_/btsod dang bong nga pi pi ling /_/bil ba gzhon nu na la sham/_/
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]ta ka yi khu bar btags/_/lde gus byugs na phan pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang sems rmugs pa dang /_rngam pa 'thon pa dang /_bla zhing 'brel ba dang /_'brel pa'i tshig mang du smra ba dang /_brnag par dka' ba na bar gyur pa gang yin pa de la yung ba la sogs pa'i lde gus
[\[269b.2\]]bsku bar bya'o/_/sbrang ma gdug pa'i dug kun la/_/zho dang mar ni blud bya zhing /_/gtar ga gdab cing sna sman dang /_/mig sman gyi ni cho ga bya/_/dro zhing snum dang skyur ba dang /_/rlung 'joms kha zas sbyin par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrang ma gdug pa'i dug gis zin pa la ni zho dang
[\[269b.3\]]mar blud pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dang /_kha zas dro ba la sogs pa rlung sel ba sbyin par bya'o/_/dong gra byi ba'i rtug pa dang /_/kha lung khu ba ba bla dang /_/rgyam tsha pu shel tse sbyar ba'i/_/lde gus sbrang ma'i dug myur 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_dong gral sogs pa'i lde gus bskus
[\[269b.4\]]na sbrang ma gdug pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dug 'joms par byed do/_/sdig pas zin pa'i tha mar ni/_/dug gi shas cher langs gyur pa/_/zin pa'i rma la dug gis bsku/_/u ts+tshaTi ka'i gso ba'ang 'di/_/zhes bya ba la/_sdig pas zin pa'i mi la gso ba thams cad byas pa'i tha mar
[\[269b.5\]]dug mi bzad pa langs par gyur na rma de la dug gis bsku bar bya'o/_/u ts+tshe Ta \u0f72\u0f7eka zhes bya ba'i 'bus zin pa yang cho ga 'di nyid bya'o/_/glang po che yi rtug pa'i steng /_/ro he sha'i rtsa se 'u'i chu/_/lde gur byas btags bskus na ni/_/'di ni sbrang ma'i dug 'joms mchog_/ces bya ba
[\[269b.6\]]la/_glang po che'i rtug pa'i steng du/_ro hi sha'i rtsa ba dang /_se'u'i chu lde gur byas la bskus na sbrang ma'i dug thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog yin no/_/shir sha'i sa bon a rga yi/_/'o mas lan gsum bsgos pa ni/_/pi pi ling gi phye mar bsres/_/dug sman 'dis ni srin bu'i
[\[269b.7\]]dug/_/sbrul dang lu ta byi ba yi/_/dug ni sel bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_shir sha'i sa bon pi pi ling gi phye ma dang bsres la/_arga'i 'o mas lan gsum bsgos te sbyar ba'i sman 'dis ni srin bu'i dug thams cad sel bar byed do/_/shir sha ka rany+dza yi sa bon dang /_/gur gum
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]ru rta ldong ros bcas pa yi/_/dug sman 'dis ni mtshan rgyu'i sdig pas zin/_/sel bar byed pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_shir sha'i sa bon la sogs pa sbyar ba'i dug sman 'dis ni mtshan mo rgyu ba'i sdig pas zin pa sel bar byed pa'i dam pa yin par
[\[270a.2\]]rgyal ba ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/srin bu las ni rab gdug pa/_/ba ni bcu drug yin par bshad/_/gzhan dag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'dod/_/kha cig de bas mang bar 'dod/_/nyi ma'i 'od kyi rjes 'brang ba/_/stong phrag yod ces gzhan dag 'chad/_/
[\[270a.3\]]ces bya ba la/_/srin bu rnams las rab tu gdug cing gso dka' ba ni srog chags ba zhes bya ba yin la/_de'i dbye ba yang bcu drug yod par slob dpon gyis bshad do/_/kha cig ni de nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod par 'dod do/_/drang srong gzhan dag ni de bas kyang mang bar 'dod do/_/
[\[270a.4\]]drang srong kha cig ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi rjes su 'brang zhing skye ba stong phrag du ma yod par 'chad do/_/bla brnan gzugs ni mar gyur pa/_/dug can pa ni gcig pur 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_srog chags ba ni bla brnan mang zhing gzugs mang ba'i dug can ni gcig pu kho nar 'dod do/_/
[\[270a.5\]]de yi gzugs dang ming dag ni/_/shin tu 'dris pas shes par dka'/_/gnas kyi nges pa yod min pas/_/de phyir nad las bshad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba de'i gzugs la sogs pa ni shin tu shes par dka' zhing /_/gnas kyi nges pa yang yod pa ma yin pas de'i rang bzhin ni nad kyi
[\[270a.6\]]tshul las bshad par bya'o/_/nad gzhi so so'i gso ba dka'/_/'dus pa las gyur gsor mi rung /_/zhes bya ba la/_bde ni nad gzhi tha dad pa las gyur pa ni gso dka' ba yin la/_'dug pa las gyur ba ni gsor mi rung ba yin no/_/des zin mkhris gyur tsha ba dang /_/skom dang chu bur
[\[270a.7\]]rims kyis 'debs/_/rmongs bag ra ba tsha dmar ser mdog_/rnags shing rgun 'bru'i 'bras bu 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba des zin pa'i mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni tsha pa la sogs pa yin no/_/bad kan las gyur sra zhing skye/_/pa ru sha ka'i 'bras bu 'dra/_/gnyid che grang rims
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]lud pa lu/_/shin tu g.ya' bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_bas zin pa'i bad kan can gyi mtshan nyid ni sra zhing mdog skya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/rlung gyur rtsub cing gnag pa dang /_/tshigs na rims kyis 'debs par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_de la rlung las gyur pa ni/_/reg
[\[270b.2\]]na rtsub cing kha dog gnag pa la sogs pa yin no/_/de yid bye ba nad kyi ni/_/rang gi mtshan nyid las shes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba de'i dbye ba ni de ltar nad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid las shes par bya'o/_/gsor mi rung ba snying tsha zhing /_/lud pa skyigs bu mgo nad dang /_/'brum phran
[\[270b.3\]]dkar dang ser dang gnag_/dmar dang skya ba las 'byung 'gyur/_/'dar zhing skrangs la tsha ba dang /_/skom dad lang zhing sna 'chus la/_/mchu gnag so ni g.yo ba dang /_/rgyab dang mid pa bcom snyam sems/_/'dzom bu'i 'bras bu smin 'dra ba'i/_/khrag ni mchus bldags rma
[\[270b.4\]]las 'dzag_/ces bya ba la/_bas bldags pa gso bar mi rung ba ni/_snying tsha ba la sogs pa dang /_'brum phran mdog dkar ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_'dar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can nas mchus bldags pa las 'dzam bu smin pa'i 'bras bu 'dra ba'i
[\[270b.5\]]khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ba'i bar yin no/_/'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing /_/ming ni mang por gyur pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba thams cad kyang 'dus pa las gyur pa yin zhing /_nad skyed par byed pa yin la/_de'i ming yang du mar gyur pa yin no/_/de'i dug rnon po bar ma dang /_/
[\[270b.6\]]dman pa'i dbye bas gsum du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba de ni dug rnon po la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro/_/ma bcos zhag bdun zhag bcu dang /_/zla ba phyed kyi rims kyis gsod/_/ces bya ba la/_ba de'i dug ni ma bcos shing gso ba ma byas na dug rnon
[\[270b.7\]]pos ni zhag bdun nas gsod do/_/dug bar mas ni zhag bcu nas gsod do/_/dug dman pas ni zla ba phyed kyis gsod do/_/ba dang mchu rings thams cad kyang /_/glang shu kor kor por byed cing /_/dkar dang gnag dang dmar dang ser/_/gnag pa'am 'jam zhing mtho ba
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]dang /_/dbus su gnag pa'am sngo ba la/_/mtha' ma dra ba lta bus khebs/_/mched cing skrang bar byed pa dang /_/tsha zhing mang du na ba dang /_/rims 'debs myur du rnags shing 'drul/_/rul zhing gas par byed pa dang /_/rnag gis gang du reg gyur ba'i/_/
[\[271a.2\]]phyogs der yang ni rma skyed byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ba dang sbrang bu mchu ring la sogs pa thams cad kyang glang shu zlum po kor kor po dang 'dra ba skyed par byed cing /_mdog ni dkar po la sogs pa gang yang rung bar gyur la/_de bzhin du 'jam pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang
[\[271a.3\]]ldan pa dang /_shu ba mched pa la sogs pa dang /_rims la sogs pa skyed par byed pa yin no/_/dbugs dang mche ba bshang gci dang /_/khu chu kha chu sen mo khrag_/brgyad po gnod byed khyad par du/_/dug ni kha la gnas pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba la sogs pa'i srin
[\[271a.4\]]bu gdug pa 'di dag ni/_dbugs la sogs pa brgyad la dug yong pas gnod par byed la/_khyad par du ni dug de kha la gnas pa yin no/_/ba ni lte ba yan chad 'dzin/_/srin bu stod smad kun tu gnod/_/ces bya ba la/_ba ni lte ba yan chad du gnod cing dug 'debs par byed
[\[271a.5\]]la/_srin bu ni lus kyi stod smad kun tu gnod par byed do/_/des gnod byas pa'i gos la sogs/_/lus la reg na nad skyed byed/_/ces bya ba la/_ba dang srin bu gdug pa des gnod cing gos par byas pa'i gos la sogs pas lus la reg na yang dug gi nad skyed par byed
[\[271a.6\]]ngo /_/ba dang srin bu las gyur dug_/nyin phyed bar du tshor mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba dang sbrang bu gdug pa la sogs pas zin pa'i dug ni nyi ma phyed kyi bar du tshor bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas dang po'i nyin zhag la/_/khab kyis gtsags pa snyam du sems/_/mdog mi gsal
[\[271a.7\]]zhing gso ba dang /_/cung zad g.ya' zhing nad dang ldan/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i 'og tu srin bus zin pa de dang po'i nyin zhag la khab kyis gtsags pa snyam du sems pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis par mtha' ma shin tu mtho/_/'brum bu phra mos khyab pa 'dra/_/mdog
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]gsal gyur nas dbus dma' zhing /_/g.ya' zhing rmen bu lta bur snang /_/zhes bya ba la/_sbrang bu gdug pas zin nas zhag gnyis pa'i mtha' ni shin tu mtho ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/gsum par rims bcas sbu ldang zhing /_/'khor ling dmar por snang ba dang /_/kham
[\[271b.2\]]phor gzugs 'dra phal cher ni/_/ba spu'i bu ga 'dzag par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_zhag gsum par ni rims dang bcas pa la sogs par 'gyur zhing /_ba spu'i bu ga nas chu ser la sogs pa 'dzag par 'gyur ro/_/nyin zhag bzhi par rab skrang zhing /_/mgo 'khor lus tsha
[\[271b.3\]]dbugs mi bde/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i nyin zhag bzhi pa la ni de las gyur pa'i nad skrang ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/lnga par dug ldang las gyur pa'i/_/nad ni de dang de dag skyed/_/drug par gnad du khyab par byed/_/bdun par srog ni 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gdug pa'i
[\[271b.4\]]dug des drug pa la ni gnad rnams la khyab bar byed la/_zhal bdun pa la ni gsod par byed do/_/de ltar dug ni rnon po dang /_/bar ma dman ba dbye bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul de ltar na rnon po la sogs pa'i dug gi dbye ba stan pa yin no/_/de nas nyin zhag nyi shu ni/_/gcig na
[\[271b.5\]]yong ye zhi bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig 'das nas ni rnam pa thams cad du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas ba yis zin pa ni/_/mtshon gyis rma ni gnod par bya/_/'dzam bu'i mchu la sogs pas bsreg_/mkhris pa las gyur bsreg mi bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/
[\[271b.6\]]de'i 'og tu bas bldags pa'i rma mtshon gyis bcad de gnod pa dang /
[\[271b.7\]]tshigs la sogs pa nas/_/zin nas kun tu khyab gyur pa/_/gcad par mi bya bsreg mi bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_rtsub pa la sogs pa'i mtshon gyis gcad du yang mi rung la mes bsreg tu yang mi rung ngo /_/bsreg pa dug sman rgyam tsha dang /_/sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku bar bya/_/zhes
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]bya ba la/_mche bas zin pa bsreg pa la ni rgyam tsha dang sbrang rtsir sbyar pa'i dug sman bsku bar bya'o/_de rjes 'o ma can shing bskol/_/sman khu shin tu bsil mo blugs/_/zhes bya ba la/_'bus zin pa'i rma bsregs pa de'i 'og tu sman gyi khu ba yang blugs par bya'o/_/rngabs rwa
[\[272a.2\]]sogs sam gtar ga yis/_/thams cad la ni khrag dbyung bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gdug pa'i srin bus zin pa thams cad la rngabs rwa la sogs pas khrag dbyung bar bya'o/_/de nas bsil sman bsku blugs bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de'i 'og tu bsil ba'i sman gyi lde gus bsku ba
[\[272a.3\]]dang /_shin tu bsil ba'i sman gyi chu blugs par bya'o/_/sle sman ta ka a shwad tha/_/ba ru ra dang pri yang ku/_/shug pa ser gnyis sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/ba dang srin bu la sogs pa'i/_/dug 'joms las ni thams cad byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sle sman ta ka la sogs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar
[\[272a.4\]]ba'i lde gus bas bldags pa dang /_srin bu gdug pas zin pa la sogs pa'i dug sel zhing las thams cad byed pa yin no/_/ser po rnam gnyis rma shing btsod/_/pad+ma ge ser rgya spos ni/_/sbrang rtsi mar sbyar tsam pa ka_/snga ma bas kyang yon tan lhag_/ces bya ba la/_ser po rnam
[\[272a.5\]]gnyis la sogs pa spyar ba'i dug sman ni tsam pa ka zhes bya snye/_snga ma bas yon tan che ba yin no/_/lci khu btsir dang ka ra dkar/_/a pa marga ldong ros dang /_/ba bla skyer pa bya ma ka_/yug snam sbrang rtsi mar de bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/lci khu btsir ba la sogs pa'i sman ni de bzhin te/_/
[\[272a.6\]]ba la sogs pa'i dug 'joms shing las thams cad byed pa yin no/_/rgya spos na le sham sug smel/_/ru rta shing mngar sbrang rtsi mar/_/sbyar ba'i sman ni man da ra/_/zhes bya ba la/_rgya spes la sogs pa sbyar ba'i sman ni ming man da ra zhes bya ste/_de'i yon tan yang de dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[272a.7\]]rgya spos seng phrom pu tse shel/_/shu dag pa tha sug smel dang /_/gur gum spos ngad ldang de bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan yang rgya spos la sogs pa sbyar ba'i sman ni spos ngad ldang ba zhes bya ste/_yon tan yang snga ma dang 'dra ba yin no/_/nad gzhi mang la dug 'joms pa'i/_/sbyang ba byas
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]pas gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu nad gzhi mang ba la dug 'joms pa'i sman gyis dang por sbyang bar bya'o/_/shing mngar dang ni po son cha/_/ko sha ta ki ang ko la/_/sin du ba ra 'bras chur sbyar/_/'thungs na bad kan las gyur dug_/myur du slon bar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba
[\[272b.2\]]la/_bad kan gyi shas che ba la ni shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman 'bras kyi chu dang blud na/_dug myur du 'byin par byed do/_/shir sha'i lo ma me da dang /_/rtsa ba 'bras bu ang ko la'i/_/rtsa bar bcas pa'ang de bzhin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_shi ri sha'i lo ma dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang /_ang
[\[272b.3\]]ko la'i rtsa ba dang bcas pa 'bras kyi chu dang sbyar te 'thungs na yang bad kan las gyur ba'i srin bu'i dug de myur du slon par byed do/_/'bras bu gsum dang ni li ni/_/dur byid la sogs bkru sman gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te bkru sman gyis gso bar 'os pa yin na ni/_'bras bu gsum la
[\[272b.4\]]sogs pa'i bkru sman gtang bar bya'o/_/skrang dang tsha sogs zhi gyur na/_/rma yi lte ba dpog par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te skrung pa la sogs pa zhi bar gyur na 'og nas bshad pa'i sman gyis rma'i lte ba dpog par bya'o/_/ba bla le brgan rtsa'i me tog/_/khron bu byi ba'i rtug pa dang /_/dur byid dan
[\[272b.5\]]da rgyam tshar sbyar/_/lte ba 'byin par byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_ba bla la sogs pa'i sman sbyar te bskus na yang lte ba 'byin par byed do/_/de bzhin u ta ma ka ri'i/_/rtsa ba smin pa'i shun bcas pa'i/_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du u ta ma ka ri'i rtsa ba dang /_smin pa'i shun pa gnyis kyis kyang lte ba
[\[272b.6\]]'byin par byed do/_/rgyam tsha ru rta pu tse shel/_/dan da pa ya s+ya sbyar ba 'am/_/rAdza ko sha ta ki'i rtsar/_/dar ba'i tshigs ma sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang lte ba mtho ba de dbyung ba'i phyir rgyam tsha la sogs pa'i sbyor ba 'am/_rA dza ko sha ta ki'i rtsa ba dang /_dar ba'i tshigs ma ska ba dang sbyar bas kyang bya'o/_/
[\[272b.7\]]lte ba bcad pa'i dus su ni/_/dug sil ba yis brta bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lte ba bcad pa'i dus su dug sel bar byed pa'i kha zas dang /_/sman gyis brta bar bya'o/_/snum chos ma lus bya ba ni/_/zhun mar nyid kyis bya ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/srin bu'i dug gi snum chos la ni kun kyang zhun mar
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]gyis bya'o/_/til mar gyis ni rtsa sogs la/_/me mched lta bur dug 'phel byed/_/ces bya ba la/_gal te til mar gyis snum chos byas na ni/_rtswa sngon por me mched pa ltar dug de 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/be koM ka ta ba li ka/_/thal
[\[273a.2\]]tres gla sgang spri ka dang /_/tsan+dan nya lcibs so na ka/_/ut+pal rgya sbos shing mngar dang /_/shing tsha shug pa na gu li/_/po son cha'i rkang lhan cig sbyar/_/skyer pa gla sgang sar pa k+Shi/_/bca' sga pi pi ling rtsa ba/_/pi pi ling dang tsi tra ka_/ba ru na dang a ga ru/_/
[\[273a.3\]]bil ba nim pa ba ta li/_/ru rta nA ga ge sar dang /_/se'u lu lhan cig sbyar ba dang /_/bil ba tsan+dan ut+pa la/_/rgya spos bca' sga pi pi ling /_/lcang ma nim pa ru rta dang /_/chu srin sder mo dzi ban ti/_/ga bra'i rtsa ba pa ta li/_/dzi ban ti dang po son cha/_/
[\[273a.4\]]shing tsha sbyar ba de dag ni/_/mig sman snar blugs byug pa dang /_/sman chu blugs pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/mkhris pa bang kan rlung gyur pa'i/_/lu ta'i dug ni ji snyed pa/_/tshul khrims la gnas ngan 'gro bzhin/_/'di yis dug nad kun 'joms byed/_/
[\[273a.5\]]ces bya ba la/_/be kang ka ta la sogs pa'i dug sman gyi mchog 'di ni sman gyi sde tshan gsum pos mkhris pa la sogs pa'i srin bu'i nad gsum po 'joms par byed do/_/ji ltar tshul khrims la gnas pa'i mis ngan 'gro'i tshogs zlog par byed pa dang 'dra'o/_/spri
[\[273a.6\]]ka ni sha rtsi'o/_/nya lcibs ni chu bal lo/_/ku li ni gan+b+han ku li'o/_/se'u lu ni sle sman ta ka'o/_/gzhan ni go bar zad do/_/sbyor ba tshan gsum ni be koM ka ta nas po son cha'i rkang gi bar du sbyor ba gcig go/_/gnyis pa ni skyer pa nas se'u lu'i bar
[\[273a.7\]]ro/_/gsum ba ni bil ba nas shing tsha'i bar ro/_/seng phrom shug pa pad+ma ge sar dang /_/tsan+dan dmar ser phri yang ku'i me tog_/pad+ma pu shel tse dang pa ya s+ya'i/_/sbyor ba kun gyis ba yi dug rnams 'joms/_/zhes bya ba la/_/seng phrom la
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]sogs pa'i sman gyi sbyor ba ste/_btung ba dang /_sna sman dang /_mig sman dang /_bsku ba dang /_sman chu blugs pa'i sbyor bas sbyar na ni ba'i dug thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_slob dpon
[\[273b.2\]]zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa bdun pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//de nas byi ba dang a lang ga'i dug gso ba bshad par bya'o/_/kha chu can dang mi brtan bu/_/rgod dang sgra can pags pa dang /_/rnying pa'i
[\[273b.3\]]so dang khu byug dang /_/ser skya dang ni nag po dang /_/dmar ser khra bo dkar po dang /_/thi ba skra dkar byi ba dang /_/phus pa dang ni bra byi ste/_/byi ba'i dbye ba bco brgyad yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_byi ba'i dbye bas ni/_kha chu can la sogs pa'i dbye bas
[\[273b.4\]]bstan pa grangs bco brgyad yin no/_/gang du 'di yi khu chus phog_/khu bas phog dang reg pa ni/_/lus kyis lus la reg pa der/_/khrag la gnod cing mdog skya la/_/thor bu rmen bu dri mnam dang /_/shu ba 'khor ling yi ga 'chus/_/mgo 'khor
[\[273b.5\]]skrang rims rab tu na/_/nyam chung 'dar zhing lhu tshigs na/_/sbu ldang dran nyams khrag 'dzag dang /_/yun ring du ni gnas bar byed/_/bad kan can gyi byi ba yi/_/phru gu mang reg skom slon 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_byi ba 'di dag gi khu chus
[\[273b.6\]]lus gang la phog pa dang /_yang na khu bas phog pa'i lus dang rig par gyur na der mdog skya ba la sogs pa'i nad dang /_yun ring du 'brel zhing gnas par byed pa'i bar du 'gyur la/_bad kan can gyi mi byi ba'i phru gu mang pos reg na skom dang che
[\[273b.7\]]ba dang /_slon par 'gyur ro/_/byi ba 'khrig spyod dug gso dka'/_/yang dang yang du ldang bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_'khrig pa spyod pa'i dug gis reg pa ni shin tu gso dka' zhing /_de yang dang yang du ldang zhing 'khrug par byed pa yin no/_/yan
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]lag kun skrangs mdog mi sdug_/rnags shing 'on la rims kyis 'debs/_/mgo lci kha chu khrag 'byung zhing /_/slon pa gso dka'i mtshan nyid yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_byi ba'i dug gsor mi rung bas zin pa'i mtshan ma ni
[\[274a.2\]]yan lag kun skrangs pa nas/_slon pa'i bar yin par shes par bya'o/_/phus pas zin pa de dri bro/_/lgang pa skrangs shing chu mdog nyams/_/sbrang rtsi 'dra ba'i rmen bus khyab/_/ces bya ba la/_mi phus pa'i dug gis zin pa'i mtshan ma ni de'i
[\[274a.3\]]dri bro ba nas rmen bus khyab pa'i bar yin te/_de ni gsor mi rung bas sbang bar bya'o/_/khyi'i dug bad kan shas cher 'khrugs/_/'du shes rgyu ba'i rtsa mang gnas/_/gnod cing 'khrug par byed pa dang /_/lus zungs la ni mi bzad gnod/_/
[\[274a.4\]]ces bya ba la/_khyi'i mche ba'i dug gis zin pa ni/_bad kan gyi nad shas cher ldang zhing 'khrugs pa dang /_'du shes rgyu ba'i rtsa mang po la gnas nas 'du shes stong cing brgyal bar byed pa dang /_lus zungs rnams la lhag par gnod par
[\[274a.5\]]byed pa yin no/_/kha chu 'dzag dang long dang 'on/_/kun tu rgyug par byed pa dang /_/mjug ma 'gram pa phrag gong lhod/_/mgo na gdong ni dud pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khyi kha chu 'dzag cing long ba dang 'on pa dang /_phyogs kun tu rgyug par
[\[274a.6\]]byed pa dang /_mjug ma lhod cing rang gi gnas nas bskyod pa dang /_'gram pa dang /_phrag pa yang lhod pa dang /_mgo na zhing tsha ba dang /_gdong dud par byed pa ni khyi gdug pa yin no/_/de yi so yis zin na rma/_/tshor ba chung zhing khrag nag
[\[274a.7\]]'dzag_/mgo snying na zhing rims 'debs rengs/_/de rjes skom dang brgyal bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_de khyi'i sos zin par gyur pa'i mi ni rma'i tshor ba chung ba dang /_de bzhin du khrag nag po 'dzag pa la sogs pa yin no/_/'di yis
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]gdug cing mche ba can/_/ce sbyang dom dang dred dang gung /_/stag dang spyang ki la sogs pa/_/gzhan dag kyang ni shes par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul 'dis ni gcan gzan gdug cing mche ba dang ldan pa'i mche ba can ce sbyang la sogs pa gzhan dag
[\[274b.2\]]kyang shes par bya'o/_/g.ya' zhing zug la mdog mi sdug/_/tsher ba med gnas rims mgo 'khor/_/tsha zhing dmar la na zhing rnags/_/skrang zhing rmen bu skye zug 'khums/_/rma ni 'gags shing 'brum bu 'byung /_/lte ba can du zlum por
[\[274b.3\]]'gyur/_/kun tu dug bcas mtshan ma 'di/_/dug mid de las bzlog pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_thams cad du dug dang ldan pa ni/_g.ya' ba la sogs ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan par shes par bya la/_dug med pa ni g.ya' ba la sogs pa'i
[\[274b.4\]]mtshan nyid de dag med cing snga ma las go bzlog pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/gang gis bzung ba de'i sbyod tshul/_/sgra sgrogs rgyu med par de'i gzugs/_/chu dang me long sogs mthong 'chi/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi ce sbyang la sogs pa dag gis
[\[274b.5\]]bzung bar gyur pa gang yin pa de mod la de'i spyod tshul de ce sbyod tshul de ce sbyang la sogs pa'i sbyod tshul byed cing /_de ltar mthong ba'i rgyu med par chu la sogs par de'i gzugs mthong na 'chi bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/ma bzung bar yang sgra dang ni/_/mthong bas
[\[274b.6\]]sngangs par byed pa ni/_/chu yis skrag ces bya ba ste/_/zin pa de yang spang par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang srog chags de dag gis ma bzung du zin kyang sgra la sogs pas sngangs shing chus skrag par byed pa'i mi de ni chus skrag pa zhes bya ba'i nad
[\[274b.7\]]kyis zin pa yin te/_de yang spang bar bya'o/_/byi ba'i dug gis zin ma thag_/rma ni mde'u bsregs pas bsreg_/yang na me long dag gis bya/_/gzhan du lte bar mi bzod na/_/zhes bya ba la/_byi bas zin ma thag pa'i mi'i rma la
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]mde'u bsregs pa'am/_yang na me long bsregs pas de bsregs pas de bsreg par bya'o/_/gzhan du ma bsregs na rma'i lte ba mi bzod par na bar 'gyur ro/_/bsregs nas rma las khrag dbyung zhing /_/zhal zhal byas la shir sha dang /_/yung ba rgya spos
[\[275a.2\]]gur gum dang /_/sle tres kyi ni lde gus bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_sos bzung ba bsregs pa'i rma la rngabs rwa la sogs pas khrag dbyung ba dang /_zhal zhal byas la shi ri sha la sogs pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/khyim gyi dug pa skyer pa dang /_/rgyam tsha dang ni
[\[275a.3\]]btsod dag gi_/lde gus byi ba'i dug sel zhing /_/lte ba 'bur ba'ang 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_khyim gyi dud pa la sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gus bskus na byi ba'i dug sel bar byed cing /_de nyid kyis rma'i lte ba 'bur ba yang sel bar byed do/_/de
[\[275a.4\]]nas skyur bas bkrus nas ni/_/gi ri kar Ni pa lin ti/_/bil ba'i rtsa ba sle tres dang /_/chu dang btags pa'i lde gus bsku/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i 'og tu kan dza dang dar ba la sogs pa khu ba skyur bas bkrus la/_de'i rjes la gi ri kar Ni la sogs pa chu
[\[275a.5\]]dang btags pa'i lde gus bsku bar bya'o/_/dug dang skrang sel sman gzhan dang /_/yang na gtar ga myur du gdab/_/ces bya ba la/_de bzhin du de la dug dang skrang pa sel ba'i sman gzhan dag gis kyang bsku ba dang /_gtar ga gdab par yang bya'o/_/ni li ni
[\[275a.6\]]bskol shi ri sha/_/ang ko la yi khu bas slon/_/zhes bya ba la/_byi ba'i dug de la ni li ni bskol ba'i khu ba blud pa'am/_shi ri sha dang ang ko la'i khu ba blud de slon par bya'o/_/ko sha ta ki shir sha dang /_/dzi mu ta ka'i 'bras bu dang /_/po son cha ni phye mar
[\[275a.7\]]btags/_/zho sbyar blud la dug slon gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_yang na ko sha ta ki la sogs pa'i sman bzhi'i phyi ma dang zhor sbyar te blud la byi ba'i dug slon du gzhug par bya'o/_/shu dag ru rta po son cha'am/_/dzi ban ti ni ba gcin btags/_/cho ga snga ma bzhin blud
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]na/_/dug gi nad ni thams cad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_shu dag la sogs pa'i sman ba gcin dang btags pa'i lde gu dang snga ma bzhin du zho dang sbyar te blud na yang byi ba'i dug gi nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/dur byid ni li ni dang ni/_/'bras bu gsum gyi bkru sman bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_/
[\[275b.2\]]yang nang dur byid la sogs pa'i bkru sman yang bsngags so/_/shi ra sha'i snying po'i 'bras bu yis/_/mgo bo'i bkru sman dag kyang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na shir sha'i nang gi snying po dang /_de nyid kyi 'bras bu mgo bo'i bkru sman btang na yang phan no/_/ba lci'i khu ba tsha ba gsum/_/phye ma
[\[275b.3\]]zhib btags lde gus phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na ba'i lci ba la sogs pa'i mig sman yang phan no/_/ba lang lci ba ka pid ta'i/_/phye ma sbrang rtsi'i lde gu bza'/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na ba lang gi lci ba la sogs pa'i lde gu zos na yang phan no/_/taN+Du li yi rtsa ba dang /_/bskol ba'i
[\[275b.4\]]mar ni blud na 'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na taN+Du li'i rtsa ba'i sman mar yang phan no/_/gi ri kar Ni ser po gnyis/_/shing mngar btsod dang sle tres phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na gi ri kar+Ni la sogs pa'i mar blud na yang phan no/_/thal tres rtsa ba mar bskol ba/_/ka pid ta yi
[\[275b.5\]]rnam lnga'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na thal tres zhes bya ba sha ri ba dang bskol ba'i sman mar ram/_yang na ka pid ta lnga pa zhes bya ba ka pid tha'i shun pa dang /_lo ma dang rtsa ba la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i mar yang phan no/_/sin du ba ra rgya spos dang /_/shi kru bil ba'i rtsa ba dang /_/shu dag gze
[\[275b.6\]]ma ba spru ba/_/dzi mu ta dang bcas pa ste/_/de rnams khu ba sbrang rtsir bcas/_/blud nas 'bras chan sA lu zho/_/byin na phyi ba'i dug nad sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang byi ba'i dug gis nyin pa la ni sin du ba ra la sogs pa'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa blud pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas na yang phan no/_/
[\[275b.7\]]shar pung ga'i phye ma ni/_/dar bar sbyar ba blud pa'ang phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na sha ra pung ga'i sa bon btags pa'i phye ma dar ba dang sbyar te blud na yang phan no/_/ang ko la yi rtsa ba ni/_/ra thug gcin sbyar lde gus ni/_/btung dang bsku ba la sbyar na/_/byi ba'i dug kun sel bar byed/_/ces
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bya ba la/_yang na ang ko la'i rtsa ba ji skad smos pa bzhin du btang ba yang phan no/_/ka pid ta yi snying po dang /_/ti la ka dang til dang ni/_/ang ko la yi rtsa ba ni/_/'a yi 'o ma'am gcin sbyar blud/_/ces bya ba la/_/yang na ka pid ta'i snying po la sogs pa gcin dang sbyar ba
[\[276a.2\]]blud na yang phan no/_/ti la ka'i sdong yal ga ni/_/ba yi 'o ma sbyar ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na sbyor ba 'di byas na yang phan no/_/yang na sher+ya ka'i rtsa ba/_/sbrang rtsi 'bras bu sbyar ba blud/_/ces bya ba la/_yang na sher+ya ka zhes bya ba ha tsa ra'i rtsa ba dang /_sbrang rtsi dang 'bras bkrus pa'i chu dang sbyar te blud na yang phan
[\[276a.3\]]no/_/ku ba kha bo zhag gcig ni/_/chu la spangs pa'ang blud par bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na ku ba kha bo zhag gcig chur sbangs pa'i khu ba blud par bya'o/_/sin du ba ra'i rtsa dang /_/byi ba'i rus pa bong nga dkar/_/rgya spos chur btags sna sman sogs/_/sbyar bas byi ba'i dug sel byed/_/ces bya ba
[\[276a.4\]]la/_/yang sin du ba ra'i rtsa ba la sogs pa'i sman sna sman la sogs pa byas na yang phan no/_/byi ba'i dug ni lhag lus pa/_/sprin mthong bas ni ldang byed pa'am/_/nad ni 'phel bar byed pa'i rgyu/_/ji lta bar ni 'phel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_byi ba'i dug lus la lhag par lus pa gnas na sprin
[\[276a.5\]]mthong na ldang bar byed pa'am/_yang na 'phel bar byed pa'i dus dbyar la sogs pa'i tshe 'phel zhing ldang bar byed pa yin no/_/de la gnas skabs thams cad du/_/gso ba thams cad sbyar bya zhing /_/rang gi gso bar gang bshad dang /_/de bzhin nyams pa'i dug sel sbyor/_/zhes bya ba
[\[276a.6\]]la/_de la rang gi 'phel bar byed pa'i gnas skabs su ldang bar byed na gnas skabs thams cad du ji skad du bstan pa'i gsob sbyar bar bya zhing /_rang gi gso ba'i sman gang dag yin pa dang nyams pa'i dug sel ba'i sbyor ba dag bya'o/_/a lang ka yi so yis zin/_/mar bskol
[\[276a.7\]]ba yis bsreg par bya/_/dug sman de dang de bsku zhing /_/mar gyi snying po blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/a lang ka'i sos zin pa'i mi la ni mar bskol bas sos btab pa'i rjes bsreg par bya'o/_/'di la arka'i 'o mar bcas/_/bkru sman dag kyang myur du gtang /_/zhes
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]bya ba la/_a lang ka'i dug gis zin pa 'di la arga'i 'o ma dang sbyar ba'i sman gtang bar bya'o/_/ang ko la'i rtsa byang phyogs chu/_/srang gsum mar ni srang gcig blud/_/ces bya ba la/_ang ko la byang phyogs na gnas pa'i rtsa ba bskol ba'i chu srang gsum dang mar srang
[\[276b.2\]]gcig bsres te blud na yang phan no/_/ng+ha du ra yi 'bras bu dang /_/gi ri kar Ni ba sbru ba/_/bskol ba'i khu ba blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_ng+ha du ra'i 'bras bu dang gi ri kar+Ni dkar po bskol te blud pa'am/_yang na ng+ha du ra'i 'bras bu dang /_ba sbru ba dkar po bskol ta \u0f7ablud par bya'o/_/
[\[276b.3\]]til btags lde bu arka lcags/_/'o ma bu ram bsres byin na/_/sprin tshogs rlung gis gtor ba bzhin/_/a lang ka yi dug 'joms byed/_/ces bya ba la/_til btags pa'i lde gu la sogs pa'i sman gcig tu bsres te byin na yang ji skad smos pa'i yon tan skyed par byed
[\[276b.4\]]do/_/sngags bcas sman dang rin chen bcas/_/zhi bar byed pa dag kyang sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_a lang kas zin pa de la sngags la sogs pa des zhi bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dag kyang bya'o/_/rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis pa'i/_/so 'am sen mos snad gyur pa/_/skrang zhing
[\[276b.5\]]rnags la mdog dmar zhing /_/tsha na chu ser 'dzag pa la/_/zhes bya ba la/_rta dang glang po che la sogs pa rkang bzhi pa dang /_rkang gnyis pa ste mi dang /_rma bya dang khyim bya la sogs pa'i so'am sen mos snad par gyur nas skrangs pa dang rnags pa la sogs pa'i nad la ni 'og nas
[\[276b.6\]]bshad ba'i sman gyi sbyor ba bya'o/_/a shwa kar Na kad pa la/_/ha na sa ti go dzi ha/_/yug snam ser po gnyis kyis bsku/_/so dang sen mo'i dug 'joms byed/_/ces bya ba la/_a shwa kar Na la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na so la sogs pas snad pa'i dug sel bar byed
[\[276b.7\]]do/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel ba tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par byar ba las/_phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o//_//dug gso ba'i rgyud rdzogs so//
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]de nas bcud kyis len gyi le'u bshad par bya'o/_/de ltar re zhig nad kyis nyen pa dag gi sman gyi sbyor ba bshad na/_bde zhing nad med par gnas pa'i lus kyi stobs dang gzi byin skyed pa ston pa yin la de yang bcud kyis len dang ro tsa bar byed pa yin pa las
[\[277a.2\]]bcud kyis len ni de dag las kyang mchog tu gyur pa yin pas de sngar bshad pa yin no/_/tshe ring dran dang yid gzhungs dang /_/nad med gzhon dang lang tsho dang /_/gzugs bzang mdog dang skad gsal dang /_/lus dang dbang po'i stobs skyed cing /_/tshig 'grub ro tsa mdangs ldan pa/_/
[\[277a.3\]]bcud kyis len gyis 'thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/bcud kyis len gyi cho ga yang dag par gyur pa'i skyes bus ni/_tshe ring ba la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba yin no/_/dngas ma la sogs yon tan can/_/thob gnas yin phyir bcud kyis len/_/zhes bya ba la/
[\[277a.4\]]dngas ma dang khrag dang sha la sogs pa yon tan dang ldan pa khyad par can thob cing rnyed par 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pas na bcud kyis len ces bya'o/_/na tshod dang po'am bar ma'i tshe/_/dbang po thul bas de sbyar te/_/snum chos bya zhing gtar ga gdab/_/rnam pa kun tu sbyang byas gtang /_/
[\[277a.5\]]zhes bya ba la/_bcud kyis len de yang na tshod dang po'i tshe 'am/_na tshod bar ma'i tshe gtang bar byas la/_de yang skyes bu dbang po thul cing yul gyis sems ma phrogs pas de bsten cing sbyar bar bya la/_de yang snum chos byas shing gtar ga gdab pa dang /_slon sman dang bkru sman la
[\[277a.6\]]sogs pa las rnam pa ldas lus sbyangs nas gtang bar bya'o/_/ma sbyangs pa yi lus la ni/_/bcud gyis len dang ro tsa ba'i/_/sbyor byas dri ma can gyi ni/_/gos kyi tshon ltar don me 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir lus ma sbyangs shing dag par ma byas pa la/_bcud kyis
[\[277a.7\]]len gyi sbyor ba'am/_ro tsa ba byas na de don med par 'gyur te/_dper na dri ma can gyi gos la tshon gyis kha bsgyur na de len du mi btub pa dang 'dra'o/_/bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba ni/_/rnam pa gnyis su drang srong 'dod/_/spyil por 'dug pa gtso bo ste/_/rlung dang than pas nyen
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]cig shos/_/zhes bya ba la/_bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba ni drang srong rnams kyis rnam pa gnyis su bshad de/_spyil po'am khang par zhugs te bsgrub pa ni gtso bo yin la/_rlung dang than pas nyen pa'i sbyor ba ni cig shos te gtso bo ma yin pa'o/_/khang pa rlung med 'jigs pa med/_/
[\[277b.2\]]chos ldan yo byad 'byor ba'i grong /_/sa phyogs shis pa'i byang phyogs su/_/khang pa sum rim dkar khung chung /_/dud pa nyi tshan sbrul dang rdul/_/bud med glen mas ma bgrod par/_/yo byad sman pa sta gon byas/_/khang pa legs par byi dor bya'o/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman bsten pa'i
[\[277b.3\]]khang par rlung med pa dang /_'jigs shing bag tsha ba med pa dang /_chos dang mi 'gal ba'i spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_sman la sogs pa'i yo byad 'byor pa dang grong gi byang shar gyi mtshams kyis phyogs shis par khang pa sum rim du brtsigs pa skar khung chung ngu dang ldan pa dang /_dud bal sogs
[\[277b.4\]]pas mnyen pa/_yo byad dang sman pa sta gon byas pa khang pa skyang nul la sogs pa byi dor bya'o/_/de nas tshes grangs bzang khrus byas/_/mchod 'os mchod nas 'jug par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i 'og tu bcud kyis len bsgrub par 'dod pa des zla ba yang ngo'i tshes grangs bzang por khus
[\[277b.5\]]dang gtsang sbra byas te/_mchod par 'os pa lha dang bla ma la mchod pa byas te der 'jug par bya'o/_/der ni sbyang byas dag gyur nas/_/bde zhing stobs ni skyed pa dang /_/tshangs par spyod dang brtan par ldan/_/dad par ldan zhing dbang po thul/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bde ba dang /_/
[\[277b.6\]]brtul zhugs chos la mchog tu gzhol/_/lha ni rjes su dran par ldan/_/rigs pas gnyid log gnyid mi log_/sman la dga' zhing tshig 'jam pas/_/bcud kyis len ni brtsam par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas khang par der bkru sman dang /_skyug sman la sogs pas sbyang bar
[\[277b.7\]]bya zhing /_de bzhin du nyams brta ba la sogs pas stobs thob cing nus pa rnyed pa'i mi tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan zhing bud med la nyal po bya ba spang ba brtan zhing sran thub pa/_dad pa dang ldan zhing mos pa che ba/_dbang po thul zhing yul gyis sems mi phrogs pa sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]sogs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs la mchog tu gzhol ba/_de bzhin du lha rjes su dran zhing yid la byed pa'i gtam dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du rigs shing ran par gnyid log pa dang /_ma log pa dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du sman gyi sbyor ba la dga' zhing mos pa
[\[278a.2\]]dang /_tshig 'jam zhing des pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa de lta bus bcud kyis len gyi cho ga brtsam par bya zhing de la 'jug par bya'o/_/de nyid snum chos dugs byas nas/_/a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/_/rgyam tsha bca' sga pi pi ling /_/shu dag yung ba byi dang ga_/bu ram chu dron sbyar ba ni/_/blud na
[\[278a.3\]]legs par 'khru bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyes bu de dang po snum chos dang dugs byas nas/_a ru ra dang bu ram gyi bar du chu dron dang sbyar te blud na/_mi de legs shing bde bar 'khru bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lus ni dag 'gyur zhing /_/thug sogs rim par spyad nas kyang /_zhag gsum
[\[278a.4\]]mam ni zhag lnga'am/_/zhag bdun bar du zhun mar bcas/_/nas thug dag par gyur gyi bar/_/sbyin zhing bshang rnying dag par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de'i 'og tu lus kyi sbyang ba byas pa'i skyes bu des thug pa la sogs pa'i rim pa ji skad bshad pa spyad nas/_zhag gsum mam/_zhag
[\[278a.5\]]lnga'am/_zhag bdun gyi bar du zhun mar dang bcas pa'i nas thug sbyin par bya ba'am/_yang na sngar gyi bshang ba rnying pa de dag par gyur gyi bar du nas thug sbyin par bya'o/_/de ltar lto ni sbyang byas nas/_/goms par shes pas gang zhig la/_/gang zhig 'tsham pa de kun brtags/_/bcud
[\[278a.6\]]kyis len ni sbyin par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul de ltar lto sbyang ba byas pa'i skyes bu goms pa'i sbyor ba shes pa'i sman pas lus zungs nad gzhi la sogs pa'i tshul thams cad brtags te/_gang la ji ltar 'tsham pa'i bcud kyis len de sbyin par bya'o/_/a ru ra stong de'i sum 'gyur/_/
[\[278a.7\]]skyu ru ra dang bcas pa dang /_/rtsa ba lnga po lnga rnams ni/_/srang ni nyis brgya lnga bcu dag_/chu ni bcu 'gyur nang du bskol/_/khu ba bcu cha lus pa ru/_/a ru rnam rgyal skyu ru ra/_/brdungs la rus pa phyug nas ni/_/khu ba de yi nang du ni/_/shing tsha sug smel pi pi ling /_/gdur skyer
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]pa a ru ra/_/tsan+dan ma du ka par ni/_/shang ka puSh+paka na ya/_/shu dag gla ba shing mngar dang /_/byi dang ga ni phul re'i tshad/_/kha ra dkar srang stong chig brgya/_/zhun mar bre ni bcu gnyis dang /_/til mar bre ni brgyad bcas pa/_/lde gur gyur gyi bar du bskol/_/phab la bsgrangs par sbrang
[\[278b.2\]]rtsi ni/_/srang ni sum brgya nyi shu gzhug_/de nas gzar bus dkrugs nas ni/_/mar gyi snod dug zhug par bya/_/gang zhig zas gcig la mi gnod/_/de ni 'di yi tshad du bshad/_/zhu ba'i tshe na drug cu pa/_/'o mar bcas pa'i kha zas sbyin/_/bcud kyas len 'di tshangs pas bshad/_/
[\[278b.3\]]dge zhing dpal yon can yin zhing /_/mkha' la gnas dang byis pa rtse/_/de bzhin dka' thub pas bsten byas/_/lus snyom ngal dang skra dkar dang /_/gnyer ma'i skyon ni spang 'gyur zhing /_/yid gzhungs dran dang stobs ldan zhing /_/tshe ring par yang 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba
[\[278b.4\]]la/_a ru ra rdog ma stong dang /_de'i sum 'gyur gyi skyu ru ra dang bcas pa ste skyu ru ra sum stong dang /_sman gyi sde tshan sna tshogs nas bshad pa'i rtsa ba lnga ngo lnga spyir srang nyis brgya lnga bcu ste/_'di dag ni sman re re zhing bcu bcu gzhug par bya ste/_de dag thams cad bsdus pa srang gis bsdus
[\[278b.5\]]te/_de'i bcu 'gyur gyi chu'i nang du bskol la de'i khu ba bcu cha lus pa dang /_de'i 'og tu a ru ra rnam par rgyal ba dang /_skyu ru ra brdungs la rus pa phyung ste/_khu ba de'i nang du shing tsha nas byi dang ga'i bar du sman sna re zhing phul re gzhug par bya'o/_/de bzhin du kha ra dka' bo srang stong chig
[\[278b.6\]]brgya dang /_de bzhin du zhun mar bre bcu gnyis dang /_de bzhin du til mar bre brgyad de/_de dag thams cad gcig tu bsres la/_gzar bu la chags shing lde gur gyur gyi bar du bskol la thab las phab ste bsgrangs pa'i nang du sbrang rtsi srang sum brgya nyi shu gzhug par bya'o/_/de nas
[\[278b.7\]]de'i 'og tu gzar bus legs par dkrugs la de mar gyi snod du bcug cing bzhag par bya la/_de las tshad ni ji tsam zhig zos bza' ba'i dus la mi gnod cing bde bar 'ju nus pa de tsam du bza' par bya'o/_/sman de zhu ba'i tshe
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]na 'bras drug cu pa'i chan 'o ma dang bcas pa'i kha zas sbyin par bya'o/_/bcud kyis len pa 'di ni tshangs pas bshad pa yin te/_dge zhing dpal skyed pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan no/_/drang srong mkha' la gnas pa dang /_byis pa dang rtse ba dang /_de bzhin du dka'
[\[279a.2\]]thub pa gzhan rnams kyis kyang bsten cing goms par byas pa yin la/_de dag kyang bcud kyis len 'di lus kyi snyim pa dang /_ngal ba la sogs pa spang bar 'gyur ba dang /_yid gzhungs pa dang /_dran pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa nas tshe shin tu ring ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur
[\[279a.3\]]ba yin no/_/skyon med a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/_/stong dang pi pi ling ni stong dang bcas/_/rgya skyegs shing gzhon thal ba'i chu sbyar ba/_/snod du bzhag ste legs par spangs nas ni/_/slar phyung grib mar skams te phye mar byas/_/kha ra dkar po bzhi cha mar dang ni/_/sbrang rtsi bzhi 'gyur bcas pa
[\[279a.4\]]mar gyi ni/_/bum par bcug ste sa brkos par bzhag la/_/zla ba drug lon nas ni slar phyung ste/_/snga dro'i dus su me drod ji bzhin bza'/_/rtag tu mthun pa'i zas na lo brgya 'tsho/_/nad med pa dang skra dkar gnyer ma med/_/lus kyi stobs 'phel rgyas
[\[279a.5\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_/mchog tu dran gsal yid ni gzhungs par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_a ru ra dang skyu ru ra skyon med cing khu ba dang sman gyi nus pa la sogs pa rdzogs par gyur pa dang /_de bzhin du pi pi ling stong dang bcas pa dang /_de bzhin du rgya skyegs shing pa la sha zhes bya ba thal
[\[279a.6\]]bar byas te chur gzags pa dang sbyar te/_snod du bzhag la spangs par gyur nas slar phyung ste grib ma'i nang du skams nas phye mar byas pa dang /_kha ra dkar po phye ma'i bzhi cha las/_de bzhin du mar dang sbrang rtsi sman gyi bzhi 'gyur dang bcas pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdoms te mar gyi
[\[279a.7\]]bum par bcug nas sa brkos pa'i nang du bzhag la/_zla ba drug lon pa dang /_de'i 'og tu slar phyung ste snga dro'i dus su ji tsam du ran par zos la/_de zhu ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i kha zas sA lu'i chan la sogs pa bza' bar bya'o/_/de lta bu'i sbyor bas sman thams cad zos na/_lo brgya'i
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing nad dang skra dkar dang gnyer ma med par 'gyur ba dang /_lus kyi stobs 'phel ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/skyon med rgya skyegs shing rlon pa/_/thor to bcad la bzhog pa yi/_/sdod bu khru gnyis brkos pa'i nang /_/skyu ru ra ni sar pas dgang /_/rtsa ba'i
[\[279b.2\]]bar du 'jag mas dkri/_/pad+ma skyes pa'i 'dam gyis bsku/_/de nas rlung med gnas su ni/_/lci ba sar pa gtsang mas btso/_/tshos shing skyu ru ra spangs nas/_/sbrang rtsi mar bcas mi yis bza'/_/de rjes 'o ma mar bcas pa/_/ci 'dod par ni btung bar bya/_/de nyid kyis ni zla gcig
[\[279b.3\]]par/_/bsten zhing spang bar bya ba rnams/_/de ni 'bad de spang bar bya/_/chu ni grang mo lag pa yis/_/reg pa tsam yang mi bya'o/_/de ltar zhag ni bcu gcig 'das/_/skra so san mo lhags par 'gyur/_/de nas nyin zhag nyung zad nas/_/gzugs bzang bud med la phod cing /_/stobs
[\[279b.4\]]ni glang po dang 'drar 'gyur/_/mchog tu yid gzhungs snying stobs dang /_/blo ldan lo stong 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_pa la sha rul pa la sogs pa'i skyon med pa rlon pa'i thor to bcad la bzhog pa'i nad gi sdong bu khru gnyis pa brkos la/_de'i nang du skyu ru ra sar pas bkang la/
[\[279b.5\]]de'i 'og tu 'jag mas rtsa ba'i bar du dkri bar bya'o/_/de nas pad+ma skyes pa'i 'dam gyi bsku bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu rlung med pa'i gnas su dgon pa'i lci ba sar pa'i mes btsos la/_de nas skyu ru ra de sbrang rtsi dang mar dang bcas par bza' bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu skom du 'o ma ngoms par blud
[\[279b.6\]]par bya zhing /_'o ma de nyid dang zla ba gcig gi bar du gnas par bya zhing /_zas gzhan mi bza' bar bya ba dang /_de'i bcud kyis len gyi sbang bar bya ba'i spyod lam ni/_'bad de spang bar bya ba dang /_chu grang mo ni tha na lag pas kyang mi reg par bya'o/_de lta bu'i tshul gyis zhag bcu gcig
[\[279b.7\]]'das par gyur pa dang /_skra dang so la sogs pa lhags par 'gyur ro/_/de nas nyin zhag gi dus nyung zad cig na gzugs bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_bud med la phod pal sogs pa'i yon tan rnams 'byug bar 'gyur ro/_/rtsa ba bcu pa ba bla dang /_/gla sgang thal tres dzi ba ka//
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]ut+pa la dang pa r+Ni gnyis/_/kar ka ta sring pi pi ling /_/med sug smel ta ma la/_/'tsho byed rgun 'brum a ga ru/_/ma nu zur ba sbru ba/_/ram nye ba gnyis sle tres dang /_/ka ka nas a ru ra/_/ba sha ka'i rtsa bi da ri/_/srang re gcig tu bsres nas
[\[280a.2\]]ni/_/skyu ru ra'i 'bru lnga brgya ni/_/chu bre bcu drug nang du bskol/_/de yi khu ba bzhi cha lus/_/skyu ru ra yi rus pa bsal/_/mar dang til mar srang bcu gnyis/_/nang du legs par brngos nas ni/_/kha ra dkar po srang lnga bcu/_/btags te lde gu'i tshul du bskol/_/snum phyed
[\[280a.3\]]kyi ni sbrang rtsi gzhug_/smig rkang srang ni bzhi dag dang /_/pi pi ling ni srang gnyis dang /_/dri bzangs bzhi ni srang gcig gzhug_/de las tshad tsam bza' bya zhing /_/khang par gnas shing 'phrod zas bsten/_/'di ni drang srong 'pho bas bsten/_/drang srong 'pho bas gang zos pas/_/
[\[280a.4\]]rgas pas nyen par gyur pa yang /_/bud med kyi ni mig tu sdug_/cho ga bzhin du bsten gyur na/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde rims dang /_/skems dang snying nad dreg nad dang /_/gcin dang khu chu la gnas dang /_/skad 'gags pa yang sel bar byed/_/byis pa rgan dang glo 'gram gcod/_/
[\[280a.5\]]rid pa'i nyams stobs 'phel bar byed/_/yid gzhungs dran dang mdangs ldan dang /_/nad med nyid dang tshe 'phel dang /_/rlang ni bde bar rgyu byed cing /_/bud med la phod stobs dang ni/_/dbang po gsal zhing me drod skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_rtsa ba bcu dang ba bla la sogs pa'i sman sna re zhing
[\[280a.6\]]srang re gcig tu bsres pa dang /_skyu ru ra'i rdog ma lnga brgya chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bskol la/_de'i khu ba bzhi cha lus pa dang /_de las skyu ru ra btus te rus pa bsal la mar dang til mar srang bcu gnyis kyi nang du brngos la/_de'i 'og tu kha ra dkar po srang lnga bcu dang bcas pa de lde gu'i sbyor
[\[280a.7\]]bas bskol la tshos nas bsgrangs la/_sbrang rtsi snum gyi phyed de srang drug la sogs pa bcug la/_lde gu de las tshad tsam bza' zhing /_khang bar gnas te kha zas 'phrod pa bstan par bya'o/_/'di ni drang srong 'pho bas bsten zhing zos pa zhes bya ba'i bcud kyis len yin te/_bcud
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]kyis len gang zhig zos pas de rgas 'khogs par gyur pa yang gzugs bzang zhing bud med kyi mig tu sdug par 'gyur ro/_/'di cho ga bzhin bsten par gyur na/_lud pa dang dbugs mi bde ba la sogs pa nas/_dbang po gsal zhing me drod skyed par byed pa'i par gyi yon tan dang ldan pa
[\[280b.2\]]yin no/_/shing mngar smig rkang pi pi ling /_/lce myang tsha dang bcas pa dang /_/lcags ni sna re gser dang ni/_/shu dag sbrang rtsi zhun mar ram/_/kha ra dkar po 'bras bu gsum/_/lo gcig bsten na bcud len 'gyur/_/nad kun 'joms shing dran pa dang /_/yid gzhungs
[\[280b.3\]]blo ni skyid par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_shing mngar ram/_smig rkang ngam/_pi pi ling ngam/_lce myang tsha'am/_lcags lnga po re re'am/_so sor ram/_gser ram/_shu dag gam/_mar dang sbrang rtsi'am/_kha ra dkar po 'bras bu gsum dang bcas pa lo gcig tu bsten na/
[\[280b.4\]]bcud kyis len du 'gyur zhing nad thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin no/_/ma du ka par+Na yi khu ba'am/_/shing mngar phye ma 'o mar bcas pa ni/_/lhan cig sbyar ba me drod ji bzhin sbyin/_/sle tres shang ka puSh+pa'i me tog bcas/_/lde gur sbyar ba me drod ji bzhin du/_/bsten na tshe ni
[\[280b.5\]]sbyin par byed pa dang /_/nad 'jig stobs skyed mdog ni gsal byed cing /_/me drod skad gsal yid gzhungs skyed par byed/_/bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba 'di dag las/_/shang ka puSh+pa'i sbyor 'di yi dag zhungs mchog_/ces bya ba la/_ma du ka par+Ni zhes bya ba bskol ba'i khu ba
[\[280b.6\]]'am/_shing mngar gyi phye ma 'am/_sle tres kyi phye ma 'am/_shang ka puSh+pa'i rtsa ba'i lde gu me drod ji lta ba bzhin du bsten na bcud kyis du 'gyur zhing /_tshe sbyin par byed pa la sogs pa yin no/_/bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba 'di dag las shang ka pushaSh+pa'i sbyor ba ni mchog tu yang yid
[\[280b.7\]]gzhungs par byed pa yin no/_/spangs ma pu tse shel dang pa ya s+ya/_/shing mngar thal tres tsan+dan 'bras bu gsum/_/shu dag tsha ba gsum dang ser po gnyis/_/pa to li'i rtsa rgyam tsha zhib tu btags/_/mar dang 'om bre ni bcu drug dang /_/shang ka baSh+pali bu bsum 'gyur bskol/_/
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]blud na glen pa'ang tshig la dbang 'gyur zhing /_/thos 'dzin spobs pa che zhing nad med 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_spangs ma la sogs pa de dag zhib tu btags la mar dang 'o ma bre bcu drug dang /_shang ka puSh+pa'i khu ba mar gyi sum 'gyur dang bskol te blud na skyes
[\[281a.2\]]bu blun po dag kyang tshig gsal zhing dag la dbang ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa dang /_nad med pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i rtsa ba sdong bu dang /_/ge sar nang gi sa bon rnams/_/gser bcas mar dang 'o ma ni/_/bre ni bcu drug nang du bskol/_/bang+ma lnga pa'i thig le zhes/_/sa steng dag du
[\[281a.3\]]grags pa yin/_/tshul bzhin bsten na skyes bu ni/_/nyams stobs zad pa 'phel bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_pad+ma'i rtsa ba la sogs pa tshul bzhin du bskol ba'i bcud kyis len ni ming pad+ma lnga pa zhes grags pa yin te/_de tshul bzhin du bsten na mchog tu skyes bu'i nyams stobs skyed
