[\[281a.4\]]par byed pa yin no/_/gang zhig ut+pal sdong bu lo/_/rtsa ba ge sar ldan bskol ba/_/ut+pal bzhi bar grags pa yin/_/gser dang bcas pa'i bcud len gyi/_/sbyor ba bsten na ba lang yang /_/yid gzhungs 'gyur na mir ci smos/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman mar gang ud+pa la'i sdong bu dang lo ma
[\[281a.5\]]dang rtsa ba dang ldan par bskol zhing gsar dang bcas pa sbyar ba'i bcud kyis len ni ut+pa la bzhi pa yin te/_de bsten na ba lang yang yid gzhungs shing blo dang ldan par 'gyur ba yin na/_mi skyes nas lta smos kyang ci dgos/_/pram+hi shu dag shang ka puSh+pa dang /_/rgyam tsha mang tsha k+Shar bi shal/_/
[\[281a.6\]]bram+hi so bar tsa la pi pi ling /_/re re nas ni gsum gsum tsam gyi tshad/_/gser ni nas gnyis dug ni til 'bru tsam/_/zhun mar srang gcig 'di dag zhib tu sbyar/_/legs par btang ste zhu bar gyur nas ni/_/mar bcas kha zas lo gcig bar du bsten/_/dran dang yid gzhungs blo ni
[\[281a.7\]]'phel 'gyur zhing /_/na dang rgas pa dang gad las 'das pa dang /_/snyom dang ngal dub sel byed lo brgyar 'tsho/_/dpal dang gzi brjid mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/_/khyad par du ni mdze nad sha bkra skran/_/dug dang dbyig dug rims dang smyo byed dang /_/sring skung rig byed sngags byas gshed
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]byed dang /_/rlung nad stobs chen 'dis ni zhi bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bra m+hi nas pi pi ling gi sman sna re re zhing nas gsum gyi tshad dang /_gser ni gnyis kyi tshad dang /_dug til 'bru gcig tsam dang /_zhun mar srang gcig ste/_de dag thams cad gcig tu sbyar nas zos te/_de zhu bar gyur
[\[281b.2\]]ba dang /_kha zas mar dang sbrang rtsi mang po zos la tshul de ltar lo gcig gi bar du bsten na dran pa dang /_/yid gzhungs pa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /_nad la sogs pa las 'das pa dang /_lo brgya tshang ba'i bar du 'tsho zhing dpal la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_khyad par
[\[281b.3\]]du yang bcud kyis len 'dis mdze la sogs pa sel bar byed pa dang /_de bzhin du srid srung gi rig byed las bshad pa'i cho gas gshed byed dang /_gnod pa'i las kyi sbyor ba byas pa dang /_rlung nad shin tu mi bzad pa dag kyang zhi bar byed pa yin no/_/nag pa la ston gyi tshe/_/skar ma rgyal
[\[281b.4\]]la bab par btu/_/de yi rtsa ba zho gnyis tsam/_/phyer btags 'o ma sbyar te btung /_/yang na mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/bldag cing zas med 'o mas 'tsho/_/de ltar lo gcig zos gyur na/_/lo brgyad 'tsho zhing stobs ldan 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_nag bal zhes bya ba'i sman ston gyi dus
[\[281b.5\]]la bab pa dang /_skar ma rgyal dang gza' zla ba la babs pa'i dus su btus te/_de'i rtsa ba zho gnyis tsam gyi phye ma 'o ma dang sbyar te btung ba'am/_yang na mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar te bldag cing 'o mas 'tsho bar byas te/_de ltar lo gcig gi nang du bsten na lo brgya'i bar du 'tsho ba dang /_stobs
[\[281b.6\]]shin tu che bar 'gyur ro/_/gze ma 'bras bu skyes pa rtsa bar bcas/_/grib mar skams te zhib tu btags nas ni/_/rang gi khu bar sbangs ba de las ni/_/che tshad khyor gang tsam du byas gyur gang /_/de dang 'o ma sbyar nas bza' bya zhing /_/zhu nas 'o ma srang ni nyis brgya zos/_/gzugs
[\[281b.7\]]bzang skal ldan lo brgya thub pa dang /_/'dod spyod khyu mchog ba lang tshogs gnas 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_gze ma 'bras bu skyes pa rtsa ba dang bcas pa grib mar skams te zhib tu btags pa'i phye ma rang gi khu ba'i nang du sbangs te/_gze ma de las che tshang rang gi khyor gang tsam ste srang
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]gnyis kyi tshad tsam yang 'o ma dang sbyar te/_bza' zhing longs spyod la/_sman de khu bar gyur nas 'o ma nyid srang nyis brgya dang /_'bras chan bsres bzos bar gyur na gzugs bzang ba la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing /_ji ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyi
[\[282a.2\]]nang na khyu mchog 'dod pa spyod pa dang 'dra bar 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro/_/bar hi yi sdong bu rlon pa ni/_/'o mar sbyar bzos shing 'o ma btung /_/zla gcig bar du kha zas 'o mas 'tsho/_/rgas pa'i tshogs las nges par rgyal 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman bar hi'i sdong bu rlon pa 'o ma dang
[\[282a.3\]]sbyar ba bsten cing zla ba gnyis pa la yang sdong bu de zas gzhan mi bza' bar 'o ma dang bcas par bsten na skyes bu de sbyor ba des rgas pa las nges par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na de yi sdod bu'i phye zhib mo/_rang gi khu ba dang ni legs sbyar te/_/mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu bza'/_/yang
[\[282a.4\]]na de bskol mar ni btung bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_yang na de'i sdong bu phye ma zhib mor btags la rang nyid bskol ba'i khu ba dang sbyar te/_ji skad smos pa'i lde gu'am/_sman mar zos na yang yon tan snga ma dang 'dra'o/_/de bzhin a ti bal bi da ri/_/shing mngar dang ni mon sne'u dme ru dang /_/
[\[282a.5\]]dzi ban ti dang ra sna a ru ra/_/sa la par+Ni sle tres skyu ru ra/_/shang ka puSh+pa man du ka par+Ni/_/a shwa gan+t+ha dang ni nye'u shing rnams/_/sbyar ba btang na yid gzhungs blo dang ni/_/rgas sran tshod brtan zhing stobs skyed byed /_/ces bya ba la/_de bzhin du a tib la la sogs pa yang bar ha'i sbyor ba
[\[282a.6\]]dang 'dra bar sman sna dang yang rung ba re re btang bar gyur na yid gzhungs pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/s+thi ra ni sa la pa r+Ni'o/_/man du ka pa r+Ni man du ki'o/_/gzhan ni go bar zad do/_/tsi tra ka yi me tog ni/_/ser bo dkar nag las shes bya/_/cho ga bzhin du bcud len sbyar/_/go
[\[282a.7\]]rims bzhin du yon tan che/_/zhes bya ba la/_tsi tra ka'i me te rnam pa gsum po ser po dang dkar po dang nag po ji lta ba bzhin du shes par byas la/_de bcud kyis len du sbyar na go rims ji lta na ba bzhin du yon tan che ba yin te/_me tog ser po can bas ni dkar po yon tan dang ldan la
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]dkar po bas ni nag po yon tan che ba yin no/_/de yi rtsa ba grib mar skam/_/phye mar bcas pa sbrang rtsi mar/_/'o ma chu dang zla gcig bar/_/brtul zhugs can gyis bsten byas la/_/phan pa'i zas ni za byed na/_/lo brgyar 'tsho zhing nad med la/_/yid gzhungs stobs dang mdangs ldan zhing /_/
[\[282b.2\]]lus rgyas me drod 'bar bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_tsi tra ka de'i rtsa ba'i phye ma mar dang sbrang rtsi gnyi ga'am/_'o ma'am/_chu dang bcas par zla ba gcig gi bar du bsten nas 'phrod pa'i zas zos na lo brgyar 'tsho ba la sogs pa'i yon tan skyed par 'gyur ro/_/til mar lde gu zla gcig par/_/
[\[282b.3\]]bsten na rlung nad gso dka' 'joms/_/gcin sbyar sha bkra mdze nad 'dzoms/_/dar bar sbyar bas gzhang 'brum sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_tsi tra ka de til mar dang bcas pa zla ba gcig gi bar du bsten na rlung nad mi bzad pa dag kyang sel bar byed la/_de gcin dang sbyar te zla ba gcig gi bar
[\[282b.4\]]du bsten na ni mdze dang sha bkra 'joms bar byed do/_/tsi tra ka dang sbyar te zla gcig gi bar bsten na ni gzhang 'brum sel bar byed do/_/go bye legs par smin pa ni/_/'bras kyi phung po'i nang du gzhug_/so ga'i tshe btus dgun tshe phyung /_/mngar zhing snum dang bsil ba yi/_/sman sbyar de
[\[282b.5\]]yi rdog ma brgyad/_/brgyad 'gyur chur ni bskol nas ni/_/khu ba de yi brgyad chu lus/_/'o ma sbyar ba grang mo btung /_/de rjes nyi ma re res bskyed/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig bar du ni/_/gsum gsum gyis bskyed de phan chad/_/bzhi bcu'i bar bskyed de 'og tu/_/
[\[282b.6\]]bskyed pa bzhin du dbri bar bya/_/bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du ni/_/stong gi bar du gtang bar bya/_/bdag nyid bsdams shing 'o ma mar/_/sA lu drug cu'i 'bras chan bza'/_/de bzhin dus ni sum 'gyur bya/_/de bzhin dus ni sum 'gyur bya/_/sbyong ba'i mtha' yang sbyad par bya/_/sngon gyi legs smon thob 'gyur zhing /_/khyad
[\[282b.7\]]bar du ni me drod skyed/_/gcin snyi srin bu gzhang 'brum mdze/_/tshil las gyur ba'i gzhang 'brum 'joms/_zhes bya ba la/_go bye zhes bya ba bse shing gi 'bras bu so ga'i dus su legs par smin zhing khu bcud yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa btus la 'bras kyi phung po'i nang du bcug ste/_/
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]de dgun gyi dus su phyung la ro mngar ba dang rang bzhin snum zhing bsil ba'i sman dang legs par sbyar te/_de'i rdog pa brgyad chu brgyad 'gyur gyi nang du bskol la khu ba brgyad cha lus par byas te/_de 'o ma dang sbyar ba grang mo btung zhing go bye rdog ma brgyad po de dag zhag bdun gyi
[\[283a.2\]]bar du rdog ma re res bskyed par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu go bye las nyi ma re zhing gsum gsum gyis bskyed la bzhi bcu'i bar du bskyed bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu go bye de sngar bskyed ba'i tshul gyi grangs dang 'dra bar gsum gsum gyis dbri zhing bsten par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu ni re res dbri bar bya'o/_/
[\[283a.3\]]tshul de ltar zhag bdun phrag bdun gyi bar du gtang zhing /_rdog ma stong gi bar du gtad bar bya'o/_/de'i tshe bdag nyid bsdams pa la sogs pa'i sbyod pa dang ldan par bya zhing sbyor ba'i mtha' yang spyod lam bsdams pa'i dus su ma 'gyur du byas la sngon gyi legs par smon pa tsi tra ka'i skabs su
[\[283a.4\]]bshad pa'i nad med pa dang /_yun ring du 'tsho ba la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur la/_khyad par du ni me drod bskyed pa dang /_gcin snyi ba la sogs pa'i nad 'joms pa yin no/_/go bye'i 'bras bu skyon med pa/_/brdungs shing zhi btu btags pa ni/_/bum par bcug ste sa nag
[\[283a.5\]]bskus/_/sa brkos pa yi nang du gzhug_/kun nas ba yi lci bas bskor/_/de sbyar me la btsos nas ni/_/de las 'dzag pa'i khu ba gang /_/blangs pa nyin zhag gzhan la ni/_/de yi brgyad 'gyur sbrang rtsi dang /_/nyis 'gyur mar dang sbyar ba ni/_/cho ga snga ma bzhin bsdams te/_/bsten na yon
[\[283a.6\]]tan de nyid thob/_/ces bya ba la/_go bye'i 'bras bu skyon med par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba byas la de tshul bzhin du btsos la/_de las khu ba gang zhig 'dzag pa de nyi ma gnyis pa la blangs la/_rang gi khu ba de'i brgyad 'gyur gyi sbrang rtsi dang nyis 'gyur gyi mar dang sbyar te/_cho ga snga ma bzhin
[\[283a.7\]]du bsdams pa dang bcas pas bsten na yang skyes bu de sngar bshad pa'i yon tan de nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/go bye'i 'bras bu smin te lhung gyur pa/_/bre bzhi'i tshad tsam dang ni so phag dang /_/bdar ba'i phye ma dag dang chu dang mnye/_/bkrus te rlung la legs par bskams nas ni/_/brdungs te chu
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]bre bcu drug nang du bskol/_/bzhi cha lus pa btsags te bsgrangs pa yi/_/khu ba de dang 'o ma bre bcu drug_/bskol te bzhi cha lus par gyur ba dang /_/de dang mnyam pa'i zhun mar bcas pa rab skol/_/de'i nang kha ra'i phye ma ci ran gzhug_/de ni gzar bus dkrugs pas gcig tu gyur/_/
[\[283b.2\]]'bras kyi phung bor zhag bdun legs par sba/_/bdud rtsi 'dra ba de bsten skyes bu gang /_/chu 'am 'o ma sha khu 'thung gyur na/_/dran dang yid gzhungs blo gros stobs dang ldan/_/snying stobs dang ldan gser gyi mdog dang 'dra/_/tshe ring ba yang des ni 'thob bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/go bye
[\[283b.3\]]smin par gyur nas/_/rang nyid lhung bar gyur pa bre bzhi tsam so phag bdar ba'i phye ma dang /_chu dang bcas par mnyes la/_yang slar chur bkrus la rlung la skams pa gtun gyi nang du brdungs te/_ji skad smos pa bzhin du bskol la/_de'i nang du kha ra'i phye ma rang nyid ji tsam 'dod pa bcug ste/_/
[\[283b.4\]]de dkrugs la zhag bdun gyi bar du 'bras kyi phung por sbas la/_skyes bu gang gis bdud rtsi bza' ba lta bu'i sman mar de bsten la de'i 'og tu chu la sogs pa gang yang rung ba 'thungs na/_de dran ba la sogs pa 'thob bar 'gyur ro/_chu bre bcu drug nang du go bye ni/_/sum brgya bskol te bzhi
[\[283b.5\]]cha lus pa ru/_/til mar srang bzhi der ni bcu gnas kyang /_/tig ta bong nga gnyis dang 'bras bu gsum/_/brag zhun skyer shun da lis phye ma gdab/_/bskol na mdze nad ma las 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_chu bre bcu drug gi nang du bser shing gi 'bras bu gsum brgya ji skad smos pa bzhin
[\[283b.6\]]du bskol ba'i sman mar ni mdze nad thams cad 'joms par byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/go bye skyu ru ra 'am tsha'am ni/_/zho yi sbris ma til mar 'o ma'am/_/bu ram 'o thug mar ram sbrad rtsi'am/_/nas zan dag gam til btags lde gur byas/_/sran tshod dag dang lhan cig sbyar ba ni/_/lus rgyas yid
[\[283b.7\]]gzhungs tshe ring byed mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_go bye sgyu ru ra dang bcas pa tsha la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang /_lde gur byas la/_sran mung+ga 'i tshod ma dang bcas pa lhan cig sbyar te bsten pa yang lus rgyas par byed pa la sogs ba'i mchog yin no/_/go bye'i 'bras bu rnon po ni
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]smin pa me dang 'drar gyur pa/_/cho ga bzhin du sbyar ba ni/_/bdud rtsi dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_go bye'i 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis rno ba dang de bzhin du smin cing tshos pa me dang 'dra ba cho ga ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bsten cing sbyad par gyur na bdud rtsi dang 'dra bar
[\[284a.2\]]yon tan che ba yin no/_/bse shing 'bras bu ma bcos pa'i/_/bad kan da dang nad rnying ni/_/'brel pa gang yin de med cing /_/me yi drod kyang myur du skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_gang bse shing gi 'bras bu bsten na des ma bcos pa'i bad kan gyi nad dam nad rnying pa dang rjes su 'brel zhing yun ring du
[\[284a.3\]]lon pa'i nad gang yang med cing me drod shin tu skyed pa yin no/_/rlung dang tsha bar 'dug pa ni/_/khyad par du ni spang bya zhing /_/rgya sran zho dang tsha dang ni/_/til mar bsku dang me bsten spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_bse shing gi 'bras bu bsten par byed pa na rlung dang nyi tshan la sogs pa spang bar bya zhing khyad par du
[\[284a.4\]]rgya sran la sogs pa spang bar bya'o/_/du ba ra yi shing zhes bya/_/nub phyogs rgyam tsho'i ngos nas skye/_/chu rlabs g.yo bas bskyod pa dang /_/rlung gis lo ma g.yengs pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing du ba ra zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi rgyam tsho'i ngogs na skye ba yod de/_de ni chu rlabs g.yo bas
[\[284a.5\]]bskyod bal sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa yin no/_/de yi 'bras bu dbyar gyi tshe/_/legs par smin pa btu bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_du bar de'i 'bras bu shin tu legs par smin pa dbyar gyi tshe btu zhing blang bar bya'o/_/'bras bu de las rkang phyung nas/_/bskams te phye mang btags nas
[\[284a.6\]]ni/_/til bzhin pa tsir bar bya ba'am/_/le brgan me tog bzhin du bskol/_/zhes bya ba la/_shing de'i 'bras bu las rkang phyung ste bskams la btags nas gtun la til bzhin du btsir bar bya ba'am le brgan rtsi bzhin du bskol la/_mar dbyung bar bya'o/_/de yi mar bsags gyur pa
[\[284a.7\]]ni/_/chung zad pa yi bar du bskol/_/phab ste ba yi lci ba yi/_/nang du zla phyed tsam du gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_de'i mar bsags par bya ba ni chung ngu'i bar du bskol bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu phab la ba'i lci ba'i nang du zla ba phyed kyi bar du gzhag par bya'o/_/de 'og de las phyung nas ni/_/
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]snum zhing dugs byas dri ma bsal/_/zas kyi dus ni bzhi chod par/_/nang par zho gnyis tsam zhig btung /_/mar de nyi ma shes pa la/_/sngags 'di yis ni dag par bya/_/rkang pa gnyis po brtson pa che/_/lus zungs thams cad skyod byed par/_/'khor lo dbyig pa dung thogs la/_/mi
[\[284b.2\]]'pho bas ni khyod lab sgo/_/de gang 'di yi nad steng dang /_/'og gi nad ni du ma sel/_/dgongs ka snum dang lan tshwar bcas/_/nas thag grang mo btung bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de la de'i 'og tu phyung la dang por snum dang dugs byas la dri ma'i tshogs bsal te zas kyi dus bzhi bzhis chod pa'i
[\[284b.3\]]dus su nang par gyi dus su zho gnyis gnyis kyi tshad tsam btung la/_btung ba de yang nyin zhag shis pa la/_rkang ba gnyis po brtson pa che/_/zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi tshigs bcad bzlas la btung bar bya'o/_/mar de sbyar bas skyes bu de'i nad steng dang 'og tu gtogs pa sal bar byed do/_/de
[\[284b.4\]]ltar sman 'thungs nas dgongs ka'i snum dang lan tshwar bcas pa'i nas thug grang mo btung bar bya'o/_/mar de zhag lnga'i bar du btung /_/spang bar bya ba thams cad spang /_/zla phyed mud ga'i khu ba btung /_/mdze nad kun las thar bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul de ltar mar de zhag lnga'i bar
[\[284b.5\]]du btung bar bya zhing zas skom dang sbyod lam la sogs pa spang bar bya ba dang /_zla ba phyed kyi bar du mon sran sde'u'i khu ba 'thung san mdze'i nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid seng ldeng khu ba ni/_/sum 'gyur dang ni legs par bskol/_/snga ma bzhin du zla
[\[284b.6\]]phyed bzhag_/legs par bsdams te zla gcig btung /_/de yis lus ni bsku ba dang /_/ji skad bshad pa'i zas zos pa'i/_/sbyor ba 'di yis myur du ni/_/mdze can mi ni gso bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mar de nyid seng ldeng gi khu ba sum 'gyur dang legs par bskol ba ji skad smos
[\[284b.7\]]pa bzhin du bzhag ste/_zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungs na yang ji skad smos pa'i yon tan thob bar 'gyur zhing /_khyad par du sbyor ba 'dis mdzes btab pa'i nad pa gso par bya'o/_/de nyid seng ldeng med par ni/_/zhun mar sbrang rtsi ldan par btung /_/zla phyed bar du sha khu btung /_/
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]lo ni nyis brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_du ba ra'i mar de nyid seng ldeng gi khu ba med par zhun mar dang bskol te sbrang rtsi btab pas zla ba phyed kyi bar du bsten zhing sha khu 'thungs na de lo nyis brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/de nyid zhag ni lnga bcu'i bar/_/sna sman du ni btang gyur
[\[285a.2\]]na/_/lus rgyas thos pa 'dzin pa dang /_/lo ni sum brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman mar de nyid zhag lnga bcu'i bar du sna sman btang na lus rgyas ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/pi pi ling ni pa la sha'o/_/thal chur spangs shing mar dang brngos/_/rdog ma gsum gsum snga dro dang /_/
[\[285a.3\]]zas kyi sngon du bza' bar bya/_/bcud len yon tan 'dod pa yis/_/sbyar rtsi dang ni sbyar te bza'/_/zhes bya ba la/_pi pi ling gi rdog ma lnga 'am brgyad dam bdun nang bcu mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bcud kyis len 'dod pas cho ga bzhin du lo gcig gi bar du spyad par bya'o/_/pi pi ling de
[\[285a.4\]]nyid pa la sha zhes bya ba rgya skyegs shing king shu ka'i thal ba btsags pa'i chur spangs la mar dang brngos brdog ma gsum ni snga dro/_gsum ni zas zos pa'i sngon du sbrang rtsi dang bcas par bza' bar bya ste/_de ni bcud kyis len gyi yon tan du 'gyur ro/_/pi pi ling bcu nyin re bzhin/_/rom gyis
[\[285a.5\]]bskyed par gyur pa dag_/de bzhin 'o mar sbyar te bza'/_/de bzhin du ni dbri bar bya/_/sman zhu nas ni drug cu pa'i/_/'bras chan 'o ma mar bcas bza'/_/pi pi ling ni stong gi bar/_/btang na 'di ni bcud len 'gyur/_/stobs dang ldan la de btags sbyin/_/stobs dbri ba la
[\[285a.6\]]bskol te blud/_/ces bya ba la/_nyin re zhing pi pi ling bcu bcus rim gyis bskyed de zhag bcu'i bar du 'o ma dang lhan cig bza' bar bya la/_de bzhin du zhag bcu'i bar du bcu bcus dbri zhing 'o ma dang bcas bar bsten par bya'o/_/des na 'di skad ston te/_de nas zhag dang po la ni pi pi
[\[285a.7\]]ling bcu 'o ma dang sbyar te gtang bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa la ni nyi shu/_gsum pa la ni sum cu/_de nas zhag bcu ba la brgya'i bar du bskyed cing 'o ma dang bcas par bza' la/_de nas ni rim bzhin du dbri bar bya ste/_de nas zhag bcu gcig ba la dgu bcu/_zhag bcu gnyis
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]pa la brgyad cu nas zhag bcu dgu pa la bcu'i bar bza' ste/_de ltar na stong tshang bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba 'di la sman zhu nas 'o ma dang zhun mar dang drug cu pa'i 'bras chan dang bcas par bza' ste/_'di ni pi pi ling stong gi bcud len zhes bya'o/_/pi pi ling de mi nyams stobs chen po
[\[285b.2\]]dang ldan pa la ni btags pa'i phyi ma sbyin bar bya la/_stobs bar ma dag la ni bskol te blud par bya'o/_/de bzhin ra yi 'o ma dang /_/nyis stong gi ni bar du gtang /_/zhes bya ba la/_de bzhin du ra'i 'o ma dang pi pi ling du bcas par bskyed dbri snga ma bzhin du byas te nyis stong gi bar du
[\[285b.3\]]yang gtang bar bya'o/_/pi pi ling gi sbyor ba 'dis/_/lud pa dbugs mi bde mgul nad/_/gcong chen gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad/_/gcin snyi skya rbab mi bzad rims/_/'or nad slon dang sgyigs bu dang /_/mdzer pa dreg nad 'joms par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bshad ma
[\[285b.4\]]thag pa'i pi pi ling gi sbyor ba 'dis ni lud pa dreg nad kyi bar du 'joms bar byed do/_/pi pi ling ni srang phyed lde gur byas/_/lcags kyi snod bskrus nas ni nub gcig bzhag_/de dang chu ni snyim gang nang bar btung /_/lo gcig bza' btung sbyod pa ci 'dod bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_pi pi
[\[285b.5\]]ling srang phyed lde gur byas pas lcags kyi snod bskus te mtshan mo bzhag la de nang par chu snyim pa gang dang bcas par 'thungs nas/_lo gcig gi bar du bsten zhing bza' btung ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyad par bya'o/_/bca' sga sle tres shing mngar byi dang ga_/ba la a ti ba la 'bras bu
[\[285b.6\]]gsum/_/gla spang thang shing yung ba a ga ru/_/mu zi pad+pa ut+pal kru drug tres/_/da ta a shwa kar+Na a sa na/_/ba la'i lo ma'am snying bo de bzhin du/_/pi pi ling bzhin lcags snod bsku sogs bya/_/lo brgya 'tsho zhing rgas dang nad las thar/_/'o ma snyim gang gi ni bcud len sman/_/
[\[285b.7\]]sbyar ba 'di yis lcags snod bskus bas ni/_/sngar bshad yon tan bas kyang lhag bskyed cing /_/tshe yang de las nyis 'gyur skyed bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_bca' sga la sogs pa pi pi ling gi cho ga bzhin du bsten par byas pas kyang lo brgyar 'cho ba la sogs pa dang /_lcags kyi snod
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]la pi pi ling bskus pa'i sbyor bas yon tan che zhing tshe yang de'i nyis 'gyur gyis 'phel bar byed do/_/a san dang seng ldeng gi_/khu bar so ma ra dza sbangs/_/sbrang rtsi ru rta mar dang ni/_/a ru ra dang lcags phyer bcas/_/lde gu lo gcig bar zos na/_/rgas
[\[286a.2\]]dang mi 'phrod zos pa las/_/nad ni yongs su 'dor bar byed/_/ces bya ba la/_a sa na dang seng ldeng bskol ba'i khu bar so ma ra dza spangs pa sbrang rtsi dang bcas lde gu mis lo gcig gi bar du bsten na rgas ba dang kha zas mi 'phrod bzos pa las nad du gyur pa yongs su 'dir bar
[\[286a.3\]]byed do/_/mdze nad mi bzad pa yis ni/_/lus nyen gyur pa gang yin pas/_/so ma ra dza til nag gnyis/_/lo gcig bar du bsten na ni/_/de ni zla rgyas lta bur 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mdze nad mi bzad pas thebs par gyur pa gang yin pa des so ma ra dza dang til nag po gnyis
[\[286a.4\]]lo gcig gi bar du bsten na de'i lus zla ba lta bur 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig so ma ra dza sbun pa med/_/btags pa 'o ma lhan cig zhor mnan pa'i/_/snying po phyung la sbrang rtsi'i lde gu bldags/_/de rjes de nyid kyi ni dar ba btung /_/mdze yi nad kyis yan lag nyams pa dang /_/sna
[\[286a.5\]]chad sor mo 'brul ba la sogs pa/_/shing bcad rjes la ljon shing skye ba ltar/_/de ni nges par skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang zhig so ma ra dza spun ba med pa la sogs pa'i sbyor bas de'i snying po mar sar phyung la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba ldags par gyur nas/
[\[286a.6\]]de'i rjes la dar ba de nyid 'thungs na mdze nad kyis sna chad cing sor mo 'brul ba la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang ldan par gyur pa yang sna dang sen mo la sogs pa mdzes par skye ste/_dper na shing bcad pa las ljon shing skyes pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/sgra gcan bdud rtsi brkus ba na/_/ske bcad
[\[286a.7\]]pa las 'dzag gyur pa'i/_/bdud rtsi'i thigs pa sar ltung ba/_/sgog skya nyid du gyur ba yin/_/lha min lus las byung bas na/_/de phyir bram zes de mi bza'/_/zhes bya ba la/_sgra gcan 'dzin gyis bdud rtsi brkus par gyur nas khyab 'jug gis ske bcad par gyur pa na bdud rtsi'i
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]thigs pa des la lhung pa na sgog skya nyid du gyur pa yin la/_de bas na sgog skya de ni lha ma yin gyi lus las byung ba yin pa'i phyir bram ze dag mi za'o/_/mngon du bdud rtsi las byung bas/_/de ni bcud kyis len mchog yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_sgog skya de ni bdud rtsi las mngon sum du byung
[\[286b.2\]]ba yin pa'i phyir bcud kyis len thams cad kyi yang mchog yin no/_/grang ba'i dus na'ang sgog skya bsten/_/dpyid dus bad kan shas cher bza'/_/sos ka'i dus su'ang sbyad bya zhing /_/dbyar ni rlung gis gzir tshe bza'/_/dgun ni snum zhing bsil ba dang /_/mngar bas nye bar
[\[286b.3\]]bsres ba dang /_/de ni phreng ba rgyan dag dang /_/'khor dang lhan cig bsten bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi lus snum zhing bsil ba dang mngar bar bsres la grang ba'i dus dgun stod dang /_dgun sman na ni sgog skya bsten par bya la/_de bzhin du dpyid kyi tshe la sogs pa'i tshe na yang phreng
[\[286b.4\]]ba la sogs pa'i longs sbyong thams cad du bsten par bya'o/_/de yi lde gu dpyid kyi tshe /_/kha ba can gyi yul skyes pa/_/shun pa bshus nas mtshan mo ni/_/chang sogs la ni sbrang bar bya/_/de yi khu ba nang par ni/_/ras ni gtsang mas btsags nas kyang /_/chang ni legs par langs
[\[286b.5\]]gyur pa/_/cha gsum dang ni sbyar ba 'am/_/chang gzhan dag gam til mar ram/_/rang skyur ram zho ga chu/_/de tshe nyid sbyar nang bar ni/_/tshad dang ldan par sbyin bya zhing /_/'o ma zhun mar zhag dang rkang /_/skam sa'i sha khu so sor ni/_/bskol ba nad gzhi ji bzhin blud /_/
[\[286b.6\]]yang na sman khu 'ba' zhig blud/_/dang por mkhur gang tsam 'thungs na/_/mid pa'i spubs ni dag par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_sgog skya de'i lde gu dpyid kyi tshe ni ji skad smos pa bzhin du btsags pa'i khu ba chang ba gsum mam/_chang gzhan nam/_til mar la sogs pa gang yang
[\[286b.7\]]rung ba'i cha gsum dang btung ba de nyi tshe sbyar la/_tshad dang ldan par byas te/_'o ma la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang /_nad gzhi ji lta ba la blud bar bya ba 'am/_yang sgog skya'i khu ba 'ba' zhig blud pa la sogs pas kyang mid pa'i spubs dag par byed do/_rgyun du blugs pa'i dugs
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]byas na/_/na zhing zug pa dag la phan/_/zhes bya ba la/_sgog skya rang gi khu ba rgyun du blugs pa'i dugs byas na na zhing zug pa la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do/_/skyug cing brgyal ba'i nad la ni/_/'phral du chu grang dag kyang blud/_/ces bya ba la/_/skyug pa la
[\[287a.2\]]sogs pa la ni 'phral du chu grang la sogs pa blud par bya'o/_/ngal ba med cing lus kyi ni/_/gzi mdangs brtan pas lhag ma spyin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/ngal ba la sogs pa la ni sgog skya btsir ba'i lhag ma sbyin par bya'o/_/tsha ba bsal bar bya ba'i phyir/_/shin tu bsil bas bsku bya
[\[287a.3\]]zhing /_/mu tig ga bur phreng ba can/_/chu thigs phre'u bsten par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_lus tsha ba bsal ba'i phyir ni sgog skya'i khu ba bsil sman la sogs pa'i chu dang bcas pa blud par bya'o/_/'di yi tshad che na phul gang ste/_/nyi tshe la ni de yi phyed/_/ces bya ba la/_/sgog skya 'di'i
[\[287a.4\]]khu ba'i tshad chen po ni phul gang ste/_srang brgyad yin la/_sman gyi sbyor ba gzhan med pa ni srang bzhi ste bsten par bya'o/_/sgog skya srang gcig btags pa ni/_/zas dang bcas pa'ang bsten par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/sgog skya btags pa srang gcig zas dang bcas pa bsten par bya la/_/
[\[287a.5\]]'ang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni zas med bar yang bsten ba'i don do/_/zhu nas sA lu rnying pa'i chan/_/dung dang kun da ltar dkar ba/_/yu sha 'o ma skam sa yi/_/sha khu dang ni lhan cig bza'/_/zhes bya ba la/_sman de zhu nas 'bras sA lu rnying pa'i chan la sogs pa bza' bar bya'o/_/skom
[\[287a.6\]]par gyur na chang dang ni/_/chur sbyar ba ni blud par bya/_/chang mi btung na rang skyur ram/_/rgun 'bru'i chu ni blud bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te gnas skabs der skom par gyur na/_chang chur sbyar ba btung bar bya la/_chang spangs pa yin na ni rgun 'bru'i chu 'am rang skyur blud
[\[287a.7\]]par bya'o/_/de yi lde gu mar dar bcas/_/mar ni snod du gzar bus dkrug_/zhag bcu gzhag gam de bzhin du/_/zhag dang mnyam sbyar sbyad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_sgog skya de'i lde gu mar dang bcas pa ji skad smos pa'i sbyor bas spyad par bya'o/_/sgog skya shun pa bshus
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]ba'i snying po ni/_/sreg sha dag gam bza' ba sna tshogs sam/_/sha gtubs pa'am mar dang tshar bcas bza'/_/kha zas nyung ba ci 'dod sbyad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/yang sgog skya shun pa bshus bde sreg sha la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig bza' zhing 'dod par
[\[287b.2\]]logs sbyad par bya'o/_/khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad ni ma gtogs pa/_/nad gzhi ma lus ldan par 'gyur ba 'am/_/rlung nas nyi tshe dang ni ldan gyur la/_/sgog pa las lhag sman gzhan yod ma yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_khrag dang mkhris pa med pa'i rlung nad dam/_/yang na rlung
[\[287b.3\]]nad 'ba' zhig la ni sman gyi mchog sgog skya 'ba' zhig yin no/_/chu dang bu ram 'o ma sred /_/sha chang skyur la mi dga' zhing /_/ma zhu ba ni spong mi nus/_/sgog skye nges par gnod ba skyed/_/ces bya ba la/_/mi chu dang bu ram la sred par gyur cing sha dang chang dang skyur la ni sred pa med par gyur ba
[\[287b.4\]]dag ma zhu ba'i nad sel zhing sbong bar mi nus pa dag la ni sgog skya nges par gnod pa skyed par 'gyur ro/_/mkhris ba ldang ba'i 'jigs pa yi/_/tha mar bkru sman 'jam po gtang /_/de ltar bcud len yon tan ni/_/yongs su rdzogs pa thob bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_sgog
[\[287b.5\]]skya bsten pa dag gis mkhris pa'i nad ldang bar dogs na/_sman btang ba'i tha mar bkru sman gtang bar bya ste/_des ni bcud kyis len gyi yon tan rdzogs pa kho nar 'gyur ro/_/so ga'i tsha bas gsungs drags las/_/rgya skyegs khu ba ltar 'dzag gang /_/gser sogs 'byung
[\[287b.6\]]khungs drug gi bcud/_/de ni brag zhun zhes byar bshad/_/ces bya ba la/_so ga'i dus su brag nyi ma tsha bas gdungs pa las gser la sogs pa 'byung khungs kyi khams drug gi bcud rgya skyegs kyi khu ba zhu ba ltar 'dzag par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni ming brag zhun zhes bya'o/_/de ni
[\[287b.7\]]kun kyang kha zhing tsha/_/shas cher me drod zhu rjes tsha/_/gcod par byed de de la ni/_/lcags las byung ba rab tu bsngags/_/zhes bya ba la/_/brag zhun de thams cad kyang ro ni kha la nus pa ni shin tu bro ba ma yin la zhu rjes ni tsha ba dang gcod par byed pa yin te/_de dag la lcags kyi
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]khams las byung ba ni shin tu yang bsngags pa yin no/_/ba gcin dri bro gnag pa dang /_/gu gul 'dra zhing gseg ma med/_/sbyin bag snum zhing skyur ba dang /_/bsku zhing 'jam la lci ba yi/_/brag zhan de ni mchog yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_/brag
[\[288a.2\]]zhun gang dri ni ba gcin dang 'dra la/_kha dog ni gnag pa mtshan nyid gu gul 'dra zhing rdo phye'i gseg ma med pa mnyes na sbyin bag tu 'dug cing snum pa ro skyur zhing bska ba rang bzhin 'jam zhing lci bas de ni brag zhun kyi dam pa yin no/_/nad dang nad pa rjes mthun par/_/sman dang brag
[\[288a.3\]]zhun cha mnyam byas/_/lcags kyi snod du sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_brag zhun de nad pa dang nad pa'i goms pa'i tshul gang dag yin pa shes par byas la lcags kyi snod du sbyar bar bya'o/_/dang por chu ni nyi ches bkru/_/de 'og bskams la bskol dang bsre/_/zhes bya ba la/_/
[\[288a.4\]]brag zhun de dang por ni chu 'ba' zhig gis bkrus la/_de'i 'og tu bskams te bskol ba dang bsre bar bya'o/_/brag zhun sman dang mnyam byas la/_/brgyad cha'i nang du bskol bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_bsres pa'i brag zhun gyi 'phrod kyi sman dang brag zhun cha mnyam par byas la chu de'i
[\[288a.5\]]brgyad 'gyur gyi nang du bskol bar bya'o/_/de la gal te brag zhun srang gcig dang sbyar na de'i 'phrod kyi sman yang srang gcig la sbyar la de chu brgyad 'gyur dang bskol bar bya'o/_/khu ba brgyad cha lus btsags pa/_/dro 'jam nang du brag zhun gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_khu ba
[\[288a.6\]]bskol ba de brgyad cha lus pa dang btsags pa dro 'jam tsam gyi nang du brag zhun gzhug par bya'o/_/de dang 'dres gyur bskams nas ni/_/sman chu'i nang du slar yang gzhug_/ces bya ba la/_brag zhun 'dres par gyur te de bskams nas slar yang gzhug par bya'o/_/de ltar rang rang
[\[288a.7\]]sman 'phrod ni/_/bskol ba'i khu bar lan bdun spangs/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul de ltar rang gi sman 'phrod pa'i khu ba dang lan bdun gyi bar du sbangs shing bsre bar bya'o/_/de nas tig ta'i sman mar gyis/_/snum chos byas nas sbyar byas te/_/'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang /_/
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]shing mngar pa to la'i khu ba/_/brag zhun dag ni re re yang /_/zhag gsum bar du blud par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas de ltar snum chos byas pa'i mi de la tig ta'i sman mar zhag gsum gyi bar du sbyin par bya'o/_/de bzhin du brag zhun dang /_'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba
[\[288b.2\]]dang /_shing mngar gyi khu ba dang /_pa to la'i khu ba zhag gsum gyi bar du blud par bya'o/_/de nas de la sbyor ba ni/_/dus dang sbyar te blud bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_de nas mi de la 'tshams shing 'os pa'i sbyor ba dus dang sbyar te sman pas blud par bya'o/_/de ltar brag zhun mi rnams
[\[288b.3\]]la/_shin tu phan par byed pa yin/_/yon tan ma lus skyed byed cing /_/'phral du gnod par mi bye 'do/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul de ltar brag zhun bsten zhing goms par byed pa dag ni shin tu phan par byed pa yin la/_de bzhin du bcud kyis len gyi yon tan ma lus pa yang skyed
[\[288b.4\]]par byed la/_'phral du de'i mod la gnod pa yang skyed par mi byed pa yin no/_/zhag bdun phrag gcig phrag gsum dang /_/phrag bdun zho gnyis srang phyed gcig_/dman dang bar ma chen po yi/_/brag zhun go rims bzhin du sbyar/_/zhes bya ba la/_/brag zhun zhag bdun
[\[288b.5\]]phrag gcig dang /_tshad zho gnyis ni dman pa'i tshad yin no/_/zhag bdun phrag bdun dang srang gcig ni phyed tshad yin no/_/lus ni shin tu sbyangs byas la/_/brag zhun sbyangs la gtang bar bya/_/zangs dang lcags dang dngul dang gser/_/kun dang yang na re rer sbyar/_/'o ma dang
[\[288b.6\]]ni lhan cig gtang /_/bcud len 'bras bu myur du 'grub/_/ces bya ba la/_brag zhun ni lus shin tu sbyangs par gyur pa la brag zhun legs par sbyangs shing btul ba gtang bar bya la/_de bzhin du zangs la sogs par sna re'am/_kun dang yang sbyar bar bya zhing 'o ma dang lhan cig
[\[288b.7\]]btang na bcud kyis len gyi 'bras bu gang dag yin 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/rgya sran mon sne'u dme ru dang /_/phug ron sha ni rtag tu spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_brag zhun gyi sbyor ba bsten ba'i dus su rgya sran la sogs pa rtag tu spang bar bya'o/_/gang zhig brag zhun gyis ni mngon sum du
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]ma bsal nad ni sa steng yod ma yin/_/dus su cho ga bzhin du bsten gyur na/_/nad me nyams stobs rgya chen skyed par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_/mi yul sa steng 'di na brag zhun gyi sman gyis mngon du ma bcom pa'i nad ni yod pa ma yin la/_de bzhin
[\[289a.2\]]du de'i cho ga bzhin du bsten na nad med pa la sogs pa'i yon tan skyed par byed do/_/khang par gnas pa'i khom ldan can/_/phun sum tshogs dang ldan la phan/_/de las gzhan du de rnams la/_/nyi ma rlung gi tshe na bsten/_/zhes bya ba la/_khang par gnas pa la sogs
[\[289a.3\]]pa khom ldan yod cing 'khor dang yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa la ni phan par gyur pa yin la/_de las gzhan pa ste/_khang par gnas pa la sogs pa'i khom ldan med pa la ni nyi ma dang rlung la gnas pa'i tshul gyis bsten na phan par 'gyur ro/_/rlung dang nyi tshan bcas
[\[289a.4\]]sbyor ba/_/bde ba'i longs sbyod med na yang /_/gang zhig lus la mi gnod pa/_/mchog tu de ni bshad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_da ni rlung dang nyi tshan dang bcas par yang bsten du rung ba'i sbyor ba bde ba'i longs spyod las nyams su zin kyang lus la gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i
[\[289a.5\]]sbyor ba'i mchog de bshad par bya'o/_/chu grang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang /_/mar ni re re gnyis gnyis dang /_/gsum mam yang na thams cad dang /_/zas sngar 'thungs na rgas sra byed/_/ces bya ba la/_chu grang la sogs pa re re 'am/_gnyis gnyis sam/_gsum mam/
[\[289a.6\]]bzhi char kun zas kyi sngar 'thungs na yang rgas sra bar byed do/_/bu ram sbrang rtsi bca' sga dang /_/pi pi ling ngam rgyam tsha dang /_/a ru ra ni gnyis gnyis dag_/rtag zos bde zhing lo brgyur 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_bu ram la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang /_a ru ra gnyis
[\[289a.7\]]gnyis rtag tu zos na yang mi de lo brgya'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/a ru ra ni mar nang bsros/_/bza' zhing mar de 'thungs na ni/_/rgas sra lus ni yun ring gnas/_/stobs ni 'phel bar byed 'gyur te/_/ji ltar dam pa byas gzo ba/_/lan cig phan gdags ji lta
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]bzhin/_/zhes bya ba la/_a ru ra mar gyi nang du bsros te bza' ba dang bsros pa'i mar de 'thungs par gyur na lus rgas sra ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar byas pa gzo ba'i mi la phan btags na de'i mi brjed par sems la 'jog pa dang 'dra'o/_/skyu ru ra'i khu sbrang rtsi dang /_/
[\[289b.2\]]kha ra mar dang lde gur byas/_/bsten zhing 'phrod nga za ba'i mi/_/rga ba'i gnod pa 'jig 'gyur te/_/nyes bsrung bsten bcos rgya chen mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_/skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dang kha ra lde gur byas pa zas shing kha zas 'phrod pa la bsten pa'i mi rgas
[\[289b.3\]]pa'i gnod pa gang yin par de 'jig par 'gyur te/_ji ltar bstan bcos rgya chen po legs par bzung nas brjed du mi rung bar 'gyur ba dang mtshungs so/_/skyu ru ra dang byi dang ga_/a sa na yi snying po phye/_/lcags phye til mar sbrang rtsi yi/_/mar bcas lde gu bsten na ni/_/
[\[289b.4\]]na tshod mdzes pa ma nyams 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_skyu ru ra la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin bsten yang na tshod mdzes pa la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/lcags phye byi dang ga yi bye ma dang /_/mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa lo gcig tsam/_/a sa na yi za ma tog nang gzhug
[\[289b.5\]]bsten na stobs ldan tshe ring skra gnag 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/lcags nag po'i phyi ma la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin du bsten na yang tshe ring zhing skra gnag par 'gyur ro/_/byi dang ga dang go bye bca' sga rnams/_/mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa gang gis zos/_/rgas pa'i chu bo
[\[289b.6\]]nad kyi rba rlabs can/_/na tshod ldan pa'i skyes bu de rgal 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_mi gang byi dang ga la sogs pa'i lde gu zos ba de ni na tshod dar la bab pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /_rgas pa'i chu bo'i rba rlabs las nges par rgal bar 'gyur ro/_/seng ldeng a sa na yi khu ba dang /_/
[\[289b.7\]]'bras bu gsum dang sbrang rtsi mar sbyar ba/_/cho ga bzhin du bsten pa'i mi rnams ni/_/tshe ring 'gyur ba 'di las ngo mtshar med/_/ces bya ba la/_seng ldeng la sogs pa'i lde gu bsten na yang nges par tshe ring bar 'gyur ba yin no/_/dzi ba ka yi khu ba sor mor chags/_/kha ra
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]sbrang rtsi mar dang 'bras bu gsum/_/skyes bu dam pas bsten par gyur na ni/_/rgas dang nad ni nges par bzlog par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_dzi ba ka zhes bya ba a sa na'i khu ba la sogs pa'i lde gu bsten na yang rgas pa la sogs pa'i 'tshe ba med
[\[290a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/ba sbru ba ni sar pa srad phyed dang /_/'o mar btags pa zla phyed zla ba gnyis/_/zla drug lo gcig bar du 'thungs na ni/_/rgas shing rnying pa'ang slar ni gzhon par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la ba sbru ba zhes bya ba pu r+Na ba srang phyed btags pa zla ba phyad dam gnyis sam drug gam lo gcig gi bar du 'o ma dang
[\[290a.3\]]sbyar te 'thungs na rgas shing 'khogs de slar gzhon pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/mur ba ang shu ma ti pri ha ti/_/ba la pu shel tse dang pa ta dang /_/a sa na dang thal tres a ka ru/_/pri yang ku dang tsan+dan re re yi/_/cho ga 'ang ba spru ba dang mtshungs pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_mur ba la
[\[290a.4\]]sogs pa sman sna re re zhing yang ba sbru ba'i cho ga bzhin bsten na yon tan de dang mtshungs pa yin no/_/nye'u shing lde gu khu bar bskol ba dang /_/zhun mar kha rar bcas pa za byed pa/_/de ni 'tsho ba'i lam du zhugs gyur tshe/_/nad kyi rkun pos choms par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba la/
[\[290a.5\]]nye'u shing gi lde gu dang khu ba bskol ba'i sman mar gyi nang du khu ra btab ste zos na mi 'tsho ba'i lam du zhugs par gyur pa'i tshe srog 'phrog par byed pa'i nad kyi rkun pos choms par mi 'gyur ro/_/a shwa gan+d+ha 'o mar bcas pa ni/_/mar ram til mar chu dron sbyar ba dang /_/zla phyed
[\[290a.6\]]bsten na nyam chung lus rgyas shing /_/ji ltar lo tog gzhon la char bab mtshungs/_/zhes bya ba la/_a shwa gan+d+ha 'o ma 'am/_/mar ram/_/til mar ram/_chu dron dang sbyar te 'thungs na ni lus shin tu nyam chung ba yang rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar lo tog
[\[290a.7\]]shin tu gzhon pa la char bab pa dang mtshungs so/_/nyid re til nag srang ni re re dag_/zos pa'i rjes la chu grang 'thungs gyur na/_/lus ni shas cher rgyas pa nyid 'gyur zhing /_/'chi ba'i bar du son ni brtan par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_til nag po nyin re srang re zos la
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]de'i 'og tu chu grang 'thungs par gyur na mi'i lus shas cher rgyas par 'gyur zhing rtag tu sog brtan par 'gyur ro/_/gze ma sle tres skyu ru ra'i phye ma/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi cha mnyam lde gu zos/_/ro tsa lus brtan nad kyi sdug bsngal zhi/_/lo brgyar 'tsho zhing skra ni nag por 'gyur/_/zhes
[\[290b.2\]]bya ba la/_/gze ma la sogs pa'i lde gu zos na yang ro tsa ba la sogs pa'i yon tan skyed do/_/til nag a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/_/ba ru ra dang bcas pa brdungs nas bsten/_/mi de rma bya lta bur med ngas ldan zhing /_/yid du 'ong ba'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur/_/brag zhun mar dang sbrang rtsi
[\[290b.3\]]byi dang ga_/a ru ra dang lcags phyed ngul chu dang /_/ta bya ba sten na lus zungs rdzogs 'gyur te/_/yar ngo zla phyed rdzogs pa'i zla ba 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_/skyes bu gang til dang lhan cig tu skyu ru ra la sogs pa brdungs pa bcas te zos na yang mi de ji skad smos pa'i mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur
[\[290b.4\]]la/_/de bzhin du brag zhun la sogs pa zos na yang lus zungs zla ba yar gyi ngo ltar rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig bying ga ra dza'i khu ba zla ba gcig_/nyin re rgyun du bsten par byed pa dang /_/'o ma 'thungs ste stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan/_/lo brgyar 'tsho ba dag kyang thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[290b.5\]]zhes bya ba la/_/skyes bu gang bring gar dza bskol ba'i khu ba nyin re zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thung bar byed pa da 'o ma 'thungs pa de ni stobs la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/shu dag kyang ni zla ba gcig bsten zhing /_/'o ma 'am mar ram til mar bcas pa bsten/_/gdon
[\[290b.6\]]gyis mi tshugs pa yi lus 'gyur zhing /_/yid gzhungs tshig ni shin tu gsal bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/mi gang zla ba gcig gi bar du shu dag 'o ma 'am mar dang til mar dang bcas par bsten na gdon gyis mi tshugs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/man
[\[290b.7\]]du ka pa r+Ni ni mar dang brngos/_/zla gcig bar du zas ma zos bar bsten/_/gzugs ni rgya cher 'tshe zhing spobs pa che/_/gzhon zhing mdangs ldan yon tan ldan par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/man du ka par+Ni zhes bya ba sman mar dang brngos ba zla ba gcig gi bar du zos na yang yun ring
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]du 'tsho zhing spobs pa che ba la sogs par 'gyur ro/_/'bras bu gsum dang tsang gi ri dang ni/_/lcags phye srang ni lnga bcu las bya shing /_/ko sha da ki li khu ba'i nang du btags/_/ri lu sum brgya byas nas ri lu de/_/grib mar bskams te rim
[\[291a.2\]]gyis ma lus par/_/bkru sman bya zhing thug sla'i rim pa dang /_/thug ska gang po sha khu 'bras chen dang /_/mar la bsten zhing zla gcig lus bsdams la/_/zla gcig 'das nas rang dga' nyid du spyad/_/'bad pas dus kun du ni ma zhu spang /_/lo gcig bar du spyor ba 'di
[\[291a.3\]]bsten na/_/gang zhig gsod ka'i nad kyis nyen pa yang /_/shin tu stobs che skyes bu'i bya ba rdzogs/_/lus rgyas 'jam zhing mig dang rna ba gsal/_/gzhon pa nyid dang lo ni lnga brgyar 'tsho/_/zhes bya ba la/_/'bras bu gsum dang /_/tsang gi ri dang /_/lcags kyi phye ma tshad srang
[\[291a.4\]]lnga bcu ko sha ta ka'i khu ba'i nang du btags pa las ril bur sbyar te grib mar bskams nas de ma lus par zos la/_/bkru sman dang brug pa'i rim pa lnga la sogs pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig 'das par byas nas de'i 'og tu spyod pa bsdams pa med pas gnas par bya ste/_/'dir ni
[\[291a.5\]]rnam pa thams cad du ma zhu ba'i bag spang par bya'o/_/tshul de ltar sbyor ba 'dis lo gcig gi bar da bsten na gso dka' ba'i nang kyang sel ba la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/seng ldeng shir sha ba dang a sa na/_/rma bya a ru ra dang skyu ru ra/_/go bye byi dang ga btags chu
[\[291a.6\]]'gyur ni/_/bco brgyad nang bskol lcags kyi dum bu bcug_/lcags kyi snod du zhag gsum nyi ma yi/_/'od kyis bsros la de rjes me la ni/_/lcags kyi phye ma zhib par byas te bskol/_/de btsags khu ba cha gcig 'o ma ni/_/cha gcig de bzhin gso ma'i khu ba gcig
[\[291a.7\]]nye'u shing bskol ba'i khu ba cha gsum dang /_/'dir ni mar sar cha ni bzhi dang sbyar/_/'di dag gcig tu lcags nag snod du bskol/_/kha ra rngul med de bzhin sbrang rtsi dang /_/de bzhin mar dang bsres par gyur pa dang /_/de bzhin mar dang bsres par gyur pa dang /_/'phrod pa'i zas dang skom dang spyod lam bcas/_/srang re
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]rtag tu bsten par gyur na ni/_/dpal dang ldan zhing nyis pa bsal ba dang /_/nags kyi ma he lta bu'i stobs ldan zhing /_/rta ltar mgyogs la lus ni brtan pa dang /_/skra ni bung ba'i mdog ltar gnag pa dang /_/kha ni dri zhim bud med mang bsten nus/_/tshig gsal yid
[\[291b.2\]]gzhungs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/zla gcig bsten na me drod che ba yin/_/de ni mi yi seng ge 'am me'am ni/_/btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra'i lus 'dzin gyur/_/mi yi seng ge'i sbyor ba 'di/_/zos na nad kyis mi nyen te/_/'khor lo 'bar ba'i lag pa yis/_/lha min
[\[291b.3\]]tshogs ni 'jigs dang 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_/seng ldeng la sogs pa cha mnyam par byas te btags la/_/sman gyi bco brgyad 'gyur nang du bskol la lcags kyi dum bu bcug ste/_lcags kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag la nyi ma gsum du nyi ma'i 'od kyis bsros la/_/de'i
[\[291b.4\]]rjes la me chung ngu la de bzhi cha lus kyi bar du bskol la/_/de btsags nas cha gcig tu byas pa dang /_/'o ma'i cha yang de dang mnyam pa dang /_/de bzhin du gso ma'i khu ba'i cha dang mnyam pa dang /_/de bzhin du nyi'u shing gi khu ba cha gsum dang /_/mar sar bzhi cha ste de thams cad gcig
[\[291b.5\]]du bsdus la lcags kyi snod chen po'i nang du sman mar de bskol bar bya'o/_/der yang kha ra dkar po nag nog med pa dang /_/sbrang rtsi la sogs pa bcug la de las srang re bsten na dpal dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i bar du
[\[291b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/sbyor bde zla ba gcig gi bar du bsten na me drod che ba la sogs pa'i yon tan thob par 'gyur te/_/'di ni mi'i seng ge zhes bya ba khyag 'jug gis bshad pa'i sbyor ba yin te/_/'di zos na nad kyi tshogs kyis nyen par mi 'gyur te/_/ji ltar khyab 'jug 'khor lo 'bar
[\[291b.7\]]ba lag na thogs pas lha ma yin gyi tshogs 'jigs shing 'byer bar byed pa dang 'dra'o/_/bring gar dza myu gu'i chog 'dis/_/brngos shing mar bcas zos la bsngams dang bcas/_lto sbyangs pa la a sa na'i khu ba/_/'om 'thung zhing zas kyi bya ba byed/_/zla gcig bar du
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]bsten par gyur na ni/_/bde zhing lo ni nyis brgya'i bar du 'tsho/_/lan cig smras pa'i tshig kyang zin gyur zhing /_/dran dang dbang po nyams pa med par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/bring gar dza'i myu gu mar dang brngos pa la sogs ba'i sbyor bas zla ba
[\[292a.2\]]gcig gi bar du bsten na bde zhing lo nyis brgya'i bar du 'tsho ba la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig sbyor ba 'di yis ni/_/til mar bsten par byed pa dag_/de yis yon tan de thob cing /_/lus ni nag po nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/sngar bshad pa'i sbyor
[\[292a.3\]]ba 'di nyid kyis mar ji ltar bskol ba de bzhin du til mar bskol la bsten par bye pa de yang yon tan sngar ji skad smos pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang khyad par ni til mar gyi sbyor bas lus nag po nyid du 'gyur ro/_/bcud kyis len ni dus dang rjes mthun zhing /_/bsten
[\[292a.4\]]cus 'bras bur bcas pa bshad pa yin/_/gzhan dag phan yon bcas pa yod mod kyi/_/rnyed par dka' bas bdag gis ma bshad do/_/zhes bya ba la/_/bcud kyis len da ltar gyi dus dang rjes su mthun zhing /_/bsten cing spyad bar nus pa 'bras bu dang bcas pa gang dag yin pa
[\[292a.5\]]de bdag gis bshad pa yin gyi/_/bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba gzhan dag phan yon dang bcas pa mang po drang srong rnams kyis bshad pa yod mod kyi/_/de ni rnyed pa dang bsgrub par dka' ba yin pas bdag gis 'dir ma bshad do/_/bcud kyis len gyi cho ga las/_/nyams pas
[\[292a.6\]]gal te nad skye na/_/bcud kyis len de sprangs nas ni/_/de yi sman ni ji bzhin bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/bcud kyis len gyi cho ga bstan pa las legs par ma spyad pa nyams par gyur te/_/gal te nad skyes na bcud kyis len gyi cho ga de spangs shing dor la nad ni de'i sman ji lta bu
[\[292a.7\]]bzhin du bya'o/_/bden par smra zhing khro ba med/_/dbang po bsdams shing bdag nyid thul/_/zhi zhing dam pa'i spyod la dga'/_/rtag tu bcud len yin zhes bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/mi rtag par bden par smra ba dang /_de bzhin du khro ba med ba dang /_/dbang po bsdams
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]shing yul la mig yeng bar bdag nyid thul ba dang /_/spyod lam zhi ba dang /_/dam pa'i spyod lam la dga' ba rnams ni rtag tu bcud gyis len yin par shes bar bya'o/_/yon tan 'di dag ldan gyur pas/_/gang zhig bcud len bsten gyur pa/_/de ni dga' zhing tshe ring la/_/'jig
[\[292b.2\]]rten 'di dang gzhan du bde/_/zhes bya ba la/_/bden par smra ba la sogs pa'i yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pas/_/mi gang zhig bcud kyis len bsten zhing spyod par byed pa de dag ni bde zhing dga' ba dang tshe ring ba dang /_/'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten gzhan dag tu bde ba
[\[292b.3\]]phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/spyod pa bstan bcos rjes 'jug cing /_/gam na gnas pa'i sems dang mthun/_/don la blo ni mi 'khrugs la/_/bcud kyis len ni rdzogs pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/mi gang gi spyod pa bsten bcos las ji skad
[\[292b.4\]]ston pa'i rjes su 'jug par byed pa dang /_/gang na nye 'khor du gnas pa'i grogs kyi sems dang rjes su mthun par 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin du gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i don la blo ma 'khrugs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bcud kyis len yongs su rdzogs pa yin
[\[292b.5\]]par shes par bya'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba las/_/phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o/_/de nas ro tsa bar bya ba'i le'u bshad
[\[292b.6\]]par bya'o/_/skyes bus rtag tu yul bsten pas/_/ro tsa bar ni 'dod bya ste/_/dga' dang brta dang bu rgyud ni/_/yon tan ldan pas de la gnas/_/zhes bya ba la/_/skyes bu rtag tu yul bsten par byed pas ro tsa bar bya ba'i sman 'dod par bya zhing de bstan par bya ste/_/gang gi phyir ro
[\[292b.7\]]tsa bar bya ba'i cho ga de la ni dga' ba dang lus rgyas shing brta ba dang /_/yon tan dang ldan pa'i bu rgyud 'phel bar bya ba dag de la gnas pa yin no/_/bu tsha'i rgyud ni skyed byed cing /_/'phral du yang dag dga' byed gang /_/gang gis rta ltar rab stobs ldan/_/bud med la ni thogs
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]med 'gro/_/bud med la rab chags 'gyur ba/_/gang dang gang gis 'phel 'gyur ba/_/de ni ro tsa byed pa ste/_/lus kyi stobs kyang skyed pa'i mchog_/ces bya ba la/_/bcud kyis len gang bu tsha'i rgyud ni skyed cing mi rabs gnas par byed pa dang /
[\[293a.2\]]gang 'phral du yang dga' zhing bde bar byed pa dang /_/dngos po gang zhig bsten pas bud med la 'jug par byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan te/_/ji ltar rta 'dod pa spyod pa la nus pa dang ldan pa lta bur 'gyur zhing /_/gang zhig la gnas na bud med la rab tu chags par 'gyur ba de 'phel
[\[293a.3\]]zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la ni ro tsa bar byed pa zhes bya ste/_/de ni lus kyi stobs dang bzi brjid skyed bar byed pa'i mchog yin no/_/chos dang grangs dang tshe ring dang /_/'jig rten gnyis ka'i bcud len 'gyur/_/gcig tu skyon ni med pa yi/_/tshangs par
[\[293a.4\]]spyod la bdag yi rang /_/zhes bya ba la/_/gang zhig tshangs par spyod pa gcig tu skyon med pa la gnas pa ni chos dang grags par 'gyur ba dang /_/tshe ring bar byed pa dang /_/'jig rten 'di dang phyi mar bcud kyis len du gyur pa'i tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa la bdag shin tu
[\[293a.5\]]yi rang ngo /_/snying stobs chung ba nyon mongs pas/_/gnod par gyur pa'i nad bu can/_/lus mi zad pa bsrung ba'i phyir/_/ro tsa'i cho ga brjod pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/sems can snying stobs chung ba dang /_/nyon mongs pa shas che bar gyur pa dang /_/nad bu can gyi
[\[293a.6\]]'dod pa spyad pas lus zad par 'gyur ba bsrung ba'i phyir ro tsa ba'i cho ga bshad pa yin no/_/nad med lang tsho ldan pa dang /_/ro tsa ba ni bsten byed pa/_/dus tshigs kun la nyin re zhing /_/nyal por bya ba dgag pa med/_/ces bya ba la/_/skyes bu nad med pa dang lang tsho dang ldan
[\[293a.7\]]pa dag ro tsa ba'i cho ga la bsten par byed pa la ni/_/dus tshigs drug po kun la yang nyin re zhing nyal po bya zhing 'khrig pa spyod pa la dgag pa med do/_/de nas snum 'gyur sbyang byas pa/_/ni ru ha dang 'jam rtsir bcas/_/mar dang til mar sbrang rtsi dang /_/sha khu 'o ma kha rar
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]bcas/_/'o ma sha dang sha khu bza'/_/skyor ba shes pas dang por gtang /_/de nas ro tsa byed sbyor ba/_/khu ba bu tsha 'phel byed bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/de nas da'i 'og tu mi snum gyi cho ga byas shing skyug sman la sogs pa'i sbyang ba byas pa dang /_/ni ru ha la sogs pa
[\[293b.2\]]sbyor ba shes pa'i sman pas dang po gtang bar bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba ji skad bshad pa dang bu tsha 'phel bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dag bya'o/_/me tog dri mnam grib ma med/_/'bras bu med par gyur pa'i shing /_/yal ga gcig pa'i shing gcig bzhin/_/
[\[293b.3\]]bud med med mi de dang 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_/ji ltar shing me tog dri mnam ba yod cing grib ma dang 'bras bu med pa'i shing gcig pu yod cing yal ga gcig yod kyi mang po med pa ji lta ba bzhin du bud med med pa'i mi yang de dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/_/gom 'gros 'khyor zhing
[\[293b.4\]]tshig mi gsal/_/rdul gyis yogs pa ltar snang zhing /_/bzhin ras snabs kyis gos pa yang /_snying ni dga' bar byed pa yin/_/reg pa dang ni mthong sogs la/_/bu mnyam bde ba yod min na/_/gang zhig chos dang grags par ldan/_/nga rgyal rigs 'phel smos ci
[\[293b.5\]]dgos/_/zhes bya ba la/_/bu gang shin tu ngan cing gom 'gros 'khyor ba dang /_tshig mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can dag kyang snying dga' bar byed pa yin zhing de dang reg pa dang mthong ba la sogs pa de dang mnyam pa'i bde ba yod pa ma yin na/_/bu gang zhig
[\[293b.6\]]chos dang grags pa la sogs pa 'phel bar byed pa de lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_/de la mnyam pa'i dpe gang zhig gzhal bar bya ste dpe med pa yin no/_/lus sbyang byas te ci nus par/_/ro tsa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/mi'i lus skyug sman la sogs pas sbyang ba byas
[\[293b.7\]]nas/_/de'i 'og tu nus pa dang lcogs pa ci yod pas ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya'o/_/'dam bu gung shing 'jag ma sogs/_/pu shel tse dang bi da ri/_/kaN+Daka ri'i rtsa ba dang /_/ba la 'tsho byed zangs rtsi ba/_/ram nye ba gnyis med gnyis/_/nye'u shing pa r+Na rnam gnyis dang /_/
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]a shwa gan+d+ha kha sral phre'u/_/a ti ba la ba spru ba/_/bi da ri ti pa ya s+ye/_/ra sna gze ma dzi ban ti/_/shing mngar sa la par+Ni rnams/_/re re'ang srang ni gsum gsum cha/_/mon sran gre'u bre bzhi dang /_/chu bre sum cu gnyis nang bskol/_/khu ba bre
[\[294a.2\]]bzhi lus pa ru/_/mar bre bzhi dang bi da ri/_/skyu ru ra dang bu ram shing /_/bre ni bzhi bzhi gzhug par bye/_/'o ma mar gyi bzhi 'gyur dang /_/pir kha sral ra mnye gnyis/_/shing mngar phal gu pi pi ling /_/rgun 'brum 'bra go bi da ri/_/ma du ka dang nye'u shing pa/_/'di
[\[294a.3\]]dag btags te bcug nas ni/_/de bskol btsags pa'i nang du ni/_/kha ra dkar po smig rkang ni/_/sman ni bre re gzhug pa dang /_/pi pi ling ni srang bzhi dang /_/na le sham ni srang gcig dang /_/shing tsha sug smel ge sar rnams/_/re re srang ni phyed phyed phye/_/sbrang
[\[294a.4\]]rtsi srang ni bcu drug sbyar/_/de las nyin re srang re bza'/_/'o ma dang ni sha khu 'thung /_/des ni rta ltar spyod 'gyur zhing /_/mchil pa lta bur 'dod pa spyod/_/ces bya ba la/_'dam bu nas kaN+Daka ri'i bar gyi rtsa ba dang /_/de bzhin du bal la sogs pa'i sman sna re zhing srang gsum
[\[294a.5\]]gsum byas la/_/mon sran gre'u la sogs pa'i nang du bskol te/_/de'i khu ba bzhi cha lus par ma ral sogs pa'i khu ba bzhi po bre bzhi bzhi bcug la 'o ma bre bcu drug bcug ste/_/bi ra nas nyi'u shing gi bar du bskol ba'i cho ga bzhin du lde gur byas pa bcug nas mar de bskol
[\[294a.6\]]la btsags pa'i nang du kha ra dang cu gang bre re bcug la/_/de bzhin du pi pi ling la sogs pa yang ji skad smos pa bzhin du bcug ste sbyar la/_/de nas nyin re srang re zes shing 'o ma dang sha khu 'thungs na ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba des rgod ma'i nang gi rta lta bu'am/_/bye'u mchil pa dang
[\[294a.7\]]'dra bar 'dod pa spyod nus so/_/bi da ri dang pi pi ling /_/sha li 'bras rtsa pi ya ling /_/kha sral phye ma phul re dang /_/de bzhin sbrang rtsi srang brgyad dang /_/kha ra'i phye ma srang lnga bcu/_/mar sar srang ni bcu drug sbyar/_/de las zho ni gnyis gnyis bza'/_/bud med
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]brgya la spyod par nus/_/zhes bya ba la/_/bi da ri la sogs pa'i phye ma phul re dang /_/sbrang rtsi la sogs pa ji skad smos pa bzhin du sbyar ba'i ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba 'di bsten na bud med brgya la yang 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro/_/kha sral phre'u zho 'am ni/_/ma sha 'o mar bskol te bsgrangs/_/mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa
[\[294b.2\]]dag_/zos la ba sar 'o ma btung /_/mtshan mo thog thag gnyid ma log_/dub pa med par nyal po spyod/_/ces bya ba la/_/kha sral phre'u la sogs pa 'o mar bskol ba'am/_/ma sha 'o ma dang bskol ba bsgrangs pa'i nad du mar la sbra rtsi btab ste skyes bus zos la/_/de'i 'og tu ba sar pa be'u lan
[\[294b.3\]]cig btsas pa'i 'o ma 'thungs na mtshan rangs bu med la nyal po spyod kyang ngal ba med par 'gyur ro/_/ra thug rlig pa 'o mar btsos/_/til dang lan mang bsres pa dang /_/kha rar bcas zos gang yin de/_/bud med brgya la 'ang gsar snyam sems/_/zhes bya ba la/_/ra thug gi rlig pa 'o ma'i nang du btsos la
[\[294b.4\]]til dang yang dang yang du lan mang por bsres la kha ra dang bcas pa zos na bud med brgya la spyod pa na yang sngon chad ma spyad pa'i sar pa snyam du sems par 'gyur ro/_/bi da ri yi phye ma ni/_/rang gi khu bar lan mang spangs/_/zhun mar sbrang rtsir bcas bldags na/_/dud med bcu la spyod bar nus/_/zhes bya ba la/_/
[\[294b.5\]]bi da re'i phye ma bi da ri rang nyid bskol pa'i khu ba'i nang du spangs ba zhun mar dang sbrang rtsi dang lde gur byas te zos na yang nyin re zhing bud med bcu la spyod par nus so/_/pi ling skyu ru ra yi phye/_/rang gi khu bar legs spangs la/_/sha kha ra mar sbrang rtsir sbyar/_/zos rjes 'o ma 'thungs pa gang /_/mi de brgyad cu lon na yang /_/
[\[294b.6\]]lang tshor gnas shing 'dod sbyod nus/_/zhes bya ba la/_/pi pi ling dang skyu ru ra'i phye ma ji skad smos pa bzhin du bsten na yang mi de lo brgyad cu lon yang da ral bab pa bzhin du bud med la 'dod pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro/_/sheng mngar phye ma zho gnyis dang /_/mar dang sbrang rtsi de mnyam pa zos rjes 'o ma 'thungs gyur na/_/
[\[294b.7\]]mi de rtag tu 'dod spyod nus/_/zhes bya ba la/_/skyes bu gang shing mngar btags pa'i phye ma zho gnyis mar dang sbrang rtsi de dang mnyam par sbyar ba zos la de'i 'og tu 'o ma 'thungs na yang rtag tu chags pa spyod nus par 'gyur ro/_/kar ka ta li sring gi phye/_/'o mar sbyar te 'thungs pa dang /_/kha ra 'o ma mar bcas pa'i
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]zas zos bud med la phod 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/yang mi gang kar ka ta sring gi phye ma ji skad smos pa ltar bsten na yang bud med la 'dod pa spyod pa khyu mchog ltar nus par 'gyur ro/_/pa yas s+ya dang 'o ma bskol/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi bcas za zhing /_/ba ni
[\[295a.2\]]yar ma'i 'o ma 'thungs/_/de yi sa bon zad mi shes/_/zhes bya ba la/_/yang mi gang pa ya s+ya dang 'o ma bskol ba mar dang sbrang rtsi dang za zhing /_/de bzhin du ba yar ma ste be'u skyes nas lo gcig lon pa'i 'o ma 'thungs na de bud med spyod kyang sa bon zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[295a.3\]]kha sral phre'u bu ram gyi/_/sa bon phye ma kha rar bcas/_/'o ma bzhos ma thag 'thungs na/_/lung bong lta bur spyod par nus/_/zhes bya ba la/_/kha sral phre'u dang bcas pa bu ram shing phra mo sa bon gyi phye ma kha ra dang bcas par zos la/_/'o ma bzhos ma thag 'thungs na bud med
[\[295a.4\]]rnams la lung bong ltar 'dod chags spyod nus par 'gyur ro/_/uts+tsha Ta yi phye ma dang /_/nye'u shing sbyar ba 'ang de bzhin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_/uts+tsha Ta'i phye ma kha ra dang bcas pa zos la 'o ma bzhos ma thag 'thungs pa 'am nye'u shing gi sbyor ba gong ma ltar byas na yang lung bong ltar
[\[295a.5\]]spyod par 'gyur ro/_/zho spris zla ba ltar dkar ba/_/tshags kyis btsags pa zos nas ni/_/kha ra drug cu'i 'bras chan zos/_/rgan po'ang gzhon nu bzhin du spyod/_/ces bya ba la/_/zho'i sbris ma zla ba ltar rab tu dkar ba tshags kyis btsags pa dang /_/'bras drug
[\[295a.6\]]cu pa'i chan dang kha rar bcas pa zos na yang rgan po zhig yin yang dar la bab pa bzhin du 'dod pa spyod par nus so/_/gze ma ma sha a ru ra/_/kha sral sa bon nyi'u shing pa/_/'o ma bcas 'thungs rgan pa yang /_/bud med brgya la spyod par nus/_/zhes bya ba la/_/gang
[\[295a.7\]]zhig gze ma la sogs pa 'o ma dang bskol ba 'thungs na mi de rgas pa yin yang bud med brgya la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang snum zhing mngar ba dang /_/stobs 'phel nyams ni rtas byed dang /_/yid ni dga' bar byed pa gang /_/de dag thams cad ro tsar bshad/_/
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]de bas rdzas ni 'di lta bus/_/brtas byas bud med la 'jug bya/_/rang gi shugs kyis spyod pa dang /_/bud med yon tan gyis dga' spyad/_/ces bya ba la/_/gang yang ro mngar ba dang snum pa dang /_/nyams 'phel zhing rgyas bar byed pa dang /_/yid dga' bar byed de/_/de
[\[295b.2\]]thams cad kyang ro tsa zhing khu ba la 'phel bar byed par bshad do/_/de bas na mngar ba la sogs pa'i rdzas 'di lta bus mi brtas par byas nas bud med la 'jug pa dang /_/de bzhin du rang gi dga' ba'i shugs ba do bas bskyod pa dang /_/bud med kyi yon tan gyis dga' bar byed pa'i
[\[295b.3\]]sems dang /_/bud med la 'jug cing dga' bar 'dod pa spyod par bya'o/_/chos kyi dpag bsam shing myu gu/_/dbang po'i bde ba kun bsten bya/_/yul ni yid du 'ong ba lnga/_/'dod pa'i lha yi mda' yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_/'dod pa'i chos kyi lha'i dpag bsam gyi myu gu
[\[295b.4\]]lta bu yin zhing 'dod pa'i lha'i sder gyur pa gzugs la sogs pa'i yul lnga po gang dag yin pa dbang po'i bde ba skyed par byed pa de bsten par bya'o/_/yid 'ong yul ni re res kyang /_/tshim zhing dga' byed mchog yin no/_/bud med lus la 'dus nas gang /_/gnas pa de ni smos
[\[295b.5\]]ci dgos/_/zhes bya ba la/_/yid du 'ong ba'i yul sgra la sogs pa yul re res kyang tshim pa dang dga' bar byed pa'i mchog yin na yul thams cad 'dus par gyur ba'i bud med lta smos kyang ci dgos/_/gang gi ming thos na yang snying dga' zhing /_/mthong na ngoms par 'gyur ba
[\[295b.6\]]med pa dang /_/dbang po kun 'dren lcags kyur 'gyur ba yin/_/bud med khyo yi rjes 'jug 'phyon ma min/_/sgyu rtsal 'jo sgeg na tshod lus kyis brgyan/_/dga' ba'i phyir ni ngo tsha dben par sbyod/_/tshig snyan smra zhing mtshungs par mngon dga' bcas/_/bud med de ni ro tsa'i don mchog byed/_/
[\[295b.7\]]ces bya ba la/_/bud med gang gi ming tsam thos na yang snying dga' zhing ro tsa bar byed pa dang /_/bud med gang mthong na yid ngoms par 'gyur ba med pa dang /_/gang dbang po thams cad 'gugs shing 'dren pa'i lcags kyur gyur pa dang /_/bud med khyo'i rjes su 'jug cing gzhan la mi 'pho
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]ba'i khyim thab kyi brtul zhugs can du gyur pa dang /_/de bzhin du sgyu rtsal dang lus kyi 'jo sgeg dang /_/na tshod gzhon pas brgyan par gyur pa dang /_/de bzhin du phyi rol mang po 'dus pa'i nang du ngo tsha dang bcas pa dang /_/dben par gcig pu gnas pa dang /_/
[\[296a.2\]]spyod ba'i bag yangs la mkhas pa dang /_/tshig 'jam zhing snyan par smra ba dang /_/'dod pa la mtshungs par dga' bar gyur pa'i bud med de ni ro tsa ba'i don gyi mchog grub par byed pa yin no/_/'dod pa'i bstan bcos las bshad skyon med pa'i/_/yul dang dus dang nyams
[\[296a.3\]]stobs rjes mthun zhing /_/sman dpyad bstan bcos sbyor dang mi 'gal ba/_/'dod pa'i spyod pa ma lus spyad par bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/'dod pa'i bstan bcos b+ha tsa ya na la sogs pa las bshad pa'i nyes pa'i skyon med pa dang /_/yul dang dus dang nyams stobs kyi rjes su
[\[296a.4\]]mthun par spyod pa dang /_/sman dpyad de bstan bcos las bshad pa'i sbyor ba dang mi 'gal ba'i 'dod pa spyod pa de lta bu dag gis 'dod pa spyod par bya'o/_/bsku byug lus dril sman chu blugs dang dril/_/me tog phreng ba sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan/_/glu dang snyan ngag la sogs gtam
[\[296a.5\]]la mkhas/_/rang bzhin tshod mtshungs shing dbang gyur grogs/_/zhes bya ba la/_/grogs po 'dza' bshes kyang bsku byug la sogs pa dang ldan zhing glu la sogs pa la mkhas pa/_/rang bzhin dang na tshod mnyam pa dang rang gi dbang du gyur pa yang yid dang mthun zhing mgu bar
[\[296a.6\]]byed pa yin pas ro tsa bar byed pa yin no zhes bya ba nas bshad pa dang sbyar ro/_/rang gi khang pa'i nye 'khor khrus rdzing bu/_/pad+ma'i ge sar sbrang rtsis myos pa yi/_/sbrang ma bya dang bcas par gyur pa ni/_/sngo zhing gzhi mnyam ri yi 'dab na ni/_/nags tshal khyim dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang /_/
[\[296a.7\]]zhes bya ba la/_/rang gi khang pa'i nye 'khor na khrus kyi rdzing bu yid du 'ong ba pad+ma'i ge sar gyi rdul las byung ba'i sbrang rtsis myos par gyur pa'i sbrang ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa yang yid du 'ong ba yin pas na ro tsa bar byed pa yin la/_/de bzhin du bya sna tshogs dang bcas pa'i nags tshal
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]gzhi mnyam zhing yid du 'ong ba yang khyim gyi 'dab nye bar 'dug pa de yang nyams dga' bar byed pa yin pas na ro tsa bar byed pa yin no/_/mthong na dga' ba'i shing ni sna tshogs skyes/_/mnyan na bde ba'i khu byug sgra snyan sgrogs/_/lus bde bud med rgyan ldan dus dbang 'gyur/_/
[\[296b.2\]]sems bde ma lus 'khor gyis bskor ba dang /_/zhes bya ba la/_/skyed mos tshal mthong na nyams dga' zhing bde ba skyed pa sna tshogs pa mthong bas dga' ba skyed pa de yang ro tsa bar byed pa yin la/_/de bzhin du mnyan na bde ba'i sgra khu byug la sogs pa dag gi sgra yid du 'ong ba thos pa yang
[\[296b.3\]]ro tsa bar byed pa yin no/_/bud med rgyan gyis brgyan zhing dus kyi bde ba'i dbang du gyur pa skyed par byed pa yang ro tsa ba bskyed pa yin la/_/de bzhin du sems bde bar byed pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs kyis bskor te/_/gnas pa yang ro tsa bar byed pa'i rgyu yin no/_/so rtsi dang ni chang dang
[\[296b.4\]]chung ma ni/_/yid 'ong mtshan mo zla zer bcas par 'dug_/yid ni dga' bar byed pa gang dang gang /_/de dang de ne ro tsar byed pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/so rtsi tam+bu la zhes bya ba bsten zhing bza' ba dang chang dngas ma 'thung ba dang /_/chung ma yid du 'ong ba dang 'grogs shing
[\[296b.5\]]mtshan mo zla zer dang bcas pa la 'dug pa yang ro tsa bar byed pa'i rgyu yin te/_/mdor na yid dga' bar byed pa gang dang gang yin pa de dag thams cad ro tsa bar byed pa yin no/_/chung ma'i kha ni u t+pa la ltar dri zhim/_/pi lbang snyan pa'i sgra ni nyan byed dang /_/mal stan yid 'ong
[\[296b.6\]]me tog gcal bkram pa/_/lcug ma me tog myu gus brgyan pa 'dra/_/zhes bya ba la/_/chung ma'i kha ut+pa la ltar shin tu dri zhim par byed pa dang /_/pi wang snyan pa'i sgra nyan par byed pa dang /_de bzhin du mal stan yid du 'ong zhing me tog dra zhim pa'i gcal bkram
[\[296b.7\]]pa lcug ma rtse mo me tog dang myu gus brgyan pa ltar yid du 'ong ba yang 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no/_/yul dang dus la gnod pa gang yang med/_/yul gyi yid la gnod pa chung du'ang med/_/ro tsa'i sbyor ba nye bar ldan gyur pa/_/'dod pa'i 'dod
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_/gang na gnas pa'i yul na gnod pa'i 'tshe ba gang yang med pa dang /_/de bzhin du lus la gnod pa'i 'tshe ba gang yang med pa dang /_/de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gyi yid la gnod pa chung
[\[297a.2\]]zad tsam yang med par gyur ba dang /_/de bzhin du ro tsa ba'i sbyor ba ji skad la smos pa dang nye bar ldan pa ste/_/de dag thams cad de ni 'dod pa'i 'dod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no/_/gla sgang par ba ta ni rims la phan/_/skom dang che la bor pa bsregs pa ni/_/chu yi nang du
[\[297a.3\]]gsur ba'i dngas ma phan/_/slon la 'bras yos chu so'i nad brag zhun/_/gcin snyi skyu ru ra dang ser po gnyis/_/skya rbab nad la lcags kyi phye ma mchog_/rlung dang bad kan la ni a ru ra/_/mcher pa'i nad la pi pi ling mchog yin/_/glo rdol ba la rgya skyegs khu ba bsngags/_/
[\[297a.4\]]dug gi nad la sher sha rab bsngags te/_/tshil dang rlung nad la ni gu gul phan/_/khrag dang mkhris par ba sha ka rab bsngags/_/'khru ba'i nad la dug mo nyung phan zhing /_/gzhang 'brum go byed byig dug la gser phan/_/tsho ches ra la skyer kha N+Da bsngags shing /_/srin bu'i
[\[297a.5\]]nang ni byi dang yis 'joms/_/gcong chen la chang ra sha 'am 'o ma phan/_/mig gi nad la 'bras bu gsum rab phan/_/dreg nas la ni sle tres rab bsngags shing /_/pho ba'i nad la dar ba gsar pa mchog_/mdze la ser ldeng snying po bsten pas mchog_/nad kun la ni drag
[\[297a.6\]]zhun rag tu bsngags/_/smyo byed nad la mar ni rnying pa phan/_/brjed byed nad la bri m+hi phan pa yin/_/mya ngan la ni chang ni blud pa phan/_/gnyid med pa yi nad ni 'o mas sel/_/cham pa zho ni sbyar ma thag gis sel/_/red ba'i nad la sha ni spyi bar bya/_/rlung gi nad la sgog skya rab tu bsngags
[\[297a.7\]]yan lag rengs pa'i nad ni dugs kyis sel/_/phrag pa phrag gong lag ngar na ba la/_/thang chu kha po ra yi sna sman gtang /_/klad pa'i nad la mar sar hwags kyis sel/_/dmu rjid rnga mo'i gcin dang 'o mas sel/_/mgo bo'i nad kun la ni sna sman bsngags/_/khong 'bras gsar du byung //
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]la gtar ga gdab/_/kha yi nad rnams la ni mkhur bkang phan/_/mig nad sna sman mig sman brta bas sel/_/rgas pa la ni 'o ma zhun mar phan/_/brgyal la chu grang blugs dang grib ma phan/_/drod chung ngal dang sge'u gsher cha ran phan/_/dub la chang 'thungs lus ni khrus byas phan/_/sdug bsngal
[\[297b.2\]]bzod dang brtan la rtsol ba phan/_/gcin sri ba la gze ma phan pa yin/_/lud pa lu la kaN+Da ka ri phan/_/rtsib logs gzer la puSh+kar mU la phan/_/rgas sra ba la skyu ru ra phan zhing /_/rma la 'bras bu gsum dang gu gul phan/_/de ltar nad rnams kyi ni sman gyi mchog_/bshad pas nad
[\[297b.3\]]rnams zhi bar nus pa yin/_/de ni yul dang dus kyi stobs las ni/_/ci rigs par ni brtags te sbyar bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/rims kyi nad la ni gla sgang dang par pa ta mchog yin no/_/skom dang che ba la ni so phag bsregs pa chu'i nang du gsur te bgrungs pa'i chu blud na mchog yin no/_/slon pa'i nad
[\[297b.4\]]la ni 'bras yos mchog yin no/_/chu so'i nad la ni bag zhun gtang ba mchog yin no/_/gcin snyi ba'i nad la ni skyu ru ra dang yung ba dang skyer pa mchog yin no/_/skya rbab kyi nad la ni lcags kyi phye ma mchog yin no/_/rlung dang bad kan ldan pa'i nad la ni u ru ra mchog yin no/_/mcher
[\[297b.5\]]pa'i nad la ni phi pi ling mchog tu phan no/_/glo rdol ba'i nad la ni rgya skyegs kyi khu ba blud pa mchog yin no/_/dug gi nad la ni shri sha zhes bya ba shu ka ta ru mchog yin no/_/tshil dang rlung las gyur pa'i nad la ni gu gul mchog yin no/_/khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad la ni ba sha ka mchog yin
[\[297b.6\]]no/_/tshad pa rnying pa la sogs pa 'khru ba'i nad la ni dug mo nyung mchog yin no/_/gzhang 'brum la ni go bye zhes bya ba bse shing gi 'bras bu mchog yin no/_/dbyig dug la gser ba dar ba mchog yin no/_/tsho ches pa la skyer pa'i khaN+Da bsngags pa yin no/_/srin bu las gyur pa'i nad la ni byi dang ga
[\[297b.7\]]mchog yin no/_/gcong chen po'i nad la ni chang dang ra sha 'am 'o ma byin pa mchog yin no/_/mig gi nad thams cad la ni 'bras bu gsum mchog yin no/_/dreg nad la ni sle tres kyi khu ba mchog yin no/_/pho ba'i nad la ni dar ba gsar ba mchog yin no/_/mdze'i nad thams cad la ni seng ldeng gi snying
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]po bsten pa mchog yin no/_/nad thams cad la ni brag zhun bsten pa mchog yin no/_/smyo byed kyi nad la ni mar rnying pa lo mang po lon pa mchog yin no/_/brjed byed kyi nad la ni bra m+hi zhes bya ba mchog yin no/_/mya ngan la ni chang blud pa mchog yin no/_/gnyid med pa sel ba'i mchog
[\[298a.2\]]ni 'o ma yin no/_/cham pa la ni zho sbyar ba zhes bya ba zho dkrugs pa'i nang du dri bzang bzhi dang pi pi ling dang khar btab pa mchog yin no/_/skyes bu rid cing nyam chung ba la ni sha sbyin pa mchog yin no/_/rlung gi nad la ni sgog skya mchog yin no/_/yan lag rengs ba'i nad sel ba'i mchog ni dugs yin no/_/
[\[298a.3\]]phrag pa dang lag ngar dang bcas pa na ba la ni/_/thang chu kha por zhes bya ba dzi dzin na'i sman gtang ba mchog yin no/_/rlung gis klad pa'i gzhogs phyed na ba la ni mar sar hwags sbyar ba mchog yin no/_/dmu rdzing gi nad la ni rnga mo'i gcin dang 'o ma mchog yin no/_/nam tshong yan chad kyi mgo ba'i nad kun
[\[298a.4\]]la ni sna sman gtang ba mchog yin no/_/khong 'bras dang po byung ba la ni gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba mchog yin no/_/kha'i nad thams cad la ni sman khus mkhur ba bkang zhing dbo ba mchog yin no/_/mig nad la ni sna sman dang mig sman dang mig brtab bya ba mchog yin no/_/rgas pa la ni 'o ma dang
[\[298a.5\]]zhun mar bsten pa mchog yin no/_/brgyal ba sel ba'i mchog ni chu grang dang grib ma yin no/_/khong ba'i me drod chung ba sel ba'i mchog ni ngal ba dang sge'u gsher dang /_/tsha ran pa bstan pa mchog yin no/_/lus dub pa la ni ching 'thungs pa dang /_/lus khrus byas pa phan no/_/sdug bsngal bzod cing
[\[298a.6\]]dka' ba bsten nus pa dang /_/lus brtan par gyur pa la ni rtsol ba dang drag shul byas pa phan pa'i mchog yin no/_/gcin sri ba sel ba'i mchog ni gze ma yin no/_/lud pa lu ba la ni kaN+Da ka ri mchog yin no/_/rtsib logs su gzer ba la ni puSh+kar mU la zhes bya ba ma nu mchog yin no/_/rgas
[\[298a.7\]]sra bar bya ba la ni skyu ru ra mchog yin no/_/rma sel ba'i mchog ni 'bras bu gsum dang gu gul yin te/_/de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis nad rnams sel ba'i sman gyi mchog bshad cing bstan pa de dag gis ni nad zhi zhing sel bar nus pa yin la/_/de la yul dang dus kyi stobs las sman gyi sbyor
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]ba ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o/_/de ltar rgyun shes bu las gzhung gi mdo/_/legs par bshad pa des ni ma ngoms pas/_/me bzhin 'jug sogs blo mthun dad pas 'dud/_/the tshom 'di ni me bzhin 'jug gis dris/_/zhes bya ba la/_/rnam pa de lta bu'i tshul gyis drang srong rgyun shes kyi bu
[\[298b.2\]]las gzhung gi don gyi mdo thos pa dang legs par bshad cing tshad mas brtags pa'i rang gi don brtan pa rtogs sla zhing don che ba des me bzhin 'jug la sogs pa'i slob ma rnams ngoms shing tshim par ma gyur pas/_/de dag blo mthun par dad pas mgo bos btud nas drang srong lug ces bya ba la sogs
[\[298b.3\]]bslob ma rnams kyi nang na bsngags la/_/me bzhin 'jug ces bya bas blo la nges rnyed pa'i the tshom 'di rgyun shes kyi bu la dris par gyur to/_/skal ldan kha cig bdag nyid mkhas/_/sman dang nad g.yog phun sum tshogs/_/sman pa rgan po'i lung gis ni/_/rjes su 'jug kyang nad bcas shing /_/
[\[298b.4\]]nad kyi srog ni zad pa snang /_/gzhan dag de las go bzlog snang /_/de phyir phan dang gnod pa yi/_/'bras bu nges pa ma mchis na/_/'dir ni bstan bcos kyis ci bstan/_/zhes bya ba la/_/'di dag ni dri ba'i tshig ste/_/kye skal ldan rgyun shes kyi bu kha cig bdag nyid mkhas shing rig pa yin zhing
[\[298b.5\]]sman dang yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/nad g.yog phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag po dang yang ldan la/_/sman pa rgan zhing mkhas pa'i gdams ngag gis rjes su 'jug par byed du zin kyang nad kyi srog zad par byed pa dag snang la/_/nad pa gzhan kha cig ni de las go bzlog pa ste/_/bdag nyid
[\[298b.6\]]mi mkhas pa dang /_/sman pa yo byad med pa dang /_/nad g.yog med pa dang /_/sman pa mi mkhas pa dag gis bcos su zin kyang srog zad par ma gyur par snang ngo /_/de'i phyir phan par 'gyur ba dang /_/gnod par 'gyur ba'i 'bras bu la ni nges pa yod pa ma yin te/_/phan pa'i sbyor ba byas kyang 'bras
[\[298b.7\]]bu de nyid du zad pas de bas na srog bsrung ba'i gso ba'i mtshan nyid 'di ni gcig tu chad pa med cing nges pa med pa yin no/_/de ltar bya ba la nges pa med pa'i phyir gso ba'i bstan bcos kyis 'dir don gyi dngos po ci zhig bstan cing dgos pa ci zhig bya ste/_/yul de la ni 'bras bu nges pa
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]med pa'i phyir bstan ba ci yang med de/_/des na sman bsten pa dang /_/ma bsten pa dag tshul mnyam pa'i phyir bstan bcos 'di ni brtsam bar mi bya ba'i rigs so/_/de ltar me bzhin 'jug sogs slob ma'i tshogs/_/rtog pa skyes la rgyun shes bu yis ni/_/de nyid ma lus
[\[299a.2\]]rnam par bshad gyur pa/_/gso byas ma byas mnyam por bya mi rigs/_/zhes bya ba la/_tshul de ltar me bzhin 'jug la sogs pa'i slob ma'i tshogs the tshom skyes shing rtog par gyur pa de las drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bus don gyi de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log pa ma lus pa thams cad rnam par bshad
[\[299a.3\]]par gyur pa ni/_/kye me bzhin 'jug gso ba yan lag bzhi pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yon tan bcu drug gis nye bar brgyan par gyur ba dang /_/gso ba ma byas pa ste/_/yan lag bzhi dang yan lag bcu drug gi tshogs pa dang mi ldan par gyur pa de mnyam zhing cha mtshungs par brtags pa ni
[\[299a.4\]]rigs shing 'os pa ma yin no/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_yan lag bcu drug ldan pa yi/_/gso byed bde 'gyur yod mod kyi/_/nad kyi 'dam du bying ba la/_/lag nas 'dren thabs sman yin no/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang gi phyir nad pa gang yang yan lag bcu drug dang ldan pa'i 'byor pa tshad du zin kyang nad med cing
[\[299a.5\]]bde bar 'gyur ba yod mod kyi/_/'on kyang nad kyi 'dam du bying ba la ni lag nas 'dren zhing bslang ba'i thabs sman kho na yin par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to/_/de yang tsa ra ka las nad pa gang sman med par nad las thar zhing ldang ba yod kyang /_/de ni sman gyi yan lag phun sum tshogs pas gsos pa la ra
[\[299a.6\]]nad med pa yin te/_/dper na skyes bu ltung zhing 'gyel bar gyur pa la la zhig ldang bar nus pa cung zad yod du zin pa la yang /_/skyes bu gzhan zhig gis lag nas drangs na de shin du myur bar nyam nga ba med pas ldang bar 'gyur ro/_/nad pa gso ba'i sman gyi sbyor ba yongs su rdzogs pa yang de dang 'dra'o
[\[299a.7\]]zhes bya ba bshad pa lta bu'o/_/'tsho dang 'chi bar 'gyur ba la/_/kun la sman yod ma yin zhing /_/thabs la ltos pa ma yin la/_/gzhan du thabs la ltos pa'i nad/_/thabs kyis bsgrubs na 'grub 'gyur bas/_/rgyu med par ni gtan tshigs min/_/zhes bya ba la/_nad pa 'chi bar
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]'gyur ba thams cad ni sman gyis 'tsho bar 'gyur ba ma yin te/_/gang gi phyir nad thams cad gso ba'i thabs la rag las shing ltos pa ma yin gyi/_/gzhan thabs la ltos dgos pa'i nad ni gso ba'i thabs med par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/de bas na khyed kyis bshad pa'i rgyu med par bshad pa de ni
[\[299b.2\]]gtan tshigs su rung ba ma yin no/_/'di yang tsa ra ka las nad pa gang sman med pa 'ga' zhig gis 'chi bar 'gyur ba de ni sman gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs pas sos par 'gyur ba yin te/_/gang gi phyir nad thams cad kyang gso ba'i thabs la ltos dgos pa dag kyang gso ba med par
[\[299b.3\]]'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bshad pa yin no/_/gang yang khyed kyis phun tshogs ni/_/kun dang ldan pas gsos na yang /_/'chi 'gyur zhes smra de ma yin/_/thabs ni thabs min 'gyur yod min/_/zhes bya ba la/_gang yang khyod kyi yan lag bcu drug gi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan pas
[\[299b.4\]]gsos su zin kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ba dag snang ngo zhes smra ba ma yin te/_/de ni mi rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_sman gyis gsor mi rung ba'i nad pa yang sman de dag gso ba'i thabs su 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/sman pa shin tu mkhas pa dag kyang nad pa la yongs su rtog cing gso ba'i sbyor ba 'jug
[\[299b.5\]]tu zin yang gsor mi rung ba la 'tsho ba yod pa ma yin no/_/gal te de lta'i thabs ldan zhing /_/blo ldan gso ba byas gyur kyang /_/sngon las nyes pa ma grub pa/_/yan lag bcu drug ldan med yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_gal te nad pa gso ba'i thams yan lag bcu drug phun sum
[\[299b.6\]]tshogs pa dang ldan zhing nad pa blo dang ldan pa la gso pa'i dpyad byas su zin kyang /_/gso ba ma grub bar gyur ba 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas tshe zad ba la sogs ba'i dbang gis ma grub pa yod na yang yan lag bcu drug dang ldan ba'i gso ba ni med pa ma yin no/_/me dang chu sogs dugs dang ni/_/rengs sogs
[\[299b.7\]]mi 'grub su zhig zer/_/zhes bya ba la/_me dang chu la sogs pas dugs dang rengs pa la sogs pa'i las mi byed do/_/zhes su zhig zer te/_dugs kyi las ni mes byed pa yin la/_/rengs pa ni chus byed pa yin te/_/sogs pa'i sgras ni rlung gis ni dran pa rnyed pa'i lus byed pa yin par ni kun
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]la grags pa de ltar su zhig mi 'dod/_/brta dang nyams smad 'o ma dang /_/'bras ngan mi byed su zhig 'dod/_/ces bya ba la/_/skyes bu su zhig 'o mas lus brta ba dang /_/'bras ngan pa be du zhes bya bas nyams smad par mi 'gyur bar su zhig mi 'dod de/_/de yang
[\[300a.2\]]kun la grags pa yin no/_/ma sha kha sral la sogs la/_/ro tsa mi nus su zhig zer/_/zhes bya ba la/_gzhan yang mon sran sde'u ma sha dang /_/kha sral phre'u ad ma ku ba ta zhes bya ba la sogs pas ro tsa par mi 'gyur ro zhes su zhig zer te kun la yang 'di grags pa yin no zhes bya pa'i bar du'o/_/
[\[300a.3\]]bshang gci skyed dang mang bar ni/_/nad la the tshom su zhig za/_/zhes bya ba la/_bshang ba skyed par byed pa dang gci ba mang bar gyur ba ni nad yin par su zhig the tshom za ste/_/the tshom med pa yin no/_/sngags dang rgyud ni med pa ru/_/gang gis dug ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/yang srog
[\[300a.4\]]chags su zhig la dug sngags kyis ma btab cing /_/gso ba'i rgyud kyi cho ga las bshad pa'i dug bsal ba'i thabs zas dang skom sman sna tshogs pa med par dug de sus 'ju bar 'gyur te/_/gang gis kyang 'ju bar mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes bya ba'i don to/_gag pa la sogs gso ba ni/_/med par gang
[\[300a.5\]]zhig bde bar 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la/_/skyes bu gang zhig gag pa dang gnye'u reng dang mur 'gram gyi nad la gso ba'i sbyor ba ma byas par/_/gang zhig bde bar 'gyur te su yang mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'on kyang dus min 'chi la sogs/_/grub mtha' kun du nges par grags/_/'bad ba chen po
[\[300a.6\]]dag gis ni/_/ji ltar gzhan gyis bzlog par nus/_/zhes bya ba la/_'on kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba la sogs pa'i bstan bcos kyi grub pa'i mtha' thams cad la grags pa yin pas na de sbyin pa dang /_/sbyin sreg dang /_dka' thub dang sdom pa la sogs pa 'bad pa chen po yin yang gso ba'i bstan
[\[300a.7\]]bcos ltar ma byas na ji ltar bzlog par 'gyur te gang gis kyang bzlog par mi nus so/_/tsan+dan la sogs tsha sogs pa/_/lung las grags pa bzhin du sel/_/zhes bya ba la/_tsan+dan dang a ru ra la sogs pa'i sman tsha ba dang grang ba la sogs pa sel ba yin par ni bstan bcos kyi lung las
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]grags pa yin na de yang de bzhin du 'gyur ba yin no/_/rims la smyung dang brta ba dag_/bstan bcos nyid las grags pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/rims la dang por smyung ba dang /_/phyis brta ba byas pas phan pa ni gso ba'i bstan bcos las 'jig rten du grags pa yin no/_/yan lag
