[\[300b.2\]]bzhi pa'i yon tan 'byor/_/legs bar brtags nas sbyar bya zhing /_/gzhan du nad kyi tshogs 'joms pa/_/gso ba the tshom bcas mi bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/me bzhin 'jug nad sel ba'i gso ba ni yan lag bzhi po sman pa dang nad pa dang /_/nad g.yog dang /_/nad ba'i yon tan bzhi po las
[\[300b.3\]]yon tan bzhi bzhir 'phros pa mkhas shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa de dag 'byor zhing phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/de bzhin du gnod pa dang /_/gnod ba la sogs pa bcu gnyis legs par brtags nas nye bar sbyar bar bya zhing gzhan du na nad kyi tshogs 'joms par byed pa min par gso
[\[300b.4\]]ba zhes bya ba de la the tshom dang bcas par mi bya'o/_/'di ni dus min 'chi zhags pa/_/brtan po bcom par byed pa yin/_/nad kyis skrag cing 'jigs pa la/_/sngags med pa yi srung skud yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/bstan bcos 'di ni dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i
[\[300b.5\]]zhags pa brtan po 'joms par byed pa yin te/_/ji ltar zhags pa 'di mtshon rnon pos gcod par byed mi nus te/_/gso ba'i thabs kyis gcod pa yin no/_/de bzhin du nad kyis skrag cing 'jigs pa'i skyes bu la bstan bcos 'di sngags med cing sngags kyis ma btab pa'i srung skud kyang yin no/_/
[\[300b.6\]]'di ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams/_/sel byed bdud rtsi mngon sum yin/_/snod ngan gnas na 'phral du ni/_/ha la ha lar 'gyur pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/sman dpyad kyi gso ba'i rgyud 'di ni 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnams sel bar byed cing rgas pa dang /_/na ba dang /_/'chi ba'i sdug bsngal
[\[300b.7\]]'joms par byed pa yin pas rtsi dang 'dra ba yin te/_/gang gi phyir bdud rtsi don du gnyer ba'i phyir lha dang lha ma yin gyis sdug bsngal gyi 'bad pa chen po byas nas/_/'thob par gyur pa yin te/_/'di la ni sdug bsngal 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no/_/de ltar na yang snod ngan pa bstan bcos la
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]thos pa med pa'i sman pa'i rgyud la gnas par gyur na/_/'phral du de'i mod la ha la ha la zhes bya ba'i dug chen por 'gyur ba yin no/_/bstan bcos nges pa mi shes shing /_/tshig tsam la ni rjes gzhol ba'i/_/gshin rje'i zhags pa thogs pa bzhin/_/sman pa ngan pa ring
[\[301a.2\]]du spang /_/zhes bya ba la/_/sman pa gang gso ba'i bstan bcos kyi nges pa'i de kho na nyid legs par mi shes shing khong du chud par ma gyur la/_/tshig tsam gyi rjes su 'brang zhing gzhol bar byed ba'i sman pa ngan cing smad par bya ba de ni ring du spang bar bya ste/_/ji ltar gshin rje'i zhags pa dang kyang ring du spang
[\[301a.3\]]bar bya ba yin pa dang 'dra'o/_/sman pa gzhung la legs mkhas shing /_/lung la mkhas pa'i bzang po dang /_/las la goms zhing dge ba ni/_/bzang po 'dod pa dam pa yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/sman pa sman dpyad kyi lung gi gzhung lugs la shin tu mkhas shing byang ba dang /_/de bzhin du las la goms
[\[301a.4\]]shing rang bzhin dge ba'i bya ba la sogs pa dag dang /_/de bzhin du bzang por 'dod cing bde ba dang dge ba la dga' ba dag ni dam par 'gyur ba yin no/_/de ltar rgyud kyi yon tan ldan/_/rgyud kyi skyon ni spang gyur pa/_/gso ba'i bstan bcos ma lus pa/_/khyab ste yongs su gnas pa yin/_/drang srong chen po'i gzhung
[\[301a.5\]]rjes 'jug/_/rgya che'i dri ma med pa'i gnas/_/rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab cing /_/bsdum don nye bar mtshon byed yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/de ltar zhes bya ba'i don ni gang gi phyir zhes bya ba'i don te/_/gang gi phyir bstan bcos 'di ni don chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/yang na de ltar zhes bya
[\[301a.6\]]ba'i sgra ni rdzogs pa'i don te/_/rgyud ni tshul 'di ltar rdzogs bar byas la/_/de ltar rdzogs par byas pa'i rgyud kyi yon tan thams cad ni ldan la/_/rgyud kyi skyon thams cad ni spangs ba yin no/_/de yang 'dis lus 'dzin cing sdud ba'i don gyis na rgyud de/_/rgyud de'i yon tan ni drang srong tsa ra kas bshad
[\[301a.7\]]de/_/de 'dir brjod bar bya'o/_/grags pa chen po dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pas kun du brten pa/_/don shin tu mang ba nyams dang ldan pa'i skye bo rnams kyis bsngags pa/_/slob ma dam pa gsum gyi blo la phan pa/_/tshig zlos pa'i nyes pa dang bral ba/_/lung du gyur pa/_/mdo dang bshad pa dang /_/bsdu ba'i rim pa legs
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]par bshad pa/_/gzhi bzang ba/_/tshig zur chag pa med pa/_/mi go bar bya ba'i sgra med pa/_/ming yongs su rdzogs pa/_/brgyud pa'i rim pas rtogs pa'i don dang ldan pa/_/don gyi de kho na nyid nges pa/_/gtso bor gyur pa/_/don mthun pa dang ldan pa/_/don tshol zhing 'dres pa med pa/_/rab du byed ba ma 'dres
[\[301b.2\]]pa/_/myur du 'jug cing rtogs par byed pa/_/mtshan nyid dang ldan zhing dpe dang bcas pa ste/_/bstan bcos 'di ni de lta bu yin par bya'o/_/de yang ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pas mun pa'i tshogs thams cad gsal te/_/dngos po thams cad snang ba dang 'dra bar byas pa yin no/_/
[\[301b.3\]]de la rgyud kyi skyon ni the tshom dang bcas pa dang /_/don med pa dang //tshig zlos pa dang /_/go rims 'chol ba dang /_/cho ga dang mi ldan pa dang /_/shin tu mangs ba dang /_/'gal ba la sogs pa'o/_/rgyud de yang gso ba'i bstan bcos ma lus pa la kun nas khyab ste gnas pa yangs pa rgya che ba/_/dri ma
[\[301b.4\]]med cing skyon med pa ste/_/gang 'di drang srong chen po rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i gzhung rgya che zhing dri ma med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i rgyud de ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar zab cing 'jug par byed cing /_/rgyud de ni tshangs pas bshad pa'i bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gzhung chen po 'di de'i don yang mtshon par byed pa
[\[301b.5\]]yin te/_/rgyud 'dis bsdus pa'i don de yang mtshon zhing ston par byed pa yin no/_/sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa'i rgya mtsho bsrubs pa las/_/yan lag brgyad bsdus bdud rtsi'i tshogs thob gang /_/de las don chen rtsol ba zhen pa rnams/_/dga' bar bya phyir rgyud 'di logs shig
[\[301b.6\]]byas/_/zhes bya ba la/_/sman dpyad gang la yan lag brgyad yod pa de ni sman dpyad yan lag brgyad pa ste/_/de nyid du ni rgya mtsho lta bu ste bdud rtsi 'byung ba chos dang mthun pa dang /_/don zab par mthun pa'i phyir rgya mtsho zhes bya ste/_/de bsrubs shing rnam par glongs ba'i tshul gyis 'bad par
[\[301b.7\]]bya ba'i rgyu de las yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa'i bdud rtsi'i phung po chen po thob par 'gyur ba yin la/_/yan lag brgyad pa bsdus pa'i bdud rtsi'i tshogs thob pa de las don che zhing bgos pa chen po dang ldan pa 'di sman pa rtsol ba zhan zhing 'bad pa chung ngu dang ldan pa rnams kyi dga' ba
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]bskyed par bya ba'i phyir yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud 'di logs shin tu gud du byas pa yin no/_/'di ni lung chen las grags shing /_/'bras bu mngon du ston byed pas/_/sngags dang 'dra bar legs sbyar gyi/_/log dpyod nam yang mi bya'o/_/zhes bya ba
[\[302a.2\]]la/_/rgyud 'di ni sman dpyad kyi lung chen po las grags shing /_/lung gi tshad ma dang ldan pa dang /_/'bras bu 'phral du mngon sum du ston par byed ba'i phyir sngags dang 'dra bar yang dag par sbyar bar bya ste/_/ji ltar sngags kyi 'bras bu ni rgyu gang gis gnod pa sel bar dpyad par mi bya ba'i yid ches
[\[302a.3\]]pa nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba yin pa dang 'dra bar/_/'di'i sbyor ba la yang yid ches pa nyid kyis bsgrub kyi/_/log par rtog pa'i dpyod pa dag ni yang mi bya'o/_/'di bklags rtogs dang nyams blangs pas/_/tshe ring ba dang nad med dang /_/chos dang nor dang bde dang grags/_/nges par 'thob
[\[302a.4\]]par 'gyur ba yin/_/zhes bya ba la/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud 'di bklags pa dang /_/rtogs shing khong du chud pa dang /_/sbyor ba ji skad smos pa dang nyams su blangs pa las tshe ring ba dang /_/nad med pa dang /_/chos dang nor dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_/grags par 'gyur ba
[\[302a.5\]]nges bar gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni bltas na bsdus don rtogs nus pas/_/rang gi goms las sman pas bskyod mi nus/_/rgya chen rgyud gzhan dag las goms gyur pas/_/mi bskyod gyur gang de ni ngo mtshar med/_/ces bya ba la/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i
[\[302a.6\]]gzhung 'di bklags shing bltas na bsdus pa bzhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos kyi don rtogs shing shes bar nus pa dang /_/de bzhin du rang gi goms pa'i las de yang dang yang du bstan zhing nyams su blangs par gyur pa'i las la sman pa 'di la ma brten pa gzhan dag gis bskyod bar mi nus shing /_/
[\[302a.7\]]the tshom gyis sun 'byin zhing rgol bas tsher bcad bar mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don yin la/_/gal te sman dpyad kyi rgyud rgya chen po gzhan dag las dka' ba chen pos bslabs te bya bar gyur nas/_/las la glags mi thod cing mi bskyod par gyur pa yod mod kyi/_/de lta bu gang yin de ni
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]'bad pa chen po las byung ba yin pa'i 'bras bu yin pas ngo mtshar mi che'i/_/'di ni tshegs chung dus goms pa chen po thob pa yin pas ngo mtshar che'o/_/gal te tsa ra kas ni bslabs gyur des ni legs thos sogs/_/las bshad nad kyi ming tsam yang ni shes bar 'gyur ma yin/_/tsa ra ka
[\[302b.2\]]la ma bslabs gso ba dag ni ma goms pa'i/_/nyon mongs des ni nad pa rnams kyi gso ba ji ltar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/gal te sman pa tsa ra ka 'ba' zhig bslabs shing byang bar byas par gyur pa des ni drang srong legs thos kyis byas pa la sogs pa'i gzhung las bshad pa'i nad kyi tshogs nad
[\[302b.3\]]phran tshegs dang /_/mgo ba'i nad dang /_/mig gi 'bras bu dkar nag dang /_/rab rib kyi nad dang /_/rab rib kyi nad dang /_/rna ba dang /_/sna'i nad rnams kyi ming gi tha snyad tsam yang shes par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing /_/de yang phyi rol du gyur pa ma yin no/_/yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de'i nad gzhi dang mtshan nyid dang gso ba dag mi
[\[302b.4\]]shes pa dag smos kyang ci dgos so zhes ston pa yin no/_/gal te zhes bya ba la ni phyogs gnyis pa ston pa'i phyir smos pa yin te/_/gal te tsa ra ka zhes bya bas gzhung la ma bslabs shing shes par ma gyur gyi/_/legs thos kyis bshad pa la sogs pa'i gzhung 'ba' zhig tsam bslabs
[\[302b.5\]]par gyur na ni/_/nad gzhi dang lus zungs la sogs pa gnod par bya ba dang /_/yul dang /_/dus dang /_/lus dang /_/kha zas dang /_/snying stobs dang /_/rang bzhin la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i gso ba'i bya ba la ma goms shing mi shes pa yin pas/_/de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i shes pa dang mi
[\[302b.6\]]ldan pa'i sman pa ngan pa des nad kyis gzer ba'i nad rnams la gso ba ji ltar bya ste/_/de ltabus kyang nad bsal ba'i bya ba ci yang bya bar mi nus te/_/gso ba'i bya ba la ma bslabs pa'i phyir ro/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i snying po 'dir ni de gnyis ka'i don ston pa yin pas 'di la
[\[302b.7\]]bslabs pas ni nges par nad gso bar nus pa yin no/_/mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis legs par bshad par gyur pa'ang /_/shin tu rmongs pas mngon par spyad par mi byed gang yin de/_/de ni dang por sman dpyad bstan bcos skyon med bklags gyur zhing /_/skyes bu'i tshe yis ji srid thub kyi
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]bar du bslab par byed/_/ces bya ba la/_/rang gi blo'i stobs la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub par mi nus pa'i dngos po rang gi yul ma yin pa dag la phyogs 'dzin par byed pa ni mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ste/_/de'i dbang ni nus pa ste/_/mngon par zhan pa de lta bu'i
[\[303a.2\]]dbang de las legs par bshad cing bstan pa'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud las shin tu rmongs shing yon tan dang /_/skyon gyi bye brag mi shes pas mngon par mi brtson zhing klog pa dang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson par mi byed pa de dag ni nges par rmongs par gyur pas dang po smon dpyad gyi bstan bcos
[\[303a.3\]]tshangs pas bshad la/_/sh+lo ka 'bum yod pa'i gzhung la skyo ba med par bslab cing skyes bu'i tshe ji srid thub pa'i tshad lo brgya'i bar du bklags shing slob pas mngon par zhen pa mi 'dor ba de yang rmongs pa zhes bya'o/_/rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhi bya'i phyir/_/til mar mar sar sbrang
[\[303a.4\]]rtsi rim bzhin bsten/_/de ltar tshangs pa'am tshangs pa'i bu yis bshad/_/tshig gi dbye bas bshad kyang khyad 'phags med/_/ston pa po yi dbang gis ni/_/sman gyi nus pa khyad 'phags yin/_/de bas phrag dog spangs nas ni/_/bar ma nyid la bsten bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/
[\[303a.5\]]gal te gzhan dag 'di skad ces smra ba po'i khyad par las rdzas kyi nus pa yang phul du byung bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes rgol na/_/de ni de ltar ma yin te/_/gang gi phyir rlung gi nad la ni til mar phan la/_/mkhris pa'i nad la ni mar sar phan zhing /_/bad kan gyi nad la ni sbrang rtsi phan la/_/de ltar
[\[303a.6\]]rim bzhin phan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de ltar tshangs pas bshad pa'am/_/tshangs ba'i bu sam ku mA ras bshad pa'am/_/'am zhes pa'i sgras ni kho bo cag la sogs pas bshad du zin kyang /_/de ni de dag nying la gcig nas gcig tu lung brgyud pa yin gyi/_/sngags med par tshig gi
[\[303a.7\]]sgras bstan ba'i khyad par nus pa'i khyad par du gyur pa yang ma yin te/_/smra ba po'i khyad par las sman gyi khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin pas/_/de'i phyir gnas pa ma yin pa la phrag dog byed pa de spangs shing bor nas phyogs su ma lhung pa'i lam bar ma nyid la blos bsten zhing gnas bar bya zhing
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]rang nyid dus dang blo dang 'tsham pa'i bstan bcos gang yin pa yang shes par bya zhing /_/'di ni dgos pa med pa yin no zhes brtags shing shes par bya'i/_/gnas ma yin pa la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/_/drang srong gis bshad phyir dga' na/_/legs thos tsa ra kar ma zad/_/lug
[\[303b.2\]]sogs kyis byas cis mi slob/_/de bas legs bshad gzung bar bya/_/zhes bya ba la/_/gal te khyod 'di skad du kho bo ni drang srong gis bshad pa'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud la dga' zhing dang bas de nyid la slob par byed kyi/_/khyod kyi rgyud 'di la slob bar mi byed do zhes zer na/_/de ltar ni tsa ra ka
[\[303b.3\]]dang legs thos zhes bya ba'i gzhung de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/_/drang srong lug la sogs pas bshad pa'i lung gi gtsug lag rnams la khyod kyis ci'i phyir slob par mi byed/_/drang srong gis byas pa kun la slob par rigs na legs par bshad pa la dga' ba'i phyir sman pa thams cad
[\[303b.4\]]kyang tsa ra ka dang legs thos la mang du slob par byed kyi/_/drang srong lug la sogs pas bshad pa'i lung gtsug lag yod du zin kyang slob par mi byed do/_/de bas legs par bshad pa'i tshig gi sdeb sbyor dang ldan pa la dga' na yang kho bos bshad pa 'di nyid gzung zhing bslab par bya'o
[\[303b.5\]]zhes bya ba'i don to/_/'di ni tshe yi rig byed rgya mtsho yi/_/snying po las ni snying po blangs nas su/_/rnam par sbyar las dge ba gang thob pa/_/de yis 'gro bas de nyid mthong bar shog_/ces bya ba la/_/tshig 'dis ni gzhung rtsom par byed pas de yan chad gso ba'i bstan bcos rdzogs par byas nas
[\[303b.6\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo bar bya ba'i phyir smos pa yin te/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud 'di ni snying po dang 'dra ba yin la/_/gzhung gi don tshig tu rnam par sbyar ba'o/_/gang gis she na/_/tsho'i rig byed kyi tshig gi tshogs rgya mtsho ltar zab cing rgya che ba'i snying par gyur pa yin te/_/de yang snying
[\[303b.7\]]po zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'gro ba rnams kyi snying ni lus kyi phyogs gcig na gnas su zin kyang lus kyi tshogs thams cad la khyab par byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du yan lag brgyad pa 'dis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshe'i rig byed thams cad khyab par byed de/_/gnas pas snying po dang chos mthun
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]pa'i phyir snying po zhes bya la/_/de lta bu'i snying bo zhes bya ba'i don gyi mdo blangs shing btus nas/_/gzhung gi don tshig tu rnam par sbyar zhing bsdebs pa de las dge ba'i rtsa ba de dam pa'i rgyur gyur pa gang zhig thob cing rnyed par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pa des 'gro ba lnga pos
[\[304a.2\]]bsdus pa'i 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad bde ba thams cad bde ba thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa de kho na nyid kyi don mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bde ba'i dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces bya ba rjes su bsngos pa yin no/_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_/slob dpon
[\[304a.3\]]zla ba la dga' bas nges bar sbyar ba las phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi bcu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o/_/dpal ldan pha khol sman pa'i mchog_/tshe yi rig byed pha rol phyin/_/dri med shes pa ldan gyur pa/_/de yi gzhung bshad bdag gis byas/_/'grel ba don mthun ming btags
[\[304a.4\]]pa/_/gsal zhing mdor ni bsdus pa yi/_/tshig don zla zer zhes bya de/_/slob ma rtag tu dga' phyir dang /_/gang 'dir cung zad smras pa 'am/_/legs bshad gang yin de dag kun/_/bdag gis rtogs nyes las gyur gyi/_/bdag gi bla mas nyes ma yin/_/
[\[304a.5\]]bdag gi mes por gyur pa ni/_/dpal chen dga' ba zhes grags yin/_/deng sang na yang mkhas pa rnams/_/grags pa'i dri med sgrogs par byed/_/de yi bur gyur chags la dga'/_/de bu zla ba la dga' dag_/slob dpon blo gros chen po ni/_/rgyun shes don
[\[304a.6\]]ldan ming btags pa/_/don dam zhes bya sman pa'i mchog_/kha che'i yul du skyes pa yin/_/rgyal po dpa' ldan tha gan/_/dpa' ba la sogs yon tan ldan/_/sa steng dgra las rgyal ba yi/_/sa bdag kun tu rgyal gyur cig_/yan lag brgyad pa'i snying bo'i rnam par 'grel ba
[\[304a.7\]]tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba/_/chags pa la dga' ba'i bu slob dpon zla ba la dga' ba zhes bya ba tshe'i rig byed kyi bstan bcos mtha' dag la mkhas bas mdzad pa rdzogs so/_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran ng+ha ra dang /_/zhu chen gyi lo tswa ba dge slong rin chen bzang bos bskyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o//
